de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag /khA hi khA hi/ rdo rje bka' yi pho nya rnams/ /rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste/ /sna tshogs las rnams
grub par byed/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar ser mi srin chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig pa la phyag drug gzugs/
b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob/ /g.yag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /zhing za lcags kyus tri shUl 'phen/ /spu gris
gsod cing rgyu 'dren zhags/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags
tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar skya tshangs ma chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig
phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob/ /sbrul gdug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /rtse lnga rdo rje zhing chen za/ /
kha T+wAM 'phen cing lcags kyu zhags/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin byed/ /stabs glu phyag
rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying / /
dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dril khrol dbyug to stir chen za/ /b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob/ /gzig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas
pas bka' bzhin byed/ /lcags kyus 'dren tshul spu gris 'debs/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi
bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su
rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dkar dmar khyab 'jug chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob/ /bya bang mgo
yi zhal gdangs nas/ /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /sti ra khrag chen kha T+wAM rde'u/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/
rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' bzhin byed/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang
mig can/ /ser nag gzhon nu chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chen rgyu 'dren gtso la stob/ /pha bang mgo can zhal gdangs
shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /b+han dmar kha T+wAM 'khor lo 'dril/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor
yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags chig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig
can| |dmar ser dbang mo chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chen khog 'dren gtso la stob/ /dred chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang
bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /b+han dmar dbyug chen lcags kyus 'dril/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs
kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar
mo 'phrog chen chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhags pas stob/ /dom chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang
bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dril 'khrol lcags kyu dung dmar dbyug /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs
kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /sngo
nag bdud rtsi chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob/ /chu srin mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas
bka' bzhin byed/ /kha T+wAM mda' 'phen rin chen yum/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor
yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang
mig can/ /sngo skya zhi ba chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stob/ /sdig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing //
sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dril 'khrol rtse lnga dung dmar dang / /rin chen bum pa khros pas 'dzin/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing
chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su
rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /nag mo be con chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /stir chen glo snying 'dren cing stob/ /khra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs
shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /khrag chen dung 'thung kha T+wAM 'phen/ /gris 'debs rgyu zhags dbang phyug ma/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum
rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /
'jigs su rung pa'i sdang mig can/ /ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob/ /wa chen mgo
yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /zhing chen rgyu 'dren sti ra'i rde'u/ /rab tu gtum pas kha T+wAM 'phen/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang
bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka'
nyan ma| |'jigs su rung ba'i gdangs mig can/ /mthing nag za byed chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /stir chen snying 'dren gtso la
stob| |stag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dung dmar dril khrol kha T+wAM gri/ thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang
gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan
ma| |'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /bgegs 'dul lcags
kyus zhal du stob/ /rgod chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dung dmar zhing dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /
brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs
kyi dka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso
la stob/ /rta chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /rtse lnga dril dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen/ /zhing chen za ba'i dbang phyug ma/ /thod rlon
g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par
byes| |dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dkar dmar gcig pu chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /
b+han+d+has khrag chen gtso la stob| /byi chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byad/ /rdo rje tri shUl dril dbyug zhing / /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang
bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /
'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar nag yid 'phrog chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /stir chung za zhing gtso la stob/ /spyang chen mgo yi
zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /kha T+wAM dung dmar lcags kyu gri/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor
yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /
dkar dmar grub pa chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /stir chen glo snying gtso la stob/ /pu shud mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas
pas bka' bzhin byed/ /pad+ma kha T+wAM dung dmar zhags/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs
glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' sdod ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /ljang ser klu mo
chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+ha sa khrag chen gtso la stob/ /sha chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin
byed| |rnge'u rdung kha T+wAM gri 'debs shing / /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag
rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar nag gsod chen chags pas 'gying //
dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /stir chen glo snying gtso la stob/ /spang ti mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /rdo rje ral gri rnge'u
chung rdung / /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod
las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /ljang dmar me mo chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/
zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stob/ /skyin chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dung dmar kha T+wAM lcags kyu gri/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du
byas| |brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug

chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug chogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung
ba'i sdang mig can/ /ljang nag sna chad chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stob/ /rnga chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /
sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /kha T+wAM zangs gri zhags pa 'dzin/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'
bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig
can| |sngo skya chu mo chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chen glo snying 'dren cing 'dren cing stob/ /bya rog mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /
sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dung dmar dril 'khrol kha T+wAM gri/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs
kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar
skya rgan mo chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stob/ /skeg chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas
pas bka' bzhin du/ /dbyug dril kha T+wAM rgyu 'dren cing / /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du//
stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /gnag cing nag mo
chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chung za zhing gtso la stob/ /khu byug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /
lcags kyu dung dmar kha T+wAM gri/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags
tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /sngon mo ra na chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug
'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chen rgyu zhags 'debs shing stob/ /ra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dung dmar kha T+wAM dril chen zhags/ /
thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ /ci 'dod las de grub par
byos| |dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /dmar mo bum rna chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /b+han+d+has khrag
chen gtso la stobs/ /spre'u chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /zhing chen kha T+wAM 'phen tshul du/ /lcags sgrog kun 'dzin zangs gris 'debs/ /
thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//
ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ /ljang nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying / /dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs
pa'i gzugs/ /zhing chen glo snying gtso la stob/ /sbyang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / /sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ /dril chen sgra sgrog dung dmar 'thung / /kha T+wAM
'phen cing de'u chung za/ /thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ /brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig
gis| |ci 'dod las de grub par byos/ /pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma/ /ci yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po yis/ /dam bcas bzhin du las kun
byos| |de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i sprin rnam par spros pa bdud btul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang

chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ oM mahA tsit+tA maN+Da la/ kro d+ha ha ha ha/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsa tur yo gI ni hring hring hring / tring tring tring / mring mring mring / kring kring kring / ha ha ha zhes brjod
pas rdo rje he ru ka sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so/ /rat+na he ru ka sbyin pa'i khro ba mdzad do/ /chags pa'i he ru ka dang sku dang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad do//
las kyi he ru ka kun tu mi mdzad pa med pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa'i khro bo chen po'o/ /de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin ma khro mo dang / rin chen dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang / pad+ma b+han+d+ha
'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang / las kyi dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brkyang bskum gyi stabs kyi dpal he ru ka la 'khril nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul
gyis mnyam pa chen por gnas so/ /de'i phyi rim na rnal 'byor chen mo dkar mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo skul byed ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang /
gtum mo dang / rnal 'byor ma las grub par byed ma las/ rdo rje rigs byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo dang / drag po'i cha byad kyis khrag dang keng rus kyi dkyil na zhabs gnyis
thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas so/ /de'i phyi rim na rdo rje phra men ma chen mo dang / seng+ge mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang / stag mgo chen mo stabs
dang ldan ma dang / myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya rgod mgo gsod byed stabs chen mo dang / mchu ring mgo can gcod byed chen mo dang / wa'i mgo can
skul byed ma'i stabs chen mo dang / rab tu sgra 'byin gyi mgo can dang / rnam par rab tu sgyus gsos mdzad pa wang mgo can chen mo dang / mi gtong bar
za bar byed ma phag gi mgo can zhes sdang chen mo rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang / gdug pa'i mtshon dang chas nas gnas par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gsang ba las/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang / rnam par sgyur ba'i tshogs rmongs pa sel
ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dag phyung bas kun tu g.yo ba chen po mdzad do/ /oM sarba mahA kA ru Ni kA ya mahA shrI he ru ka sarba kha thaM/ d+hu pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da hUM hUM hUM/

phaT phaT phaT/ oM mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA rat+na he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da traM traM traM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA shrI pad+ma he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/ hrIM

hrIM hrIM hrIM hrIM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA shrI karma he ru ka sarba kha traM d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM/ oM sarba ma hA kA

ru Ni kA ya/ bud+d+ha lo tsa na DA ki ni/ ha na ha na ha na/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba kA ru Ni kA ya/ badzra lo tsa na mahA DA ki ni d+ha ka d+ha ka hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na lo tsa na DA

ki ni| pa tsa pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA pad+ma lo tsa Na DA ki ni d+ha ha d+ha ha d+ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba mahA kA ru ni kA ya/ karma lo tsa na mahA DA ki ni tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ hUM hUM

hUM| trUM hUM haM/ hroM hroM hroM/ ha ha ha/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ru lu gau rI/ oM ru lu tsau rI/ oM ru lu pra mo hA/ oM ru lu pe ta lI/ oM ru lu tsaN+Da lI/ oM ru lu g+hasma rI/ oM ru lu sma shA nI/ b+hin+d+ha bin+d+ha/

g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ ha na ha na ha na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ oM tso ra kA ra sid+ha he he/ oM gau ra ka ra byA g+h+ri he he/ oM tsa ra ka ka ra sri gA he he/ oM shwa na ka ra gr-i D+ha he he/ oM kAng+ka ka ra kA ka phaT phaT/

oM ga ta ka ra pa ny+tsa ma he he phaT/ hasta ka ra U lu ka he he he/ hrIM hrIM hrIM/ phaT phaT/ mahA tsa dur yo gi ni ha ha ha/ he he he/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo

b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu/ khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi/ phaT phaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ yo ga yo gi
ni phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas thams cad rab tu brgyal/ rab tu sdangs/ rab tu myos/ rab tu bsgral bar gyur te/ bsnams shing gsol nas mi gnas par mdzad do//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las/ sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i stabs kyis dza:
dza: dza: hUM hUM hoHhoHzhes par mdzad do/ /mngon spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzod nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad+ma yongs su
yangs pa'i nang du sems can gyi tshogs byang chub sems su mdzad nas mkha' phab ste sras su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam gyis mi
khyab pa/ me dpung bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing skyi bung zhes byed pa sdangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams/ /shin
tu bde ba'i gnas shig nas/ /bton pa skal pa rab tu chung / /da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod/ /lha cig rje cig 'on zhes smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan ma 'byongs
par gyur par mkhyen to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu smros la gnong longs shig /rje la gus par dam nos la/ /'di la gnas par skal med pas/ /phyi
yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug /ces bka' stsal pas dngangs pa brtas par gyur te rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/ skyes mchog lha rjes su zhig lags/ /'bangs dang
bka' stsal bdag cag nyan/ /phyi yi gnas su gnas su bgyi/ /ma sring bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams/ /'jigs pa'i skus ni bzhes su gsol/ /ci mdzad khyod mkhyen
bzhes su gsol/ /yun du skal ldan bzhes su gsol/ /bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /de ring dam mnos blan chad tu/ /'khor rnams skyong bar mi bgyid dam/ /bka'
bzhin las kun mi sgrub bam/ /theg pa 'dzin la mi stong ngam/ /bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor mi zin na/ /da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang / /shi nas dmyal bar shog ces smras te
mna' bor ro/ /de nas khrag 'thung chen po cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las rab tu gsod byed ma dang / tshangs pa mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dbang mo dang / grub mo dang / bskyod
chen mo dang / rdo rjer gdong chen mo dang / mi mo rlag par byed pa chen mo dang / phag mo gsod byed ma dang / gtum par mdzad ma dang / brlan par mdzad ma dang / phag chen mo dang /

nag mo ral pa chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang / rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / rdo rje rgan byad chen mo dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog par byed ma dang / rab tu gcig tu zab mo dang / rdo rje srin
mo'i cha byad chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ljang nag chen mo dang / be con chen mo dang / zhib bum sna chen mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / bka' nyan par byed ma dang / tsham ngam
gyi gzugs dang / drag shul ma dang / nyul ba mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa ma dang / sring mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan te rdo rje bran mor bka' nyan te/ rdo rje bran
mor dam blangs nas ci 'dod las rnams bdag cag bgyid ces mna' bor te 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshon cha dang gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te
phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par gnas so/ /de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas/ /dbus su zla gam rak+tar bcas/ /ba
su ta yi maN+Da la/ /dri chu rak+ta'i tshom bur bri/ /hrIHlas dbus su bco brgyad gzugs/ /yang na dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ /thod pa b+han+d+ha dmar chen bkang / /brgyad dam nyi shu
dgu ru ldan/ /yang na lnga dang ldan pa la/ /lnga pa'i yi ges byin gyis brlab/ /zad 'phro phud dang ldan pa la/ /uts+tshuSh+Ta yi sngags kyis bzlas/ /thod pa dmar blugs btung bya
zhing / /ming dam b+h+yo 'am ru lu yis/ /mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni/ /kha nas rak+tas rab gtor te/ /he ru ka yi las rnams kun/ /gong nas 'byung ba'i las bzhin bya/ /sgeg
mo na chung de dag la/ /dbang gi chags pas 'dod spyad de/ /ta ma la yi phur bus gdab/ /ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin/ /chags dang gsod dang rgyags pa che/ /mnyam
pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis/ /tsau ra ka ra'i 'khor rnams kyang / /bzhi yi las la 'jug par ni/ /ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bskul na rtse gcig las rnams
'grub| |de nas kun tu bzang mo chen mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to/ /gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di bsdu ba chen po mdzad do/ /de nas sems dpa' rnal
'byor mchog /kun kyang sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog /chos kun ming tsam rnal 'byor yin/ /ming tsam rnal 'byor ma yin par/ /sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'ga' yang med//
de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te/ /de nyid kun tu bzang mo mchog /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las/ /sems ma rdo rje de dag las/ /gsang ba'i nges don gang yang med/ /ces chos thams
cad 'dus pa chen mor mkhyen to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he ru ka 'dus pa chen mo'i dkyil 'khor te le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //a hoH/ rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu mngon
sum pa/ byin gyis brlab tu med bas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /de nyid mi mdzad med par shes pa kun gyi
nang na rab tu bsngags/ /chags pa mi gtong chags med mngon sum dgongs pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi ngang / /sgrub la dga' bas bsgrub tu med phyir bsgrubs
pas 'grub ces rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/ /pho mo med phyir pho mo snang la dga' ba spyod brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces sgrub pa kun gyis gsungs/ /stong par rtogs la spyod la g.yel ba
rnal 'byor min zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /med la gtod cing dge sdig 'chol ba sdig can yin par rab tu gsungs/ /med la gtod cing dge sdig
yod phyir brtson par 'grub ces theg pa kun las 'byung / /bag dang mi ldan rang bzhin med par gnas pa la/ /gtso mchog mi bkur khungs phyin chos la mi brtson sems can
yin par mngon sum gsal bar snang / /de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di bu rnams gang zhig nyan brtson pas/ /'grus par bslabs pa bgra dang ldan pa lobs pa
dang por ngo shes bya/ /skad cig gzugs la phangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin/ /rdo rje slob dpon mchog la dad pas sangs rgyas ma lus kun la mchod pa chen po
yin| |lam la mkhas pas rdo rje slob dpon bkur ba'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes te/ mchod pa chen po
bkur stis mchod/ /dkyil 'khor dang po phun sum tshogs/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i mchod pa la/ /gsang ba rol pa gleng slong ba/ /khros pa'i sprin las bdud rnams btul/ /don
gcig sgyu 'phrul bka' stsal pa/ /tshogs kyi mchod ba dgyes pa che/ /dus gsum rtag tu ma byung ba/ /lam la mkhas pa yin par bsngags/ /brtson dang ldan pas rab mnyan dang /
gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di sgrub pa/ /kun kyang kun tu bzang po yin/ /bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen po rdzogs so// //bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de
kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ sgyu 'phrul bla ma
chen po ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde/ /gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su/ /snying po bla ma 'di skad bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ shin tu gsang ba bla ma chen po'i
dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khad nam mkha'i dbyings
ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad ba/ yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo 'bur bzhis mdzes
pa| rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla mas kun
du 'khyil pa/ ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyibs dang / kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med
pa| ye shes rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang
byung la/ gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas klubs pa/ tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med
pa kun tu yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/ shin tu gsang ba pas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri/ mi 'jigs pa seng+ge'i khri dang /
stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang / dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor
dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs pa ni/ ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir/ /yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar/ /ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir/ /thogs
pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir/ /nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing / /gdod nas dri ma med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par dag pa pad+mo gdan/ /re ba yid
bzhin skong ba'i phyir/ /yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan/ /ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan/ /yon tan chen po'i gdan steng na/ /
sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad du zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las sna
tshogs par snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can//
sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings
kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo
dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed
kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa bskyed pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po
dang / le brgan dang / ljang khu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste gnyis su med par 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| til gyi gang bu 'am mngar gyi sbram bu bzhin kun tu bde ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang / bcun mo gzigs par bya ba'i bla

ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo bsnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang

chub chen po rdo rje myong dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje gsog shes bla ma dang / btsun mo sgron ma'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje
gcod shes bla ma dang / btsun mo gdug pa'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma dang / btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang /
btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yon bla ma dang / btsun
mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang / btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg 'dus bla ma dang / btsun mo
mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla ma na bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo / /e ma'o de
bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i ngang / /ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings/ /dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor bde mchog rin chen gter/ /mi zad
gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla/ /bla med byang chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang / /rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni/ /sku gsung thugs
yon tan 'phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do/ /rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i nges don du'o/ /gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las/ dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa bla ma rdo
rje kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i bla ma la 'jug par gyur to/ /gsang pa'i bla ma'i tshig 'di ched
du brjod do/ /oM chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings/ /kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum/ /ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas/ /phyag rgya
sna tshogs so sor gsal/ /nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/ /mchogs pad+ma'i gdan bting ba/ /dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /rnam par thar
pa'i sgo bzhi la/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dbang med skal ngan gsal ba'i phyir/ /nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan/ /rgyal ba yongs kyi gsang ba'i chos/ /
sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba ste/ /kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs/ /hoH/ de nas btsun mo bya ba kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/ /oM/
sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso/ /kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid/ /ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te/ /shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas nas/ /nI la lta bu'i gter 'byin
pa| |gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste/ /byang chub mchog gi nang gtan bkrol/ /ma chags pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'gro don byang chub
sems bskyed de/ /'gro lnga skye zhing dbang du bsdus/ /sku gsung thugs nas dbang bskur ro/ /zhes gleng ngo / /de nas bya ba mo kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du
phul lo/ /oM/ rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyi/ /bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste/ /dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /bdud rtsi
char chen dbab tu gsol/ /zhes ched du gleng ngo / /de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i
phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/ /oM/ rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab 'di/ /gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char dbab phyir/ /'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor/ /mi dmigs
bde dang spro ba 'dis/ /kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil/ /zhes ched du gleng ste gnyis su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma khyad par du
spags ba rdul phra mo snyed thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni/ la la ni/ gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo
rjer byin gyis rlob/ /la la ni/ 'gro ba drug gdul ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ lha yi gnas na brgya byin mgon/ /lha ma yin la thags bzang ris/ /mi
la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon/ /yi dwags gnas na kha 'bar bde/ /byol song seng+ge nyid du smra/ /dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon/ /sku dang cha lugs tshul
ston cing / /la la lhums zhugs sku la bltams/ /la la tshul srung rab tu byung / /la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed/ /la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol/ /la la bcu drug chos la
btsud| |la la me 'bar chur yang 'brub/ /la la nam mkha' sgra ru 'bar/ /la la rdo rje brag tu sra/ /la la gso gsod pham rgyal byed/ /la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed/ /la la
bdud 'dul ngan song spyod/ /la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril/ /kun kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ theg pa dang
po bcu drug mgon/ /gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrung / /gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan/ /bzhi pa gnyis kyi lta spyod spyangs/ /bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na/ /bla med
theg pa'i dbyings su btsud/ /theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che/ /mang la 'brel pas dra ba'i don//
thun mong min pas gsang ba'i don/ /theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings/ /zhes ched du gleng ste/ /snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas bsgyur ba
dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams/
cad dang / snyigs ma med par gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sa chu sbyan dang mA ma kI/ /me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ /nam
mkha'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing / /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /sangs rgyas nyid las
gzhan pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs
thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben/ /srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing / /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan
gnas| |phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mchog gi snying po bas/ /gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal/ /nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/ /btsal kyang rgyal
bas mi rnyed do/ /zhes brjod pas chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su
med pa las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang / /gzhan du min la shin tu gsang / /gsang mchog snying po
bla na med/ /thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su nges/ /bla ma mchog gi snying po las/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med/ /ces brjod pas thams cad dbyings su nges
par mkhyen to/ /de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i ye shes bskyed
pa'i phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las/ /rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sbrul/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang / /gnas dang
sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i/ /bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/ /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis//
nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa bor/ /bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/ /spros kyang
'phel 'grib med pa'i dbyings/ /de ltar yin na yang de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la kun rdzob kyi phung po byang chub kyi sems bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du sems kyi ngo bo bskyed pa'i phyir//
rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/ /stong zhing dben pa'i sems nyid ni/ /rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de/ /ci yang med la cir yang snang / /mi bskyod rdzu 'phrul sna
tshogs 'byung / /rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang / /sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin/ /gcig dang du mar mi dmigs te/ /mngon shes drug gis thams cad byed/ /
bla ma'i ting 'dzin chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po byed par bstan/ /rgyu lnga rkyen bzhis bsdus pa la/ /rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor che phra bsgom/ /bzhi yi rim pa tshul bzhin
byed| |rgyan dang phyag rgya'i tshul rnams kun/ /til 'bru'i nang du ri rab skyed/ /sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor dang / /stangs dbyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya yang / /ri rab til 'bru'i
tshul bzhin du/ /dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan sbras pa'o/ /nges pas bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsgom/ /dbyings dang ye shes stangs dpyal gnyis/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /ho/ gzugs
ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ /yul la kun du bzang mo'o/ /ho/ cher ba rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /yul la khams gsum byams ma'o/ /ho/ 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te/ /yul
lan bza' dkar mo'o/ /ho/ 'du byed don yod grub pa ste/ /yul la dam tshig sgrol ma'o/ /ho/ rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /yul la yangs pa'i
sbyan can ma'o/ /ho/ /mig las yi snying po ste/ /yul la dkar mo sgeg chen no/ /ho/ sna la nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /yul la me tog dpal phreng ma'o/ /ho/ lce la spyan ras
dbang phyug ste/ /yul la chos kyi dbyangs can no/ /ho/ rna bar phyag na rdo rje ste/ /yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o/ /ho/ kun 'dus sgrib pa rnam sel te/ /yul la me tog
char 'bebs so/ /ho/ kun shes kun tu bzang po ste/ /yul la gsal ba'i sgrol ma'o/ /ho/ gcod shes byams pa'i bdag nyid de/ /yul la gdug pa'i sprin 'phro ho/ /'jug
shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste/ /yul la tsan+dan char 'bebs so/ /g.yas gnyis stobs chen khro bo ste/ /yul la gdong mo 'jigs tshul ho/ /g.yon gnyis gshin rje'i
gshed po ste/ /yul la sder 'phro 'jigs tshul ho/ /gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste/ /yul la dur khrod bdag mo ho/ /lte bar bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ /yul la gtum mo
'jigs tshul ho/ /rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drug tu/ /thub drug phyag rgya chen po'o/ /kun tu sku dang kun tu gsung / /kun tu thugs kyi phyag rgya yang / /lus ngag yid la
de bzhin ho/ /sems nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po las/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las/ /snying po'i dkyil
'khor bla ma yin/ /zhes brjod pas sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dbyer med par dgyis te mnyam pa nyid kyi
dbyings na bzhugs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams
cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhes nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM/ ye shes bla ma rol pa yis/ /phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags
na| |dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /gru
chad bzhis brgyan rdo rje'i khyams/ /kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /seng+ge glang chen rta dang khyung / /
nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la/ /nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ /gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang / /g.yas nas mthong thos
snom pa dang / /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni gcod byed dang / /snang byed gsog byed 'jug byed rnams/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas//
bar khyams la ni thub drug dag /rgyud drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar gnas/ /de bzhin thig le chen po dag /mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dag /bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan/ /sgo khyud
bzhi la 'joms pa dag /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma'i ral gri nor bu 'bar/ /ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /mdzes tshul
mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan/ /ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs mdog /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi
byin 'bar/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste/ /mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /ho zhes
brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las 'di dag phyung ngo / /a ho/ bde
mchog ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen po/ /thig le mnyam sbyor sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i dbyings/ /rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyis rol/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings//
ho/ dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i dbyings/ /ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsang ba'i dbyings/ /ye shes
kun gsal dkyil 'khor spros med bla ma'i ngang / /ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las/ dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
de nas ye shes rgyal po de btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyis su med par gyur nas bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs ba rtser chib nas ting nge
'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs bcu dus bzhir dgod par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung ngo / /dang po bla ma'i lung bstan pa/ /mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems//
ye shes snying po gsal ba dag /sgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le la/ /ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na/ /de ni thig le chen po'i don/ /de ni de
bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni kun du snang ba'i ngang / /de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan ho/ /gsang ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba bla ma'i nges don las/ /gsang ba gsung

gi dkyil 'khor grags/ /b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he badzra swAhA/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta oM/ /a a a badzra pa ta sa ma ya oM/ hUM badzra d+h+r-i ka/ muM d+hA tu I shwa ri/ oM ji na ji ka /lAM dwe sha ra ti/ swA

rat+na d+h+r-ika /mAM mo ha ra ti/ oM A ro li ka /pAM rA ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+Shi hi rA dzA ya/ hUM lA se sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM a gar+b+ha ya/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hrIHha ho pad+ma ban+d+ha

ma| hrIHgI ti ra hoH/ haM dzi ku ru pa na hrIH/ A nr-i t+ya rA ga yA mi/ mai d+ha r-i Ni swAhA/ dzaHd+hu pe pra be sha/ th+l+hiM ni sa ra ma bA ya swAhA/ hUM puSh+pa a bai sha/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swAhA/ baM d+hu pi

su k+Sha Ni/ mUM shrI A raM gA ya swAhA/ hoHgan+d+he tsit+ta/ oM mu Ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu Ne hUM druM swAhA/ oM mu Ne praM swAhA/ oM mu ne sruM swAhA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swAhA/ oM mu ne ye swAhA/ hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita

phaT| oM mahA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pradz+nyA n+ta krita phaT/ oM mahA rat+na d+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pad+mA nata krita hUM phaT/ oM mahA pad+ma d+ha ra

ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM big+hAn+ta krita hUM phaT/ oM mahA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wA na/ mahA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoH/ sa ma s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM
hoH/ oM AMHhUM swAhA/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ oM AHhUM swAhA/ oM/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che/ /

skyon bral byang chub sems chen po/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /phyag rgya bla mar bdag sbyor cig/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badzra sa ma ya hA+oH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes
gsungs pas/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du grags/ rab tu grags/ kun tu grags so/ /grags pas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas yang ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal dag gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur to/ /de nas ye
shes rgyal po de nyid dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /oM/ chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po las/ /ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag /chos kyi dbyings
kyi ye shes kyis/ /skye med chos la dbang sgyur shog /oM mahA gu h+ya ma shU n+ya ta d+harma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ hUM/ dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te/ /skyon med sems nyid
rin po che/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /srid ba gsum la dbang sgyur shog /oM ma hA gu h+ya mahA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra swA b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ swAM/ khams gsum re skong rgyal po
ste| |yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba re skong rgyal por shog /oM mahA gu h+ya ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man+ta a be sha dz+nyA na
badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ nyes pa'i skyon bral dri ma med/ /skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar
shog /oM mahA gu h+ya ma hA pra ti pra be sha dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ hA/ dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing / /grub pa las kyi bye brag las/ /bya ba nan tan
ye shes kyis/ /skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ oM mahA gu h+ya ma hA krita a nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ a ni stong dang mi stong gnyis/ /dbu ma la yang
mi gnas shing / /stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /mi 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog /oM mahA gu h+ya mahA a be sha shun+yA tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM/ bde
gshegs sku yi ngo bo las/ /mi shigs rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog/ oM mahA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa
b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ aM/ bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las/ /mi shings rdo rje chos kyi dbyings/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/ oM mahA

gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ hUM/ bde gshegs thugs kyi gtso bo las/ /mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ra ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje thugs
kyis byin rlobs shog /oM mahA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ swAM/ mi 'gyur ba yi zhing khams nas/ /ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags/ /ma bsags pa yi

longs spyod 'byung / /cir yang 'grub pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rang dbang thabs kyis sgyur par shog /swaM mahA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta mahA bu dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM zhes gsungs pas gsal
la 'bar bas thim par gyur to/ /e ma ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyi/ /ngo mtshar ya mtshan gsang ba'i chos/ /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /sna tshogs sgra rnams dbyings su gsal/
gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab khyab mchog dbyings/ /thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog /ho/ gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las/ dkyil
'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar
lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs brtser chib nas rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungs so/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya/ /gsang ba de nyid nges
pa yi| |snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka' 'o/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge /rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge /lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las/ /sbyar ba'i phyag rgya
'byung ba'i rgyu/ /hUM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te/ /'bru brgyad bsnol nas thugs kar bkan/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi spas
nas thugs kar bkan/ /hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
bkan| |muM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus na/ /ston pa rdo rje
sems dpa' dag /yum mchog yangs ma'i sbyan dang ni/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /'bru bzhi spas nas thugs kar bkan/ /oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar//
zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing / /'khril bi 'tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /laM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su
'khril| |btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na/ /bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad dag /yum mchog kun du bzang mo dang / /gnyis med
dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /swa rtse 'bar ba rin po che/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la
brtan| |'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan/ /maM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /lho
phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng nas/ /bde gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag /yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /
'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan/ /oM bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas
thugs kar bkan/ /paM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na/ /bde
gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag /yum mchog na bza' dkar mo dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri
'bar| |zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /trAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru
lnga'i las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na/ /bde gshegs don yod grub pa dang / /
yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /rin chen myu gu g.yas phyogs na/ /sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na/ /sa snying dkar
po rdo rje'i rigs/ /yum mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang / /dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar phyogs na/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /ral gri 'byin pa g.yas
phyogs na/ /phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na/ /dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho phyogs na/ /nam snying ser po rin chen rigs/ /yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang / /gnyis
med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /pad+ma dkar po g.yas phyogs na/ /pi wang 'gyed pa g.yon phyogs na/ /dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na/ /spyan ras le brgan pad+ma
rigs| |yum mchog chos kyi dbyings mkhan dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas phyogs na/ /gar gyi cod pan g.yon phyogs na/ /dkyil 'khor
bar khyams byang phyogs na/ /phyag na mthing ga las kyi rigs/ /yum mchog gar gyi cod pan nang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /mdzes pa'i klu shing g.yas
phyogs na/ /bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na/ /dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar lho na/ /byams pa dkar ser bde gshegs rigs/ /yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dang / /
gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /gser gyi 'khor lo g.yas phyogs na/ /me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na/ /dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na/ /sgrib sel dmar
ser rin chen rigs/ /yum mchog me tog char 'bebs dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /rin chen snye ma g.yas phyogs na/ /sgron ma 'degs pa g.yon phyogs na//
dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub byang na/ /kun bzang dmar ljang las kyi rigs/ /yum mchog gsal ba'i sgrol ma dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /ut+pal sngon po g.yas
phyogs na/ /tsan+dan 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na/ /dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang shar na/ /'jam dpal dkar ljang rdo rje'i rigs/ /yum mchog tsan+dan char 'bebs dang / /gnyis med
dbyings kyi nang du 'khril/ /thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni/ /rgyud drug gnas nas 'dren pa ste/ /gseg par phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas/ /sku mdog ser pos mi rnams 'dren/ /pi wang phyag rgya tshul
'dzin pas/ /sku mdog dkar po lha rnams 'dren/ /go cha mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ /sku mdog mthing nag lha min 'dren/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /sku mdog sngon po yi dwags
'dren| |po ti brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren/ /me 'bar chu 'bebs phyag rgya yis/ /sku mdog sngon po dmyal ba 'dren
sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas pa/ /rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyogs na/ /lcags kyu 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po yang / /yum mchog rdo rje lcags kyu dang
gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /N+r-i mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na/ /zhags pa 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na/ /khro chen gshin rje gshed po yang / /yum mchog rdo
rje zhags pa dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /sprul mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na/ /lcags sgrog sdom pa g.yon phyogs na/ /khro chen rta mgrin dpa' bo dang / /
yum mchog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngan du 'khril/ /rgya gram gnon pa g.yas phyogs na/ /dril bu 'khrol ba g.yon phyogs na/ /khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil
ba yang / /yum mchog rdo rje dril 'khrol dang / /byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril/ /kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil/ /
gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro/ /bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil/ /spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag/ /bsgyur bas rang sems ye shes gsal/ /de nyid shes rab thabs
su rdzogs/ /rgyu 'phrul dra ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par
spros pa'i dgongs pa la gcig char bzhugs te rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do/ /shin tu phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog /dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing / /gzhal yas phyag
rgya la sogs te/ /mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom/ /shin tu phra bas rnam sbyangs te/ /rig pas rgya khyon tshad med pa/ /gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i/ /mtshon du
med la snang bar bsgom/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / /tshogs chen gnyis las 'grub pa yi/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams/ /nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam
rdzogs te/ /rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs/ /ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya/ /tsa ka li dang tshon rtsi dag /bya dang mi bya med pas na/ /de la dgag par ma gsungs so/ /
'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te/ /sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par mchod/ /bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro ba
ma lus kun/ /dga' ba chen pos tshim pa yin/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dgongs pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / /rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur/ /lus ngag sems
dang chos thams cad/ /gang na 'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba yis/ /dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis/ /kun byas dbang phyug
rig pas 'jug /de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid
'thad dbul/ /snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te/ /bla ma mnyes phyir gus ldan dbul/ /dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pa
yin| |gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/ /skyon rnams ma lus nges pa 'byang / /dad ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na/ /phan pa'i dbang nod theg tshad sbyin/ /des
na dbang phyug rgyal po yis/ /dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to/ /'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin/ /grub pa sa 'dzin rgyal po sbyin/ /mi 'gyur rab 'byams bde chen no/ /
gang 'dod rim gyis sbyin par bya/ /blo dang ldan pas theg tshad nod/ /yang na sras kyi dam pa ste/ /chud ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin/ /sems kyi rnam pa nying khu blud/ /sgo 'byed bde
bas gyen du bskyil/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po des/ /mi 'gyur sgrol mar sku bskyod cing / /sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste/ /tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs bzhed nas/ /go 'byed rdo
rje'i ljags brkyang ste/ /dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur pa/ /rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni/ /che mchog gong na med pa na/ /gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang / /thabs mkhas
byin rlabs che bas na/ /las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni/ /khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni/ /slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo / /hUM/ thabs mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs
kyis/ /rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir/ /gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas/ /rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad/ /'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla/ /che ba'i che ba
zil gyis gnon/ /sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya badzra rat+na ma ku TA trAM/ badzra gu h+ya sid+d+hi hUM/ hUM thabs
mkhas byin rlabs chen po ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te/ /byin rlabs chen po rnam bzhi po/ /dbang bskur gnang phyir gtad pas na/ /rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad/ /
sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /mu stegs rtag chad yan chad nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la/ khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod
pa yis/ /sems can kun gyi re ba ba skong / /oM sa ma ya gu h+ya e baM ma ya a/ slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ni/ /khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sgyur te/ hUM/ nga
ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla/ /thig le byang chub sems chen po/ /nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje/ /ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter/ /nga ni spyi dpal bla na med/ /skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po
yin| |sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu/ /khyed kyi lce la phab pa 'di/ /snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos/ /rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs mchog zung
sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin/ /byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin/ /rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/ /
bstan pa phyi nang zab mo kun/ /sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang / /rdo rje lce yi sgo phye ste/ /bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngom par byos/ /sems kyi thig le
dkyil 'khor du/ /zhi khro 'byams pa'i gter sgoms la/ /srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur cig /dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos/ /skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /gdul
ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod/ /dus gsum rtsa ba gcad par byos/ /phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag /rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam/ /byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa/ /'gro
don byang chub sems kyi dbyings/ /sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos/ /rnal 'byor chen pos dam du zungs/ /hUM/ de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir/ /
me shes rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs/ /snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyangs pa/ /hUM nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar te/ /thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings/ /dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing / /
sgom dang sgrub pas mi 'byangs pa'i/ /rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter/ /rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis/ /khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur cig/ /shrI mahA su kha badzra bo d+hi hUM ho/ oM aM/
mi 'gyur ba yi ye shes gnas/ /ma btsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog /ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan/ /gong na med pas kun gyi rje/ /ye shes rang byung bdal ba la/ /mi
'gyur g.yung drungs thob shog /oM mahA gu h+ya bruM dz+nyA na maN+Dal/ dz+nyA na gu h+ya sid+d+hi swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa/ /'gyur ba med pa'i
sman mchog thig le lnga/ /mtshan mchog rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing / /oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya at+ma a b+hi shiny+tsa ho ha/ khyung gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs
pa yis| |klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa ltar/ /srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog /mchog tu
che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon/ /oM sarba ta thA ga to mahA gu h+ya badzra a b+hi shiny+tsa ho/ /hUM bde ba chen po rang gnas la/ /ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal du/ /'gyur pa
med par longs spyod cing / /thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis/ /skye 'gro sras su 'dzin par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya a nu rA ga ta badzra swa b+hA ba
at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur/ /rgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las/ rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang / dbang sbyin pa'i le'u
ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po nges thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig stan
chen po'i 'phrin las mdzad do/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la/ /gsung gi 'phro 'du
rnam sbyangs te/ /lnga yi tshom bu yang dag gsal/ /sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog /ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar ba'i lam/ /gtsug tu snang mdzad sems dpa' che/ /skur
skyed bya ni rlabs rmad po che/ /pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du yis/ /zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su/ /nyi zla steng du de bzhag ste/ /shes pa gsum po dbyings su bstim/ /rang
rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las/ /ljang khu ni ru 'phang bstod de/ /ni ljang hUM du gnas bsgyur nas/ /yas 'dus mas 'dus hUM la 'dus/ /hUM ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga/ /
dkar la gsal bar skur bskyed de/ /bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ /rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa/ /yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid/ /le brgan hUM ni dbyings su sbyor/ /kun tu bzang mo
bde ba'i mkha'/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga'i yum/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso/ /sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog /zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams/ /
gnas 'di kun bzang yum gyi mkha'/ /sa 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i sa/ /mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan steng tu/ /mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyas bskyod/ /mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan/ /
rtag tu sku mchog g.yung drung sbyin/ /ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /de nas ye shes rgyal po des/ /gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed
na| |rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed/ /de kun gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir/ /nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis dbyings su thim/ /'khril nas
gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad/ /bco brgyad phrag gnyis hUM spros pas/ /klong du hUM chen gcig tu 'khyil/ /kha dog rnam bzhi yang dag ldan/ /rigs bzhi lha mo rnam spros te/ /
stong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed/ /la la gsang mchog dbyings su 'khril/ /la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / /bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan
gdugs dang / /rin chen do shal se mo do/ /dbyibs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes/ /bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
ma lus mchod/ /la la 'gro ba re ba skong / /la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong / /kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed/ /nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang / /gnyis su
med par 'khril nas su/ /'khril nas ga na'i mchod par byed/ /stong khams yungs 'brur gzhug tshul du/ /ga na'i mchod pa chen po yis/ /thams cad mnyes pa
chen por gyur/ /de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog /
sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang / /ma chags pa yi ngo bo las/ /chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung / /spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis las/ /rtogs nas chags pas
su spyod pa/ /yang dag chags pa chen po ste/ /'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin/ /sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis/ /zhing bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o/ /zhes ched du
gsungs so/ /de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma
chen po las/ thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog /bro gar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis/ /'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar
nges| |glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos grub len/ /rgyan dang bgo ba'i
phyag rgya yis/ /'od 'bar bla ma'i dngos grub len/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad grub cing rdo rje nges/ /rgyu 'bras dbyings su sbyor shes shing / /bla ma'i dgongs pa
gang sbyor ba/ /rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges/ /skye ba rnam gzhi rgyud sbyangs nas/ /mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs
par gyur to/ /de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i mdzad spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blangs so/ /oM/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/ /bsod nams
dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs/ /snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs/ /ho/ /oM/ /rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ /rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa/ /rdo rje
rgyal po thig le che/ /ho/ oM/ mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro/ /mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis
thim| |sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po/ /ho| oM/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang / /'dus
pa'i rdzogs chen thig le che/ /ho/ oM/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyi/ /skad cig yud la lhun
gyis grub/ /ho/ oM/ thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che/ /ho/ oM/
thams cad thig le bla ma'i don/ /sgyu 'phrul bla ma thig le'i dbyings/ /dbyings nyid byang chub sems chen po/ /snying po bla ma nges pa'i don/ /thig le nyid las g.yos pa med/ /
ho| sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las/ /tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis mnyes pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul
bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang rmongs pa'i dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen
bo ni ma rtogs/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par zhen pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni/ phyal bar bor/ bram ze'i ngan sngags mang po ni/ blo'i gdeng du blangs nas snying rje chen
bo'i las dang ni/ bral/ gnas su ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni/ rgyun tu byed/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni/ ma rtogs/ 'dod chags
spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral/ rang rig pa'i ye shes ni/ blo la nub/ don dam pa la kun tu gti mug pas rgyun tu khebs/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan
ni| ma rtogs/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni/ rgyun du byed/ tshad med pa bzhi'i las dang ni/ bral/ phrag dog gi tshub mas ni/ rgyun du khrid de bdag tu rmongs pa
dang rtog pa la zhen te yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rdo rje dmyal ba chen
por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so/ /de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so/ /las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de
las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dwags srin po chen po lus gcig mgo bo brgya pa/ mgo bo sna tshogs pa/ lus brgya pa mgo bo gcig pa/ lus dang
yan lag mang po 'dug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul ba'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad
dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so/ /de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs
par brgyan pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyang ba dang / khams gsum gyi sems can bde ba
la gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po
de nyid 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma
chen po'i dbyibs nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de gnyis su
med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM badzra dz+wa bi Sha kro d+ha badzra dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi
phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod pa dal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dba' rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil
ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rgya gra ma mig mang ris su bris pa/ phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud du
bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba/ rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mang
du bris pa/ rtse mo dbyibs bla mas 'og min kyi gnas nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mang gcig tu 'khyil ba/ ye shes rdo rje
rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba/ rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang / ru mtshon bla ma
chen pos phyogs bzhi gra bzhi nas bsgreng ba/ gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/ phyi dang
nad med pa kun tu yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong
gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed thon par gyur to/ /de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang / chem chem dang / shig shig dang / thor thor
dang | gtogs shig dang / choms shig dang / sod cig dang / drol zhig dang / sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' rtul che zhing ba rtul zhugs can
rnams brgyal/ rab tu brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen
po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang / mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de
gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo / /hUM badzra du tri nan sUr+ya tsan+ta pad+ma maN+Dal de ba tiSh+Thi naM zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar
ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng+ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te/ gdan bla ma nyi zla dang pad+ma spel bar bting ba'o/ /de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen
pos btul pa/ bsam gtan bla ma chen po spags pa tshad med pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu
btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen
po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba/ rdo rje ljags kyi gsung 'phrug stong gi sgra sgrog pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i thugs kyis
snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun du skyi bung zhes byed pa dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na
mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ga khyung
gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bkab pa/ khros pa'i rgya mo mthong nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ /gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar
phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du mahA de ba dang / 'dod pa'i lhag na rgyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das bud+d+ha
he ru ka sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o/ /bde gshegs
khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan steng du gshin rje
gan rgyal du bskyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rat+na he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon
cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'khor
lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po b+h+ring gi ri ti gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de
bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /
pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan steng du gnod sbyin stobs bzang gan
rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon
cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /de nas dregs pa'i chen po la
sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong
snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de yang sku gzi brjid chen
po'i mdangs su gyur te thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i dmangs skad chen po 'di dag phyung ngo / /hUM hUM hUM/ ha
ha ha| khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang rol kun drangs/ yan lag
kun gcad gtubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs/ rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo/ /e a ra li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so/ /de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi
rje bo'i yang rje'o/ /dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang /
tshangs ma dang / khro mo dang / dbang po dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin
mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung mo dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang /
me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag chen
mo dang / gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa bran dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus
so| |de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du
mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM AHhUM/ badzra pad+ma pra be sha pad+ma hUM a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin
du chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khab len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srun mo la sogs
pa brgyad 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga yang 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i sku la bdud rtsi mo la
sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku la me mo
la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes
brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te thon par gyur to/ /thon nas kyang 'khor lo
'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so/ /de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes
pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te thon nas yang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jig
pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so/ /de nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma
lus par 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang / yid chos dbyings nas
rol te spor byed nyi zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan steng du rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs
kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor par gnas so/ /de nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje sring 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar
du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so/ /de nas dgyes pa
chen po'i sbrin las bud+d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam
gyis phyin par dgye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig char zhugs te/ sku gsung
thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM badzra a mr-i ta mahA kro d+hi aM aM zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i snam logs
nas thon to/ /'dam khu blud de dran pa rnyed do/ /de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo / /de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas
pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu brtul bar mthong ste shin tu zhum zhing bred nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi'o 'bangs su mchi/ /'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis
na| |mgo dang lus kyang brgyar 'gas shing / /snying yang gas shing gtubs gyur cig /rul myags tshig nas rlag pa dang / /dmyal bar ltung nas 'bod par shog /ces 'bangs su mchi
bar rang rang gi smod btsugs so/ /de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go /de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ /rang rang gi chung ma dang / bu mo dang /
rang rang gi ma dang / sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor du phul te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis 'brang dang / /ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/ /dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/ /dpa'
bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol/ /bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ /ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar//
de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyid/ /ces smod btsugs so/ /de nas de'i ma dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las
kyi dngos grub stsol ba las/ de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang pho nyar dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ba chen po'i don
phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par gyur nas sku gsung
thugs rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo / /e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las/ /mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar/ /khri btsugs nyi dkyil
gdan steng du/ /de la lha tshogs gdan du bting / /hUM| 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su/ /khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /byang chub sems
las sku bskyed pa/ /dpal chen bla med he ru ka /dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de/ /spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun/ /dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad
du gtams/ /rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog /'jig rten khams kyang yog par bkab/ /sbrul nag 'jigs su rung ba dang / /dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /dbu gsum dang la byung ba
