ni| |g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/ /rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis/ /khams gsum mya ngan zla ba'i zhal/ /dbu gsum bar nas rngam pa ni/ g.yas sngo g.yon ljang
dbus mthing zhal/ /thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu/ /srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal/ /dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni/ /g.yas mthing g.yon mthing dbus mthing zhal//
khams gsum re ba skong ba yi/ /lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu/ /'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal/ /skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems/ /dbu dgu rol pa'i byin rlabs las/ /g.yas gsum
klog stong lte 'byin cing / /g.yon gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrog pa/ /dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'bebs/ /spyan dgu dang la gzigs pa ni/ /chos dbyings kun tu bzang po dang / /kun tu bzang mo'i
mkha' dbyings la/ /'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs/ /spyan dgu bar nas gzigs pa ni/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis/ /srid pa'i sems can thams cad la/ /byams mgon
snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs/ /spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni/ /g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan/ /gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs sgrol/ /g.yon gsum byams mgon
snyoms pa'i spyan/ /gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog /dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan/ /gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stobs/ /dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dgu/ /lnga dgu
bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang / /bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan/ /stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /khyab bdal chen po'i rtags su bsnams/ /bco brgyad phyag na rol pa
yis| |stor pa bco brgyad dbyings su sbyor/ /zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje mthing ga gshog pa brkyang / /bco brgyad phyag na bsnams

pa yis/ /rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas/ /ban+d+ha zhing chen stir chen g.yon/ /nang zhags nyi ma khyung chen g.yas/ /zhing chen zla ba 'ug pa g.yon/ /me dang rgya mtsho ga 'u g.yas/ /rlung dang
rin chen ri rab g.yon/ /yon tan bco brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/ /dang po rdo rje dung chen ni/ /khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang / /bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o/ /gnyis
pa stir chen glo snying ni/ /srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun/ /dam tshig stan dbyings su sgrol/ /gsum pa stir chung ril mid ni/ /dug gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags/ /bzhi pa
stir chen nang zhags ni/ /rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyings su 'dren/ /lnga pa nyi zla zung du 'dzin/ /byang chub sems las g.yos pa med/ /drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro thams
cad 'khol ba'i rtags/ /bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor/ /srid pa'i bag chags thal bar rlog /brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams/ /thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing / /'byung ba
lnga la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /dgu pa rin chen ga'u ni/ /dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i rtags/ /dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las/ /stong pa bco brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/ /dur khrod rgyan
gyis brgyan pa ni/ /thod skam 'bar ba'i phreng ba yis/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig mya ngan zlo/ /mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa'o/ /thod rlon 'dar ba'i phreng ba 'di/ khams gsum dbang du bsdus

nas su/ /sprul pa'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /thod pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni/ /dug lnga bdud rtsir sbyor ba ste/ /longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni/ /chos dbyings
mnyam pa chen po ste/ /chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs ni/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /sprul nag
chun 'phyang mang po ni/ /ye shes thams cad 'byung ba'i rtags/ /rtags chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/ /zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa bzhi/ /nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
khros pa'i rgyal mo ni/ /kro d+hI shwa ri yum gyi gtso/ /mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun/ /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta gtso la stob/ /
'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na/ /khri dang nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyar pa/ /khag
'thung bud+d+ha he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /'khor lo
dgra sta zhags pa g.yas/ /b+han+d+ha rnge'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon/ /ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam//
lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na/ /khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /tshor ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung rat+na he ru ka /dbu gsum
phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas/ /b+han+d+ha dgra sta rnge'u
chung g.yon/ /sngo nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du/ /khri dang nyi dkyil
klu yi gdan/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /'du shes phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ljang
zhal| |phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /pad+ma rnge'u chung sdu gri g.yas/ /b+han+d+ha kha T+wAM sa phreng g.yon/ /dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril
ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na/ /khri dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan/ /de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ /'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa/ /khrag 'thung karma he
ru ka |dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ljang zhal/ /phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/ /ral gri zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas/ /b+han+d+ha thod dbyug
kha T+wAM g.yon/ /ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyir min/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i
gzhal yas na/ /mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las/ /mkha' las skyes pa'i phra men ma/ /shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba/ /sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /kun gzhi gnas
gyur phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor sngo nag gau ri ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /spyugs par glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra dbyug pa
g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /skye shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho phyogs ngos su bsam bya ba/ /gsod skyen bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /rnam shes gnas gyur phra men ma//
rnal 'byor ser nag tsau ri ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /sbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /thabs kyis mda'
drangs g.yas pa na/ /shes rab gzhu brdungs g.yon pa na/ /ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /nyi ma bsgyel ba'i
gdan steng du/ /nyon mongs gnas gyur phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor dmar nag phra mo ha/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /spyugs pas
glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /zla ba bsgyel ba'i
gdan steng du/ /reg bya gnas gyur phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor dmar nag be ta li/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /spyugs pas
glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na/ /stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na/ /tsan+d+ra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /me lha bsgyel
ba'i gdan steng du/ /lta byed phra men gnas gyur pa/ /rnal 'byor dmar nag puk+ka si/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /dur khrod g.yang gzhi slog pa gyon/ /spyugs
pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra chen po g.yas pa na/ /tshems bar rgyu 'dren g.yon pa na/ /ag+ne ye la brkyang bskums bzhugs/ /lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba//
bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /nyan byed gnas gyur phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha ni/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /srog chags chen po
g.yang gzhi gyon/ /spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra chung ngu g.yon pa na/ /tsit+ta phyungs pa g.yas pa na/ /ni ri ti la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub byang mtshams su
bsam bya ba/ /rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /snom byed gnas gyur phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor ser nag tsaN+Da li/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /'jigs su rung
ba'i slog pa gsol/ /spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /sti ra chung ngu g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha bcad pa g.yon pa na/ /ba ya be la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang shar mtshams su
bsam bya ba/ /dbang ldan bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma/ /rnal 'byor ljang nag g+hasma ri/ /skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing / /sti ra chen
po'i shun pa gsol/ /spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yas pa na/ /rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na/ /i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor de
yi phyi rim du/ /smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na/ /gsang ba'i mkha' las skur bskyed pa/ /shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /kun gzhi yul
las gnas gyur pa/ /phra men thogs med seng ge'i gdong / /rnal 'byor ser nag seng+ge ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis
bsnol stabs shin tu 'gying / /stir chen po sbrug cing gsol/ /in+d+ra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /grul bum bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /
rnam shes yul la gnas gyur pa/ /phra men dpa' bo stag gi gdong / /rnal 'byor dmar nag bya gri ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor
tshul gyis/ /stir chung bskyur nas 'bru tshugs lta/ /ra tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /yi dwags bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /nyon mongs
yul la gnas gyur pa/ /phra men rtog 'dul wa yi gdong / /rnal 'byor dmar nag sri ka ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis stir chen nang grol
'dru| |hri 'di gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /reg bya yul la gnas gyur ba/ /phra men btang snyoms
spyang mo'i gdong / /rnal 'byor mthing nag shwa na ma/ /mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis/ /sti ra phyed mar btsal nas gsol/ /
yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /lta byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /pra men gzi brjid bya rgod
gdong / /rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma/ /mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na/ /rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na/ /rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum
bzhugs/ /lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /phra men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong / /rnal 'byor rnal ma
kang+ka ma/ /mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /stir chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal/ /rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub byang
mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du/ /snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /phra men sa le bya rog gdong / /rnal 'byor dmar nag kha khwa ma/ /mchu brdar rkan
brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ /zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan
steng du/ /myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /phra men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i gdong / /rnal 'byor ljang nag hu lu ma/ /mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/ /rdo rje lcags kyu
g.yas pa na/ /stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon ba na/ /rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams tha ma la/ /thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal
yas na/ /zhing chen bsnol ba'i gdan steng du/ /shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /nyul byed yul la gnas gyur pa/ /spor byed chen mo mi bzad ma/ /sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku
mdog ma/ /zhing chen rol pa'i slog pa gsol/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum 'bar/ /ha ha'i gad mos ye shes rol/ /nyi zer zhags pa
g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /mi mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /spor byed chen mo mdung thung 'phen/ /
rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/ /spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs/ /ha ha'i gad mos mi rnams spor//
rdo rje mdung thung g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa/ /spor byed rdo rje
dril 'khrol ma/ /rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi na bza' gsol/ /spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams spor/ /ha ha'i gad mos
dbyings su sbyor/ /gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ /lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa//
spor byed thod phreng skar mda'i gdong / /rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma/ /srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /spyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs/ /

ha ha'i gad mos lha min spor/ /rdo rje skar mda' g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /spor
byed khyung thogs gnod sbyin ma/ /rnal 'byor mthing nag nyul chen ma/ /'jigs byed g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags/ /ha ha'i

gad mos lha rnams spor/ /rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /yi dwags thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /spor
byed me khyer glog phreng 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma/ /yi dwags mgrin ring g.yang gzhi gyon/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /spyugs pas glu blangs snang srid sbyangs/ /ha ha'i gad
mos yi dwags spor/ /rdo rje glog phreng g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/ /byol song thub pa gnas gyur pa//
spor byed 'jigs chen slog sha rdeb/ /rnal 'byor smug nag nyul chen ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /slog chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /spyugs pas
glu blangs stong khams grags/ /ha ha'i gad mos byol song spor/ /rdo rje slog sha g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /byang shar mtshams su bsam
bya ba/ /dmyal mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa/ /spor byed gshin rje ral gri skra/ /rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /gshin rje g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/ /spyugs
pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs/ /ha ha'i gad mos dmyal ba spor/ /rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi
la| |phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur pa/ /shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /phag chen po yi gdan steng du/ /rta gdong srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha
rak+ta g.yon pa na/ /phag chen po yi gdan steng du/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ /lho yi sgor ni
bsam bya ba/ /ra gdong chen mo'i gdan steng du/ /phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /lcags kyi dril zhags g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na/ /ra gdong chen mo'i gdan steng
du| |khro chen gshin rje gshed po dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /bum rna chen mo'i gdan steng du/ /dred gdong chen mo'i
g.yang gzhi gyon/ /lcags sgrog me 'bar g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na/ /srin po bum rna'i gdan steng du/ /khro chen rta mgrin chen po dang / /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /rngam

pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ /byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba/ /gsus po che yi gdan steng du/ /spyang gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon/ /dril bu thal chen g.yas pa na/ /b+han+d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na/ /

gsus po che yi gdan steng du/ /khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis su/ /rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ /ho badzra gu h+ya tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na
nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las/ bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal

po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /b+h+ruM bi shwa kro d+ha badzra

dz+wa la maN+Da la tsakra hUM phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la du tri tsakra nAn/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma de ba tiSh+Tha nAn/ hUM hUM ha ha hUM hUM badzra mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ hUM badzra

d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Ta na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga to bud+d+ha mahA kro d+hi shwa ri

dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM traM rat+na mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+nA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ traM sUr+ya rat+na mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM hrIHpad+ma mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha

na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ hrI shwa pad+ma ba mu ka mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ ha karma mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+nAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ karma mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ badzra ke'u ri ha/

badzra tsa'u ri ha/ badzra pra mo hA ha/ badzra be tA li ha/ badzra puk+ka si ha/ badzra g+hasma ri ha/ badzra sma shA ni ha/ badzra tsaN+Da li ha/ badzra sid+ha mu kha he/ badzra byA g+t+r-i mu kha he/ badzra sri la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra gr-i d+ha mu kha

he| badzra kang+ka mu kha he/ badzra kA ka mu kha he/ badzra hu lu ka mu kha he/ badzra ar+ya te tsa te nga tsa/ badzra a mo g+ha hUM/ badzra A lo ka paM/ badzra b+hasmi pA la ya ba to ho/ e h+ye hi phri ta Ar+ya ni tsa tur ba ya

phaT| badzra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tur thA ya hUM phaT/ badzra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ba ni shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a suM pa a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/

badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni traM su pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu tri ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a du bri ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ e h+ye hi A na ya ho/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/
dzaHhUM baM ho/ badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par grags pa dang / dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs ma'i srin

mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo/ /badzra ma nu rak+Sha si/ badzra pra ma ni/ badzra rau tri/ badzra baiSh+Na be/ badzra ping+ga laM/ badzra ke ma ri/ badzra in+d+ra na/ badzra su ra ya tra/ badzra so hu mya/

badzra a mr-i ta/ badzrad na ta/ badzra rak+Sha si/ badzra bak+Sha si/ badzra ra ti haM/ badzra ru ti haM/ badzra e ka tsa raM/ badzra ma no ha raM/ badzra sa ni d+ha haM/ badzra ba ya bya/ badzra mahA ma ra ma na/ badzra ag+ne ye/ badzra tsa muN+Di/

badzra pu tra na/ badzra ba ru ni/ badzra mahA ka la/ badzra tik+Sh+Na baM/ badzra lam+bo d+ha ra/ ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol/ /khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/ /'bar

ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /oM badzras ma ya ho/ /badzra sa ma ya phaT/ a li u li ta pa li daM s+t+waM kho na rau tri kha raM yo ga ni kha raM hUM ha he
phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun/ /tshig cing 'bar bas thams cad khyab/ /gsung gi khro tshogs chen po yis/ /kun tu khyab cing gang gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhis
brgyan par khyams dang / /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum gyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po
'khrug /khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /gtum pa dom gyi sbar bas ni/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa/ /dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan/ /gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa/ /smug
nag sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad dang / /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par
sgrog |stag lug sbrul dang nyi mar chas/ /sti ra che chung nang zhags dang / /khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang / /stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /ral gri
dgra sta gshol la sogs/ /rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang / /btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /spor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang / /
dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar mdzes pa dang / /lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis
mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag char chas/ /ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ /sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka'
ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so/ /bla med mi spong bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig
chen po ni/ /gdong chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang / /rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da' 'o/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni/ /gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo / /
dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu/ /dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro/ /spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang / /yan lag bcu po mi dor ro/ /gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams/ /'da' bar
mi mdzad rdo rje dam/ /sa ma ya ni rdo rje che/ /mi 'da' rgyal ba nyid kyi dam/ /bsam rdzogs lhun grub che mthar phyin/ /srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sgyur/ /mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por
spyod| |theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs/ /ji snyed sdom pa mtha' yas pa/ /ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis rdzogs/ /nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang //
mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang / /dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed/ /dgu rdzogs bcu ldan gsum gyis sbyangs/ /bskang ba la sogs mtha' yas mchog /ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa
nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las/ 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste
bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i

ngang du snyigs ma med par byung btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /byang chub sems kyi bde chen la//
rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas pa'i/ /skyon med thig le chen po las/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog/ phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / /rang bzhin gsang
ba'i don rnams ni/ /yi ge tshig la rab brten te/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor
bsgom| |dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /
byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs/ /dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing / /snying
po thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol/ /ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu 'dul/ /zad med zag pa med pa yis/ /bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol/ /rol mo'i dkyil 'khor
mtha' yas mchog /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/ /ma
lus bdag gis dbang sgyur ro/ /dbang sgyur ye shes rol pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po
yis| |rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung / /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/ /sgyu ma'i
dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol/ /bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/ /rang byung kun nas lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi/ /thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings/ /byang chub sems kyi bde chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams

cad dbyings su thim/ /thig le chen po bla ma las/ /sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan/ /skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang / /byang chub thig le nyid kyi ngang / /spyod pa rnam pa nyid kyi yang / /thig le
chen po'i lam du nges/ /sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang / /thig le chen po'i dbyings su sbyor/ /sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang / /spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa/ /thig
le chen po'i ngang du gsal/ /snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa/ /thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings/ /tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang / /byang chub sems kyi dbyings su nges/ /gzhal
yas khang dang rgyan rnams dang / /tsho 'phrul byang chub sems su thim/ /khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang / /byang chub sems su nges pa yin/ /'gro drug sems can gsum po yang / /ye shes

drug dang sku gsum du/ /nges pa'i thig le chen po yin/ /lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang / /dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi sring / /thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus/ /snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams/ /sku
gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i/ /thig le byang chub sems su nges/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyang / /phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang / /thig le nyid las gzhan na med/ /bzhi yi las
dang gcig po yang / /thig le sems kyi ngang du gsal/ /'gro ba'i don du 'byung ba yi/ /dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi/ /byang chub sems las gzhan na med/ /bde skyid sdug bsngal mang po
yang / /rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don/ /ye shes ye shes rol pa yang / /rdo rje snying po'i dbyings su nges/ /kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/ /nyag
gcig yab tu nges par rdzogs/ /thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum/ /kun tu bzang mo la sogs kyang / /thig le ma yi ngang du gsal/ /gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang / /bzhugs gnas khyad

par mang po yang / /ye shes chen po'i gnas su bsdu/ /mchod pa'i rgyan dang longs spod kun/ /rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i dang du 'dus/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang / /chos so

cog gi rang bzhin rnams/ /byang chub sems su nges pas na/ /dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyi bde chen ni/ /ci yang med las cir yang snang / /cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku/ /cir mi
mdzad la thams cad sgrol/ /dmigs pa med par kun la khyab/ /ma bskor rgyal po yang dag pa/ /ma sbyangs ye shes snying po che/ /ma bsgoms gcig car don gnyis rdzogs/ /ma bsgrubs rgyal ba kun

gyi gtso/ /ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med/ /tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par dka'/ /kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod/ /spyod
pas 'gro bsgrol ba ste/ /de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga'/ /zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos brgyan pa'i rgyan nyid
tu bzhugs so/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las/ man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i 'phrin las chen po 'dir ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las byung
ngo| |e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ /khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma
ming du bcas par bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab/ /rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs
bcur g.yos/ /myos 'gyur gas te tshig par 'gyur/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun chen la/ /chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje gsum yang dbang
du 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab/ /chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
du| |lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin
bya| |yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag /nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag /
ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro/ /yid bzhin nam mkha'i mkha' dang mnyam/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i
gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /gtum chen rngam po'ang lha ner 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur
pas gdab/ /'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la dbul/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /'bar ba lha ne'i byin gyis khyab/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /
a| thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste/ /las su ma gyur gcig kyang med/ /las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi/ /srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams/ /byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med/ /rdzogs
pa chen po'i 'phrin las kyis/ /sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub/ /ho/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin/ /rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te/ /gang 'dod
las de byed par bsgo/ /khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad kun/ /thams cad ma lus byed pa yin/ /mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs
te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /'du bar 'dod na 'dul bar byed/ /'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/ /sbos mo chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /rmongs par 'dod
na rmongs par byed/ /myos par 'dod na myos par byed/ /seng gdong chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar
byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs te/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la 'byin par byed/ /kun la rab tu nyams par
byed| |a/ spor byed chen mo la sogs te/ /nyul byed chen mo brgyad rnams la/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la nyul bar byed/ /ma lus gnas nas
spor bar byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /rbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste/ /thams cad ma lus byed pa yin/ /ljon shing dang ni lcug
phran tshal/ /sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu/ /dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang / /khros pas ka li rab tu bya/ /zhes gsungs pas 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas
par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing sti ra
rngam pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo / /e yi tshogs chen 'byams pa ru/ /sti ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas/ /hUM ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing / /yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /
ru lu hUM b+h+yo'i gsung sgrog pa/ /khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis/ /srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang / /stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas/ /
gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te/ /mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin/ /sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas/ /stong gsum khro bo'i tshogs kyis bkang / /kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri/ /
rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum bshig /rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral/ /rnga sgra chen pos srid gsum sbyangs/ /rnga sgra chen pos sgra bgegs 'dul/ /rnga sgra chen pos ngan song
sbyangs| |rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas/ /na rag dmyal khams stong bar byed/ /rnga sgra stug chen ri rab snyil/ /sti ra rnga chen sgra phyung bas/ /phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin//
rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrog cing / /rnga thabs glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang / /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bskangs/ /rnal 'byor rnam
lnga'i dam tshig bskul/ /sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas/ /nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas sbar/ /rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol/ /sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas/ /lha dang mi yi
theg pa yang / /bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud/ /sti ra rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas/ /stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang / /kun kyang rnga rdung di ri ri/ /rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin
cing / /rnga skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs bas/ /byin rlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/ /stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor/ /rnga thabs g.yab
mor por ba dang / /kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis/ /thams cad gnam lcags chen pos btab/ /ka la chen po la sogs te/ /rdo rje lcags 'og ldogs pa'i rnams/ /dus
gcig tu ni tsit+ta 'byin/ /sti ra chen po'i rnga sgra yis/ /srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil/ /dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs/ /rnga sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs/ /bsam
rdzogs che la dbang thang thob/ /rnga sgras g.yo ba med par byed/ /chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin/ /rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs/ /byang chub sems ltar de ma thag /
ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi
dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/ /hUM/ gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /
'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /mche ba zang yag za byed che/ ho/ hUM/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /tug chem ri rab 'bum snyil skad/ /
a la la yi gad rgyangs che/ /spyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che/ ho/ hUM/ khro bo'i shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms/ /
sna tshogs ye shes thig le che/ /ho/ hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i
thig le che/ ho/ hUM/ bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs byed chen po gdal pa che/ /

hUM/ rdo rje brag chen sra pa po/ /rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che/ ho/ hUM/ stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /'jigs byed mtshon du
med pa'i sku/ /sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs/ /'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter/ /ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen
po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //rdo
rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don/ /gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin/ /nges don chos kyi snying po las/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / /dam tshig
sgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang / /'byung nas gtan la nges
par 'bebs/ /'gro drug sems can gsum po yang / /stan chen po'i dbyings su bstan/ /ling+ga pad+mar bcas pa yang / /gan chen po'i dbyings su sbyor/ /snang sring kha dog mang po
yang | |ga na chen po'i lam du bstan/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa/ /de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ /rtag tu byang chub sems la
gnas| |tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar/ /bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub/ /ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las/ gdeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lung gi spyi
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma tsa tu sha tsakra gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te yum chen mo dang gnyis
su med pa'i mkha' la bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ 'khor khro bo dang / khro mo dang / ma mo dang / mngag gzhug dang / 'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyis su med par gyur/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di ston to/ /ye nas ma skyes gshin
rje chen po'i tshogs/ /rnam dag dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la/ /gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa yi/ /
kun gyi ye shes thams cad 'dus pa ste/ /thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /sems can ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la
rdzogs| |'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcod phyir/ /'dod chags 'dus pa'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag /bye ba brag brgya dpag tu med par yang / /'dul ba'i
dbang gis de lta bu yi gzugs su bstan/ /zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi khro bo dang / khro mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/ /sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa la/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam
mchog bstan/ /bstan pa dam pa 'di gsungs pas/ /thams cad sgrol ba ngo mtshar che/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig
tu 'dus te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med dpag tu med/ /thun mong ma yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin
las rmad du byung / /mi dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad pa/ /zug rngu mi mnga' chos nyid rmad po che/ /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /sprul pa'i sku
dang gsum ni don dam kun tu sbyor/ /phyogs bcu bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal/ /yang dag ye shes dpal yin 'jam dpal yin/ /zhes bstod de gnyis
su med par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol ba la dgyes te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /zhi ba gnyis med chos kyi
dang nyid las/ /snying po gnyis med byang chub sems dpa'i don/ /thams cad 'dus pa'i bla med dam pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM sarba ta
thA ga ta e h+ye hi ta thA ga ta pra ba ti/ bo d+hi satwa d+harma d+ha tu/ e h+ye hi dza hUM h+ye hi h+ye hi hUM hUM hUM/ zhes brjod nas brdas mtshon par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi
phyogs su sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs pas phyogs la phyogs su bltas te rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba'i
nus pa can du gyur te thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur to/ /de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i brda 'dis bcom ldan 'das la bskul lo/ /e ma'o
phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi/ /ye shes 'dus pa'i 'phrin las mchog /bla med theg pa des pa la/ /sbyor ba mchog gis bshang du gsol/ /zhes bskul bas
phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa
thams cad dang bcas nas sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan te so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyams su bstar bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad ba spu langs te 'di skad ces ched du brjod do/ /sku gsung thugs rnams 'gro ba so sor 'dul/ /ngang gis zhi ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos
kyang | |'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba so sor 'dul/ /de phyir mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do/ /zhes gsungs bas 'khor rnams rab tu dga' mgu rangs par
gyur te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'dul/ /dbyings las 'dren pa rdo rje gsor byas te/ /'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad pa ngo
mtshar che/ /zhes brjod do/ /sku la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs
so| |khra dang spyang kyi srin mo mu stegs rnams/ /bdud dang log 'dren thams cad tshar gcad phyir/ /chos nyid sgyu ma lta du sprul nas 'phrin las mdzad/ /ces gsungs
pas 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ e ma'o che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la/ /ngang gis khro bor bstan pa 'di lta bu/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung sprul pa
'di lta bu/ /rab tu mi srun 'dul ba ngo mtshar che/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bskul bar 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /khyad par rim par
bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni/ /ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston/ /khro bo bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu la sogs/ /ston pa mchod phyir khro bo mang po bstan/ /ngang khro
kun khyab shugs khro rang rang 'dul ba yi/ /bye brag so sor rab tu shes bya la/ /mtshan ma drag po zhi ba dbang dang rgyas/ /go rims ldog ste rab tu bshad par bya/ /lte bar
bcas pa'i rtsibs can la/ /'khor ba gcod byed rtse mo can/ /gru gsum e yi pho brang la/ /zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi tshul/ /myu khyud dad can rgyas pa phyi/ /rnam bzhir
ldan pa'i 'khor lo la/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab bo/ /dbus su ma he'i zhing gdan la/ /rtse dbus zhing brkyang re re'o/ /rus pa tshogs kyi rba rlabs brag tu sdungs/ /rak+ta
khrag gi rba klong mtsho lta bu/ /gnam lcags dur mo rab tu ta la la/ /dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bsham mo/ /dbus su khro rgyal gshin rje gshed/ /sku ni nag po dug
'dra la| |dbu gsum dkar dmar mthing ba ste/ /ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar/ /rtse la me 'bar rked nas zhag kyang 'dzag /rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bsgrad/ /phyag
drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa'i thor tshugs ni/ /sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags lcags kyu g.yas/ /dung chen mdung thung gsal shing g.yon/ /zhabs bzhi thur du bstan pa ni/ /
brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gro ba dbang du sdud/ /sku stod glang chen ko ba zhing phrag la/ /sku smad stag ste sham thabs tsham ngam can/ /e yi pho brang
dbus su 'o/ /yum yang yab dang sku mthun te/ /pho brang dbus su g.yon du 'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mche ba can/ /khram bam b+han+d+ha bsnams pa'o/ /rtse la khro bo
yab yum bcu/ /rab tu khros pa'i sdang mig can/ /go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/ /zla gam dur khrod ma mo ste/ /sgo la de bzhin srung ba'o/ /de la rim pas mgu bar

bya| |zhes brjod de 'di sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo / /oM a kro many+dzu shrI muM/ hUM badzra kro d+ha b+hid nan hUM/ oM badzra be ta li rak+Sha maM/ huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM/ huM huM huM huM huM
huM huM huM huM huM/ oM ru ru du na/ oM dza dza ya ba/ oM yo shug b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /dza: hUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu thams cad 'khrugs te g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /ldeg go/ chem mo/ /'ung
te g.yo 'gul du gyur te 'khrugs par gyur to/ /de nas yum gyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs par gsol ba gdab ste gsol bar zhus pa/ e ma'o rab tu blo ldan
khyod| |'jig rten 'khrug par mdzad pa'o/ /dbang med las kyis mnar ba la/ /bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste/ /rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhes
gleng pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzrA na la ka la hUM badzra ga ta pra be sha
ho| |zhes gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu 'jam par gyur to/ /gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon kho na bzhin du gyur te bcom ldan
'das gshin rje gshed chen po la skyabs su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /rtse gcig
mnyam par bzhag bya ste/ /sgeg mo g.yon du gnas par bya/ /bskul ba'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la/ /bskyod pa byang chub lam du drangs/ /gnas nyid bder gshegs
skyed pa'i rkyen/ /rtse mo oM la phaT du bstan/ /zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rol mos mnyes par gyur to/ /'phags pa las
bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las zhi bar bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /rab tu
dkar ba'i yul dag la/ /mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te/ /dang bas mgu ba'i las byas zhes/ /bla med rgyal bas rab tu bshad/ /sa gzhi dkar ba rab mnyam
la| |gru bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs brgyad pa/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /dkar dang ldan pa'i zla ba
la| |gcig nas gsum nas mgo btsugs la/ /khams gsum rab tu mgu bya'i phyir/ /nyams su lon par byas la bsgrubs/ /dbus su ye shes bdag po la/ /shar
du nag 'joms chen po ste/ /lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya/ /nub tu khro bo dmigs pa la/ /byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya/ /shar lho lho nub nub byang dang / /byang shar
mtshams su dgod pa ni/ /glang mgo khro tshe gcod sbyong rje/ /las grub brgyad de go rims bzhin/ /steng 'og dmar po brag dgon bsgroms te dgod/ /zla gam lam mos
gsum rnams so/ /sgo sgor sgo srung ma rnams bri/ /de yi yum dang bcas pa rnams/ /khro bo nyid dang sku mthun pa'o/ /sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la/ /sgeg
mo g.yon du bsten byas la/ /sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs byas la/ /mgu ba'i 'phrin las brtsam par bya/ /ske tshe thal ba rus pa la/ /dzam+b+ha la yi gzugs lta
bur| |byas la snying gar bri ba ni/ /a ma pa la si ti'am/ /gang 'dod pa yi yi ge de/ /phaT dang swAhAs dam ltar bya/ /ming byang gong ltar bri byas la/ /gang ltar 'tsham
pa bzhin du gzhag /de la 'di yang rab tu brjod/ /oM a kro badzra shin+taM na ga badzra swAhA/ oM a kro te ka shin+taM ba la buM/ zhes brjod la snying gar brgyab na/ thams cad mgu
nas dang ba'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhi ba'i las byas zin nas phyogs bcu'i gdug ba zhi bar bya ste/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no/ /
'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rgyas par bya ba 'di
ched du brjod do/ /gser las grub pa'i yul dag la'ang / /dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te/ /rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad par
bya| |dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la/ /ba yi chag chag btab byas te/ /rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas/ /thig ni gdab pa rab tu brtsam/ /gser las grub pa'i thig
skud la| |dpal ldan 'phel ba'i sems dang bcas/ /slob ma dam pa las grub par/ /bsams la thig ni gdab par bya/ /pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu/ /rdo rje rtsig pa
gser las grub/ /gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub/ /rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du 'gyur/ /mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can/ /
de la sogs pa bsam par bya/ /rin chen skyil krung 'dug byas la/ /dbus su gsang sngags bdag pos te/ /phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa
rnams/ /snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang / /rang sngags skyes bu de bskyed do/ /oM a kro te ka puSh+TiM pa la na hUM/ oM a kro puSh+TiM ti ba ta na s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas bdag po
yab yum la/ /'khor rnams 'bru rer ba las sam/ /rang rang bskyed pa dam pa ste/ /sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin gsal/ /bzhugs dang brten dang mchod pa dang / /
phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi/ /las kyi bya ba ma lus par/ /thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya/ /skyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /rgyal ba bsnyen te thag mi ring / /rang grub
'bras bu de la sogs/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /dngos grub dam pa rab ster zhes/ /'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad
pa| |dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas/ /sa zhag gser las grub pa la/ /gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya/ /phyi gan gan rkyal mnan byas la/ /nang hUM puSh+TiM a pu tse swAhA/
snying gar bris nas brjod bya ba/ /snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste/ /bla med dam pas rab tu bshad/ /oM badzra puSh+TiM A yu pa shaM shri puSh+TiM swAhA zhes brjod na thams cad rgyas
par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas bar bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdag nyid
dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /zangs las 'brel pa'i yul dag la/ /rang dbang med de dbang bsdus nas/ /'du ba'i
sems dang ldan byas te/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya/ /zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra/ /legs par khod snyoms zin pa
dang / /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /lte ba can la rtsibs brgyad pa/ /kun tu zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'/ /lte dbus gzhu rdungs bris byas la/ /de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag /
thams cad ma lus mchog tu 'gugs/ /sa pa la yang thogs pa med/ /zhes ni yang dag bla med nges/ /bshad par bya ste rab tu bsten/ /gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba/ /
sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams/ /gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams/ /ma nor gsung
pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /bsgrubs na 'grub par bshad pa'o/ /de dag 'gugs par gyur pa na/ /phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /bsdu dang 'den pa byang chub lam/ /'di
dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/ /yungs kar rkang rjes sa 'am gzhan/ /khrag gsum thal chen bsres byas la/ /ga 'u'i nang du blugs byas la/ /ga 'u
gnyis ni kha sbyar te/ /skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs/ /bcing ba bsdams te dkris byas la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu gzhag /yungs kar zangs gnyis bsreg
byas te/ /dud pas ga bu de la bdug /de la bdugs par gyur pa dang / /bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing / /lan grangs khri tshad du ma ru/ /brjod na sangs rgyas la
sogs rnams/ /'gugs par 'gyur na phal pa gzhan/ /smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs/ /oM badzra a kro many+dzu shrI pa shaM ma hA sarba ti la bruM/ lan grangs mang du
brjod byas na/ /ji ltar bsam pa thams cad 'gugs/ /rgya shug bskus pa'i khu ba dang / /ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis/ /snga ma bzhin du bkug byas na/ /'gugs par
'gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad/ /yang na rang gi lag pa'ang rung / /zhes gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par 'dus te/ dper na/ phyogs thams cad nas mtsho la sbrang
ma 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rjes gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi
'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad de rang bzhin gyi mthu can
'di gsungs so/ /'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la/ /bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste/ /yum yang de bzhin de yi 'o/ /yab yum gnyis med
byin brlabs las/ /thig skud brgyus pa lcags las byas/ /de ni las kyi thig ces bya/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /
kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud can/ /gru chang ldan te dur khrod rgyan/ /mdzes par bris te gzhan na min/ /sten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin/ /bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas/ /

bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya/ /oM a kro te ka hUM a/ hUM badzra be ta li rak+Sha maM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod pa tsam gyis
'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo/ /ldeg ldeg /
rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /dbus mtho na mtha'
dma'| mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid
des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag spro lags so/ /'jig rten du 'di lta bur mthu can la bdag
zhu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
khro bo chen por 'du mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /oM shrI pa ra yak+Sha gu ya/ sarba ta kri badzra ka la rU pa ma ra na phaT ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten na dbang che ba
dang / mthu che ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang / /gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la/ /rang sems
'phro 'dur gyur pa las/ /phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin/ /de bas nan tan bskyed byas te/ /drag po'i tsham ngam bshad par bya/ /'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa
kun| |tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba las/ /ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya/ /e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas/ /phyogs bcur 'phro ba
byang chub sems/ /rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni/ /rtag par bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs par bya/ /rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni/ /gzugs dang
'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod grub par ro/ /mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas te/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang / /ga 'u pad+ma dam pa dang / /kham
pa rdza yi 'ji ba yi/ /khrag sna gsum dang gi wang ngo / /de dag 'phrin las mchog yin te/ /grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs/ /phyogs
bcu'i gdug ba ma lus kun/ /'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ drag po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i dang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /rang bzhin 'phags pa kun tu
shes rab ste/ /de bzhin rnam par mi rtog yin pas na/ /'di gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad/ /chos kyi longs spyod 'dul ba'i don la rgyas/ /'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma
lus skur 'byung dang / /bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni/ /ma lus tshar gcod don du 'di gsungs so/ /'khor
lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud zlum por bcas/ /sbrul gyi rgya gram dag gis mtha' bskor la/ /lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya/ /de yi steng du ka pA la
gnyis la/ /gcig la gshin rje dbu drug pa yi gzugs/ /gcig la yum chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la/ /nang du dgra bo rkang rdzas sa dang ni/ /dri dang de bzhin
khrag sna gsum/ /thal chen rgya shug bskus pa'i khu ba dang / /brdzis la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ /bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcing / /dkyil 'khor thog tu
gzhag par bya/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hrI Sh+TiM badzra kro ta ya man+ta ka badzra kro ta phaT phaT a/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ yab yum sku mdog mthing nag la/ /dbu skra kham nag
ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /dbu la thod pa rlon pas brgyan/ /sku la sbrul nag chun po dang / /zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams
pa ni| |g.yas kyi dang po sdigs mdzub la/ /rgyu zhags lcags kyu bar tha ma/ /dung chen tri shU la gsal shing g.yon/ /de ltar cha lugs gsal ba dang / /dbyangs
'di blang bar nan tan bya/ /hUM| rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed/ /khams gsum dbang sdud rtags su zhal gsum po/ /dbyings nas sprul pa'i
yab yum lhun gyis grub/ /las ngan 'khrul pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba/ /gdug pa de dag 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/
dza: hUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya staM/ zhes pa lan grangs mang du brjod/ /des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur/ /khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang tshil/ /chen po la sogs gtor ma
bsham/ /de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las/ /sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas/ /oM badzra ha sta ba ba he ha dA na hrI Sh+TiM che ge mo mA
ra ya huM huM phaT phaT/ che ge mo ha sta ba pri tri ni rte sa hUM hUM phaT phaT/ nyin zhag gcig la lan 'bum bzlas/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas/ /de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / /
gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya ste/ /bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te/ /bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs/ /ma lus rdzogs
pa'i 'phrin las bya/ /de ltar 'phrin las rdzogs pa dang / /yang nas yang du bstab pa bya/ /de ltar bstab pa byas pa na/ /dgra bgegs dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /de nas
yang 'di ched du brjod de gsungs so/ /oM/ nga ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par/ /bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams/ /ma
lus tshar gcod byin brlabs te/ /mgon po gshin rje nyid kyi sras/ /don rnams thams cad ma lus pa/ /de nyid du ni bsgrub par bya/ /dgra rnams
thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ /'phrin las rdo rje can gyis mdzod/ /ces brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni/ 'phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungs so/ /dus dang
dus dang zhag grangs ni/ /nyi ma gcig la stong rtsa gcig /nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig /tho rangs thun gcig brgya rtsa gcig /srod kyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig /de ltar
nyin zhag gsum bar du/ /bzlas pa zhag grangs tshad bya zhing / /phyag rgya bca' zhing gzugs la brdeg /nya la byas na gdon mi za/ /oM mA ra na kha da sarba hrI Sh+TiM ya mAn/ huM
huM tre kha da pa ra na pa la huM huM phaT phaT swAhA/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg go /oM badzra huM khaM s+pha ra na phaT/ huM A be sha a/ huM huM
phaT phaT a/ yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/ oM badzra kro ta nI la tan+t+ra huM huM/ hrI Sh+TiM bi kri tan na/ zhes brjod la bdag gi lag pas dbang bskur ro/ /yang phyag rgya bcas la

sngags 'di la yang lan grangs mang du bya'o/ /oM badzra hrI tsan+Da hrI Sh+TiM badzra sti ra baM kha hi huM huM che ge mo dbang du sdus shig /hril hril zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do/ /rdo rje rgya gram
gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go /yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go /oM badzra kang+ka ma ka la yan hUM phaT phaT a/ zhes 'bum bzlas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas brdeg go /
yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go /oM badzra a gu sha tre tha sti ra paM huM huM phaT phaT che ge mo mA ra ya dza hUM zhes dbang du bsdus shing / huM huM phaT phaT zhes lan grangs
mang du brjod do/ /rdo rje gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dbang du sdud do/ /yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go /oM huM huM phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang yaM yaM raM raM
hring hring du ba b+h+yo hUM phaT che ge mo du ma b+h+yo zhes bzlas la/ kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgyas brdeg go /de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas la bzlas pa
byas na| las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags
dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i 'phrin las sgrub pa 'di sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lnga phung yan lag gzhom pa dang / /dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang / /'bras bu rgyal bar bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /nan tur 'phrin las
bshad par bya/ /dang po'i las ni rgyas dang gsad/ /dgug dang gtang dang bcing dgrol dang / /sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun/ /'phrin las 'di
yis byed par 'gyur/ /dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni/ /rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/ /stag mo gdal mchong stabs dang / /seng+ge gangs la 'gying tshul dang / /
khwa sbyang gzan la rgyug tshul dang / /bya rgod gzan la 'bab tshul dang / /dom chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang / /khwa skeg thang shing bsnyeg tshul gyis/ /ro yi phung po btsal bar bya/ /
ri la 'dug na 'gying bas btsal/ /sribs la 'dug la mchod pas btsal/ /gdags la 'dug na 'dug pas btsal/ /'or na 'dug na 'bab pas btsal/ /brag la
'dug na rmi bas btsal/ /nags la 'dug na bsnyeg pas btsal/ /rgyal rigs yin na seng+ge'i stangs/ /bram ze yin na stag mo'i stangs/ /rje'u rigs yin na bya rgod stangs/ /
dmangs rigs yin na dom gyis bya/ /ma ning yin na spre 'us bya/ /dog la yin na khwa spyang stangs/ /de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni/ /rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/ /brtags
nas 'ongs par gyur pa dang / /gshin rje rgyal po'i tsham ngam bya/ /khro bo bcu yi stangs stabs kyis/ /ro la kun tu bskor byas la/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus
su gzhag /de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs/ /lag pa
g.yon pa nub kyi phyogs/ /rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs/ /rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs/ /de ltar gan rkyal bzhag byas la/ /da ni phur ba dgod bya ste/ /mig dang rna ba sna
dang lce| |lag gnyis rkang gnyis pho mtshan dang / /lkog ma de bzhin snying ga dang / /lte ba pus mo dpung pa gnyis/ /gru mo de bzhin long bu gnyis/ /mtshog ma de bzhin spyi bo
dang / /dku dang de bzhin mchan khung gnyis/ /dpral ba rnams su gdab byas la/ /phur pa de dag lha yi skur/ /rab tu brtags te goms pa dang / /rang bzhin gnas nas
gshegs pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang / /gzugs brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum/ /tshad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la/ /mar zhu de bzhin thim pa bzhin/ /gnyis su
med par shes bya la/ /gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni/ /rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi/ /de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni/ /brgyad po ngang du shes par bya/ /sgo ma lus la
grags pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyir/ /steng 'og khro bo de las gyur/ /de dag kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /ma mo gsum gyi nga nyid de/ /yab ni kun la khyab pa la/ /
yum ni kun la sdud pa ste/ /bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do/ /phung po kun la khyab pa la/ /mnyes pas phul phyin lha yi tshogs/ /'gro drug kun la ma lus snang / /
de ltar las rnams zin pa dang / /zhag grangs du bya dam yang bca'/ /dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin gsal/ /de ltar byas na mi la
sogs| |thams cad dbang du 'du bar gsungs/ /dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos/ /drag po'i 'phrin las grub 'dod pas/ /dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la/ /bam gyi
kha yi nang du gzhug /rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gdab/ /he ru ka yi phyag rgyas mnan/ /yungs kar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg /rgya shug bskus pas drag tu blugs/ /nyi ma bzhi la
drag tu brdeg /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /dam rdzas mchod pa shin tu dgram/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya/ /yengs na bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
g.yeng bar mi mdzad khro bos gsungs/ /des ni las kyi 'bras bu yang / /shin tu zad pa med pa ste/ /mkha' la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul/ /chu la bying med mngon shes ldan//
zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bzhi 'khor lo gsang pa'i rgyud las/ ro langs kyi sgrub pa la ngan sngags kyi phur bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /ye shes 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed steng na/ /ye shes nyi ma
gsal ba'i thig phran gdab/ /myu khyud zlum po sbrul gyi zhags pa bri/ /stegs bu phyogs mtshams phur bus bskor bar bya/ /de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa ni/ /oM ni
dbus kyi lte ba la/ /shar du hri la lho ru staM/ /nub phyogs huM la byang du ha/ /byang shar mtshams su dza zhes pa/ /shar lho tri la lho nub me/ /nub byang a la rab tu rten/ /brten
pa'i yi ge de bkod nas/ /dbus su bstan par bsgom pa ni/ /gshin rje ste sku dmar nag la/ /dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug /dbu la thod pa tshal gyis brgyan/ /zhal
g.yas smug nag g.yon ljang ba/ /dbus ni sku dang rab mthun pa/ /sku la thod pa rgyan gyi tshal/ /zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ /yab kyi sku la rab 'jug pa/ /
g.yon phyogs gnas pa gong ma bzhin/ /oM a mr-i ta ta ka sarba a mr-i ta kro ta hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kro ta hUM phaT/ de ltar yab yum gsal bar bskyed/ /pad+ma'i gdan la
rab bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa ni/ /bskyed pa gong ma'i rim pa'o/ /rtag tu bzlas pa bsnyen pa'i sngags/ /mi drag mi bul mi zhan par/ /ting 'dzin
gsal bar bsgoms byas te/ /zhi la 'tsher ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /ri rab dbus kyi lte dbus la/ /rab brten 'og gi go go nas/ /rdo rje tshe yi
dbang stsol te/ /phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te/ /gdug pa ma lus 'gugs par 'gyur/ /tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra a ko A
yu pha la si ti ni bruM a/ des ni tshe yi dbang thob nas/ /sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang / /bskal pa ma zhig bar du ni/ /lo lnga lon pa bzhin du gnas/ /de nas bskul
ba'i gnas 'di gsungs/ /e ma'o phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yi/ /ye shes rgyal po'i thig le 'di/ /gsang chen rmad du byung ba ste/ /rgyu drug 'khor ba'i sems
can rnams/ /ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /chos kyi sku 'am chos kyi dbyings/ /don dam tshig dang mngon sum pa/ /dngos
po mtshan ma thams cad las/ /khyab pa'i mya ngan thugs rje che/ /phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dang bral/ /shin tu
sad pa mya ngan 'das/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste/ /rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs
pa thams cad rngam pa'i zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /e ma'o phyogs bcu 'jig rten ye nas dben/ /bder gshegs thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub/ /mtha'
gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas/ /thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang bskur na/ /bdud dang srin po log
'dren tshe bsdus te/ /dbang bskur gnang ba des kyang byin bskyed de/ /shar phyogs dri za'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig /oM badzra ku la e swa shwa ra na ha ha ho ho hUM hUM/ zhes ni dbyangs
dang bcas pa yis/ /rdo rje rigs las grub pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /mgon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur/ /de nas rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i
phyir 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang byed pa/ /gtso mchog khyab par byin brlabs te/ /mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob
nas| |lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig /oM rat+na ku la A yu he he ho ho haM/ rin chen dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas/ /khyad par byin rlabs thob gyur cig /
de nas pad+ma rigs kyi tshe'i dbang 'di yang gsungs so/ /e ma'o khro gtum rngam pa'i tshogs/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /snang ba med las lhun gyis grub/ /rdo rje 'chang
gis dbang bskur bas/ /klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog /pad+ma ku la A yu he he ho ho haM/ lhun gyis grub pa tshe yi dbang / /thogs med dam pa thob
par shog /de nas las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o rang bzhin mtshan ma med pa yi/ /ye shes lnga ldan 'phrin las gtso/ /gnyis su
med pa las kyi rigs/ /las rnams thams cad dbang bskur bas/ /gnod sbyin gdon las tshe drongs te/ /gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog /oM karma ku la
A yu he he ho ho haM zhes brjod pas thams cad tshe'i dbang nyid du gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /tshad med bzhi yi thugs rjes kyang / /nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi
gyur cig /ces phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshe'i dbang bskur ro/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/
'jam dpal tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mtha' byed 'byung pa de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
las byung ngo / /gshin rje las kyi 'phrin las 'di/ /myos dang mgo 'khor byed pa dang / /yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed/ /log 'dren rnam pa drug tu bstan/ /
log 'dren mthar byed dkyil 'khor ni/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de/ /yi dwags kyi ni gos la bri/ /sum brtsegs ldan pa'i mu ran la/ /dbyangs kyi yi ges
kun tu bskor/ /hrISh+Ti'i sngags kyis mnan byas la/ /tha la thod pa gtang bar bya/ /de nas sngags kyis dgang bar bya/ /ya ma na ster tsa'i tshogs/ /sa ste 'byung byed do yi
rten| |me ste thams cad sreg pa'o/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed skur bskyed la/ /yum yang de ru bsgom byas la/ /phyogs bcu gdug pa thams cad kun/ /ma lus
tsham ngam drag par bya/ /bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar/ /sgra dang 'du byad rab spangs te/ /bde zhing yid 'ong gnas dag las/ /rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas/ /sgra
dang bcas pa'i sems spangs te/ /nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar/ /rgyun dang dus su ston pa'o/ /bar bar bskul ba'i las bya zhing / /bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das khro bo gshin rje'i tshogs thams cad yum btsun mo dang gnyis su med par byas te bzlas pa'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo / /oM

hrISh+Ti bi kri tA na na huM huM pa na a nut+b+ha ba/ sarba d+harma tsa tsAr+ya a ti ba haM/ oM laM yaM aM/ badzra bo d+hi ta thA ga ta kro d+hi shwa ri/ a byi ta badzra kro d+hi shwa ri/ he he haM haM/ sngags 'di rab tu
brjod byas pas/ /kha dog che zhing lus bong che ba dang / /rgya dag yongs su ma chad thams cad nam mkha' ste/ /gsal ba'i shes rab thams cad
nam mkha' 'dra/ /mthar phyin sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya/ /de yi sbyor ba thams cad dgyes skongs shig /dbang sdud sngags te drag po'i las dang sbyar/ /mi
dmigs gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyar gnas/ /sgrol dang mthar phyin 'phrin las gnas su bstan/ /ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan par bya/ /khro bo de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / go 'phang chen po la sbyar ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa'i ting
nge 'dzin dang / thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis 'dod chags sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang / yon tan gyis nga rgyal 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de dag 'joms pa'i sngags
ni| 'di dag go /pradz+nyA ku la/ dz+nyAn ku la/ d+ha ka ku la/ gu na ku la/ bIr+ya ku la/ hUM ta ku la/ badzra ku la/ pad+ma ku la/ karma ku la/ rat+na ku la/ sarba ta thA ga to ho zhes brjod
nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /dper na me dang 'od bzhin du/ /'od la sbrang ma 'du na yang / /me lce'i drod ni 'od la yod/ /'od kyis sbrang tshig ji bzhin du/ /skyon gyi dri ma
thams cad dang / /bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang / /mi mthun pa yi dgra dang bgegs/ /shes rab thabs kyis gzir gnon pa'i/ /me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o/ /tha dad
pa yi mi mthun pa'ang / /'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid/ /'khrigs pa med cing sgrol bar byed/ /mi skye ye shes ral gri yin/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal dral byas
nas| |gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi/ /rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa yi/ /nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas/ /bsgral ba'i zhing du smos pa de/ /de la de bzhin drag tu bya/ /rigs
dang lo grangs mthun pa la/ /de bzhin byas na skyon pa ste/ /de dag yongs su shes par bya/ /las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams/ /nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don sad/ /de rtags
dka' ba mi 'gyur te/ /mi la ya yi 'og gos la/ /gi wang dag gis bris byas te/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang / /gang bya spel la bris byas la/ /rak+ta dag gi

kha chus bran/ /thub pa drug gi snying po bri/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod/ /oM hrISh+Ti kro d+ha pi krA+e ta/ hrISh+Ti kro d+hi ma ra ta/ pra sad he te ba mu ka /he hang he hang / ka la rU pa huM
huM phaT phaT a/ de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas/ /dgra dang bgegs dang mu stegs dang / /bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams/ /gzir cing
mnan pa drag tu bya/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi 'byung po de/ /gdul bar bya ba'i don ched du/ /khro bo'i sku ru bsgoms byas te/ /thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi/ /rang bzhin
grub pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pra mArta na/ na mo badzra badzra ki mo na ta/ a hang pra khu ma khu ma mo mu ti swAhA/ de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dbang
du 'gyur/ /bdud rnams dag ni khro zhing gtum/ /srin po dag ni 'jigs shing rngam/ /mu stegs log 'dren rgol bar byed/ /de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /
'phrin las dam pa 'di brtsams so/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus kyi pho brang lte ba la/ /bdud rnams 'dul ba'i snying po bri/ /shar gyi 'khor lo'i
rtsibs steng du/ /dri za dbang bsdu'i snying po bri/ /lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /mu stegs sgrol ba'i snying po bri/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /klu rnams tshar gcod
snying po bri/ /byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dbang sdud bri/ /huM big+ha nan/ huM rak+Sha na na/ oM tir ti ka nan/ oM ma ra na nan/ mtshams kyi
dkyil 'khor lte dbus su/ /mtshams kyi bgegs gnon snying po bri/ /huM d+ha/ huM pA/ huM lA/ huM swA/ gru chad rnam pa bzhi po la/ /thod pa rlon pa bri bar bya/ /mu khyud thod ba
phreng ba gtang / /phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su dgang / /de ltar dkyil 'khor zin pa dang / /rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun/ /kham pa rdza yi ga 'u la/ /gzugs su
yongs su bris byas te/ /dbus su yongs su gzhag par bya/ /kha dog dmar pos bcings nas ni/ /rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas byas la/ /gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum

khri brjod/ /oM pra marta na mo ha sra badzra dza ki mo na d+ha a hang pra khu ma mo tha tha swAhA/ na mo do gi kha d+ha mu pra ba tha byi tha uste ni nan sarba ta ta na phaT/ phyag rgya de dang bcas pas
brdeg /zhag gsum bzlas pa byas na ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus/ /gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs pa'i khro/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /smug
nag ljang nag kham pa dang / /so so'i cha lugs rngam pa'i gzugs/ /mgon po gshin rje nag po yis/ /bgegs dang log 'dren gzer cing gnon/ /rngam pa'i zhal
du 'di bstabs so/ /oM che ge mo kha raM khA hi/ oM hrISh+Ti che ge mo kha raM khA hi/ oM ka la rU pa che ge mo kha raM khA hi/ huM huM phaT phaT a/ nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas/ /
de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas te/ /yang nas yang du gzir cing mnan/ /phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis/ /lan grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg/ /
oM hrISh+TiM badzra ya ya na parna su put+ta huM huM phaT phaT a/ las dang rdzas dang sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yengs par/ /'bum mam grangs ni ci mang du/ /yang
nas yang du nan tan bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/
log 'dren mthar byed kyis mnan ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid nges mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs yon tan 'phrin las las phyung ngo / /gnod sbyin mthar byed 'phrin las 'di/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /bzlas pa'i snying po bri bar bya/ /
ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg /tos la snying rje ru la chags/ /mdza ni 'byung byed yab kyi gsang / /yo la kun 'byung ta la bsdu/ /bdag nyid las kyi mthar byed sku/ /yab yum
gnyis med rol pa la/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro/ /'dzum dang bcas pas yul la 'bul/ /byang chub bla med sangs rgyas la/ /mchod cing ji ltar mdzad pa
ltar| |bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /ting 'dzin 'du ba nam mkha' 'dra/ /zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can thams cad spa gong ste khred nas myos par 'gyur
te| dper na/ mi ra ro ba bzhin no/ /de nas nan tan gyi 'phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yon tan 'phrin las las phyung ngo / /gdug pa ma lus 'dul
mdzad pa/ /khro bo chen po hUM sgra can/ /las rnams mthar byed 'phrin las sku/ /gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun/ /bar chad bya bar sems pa ste/ /de dag zil gyis
gnon pa'i phyir/ /sku mdog nag po chen po ste/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /thod pa tshar gsum dbu rgyan can/ /phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yon b+han+d+ha/ /spyan gsum
mche gtsigs zhabs kyang brkyang bskum ste/ /mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i sgra/ /ma lus dbang sdud 'phrin las mchog gi sku/ /mi sdug tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug
ldan| |zhing chen g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /zhe sdang dbang sdud stag gi sham thabs can/ /nyon mongs dbang sdud glang chen ko rlon can/ /'dren pa'i khro rgyal gdug 'dul
dam pa 'di/ /dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba/ /nyon mongs dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal du stob/ /'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes dbyings la dgod/ /zhe sdang
shugs 'chang khro bo'i gtso/ /gdug par gyur pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad pa/ /nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu dug gsum sku/ /ye shes ngang
las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod/ /oM badzra hrISh+Ti bi kri tA na na/ ta thA ga ta ya ma ra tsa hUM phaT a/ zhes pa'i sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las mthar byed kyi skur
bsgoms la 'phrin las bcol zhing gnon pa drag tu bzlas pa'i snying po bzla'o/ /de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed na/ 'phrin las brtsam par bya ste/ me thabs e yi
dbyings 'dra la/ /bang rim sum brtsegs kha khyer can/ /ngos la me yi phreng ba gtang / /kha khyer rdo rje ra ba la/ /mu ran thod pa'i phreng ba ste/ /me ste bsreg bya 'chang
zhes pa| |kha dog nag po shin tu ring / /phyag na zhugs gling bgrang phreng dang / /be con ril ba thogs pa ste/ /tshul bzhin spyan drangs gdan bzhugs bstod/ /dbang
dang phyag tshang gshegs pa rnams/ /gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya/ /gnyis 'og rang bzhin ya ma'i sku/ /gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs la bcol/ /sbyin sreg
'phrin las zin pa dang / /bcol bskul dag kyang rab tu bya/ /rdzas ni dug dang lan tshwa dang / /ske tshe sbrang rtsi yungs nag dang / /gu gul nag po la sogs pa'i/ /lcags
'dra'i rdzas la rab tu bsngags/ /bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa yi/ /sngags 'di rab tu rtse gcig bzla/ /oM hUM ya khang me tra ha mu
kha hrISh+Ti ya ma ra tsa phaT hUM/ phyag rgya zil gnon phyag rgya bca'/ /dkyil 'khor bskor zhing gsang sngags bzlas/ /bdag nyid nub kyi phyogs 'dug ste/ /las kyi mthar byed
skur bsgoms la/ /gsang sngags mi bul mi drag par/ /bzlas na myur du 'grub pa ni/ /yid 'khrugs myos nas dbang med 'gyel ba dang / /rab tu brgyal nas thal bar
'jig pa dang / /de rnams mi 'grub pa ru ngas ma bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i khro bos gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud
las| gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen pos mthar byed 'byung ba 'di sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs las phyung ngo / /srin po mthar byed 'phrin las 'di/ /dkyil 'khor sgom par bya bar bstan/ /ya ste rgyu la ta ste rkyen/ /yo ni kun tu bskul ba la/ /ni ni sdud ba'i
de na yin te/ /ri zhes bya ba lhun stug pa/ /ya la 'dus te k+She la thim/ /bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku/ /dbu gsum po la phyag drug ste/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
dbus ser nag /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni/ /g.yas pa ba su ta yi zhags/ /g.yas par gsal shing tha ma lcags kyu'o/ /
g.yon gyi dang po chu srin par ma ka ta ri/ /tha ma rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa'o/ /sku stod glang chen ko rlon la/ /sku smad stag gi sham thabs te/ /zhing chen g.yang
gzhis sku la brgyan/ /gzhan yang dur khrod rgyan mchog rnams/ /ma lus sku la rdzogs pa la/ /bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya/ /mi shigs rdo rje gar gyi
bdag /rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje ste/ /'phrin las rgyal po grub pa'i las/ /oM dang aM dang hUM zhes pa/ /oM ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs/ /aM ni lce yi steng du
la| |hUM ni thugs ka nyid du 'o/ /de las 'od zer rab spros te/ /bdag lus nam mkha' lta bur gyur/ /phaT ces bya ba rab brjod pas/ /'jig rten khams rnams
'od kyis khebs/ /de nyid sreg pa ma yin te/ /yid kyi ye shes me 'bar ba/ /gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa/ /kun gyi stong pa de yin no/ /ji ltar mkha' la tshon
snang ba| |nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar/ /sngags kyi 'phro 'du btang ba yang / /sems las byung ba nam mkha' la/ /rnam shes stong pa'i ngang la 'du/ /bdag
nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la/ /zhe sdang 'phro 'du mang byas la/ /bskyed pa'i sngags 'di drag tu bzlas/ /oM ma hA daM Sh+Tot+ka pe ra a ra ne tsa na ka ta khai che ge mo la dus zhes pa
dang / sngags gong nas 'byung ba dang spel te las byas na gdon mi za ba'o zhes gshin rje khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i
rgyud las/ klu mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed kyis mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku
gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las las phyung ngo / /ya ma mthar byed 'phrin las ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma 'dra bar dmigs/ /bzlas pa'i snying po 'di yang bri/ /ya ste 'byung
byed k+She yis sreg /ya ni yang dag tsa ni skem/ /ni zhes pa ni khug cig pa'o/ /ra zhes bya ba bsgral ba la/ /ma las skyed byed slar sdud pa'o/ /bdag nyid ya ma mthar byed sku//
sku mdog ljang nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku la thod pa phyed tshal brgyan/ /dbu yi skra ni kham nag la/ /ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ /phyag g.yas chu srin
dbyug tho 'phyar/ /g.yon pa phyag na zhing chen za ba'o/ /sku stod glang chen ko rlon la/ /sku smad stag gi sham thabs can/ /dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la/ /yum
yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin me 'dra la/ /bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bskyod/ /lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /steng du bzlas
pa'i snying po dgod/ /tha ma dbyangs dang bcas pa la/ /hrISh+T+ri'i sngags kyi phreng ba gdags/ /phar 'phros rnam shes 'gugs par bsam/ /tshur bsdus gshin rje nyid la
thim| |'phro 'du bzlas pa de dag kun/ /gong du bshad pa dag la yang / /de dag rab tu sbyar zhes bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba
'di gsungs so/ /oM/ ya ma las kun 'jigs par byed pa ni/ /thams cad dbang sdud ya ma mthar byed sku/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang / /zhabs gnyis
dor thabs klu rgyal gnon/ /sku la sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa ni/ /bgegs rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar mdzad/ /sku la thod pa'i phyed tshal brgyan pa ni/ /
'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i rtags/ /dbu skra ral pa gyen du 'khyil pa ni/ /srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /phyag g.yas chu srin
dbyug to bsnams pa ni/ /dgra bgegs 'jigs pa che las sgrol ba'i rtags/ /g.yon pa zhing dbyug phyag na bsnams pa ni/ /thugs rjes sems can mya ngan lam la
'jog /ko rlon g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/ /dug lnga ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags/ /stag gi g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/ /dug gsum gnas su bsgral nas
chos kyi sku/ /skye med dang la g.yo bskyod mi mnga' yang / /zhe sdang 'phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab/ /oM hriSh+Ti ya mA ra tsa sarba mA ra ya nan dza sa ma ya zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang ldan
par ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa dang sbyar te las byas na/ gdon mi za'o/ /de dag ni/ 'di 'os pa tsam gyis ma yin te/ yang dang yang du 'dris par byas la nan tan gyis
ma byas na 'phral du phra mo tsam gyis 'grub pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ya ma mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu
