gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang las phran tshegs sgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yon tan 'phrin las las byung ngo / /zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /
pad+ma'am 'khor lo gang yang rung / /yang na rin chen dra ba la/ /dra mig rnams ni 'dug par gnas/ /rin chen phur bu nang du bltas/ /de ru bri'am gzugs par bya/ /tha ma sbrul
gyi zhags pas bskor/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /khru gang thur du bskos byas la/ /ga 'u kha sbyar nang du ni/ /yungs kar blugs la bzlas pa bya/ /rtags lam yengs
'phro 'du yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya/ /oM badzra ka la da du kha la pra ma rtan hUM phaT/ sle kha sle kha phaT phaT ces bzlas la bdag nyid ya
man+ta kar bsgoms la sngags 'di nus tshad du bzlas na/ 'grub nges so/ /yungs kar rgyal po sgrub pa'o/ /de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das gshin
rje gshed la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o dbyings las byung ba dang / mkha' la rgyu dang sa la dbang ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lags
so| |ye shes mkha' ldan ma mo'i dpal/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrin las can/ /dbal gyi phyag brnyan rak+ta'i dri snom ma/ /ma mo khyod ni kun gyi gtso mo dpag tshad
brgyad khrir rgyug /bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'tshang ba/ /kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i gting nas skem/ /mig nas zhag 'dzag ri rab thal bar rlog /skad cig
tsam la stong khams dbang du sdud/ /'jig rten lha chen brgyad kyang 'dar yed yed/ /che ge mo zhig dbang du sdud par byed/ /bud med gzugs can dus la bab/ /che ge mo
oM trag rag+sha hriSh+Ti ya ma ma nan zhes bskul ba ni/ dbyings kyi ma mo'o/ /nam mkha'i gting dpag yangs la gnas bcas shing / /bar snang khams la rgyu ba'i tshogs/ /
khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud/ |lcags kyi bya khra lta bu ni/ /ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin/ /kha 'bar stong gi gtso mo ste/ /'jigs byed rnams kyi dbang byed ma/ /
srid gsum dbang du sdud pa mo/ /gzigs pa'i go 'phang nam mkha' 'dra/ /gshegs shing bzhugs pa glog pas mgyogs/ /g.yas kyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis/ /bdud
dang srin po rdul du rlog /g.yon gyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis/ /dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud/ /dam tshig can gyi dus la bab/ /oM mar trag rag+sha tri yo ya ma ra tsa
ka ka ru pa hriSh+T+ri dza zhes bskul ba ni/ mkha' lding gi tshogs so/ /ya ma na ste grub pa mo/ /la la lag na rgyu zhags 'chang / /la la lag na thod phreng 'dzin/ /la la zhing chung ba
su 'dran/ /la la me khyer rgya mtsho skem/ /la la 'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin/ /la la sbrul na gzhags pa 'dzin/ /la la pho nya 'gugs shing 'dren/ /sngags pas bos
shing gdungs pa'i tshe/ /dam tshig dus la bab bo sa ma ya/ /sdang bar sems pa'i snying nas drongs/ /brtse ba'i tshogs kyi dus la bab/ /oM ka ha trag rag+sha rat+na ka la hriSh+T+ri swAhA/
zhes spyan drang zhing bskul ba ni/ gter bdag gi tshogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor
lo 'di dus phyi ma la rnal 'byor ba gang zhig sgrub pa'i las byed na/ nga yang thugs dam las mi g.yel la/ 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs
pas kyang nga'i thugs dam rjes su sgrub par mdzad pas/ dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku la bsngo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'byung bar zhal gyis
bzhes so/ /de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjes dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa la dga' nas yid rangs te mngon par bstod
do| |'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mjug bskul ba dang gnang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang
pa chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rnams kyis ngag mthun pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /e ma'o bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso/ /las bzhi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung bstan pa la/ /bdag cag the tshom 'tshal ba rnams/ /bder
gshegs gsung gi ngo bo yis/ /zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad du gsol/ /'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /las bzhi zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /'khor lo
zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /rnam dag dbyings las bzhengs nas ni/ /zhu ba'i dmigs rnams
bshad par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la gdug par mdzad pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung phyung ste/ /'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal to/ /
rigs kyi 'khor rnams zhu ba yi/ /dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs/ /'phags pa zhes su bstan pa ni/ /gdug pa ma lus kun las 'phags/ /ye shes sems
dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /dpe yis de la bsgrun du med/ /las bzhi zhes su grags pa yang / /de la las ni rnam pa gnyis/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dul dbang dang / /sku
gsum 'phrin las 'dul ba ste/ /thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba la/ /shes rab 'brel pas yum zhes bya/ /chos dang longs spyod pa yi sku/ /'dul dbang las zhes bya bar
grags| |de la bzhi zhes bya ba yang / /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mngon no/ /zhi ba bya ba'i nges tshig kyang / /ting 'dzin rim pa byams pa la/ /'phro 'du dkar la 'tsher ba ste/ /
thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang / /mi mthun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir/ /de phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /rgyas pa gser ltar ser ba la/ /ting 'dzin sprul pa mang por khyab/ /phyogs
bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te/ /bskul pa'i sa la gzhes pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/ /bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /kun tu zhugs
te rgyas pa la/ /tshe dang dbang thang dpal la sogs/ /thams cad rgyas pas rgyas zhes bya/ /de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad nas/ /
bdag gi yid la bsam pa kun/ /yab yum sprul pa'i khyad par las/ /ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud/ /las dang bya ba ma lus dang / /bdag nyid lha yi skur
bsgoms pas/ /'du bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /de la drag po'i 'phrin las kyang / /gshin rje gshed dang gshed bdag mo/ /yab yum khyad par sprin lta bu/ /nam
mkha' khebs pa byed pa ltar/ /gnyis med byang chub khyad par las/ /'phro 'du 'od zer sprin lta bu/ /nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la/ /khro bo'i sprul pas khebs gyur
te| |'jig rten rdul du bshig nas ni/ /gdug pa ma lus kun btul te/ /slar bsdus yab yum sku la bsdu/ /de ltar nas dang yungs 'bru tsam/ /ma lus kun tu
'gengs byed cing / /dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag /btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs/ /'di dang 'di zhes bya med par/ /'khor ba tshang nas sprugs
bsams te/ /drag po'i 'phrin las grub par bsam/ /'khor lo zhes su bstan pa yang / /mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro/ /lte ba la 'khor rtse mos gcod/ /de phyir 'khor lo
zhes su grags/ /gsang ba zhes su grags pa yang / /kun la mi bstan rtsa ba ste/ /thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas/ /de phyir gsang ba zhes bya'o/ /de la rgyud ces bya ba yang / /tshang
zhing 'brel pas btags pa dang / /breng chags dgos pa sgrub pa yi/ /de phyir rgyud ces bya bar bshad/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nyi ma bzhi la
las bzhi zhig /gsungs shing nges par bstan pa ste/ /dngos po ci la bsgom par bgyi/ /zhi ba la ni ji ltar bgyi/ /sngags rnams ji ltar bzla bar bgyi/ /'phrin las nges
par bstan pa ste/ /rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan/ /sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu/ /dbang la ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /sngags rnams brjod pa ci lta bu/ /drag po'i las su
bstan pa la/ /lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ /'phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des/ /las ni ji lta bu zhig 'grub/ /gzhi 'am
gnas ni ji lta bu/ /de dag ji lta bu yis bri/ /nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la/ /bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan khro 'dul des/ /gsung ni
'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gang bsgom lha rnams sku mdog dkar/ /yum yang de dang 'dra ba la/ /phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams rigs dang sbyar/ /
bdag nyid ya mAn+ta ka ru/ /sku mdog gsal bar bsgoms nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas bzlas/ /ya ma ra dza sa to me ya che ge mo ba lu ka shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ ya me

to ru na yo ta ya che ge mok+Sha ra tsa shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo pa la musti shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo mA ra ya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ mi drag mi bul
mi zhan par/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas te/ /nyi ma re la rim bzhin sbyar/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za'o/ /'phrin las nges par grub pa ste/ /bsgom par bya ba sku
mdog ser/ /yum yang de dang 'dra ba la/ /phyi ma rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la/ /'phro 'du byang chub sems lta bu/ /phyogs bcu ma lus don byas
te| |bdag gi phung po ma lus dang / /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar bsam/ /de tshe sngags 'di bzla bar bya/ /ya ma ra dza sa to me ya che ge mo pra ma ya/ puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ ya

me to ru na yo ta ya che ge mo kak+Sha puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo zhig sa sti puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo zhig mA ra ya puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ de tshe
rang rig ting 'dzin gyis/ /mthu dang ldan par byas te ni/ /sngags de bzlas pa byas na ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ /lha yang
sku mdog zangs lta bu/ /yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /lha rnams gzhung bzhin bskyed pa ni/ /mthar byed 'byung ba'i bzlas pa'o/ /ya ma ra dza sa to me ya che ge mo hUM hUM pa

shaM ku ru swAhA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya che ge mo hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo hUM hUM phaT phaT kA la rU pa swAhA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo hUM hUM phaT phaT/
kA la rU pa hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sngags kyi bzlas pa byas na ni/ /bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /'du zhes gsungs te gdon mi za'o/ /lha ni sku mdog lcags lta bu/ /
mthing ga rab tu khros pa la/ /gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs/ /ma rungs 'dul ba bsgoms nas ni/ /bzlas pa 'di ni drag tu bzlas/ /yang ma ra dza sa to me ya che ge mo

a mu khaM pra ma ya ni hUM phaT/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya che ge mo a mu khaM mu ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo a mu khaM rak+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo
a mu khaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la/ /sngags kyi phreng bas phog gyur na/ /mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon
mi za| |zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis/ /dang po sems ni g.yos par 'gyur/ /gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsum pas dkar po'i ngo
bo dang / /bzhi pas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyas pa'i dus su bzlas pa yis/ /dang pos dpal yang 'phel bar byed/ /gnyis pas dbang thar skyed par byed/ /gsum
pas gzi byin rnyed 'gyur te/ /bzhi pas tshe ring ma lus rgyas par 'gyur/ /dbang gi dus su bzlas pa yis/ /dang pos sems kyang g.yos par byed/ /gnyis pas
'jug par nus pa ste/ /gsum pas dmigs pa dbang du 'du/ /bzhi pas thams cad dbang du 'du'o/ /drag po'i bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /dang pos mgo ni 'khor bar
byed| |gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrag tu skyug /bzhi pas gdon mi za ba 'o/ /gzhi 'am gnas su bstan pa ni/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can
de| |yi dwags kyi ni gos la bri/ /zhi ba pad+ma zla ba la/ /rgyas pa glang po'i rgyab tu bya/ /dbang ni bud med snying gar te/ /dgug pa seng+ge dre'u dang gnyis/ /dbye ba rta dang
ma he gnyis/ /smyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyab tu bya/ /lkug pa lug gi khong du gzhug /bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu bya/ /gsad pa skyes ba'i snying ga ste/ /mnan pa ri rab 'og tu
bya| |snag tsha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang / /khrag sna gsum dang byi la'i gcin/ /pho rog dag gi sgro rtsa la/ /shi ba'i skra las pir byas la/ /gang brtsams 'grub par
nges par bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/ /khro bo'i
bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ /yum gyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ /ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ /khro bo'i tshogs rnams ji ltar lags/ /zhe sdang 'joms mdzad
khro bo des/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /khro bo yab yum lce la bzhag /ma mo sngags kyi mthu byin che/ /khro bo mang po 'od 'phro pa'o/ /de yi bzlas pa 'di dag go /

oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa pa tsa te ni hUM phaT/ oM aM hUM be tA li rag+sha man/ oM ro ga ma du na b+h+yo/ /tsa mun ta kyi kyi ma b+h+yo/ nam gru ma pa ya ti b+h+yo/ oM oM oM/ kro d+ha badzra

pasmi| badzra kro d+ha tis+tha/ badzra kro d+ha kang+ka/ badzra kro d+ha smig sha /badzra kro d+ha rag khang / badzra kro d+ha ta ka ni/ badzra kro d+ha ra k+Sha /badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha/ badzra kro d+ha kuN+Da li/ badzra kro d+ha kri ta/

badzra lo ka /badzra pasmi/ badzra shu la/ badzra ku la na/ badzra kang+ka/ badzra mu la/ badzra sri ta/ badzra ba mu/ badzra shu la/ badzra sma ra/ huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM/ huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM huM/
dzaHhuM baM hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nges
par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/ /tshe zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /yungs kar sgrub pa ji ltar lags/ /de yis las ni ci zhig 'grub/ /phur bu zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /dang
po dam bca' ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan khro bo'i rgyal po la/ /de skad ces ni zhus pa dang / /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di yang / /chos nyid
spros pa med pa la/ /kun tu mi 'gyur nam mkha' 'dra/ /bskyod med dus kyis gshig tu med/ /'gro ba 'khrul pa'i ngo gang la/ /bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis/ /tshe
la bar chod 'ong bar gsungs/ /de phyir tshe yi sgrub pa gsungs/ /yungs kar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / /bag chags 'khrul pas gnod 'gyur ba/ /mi mthun pa dang
gnyen po ste/ /de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan/ /de ni las kyi 'bras bu yang / /sngon nas las ngan mthu brtags te/ /mi mthun pa de 'gugs par byed/ /de nas
yungs kar rgyal pos bya'o/ /phur bu zhes su bstan pa yang / /bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste/ /gnyis med mkha' la gnas bsams te/ /phur bu zhes ni de la bya'o/ /
phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste/ /de phyir phur bu zhes su bstan/ /dang por dam bcas 'di ltar ro/ /lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/ /mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing / /gos
ngan re ba gon pa dang / /zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe/ /de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe/ /lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can/ /'phags pa'i nang na 'jam
dpal gnyis/ /'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan/ /rig 'dzin kun la ma yin no/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i/ /dang po 'das
dang da ltar gyi/ /phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang med/ /dgra bgegs 'bum mam stong yang rung / /de ma thag tu rlag par byed/ /khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed/ /ces gsungs
pas| 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad tshar bcad de drag po'i 'phrin las grub par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje gshed po
la 'di skad ces bstod do/ /'phags pa khro bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ /chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/ /tshad med bzhi yi ngang nyid rnam dag pas/ /
bdag nyid khro bo 'bar pa'i skur ston cing / /tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams/ /gnyis med byang chub sems kyis sgrol bar mdzad/ /ma he'i steng na zhabs ni
brkyang bskum gnas/ /las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du rlog /klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni/ /snyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs
rnams| |yan lag lnga la nges par dkris te gnas/ /dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'bar/ /spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs/ /mgo bcad phreng
bas dbu yi rgyan du byas/ /ljags dang mche ba glog ltar 'dril zhing 'bar/ /'jigs byed drag po'i zhal spyan rab tu bgrad/ /mi lpags rlon pa dag gis stod
g.yogs shing / /stag lpags rlon pas sku yi rgyan du byas/ /de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'chang / /ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod
nas gnyis su med par gyur to/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i
rgyud las/ rgyud kyi phyi ma rim par bkod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta pud tro phu na gu h+ya ba no shi a shwad da ma bi na sa ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/
bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung
gnas| sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa/ bkod pa rgyan gyi
dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo/ zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing
ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa/ kun tu 'phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid dpal bde byed pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge
'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang par du gyur pa/ 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas
ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni/ 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzang 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs

dang /reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so/ /de'i
tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / cho 'phrul bkod pa dang / rnam par
gzigs dang / mi bskyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang / brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang / 'brug sgra dang / dri ma med pa dang / rin chen phung po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod
dang / rin chen dra ba dang / dkon mchog mtshan dang / rin chen tog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / tshe mtha' yas dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chags pa med pa'i 'od
dang / dga' ba'i spyan dang / don thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang
phyug go /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang / gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rnon pa dang /
shes snang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / drag shul can dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang / sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / rin chen rgyal po dang / dri ba can
dang / lag bzang dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang / chos kyis mtho ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon
nu rin chen dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan dang / bro'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod pa dang / pad+mo dga' ba dang / sa li dbang phyug dang / rin chen spungs pa
dang / sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i blo gros dang /
las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros rnams so/ /de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /gzhan yang pad+mo 'phro ba dang /
pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma sgrog pa dang / pad+ma bskyod pa dang / pad+ma tshim byed dang / pad+ma 'thor ba dang / pad+ma snang ba dang / pad+ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi 'phrin las kyis
bkod do/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / pad grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang /
spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par
'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams
nas 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco
brgyad byung bar gyur to/ /de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam
bskul te/ de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do/ /de yang zhing khams
rnam par spyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas ba 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so/ /de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen bo'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal
'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to/ /de'i dus na mthun par gleng ba ni/ kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs
chos| |rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che/ /cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi/ /dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni/ /gsang gsum dam tshig
spro mi mdzad/ /de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba/ /gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod/ /khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras/ /dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba/ /bka' yi bdag po
dgongs mdzod dag /legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod/ /de nas gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod
pa dang / rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de lan
brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing / rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa/ e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i
dkyil 'khor dag /ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung / /dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang / /byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis/ /nyon mongs la sogs sbyong
mdzad cing / /thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis/ /tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad/ /sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas/ /gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol//
khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'/ /zab cing phra la rgya che bas/ /'khor rnams the tshom ri bos non/ /thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod/ /'di dag thams cad bstan
pa'i snod/ /mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzod/ /dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste/ /smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod/ /de skad ces gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas
gzigs so/ /rnam par gzigs/ kun tu gzigs/ de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig /
de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgongs pa'i mtha' dang / mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
te bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / rnam par bshad ba dang / dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang / rol pa chen po dang / mdzad pa dang / sna
tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar mi byed de/ 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan
du snang bar mi dgongs so/ /de'i dus dang / sa dang / sa'i khyad par dang / dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs/ kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang
mi 'gog go /de dag ni/ mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan
dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de/ tshul phan don gyi rgyal po che/ /'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas/ /
nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston/ /kye ma'o mgon po don kun nas/ /zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa/ /byang sems thugs rje'i rlan
bral lam/ /rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur zhing / /zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas yang yum gzi ldan pad+mo zhes bya bas
rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/ mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral/ /bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems/ /
mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis/ /rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol/ /de skad ces kyang bskul ba'i rjes/ /mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs
nas| |'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de/ /'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad/ /legs so legs so rdo rje can/ /pad+mo 'dzin pa'i grogs
bcas pas/ /yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na/ /gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la/ /dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis/ /gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod/ /ma
'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams/ /thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de/ /don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis/ /gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad/ ces gsungs so//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas
dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas/ /dga' ba'i bzhin bzang rgyas mdzad de/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin/ /thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs/ /de nas gzi
ldan pad+mo can/ /'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de/ /'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa/ /dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur/ /e ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod/ /
thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin/ /thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs/ /phyogs rig med pas go 'byed pas/ /yul du gyur ba kun rgyud dgongs/ /mi dmigs
cho 'phrul nam mkha' las/ /bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin/ /thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos/ /sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod/ /de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang / /
ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de/ /rang gis mtshan mas rab mdzes pas/ /rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can/ /phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing / /phyogs rnams
kun tu gzigs mdzad de/ /mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na/ /rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas/ /gzi ldan pad+mo chen mo dang / /rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de/ /
'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis/ /'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do/ /oM A hUM mahA b+hasmi sha ku ru bi na hr-i da ya aM b+ha ba hi a la la ho/ gnyis su med pa'i
byang sems kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku/ /rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing / /dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems/ /
'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+mo'i gnas/ /dkar 'tsher dag ba'i rang bzhin te/ /dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par/ /gsal khyab kun tu spros pa las/ /dkyil 'khor sprul
pa mtha' yas thon/ /zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang / /byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag /gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la
bkod| |ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol/ /brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing / /'dzum pa mdzad dang rol pa dang / /kun tu 'gying dang spyan mdzes
bltam| |smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / /rdo rje phur bas g.ya' bas slong / /'dor zhing bskum dang 'jog ldeg dang / /rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang / /rigs kyi
'phrin las sna tshogs sprul/ /nam mkha' kun tu khyab par mdzad/ /rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar/ /byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal/ /rol pa'i char nyid
mngon 'bab pas/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas/ /byang chub sems tshogs rol pa
las| |brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las/ /sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang / /kun tu rab dgyes ye shes thig /sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma 'od/ /yang dag bde la rab
gnas mdzod/ /de 'dus pa'i tshe tshogs pa'o/ /phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i/ /byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis
mchod| |rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrog shing / /dbang po tshim pa'i ro rtsed dang / /gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun/ /stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te/ /bcom ldan
pad+mo bde yang bde/ /gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod/ /e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus na/ /thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin/ /'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad
pas| |rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs/ /pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che/ /'phrin
las ye shes gnas kun spyod/ /khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs/ /khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog /mgon po bka' drin mdzad
pas legs/ /de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs/ /de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems/ /sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las/ /
sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams/ /dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs/ /rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te/ /phyogs bzhi
nas ni bskul bar mdzad/ /kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku/ /byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad/ /rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems/ /bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don
chen mdzad/ /kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs/ /thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che/ /rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod/ /kye kye rnam par
dag pa'i sku/ /dga' ba'i rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas/ /so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /kye kye 'gro ba'i don
chen bdag /btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor/ /bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston/ /rang dga'i bskum pas g.yo mdzad
de| |phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' nas 'jug /kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las/ /nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis/ /rang
gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed/ /'di dag thugs rje'i gnas su rung / /ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos/ /thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas/ /rang gi bde
chen don ston mchog /zhes gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med
pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
stan las langs/ /bde gshegs bsngags brjod byed cing / /bskum pas dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab/ /kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku/ /ye shes bla na med
pa'i bdag /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku/ /de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /thugs
rje chen po yal 'dor na/ /ci phyir theg chen mchog tu bsngags/ /yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /thugs rjes dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad/ /mgon po'i pad+ma'i
sku de nyid/ /gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing / /dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing / /gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /theg pa gsang chen cher
'byung ba'i/ /lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog /sangs rgyas sras bcas bsdus mdzad de/ /gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g.yo mdzad cing / /stong gsum 'di dag sbyong
mdzad cing / /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste/ /sku las 'od zer spro bar mdzad/ /des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku/ /gnas
lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug /phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs/ /dmar gsal pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs/ /g.yas g.yon
zhal gnyis sngo dang ser/ /rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes/ /phyag na pad sdong bum pa dang / /rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang / /mtha' mas mda' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /
rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang / /phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad/ /gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rta babs bcas/ /
dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng / /ban+d+ha dril bu sogs kyis spras/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor cher 'phags pa'i/ /pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la/ /pad+mo rdo rje sogs pas spras/ /
'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs/ /gnas rnams kun tu rin chen khri/ /pad+ma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan/ /phyi rol bar khyams 'khor ba dang / /snod rnams kun tu
pad+ma la| |thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis/ /nyi ma zla ba rkyang pa'o/ /de nas pad+ma rnam dag kun/ /dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de/ /dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs
bskyod pa'i mthus/ /thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad/ /de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems/ /mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na/ /rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku/ /
sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de/ /gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa/ /cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du/ /thugs kyi mtshan ma dam
tshig bya| |sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul/ /rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang / /las mdzad khro bo yab yum
dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas/ /rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mdzes/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing / /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod/ /de tshe
mgon po bde chen po/ /rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas/ /pad+mo rnam par 'phrul pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'byin par mdzad/ /byang sems kam las rnam 'phrul pa'i/
bde shes 'od zer snang ba'i sku/ /zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rgyan/ /gtso bo'i cha lugs ji ltar bar/ /rang 'od yum dang 'khril bar mdzod/ /bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba
la| |rA ga pad+mo hUM zhes pas/ /sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de/ /las kun grub par mdzad pa yin/ /gang gi pad+ma sha ri dang / /bud+ha hUM gis bsnan byas na/ /zhi rgyas dbang
drag las kun dang / /grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs gsog rnams/ /sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing / /yun ring gnas pa gnas pa gnas pa yin/ /'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags
la| |yi ge ja yis gdags byas nas/ /rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor/ /rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes pas bzhugs/ /thugs rje skal ba'i glu dang sngags/ /'od
zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod/ /dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus/ /dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan/ /oM/ rnam dag pad+mo bde ba'i dbyings/ /ye shes byin
las gsal ba'i mchog /dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che/ /mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che/ /byin rlabs 'dor bar mi mdzad
pas| |sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku/ /rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin/ /gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te/ /'od zer
rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus/ /yi ge A nas aHyi bar/ /bcu drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing / /rigs mthun dkyil 'khor
kun gsal 'gyur/ /sngags kyis 'od zer sgrar bcas pas/ /chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings/ /rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas/ /mtshan mchog sum cu
rtsa gnyis rdzogs/ /de bzhin ka nas k+Sha yi bar/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal/ /brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas/ /'od 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas sku/ /
ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas na/ /sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas/ /chos mang ye shes zag pa med/ /slar nyid sku yi gnas bzhugs pas/ /dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cu rdzogs/ /gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang / /bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras/ /waM las rnam 'phrul tshe mtha' yas/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar
mdangs/ /pad+ma sogs dang ral gri 'jin/ /chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs/ /pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /gaM las
sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug /dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba dum pa 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhugs pa'o/ /g+haM las sprul pa'i chags med
'os| |zhal gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od/ /pad gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o/ /ngaM las sprul pa'i spyan dag ma/ /zhal
gcig phyag gnyis btsod kyi mdog /rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o/ /tsaM las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa/ /zhal gcig
phyag bzhi chu shel mdog /rdo rje dril 'dzin 'khril ba'i tshul/ /dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan/ /tshaM las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUr ya/ /
rin chen snye ma dung phor 'dzin/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /dzaM las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur gum mdog /rin chen chag
shing guN+De 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /nyaM las sprul pa'i dri med dpal/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma rgad mdog /rin chen pad srungs za ma tog /
byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /taM las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /rin chen dril bu yum
dang 'khril/ /rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs/ /thaM las sprul pa'i nam mkha'i mdog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs/ /rin chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin/ /
shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /daM las sprul pa'i dra ba can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog /rin chen phreng dang pad+mo 'dzin/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor
gnas la bzhugs/ /d+haM las sprul pa'i dkon mchog rgyan/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud mang 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor
gnas la bzhugs/ /naM las sprul pa'i rin chen tog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta/ /dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing / /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la
bzhugs/ /TaM las sprul pa'i kun tu snang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin/ /tsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin/ /thaM
las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi shel gyi mdog /'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzin/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /daM las sprul pa'i
dga' dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdangs/ /'khor lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /taM las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul
bkod| |zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/ /nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes spras/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /naM las sprul ba'i rnam par gzigs/ /zhal
gcig phyag gnyis ljang skya'i mdangs/ /ku sha'i chun po'i a mra'i mdangs/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /paM las sprul pa'i don yod pa/ /zhal gcig phyag
bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog /rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril/ /rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin/ /phaM las sprul pa'i brtson 'grus 'khyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi karti ka /rgya
gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /baM las sprul pa'i las chen po/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog /pad+ma'i phreng ba
nor bu 'dzin/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /b+haM las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i mdangs/ /phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin/ /nub
gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /maM las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs/ /zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin/ /byang gi dkyil
'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang / /tsakra bsgyur rgyal ma lus dang / /mtshan dang dpe byang sna tshogs brgyan/ /rigs
btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya/ /yang sprul byams pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri'i mdog /rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang / /tri shul thod bcas
pad+ma'i lcug /rngam brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khril/ /drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo/ /khwa las sprul pa rtse ba'i dbang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /rin
chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang / /thod rnga rdo rje myu gu'o/ /raM las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal/ /pad+ma dang ni dril bu dang / /thod
sprul ras sngon ba dan 'dzin/ /laM las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog /rdo rje rgya gram pad+mo dang / /gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can//
rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas/ /'khor bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pas/ /lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /gzhan 'jig drag po'i las kyis 'khod/ /shaM las
sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'od/ /rtse gsum ban+d+ha rin chen 'khril/ /me yi thod pa ri mos mtshan/ /khaM las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste/ /
zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs/ /rin chen rtse dgu bgrang phreng dang / /pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /saM las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi
dmar skya'i mdangs/ /dbyug pa rtse gcig pad+ma dang / /dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin/ /haM las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i sku/ /ral gri lcags
kyu dag sta dang / /me yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin/ /gzhan 'joms 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog /rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang rol/ /drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'gengs
pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du 'khod/ /ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs/ /yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang / /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor dang / /kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra/ /rin chen pi wang phreng ba dang / /rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs/ /ga las gzi
brjid bkod pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog /pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang / /'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang / /g+ha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni/ /zhal gcig
phyag bzhi mar dang / /'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing / /rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin/ /tsa las shes rab snang ba ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs/ /rin chen phung
po pad+ma dang / /rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor/ /tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /rin chen gdugs mdzes
nyi ma dang / /dpa' bo longs spyod pad+ma'i spyan/ /dza las 'od zer 'phro ba dang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal/ /pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu/ /mu tig chun po
za ma tog /dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog /'od kyi me phung me 'od dang / /ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon/ /ta las sprul ba'i
dri ma sel/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs/ /nyi ma'i phreng ba gaN+DI rdeg /chos kyi tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o/ /tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa
la sha /seng+ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng / /rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas/ /las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs/ /ri bo pad+ma chu dri dang / /gser
nya 'phyo ba'i rdzing bu yin/ /d+ha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog /rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang / /ban+d+ha sbrang yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun/ /ta las sprul pa'i
lag bzang ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi karta'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar dmar mdangs/ /dri yi gzhong pa ku sha'i tshul/ /tha las gser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin/ /zhal gcig
phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog /glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang / /rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od/ /Da las rin chen snye ma ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad rA ga /pad+ma'i sdong bu
dpag bsam shing / /ban+d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs/ /d+ha las chos kyi mthong ba ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku/ /go cha ye shes sgron ma dang / /dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu
tog /sna tshogs sprin phung ser gra bcas/ /mche ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin/ /b+ha las gzhon nu rin chen ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog /rgya gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / /'od zer
rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum/ /sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams/ /rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang / /yum gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi/ /gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs/ /nya ma
na las 'phrul pa yi/ /rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du/ /pad+ma rA ga rak+ta mdangs/ /be 'u gser mdog in+d+ra bzhin/ /pad+ma rdo rje rim sogs mtshan/ /
zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril/ /'og ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa yi/ /rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang / /pad+ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i/ /me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis
mdzes| |shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod/ /ya wa ra las sprul pa yi/ /pad+ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi/
zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser/ /dmar ljang pad+mo me long dang / /rin chen phreng ba pi wang gar/ /mchod pa las mdzad nang gi mtshams/ /Sha sha sa ha
las 'phrul pa'i/ /pad+mo tshim byed la sogs pa'i/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs/ /bdug spos me tog dung dang dri/ /'gying tshul tri shUl las kyi tshul/ /mchod
pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas/ /de dag gi gsang sngags ni/ oM d+he hi rA ga pad+ma shi ri pu ta hUM hUM swAhA/ oM pad+ma ma hA d+ha ba ra bu na si ta mahA d+ha ma hr-i da yA hUM hUM/ brad tang ya dza

swAhA| dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /oM tsakra a lo ka na ma rak+Sha saM b+ha rat+na hri ti ba ya ba ti dza swAhA/ nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /oM badzra da ra ba kr-i ta ya ni shaM ra ti pa shaM ni dza

swAhA| shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o/ /oM rat+na ku ti du man+ta ban+d+ha ban+d+ha du na du na bi dza swAhA/ lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'o/ /oM bi sha tsi na d+ha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba
ni hUM phaT swAhA/ byang gi dkyil 'khor pa'o/ /oM maM ma a ba le ka na ru ru yu ru si de b+h+yo de satwa ma ma hUM dza swAhA/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /oM bi lo ka nA ma si

tan ma ku ru ku ru bo d+hi satwa b+ha ra bu na dza hUM dza swAhA/ rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyi'o/ /oM bin+d+ha bin+d+ha sarba karma si de de bi ku ru bu ta saM bo ha hUM oM aM dza swAhA/ lha mo rnams
kyi'o| |oM a pasma ra kro d+ha sni/ yak+Sha hUM hUM hUM bi taM pa ka phaT swAhA/ khro bo rnams kyi'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po mi zad pas/ /rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni/ /stong gsum gnas nas g.yo
mdzad de/ /rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod/ /de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
zhugs nas/ /dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing / /rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod/ /gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas/ /rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med

'gyur| |oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta mahA bo d+hi h+ya su traM tri sha shu d+he so na khya hUM hUM hUM/ oM rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags so/ /sarba bu ta ku ru rat+na ma ma ku ta/ a a bIr+ya sad

ma ma ku a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM AHhUM swAhA/ oM pad+ma a mo ka sa ma ya shrI ha ha ha tshin+d+ha ma ni a smi sha bi ma ma ya hUM hUM/ sngags gsum gyis gsal bar byed pa'o/ /oM bi sha tsa ni d+ha ma ni a ba saM

bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa paM da hUM hUM hUM/ rnam par spro ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma sil du tri si hUM phaT swAhA/ dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags

so| |oM aM a a min du she ma la sha na du na d+he ta thA ga te b+h+yod ti pad+ma ku ru AHhUM swAhA/ rbad pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma mu khaM pad+ma ba ba sa bo ti di ra yaM gu ru hUM hUM hUM haM haM daR+sha swAhA/ snying po'i
sngags so/ /oM na ma su traM b+ho ga ga na gu ma le saM sA ra hUM phaT swAhA/ rig pa mchog gi sngags so/ /oM ba ga ga pa saM po pad+ma d+ha e h+ye hi mahA kA ru ma da a ma d+hu na

dza dza| spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM pad+mo saM ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye s+t+waM/ gdan gyi sngags so/ /oM a mu ka si na ma sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta pu tsa me da na da hUM tri swAhA/ mchod pa'i sngags so/ /
oM pad+ma bi lo ku ma la su ni tu trAM swAhA/ pa saM hi hi/ dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog /rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba'i/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang
sngags che/ /byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog /de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog /dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de ni dkyil
'khor snying po mchog /rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul/ /rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las/ /rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs chen po/ /'gro ba'i
snang ba dam pa'i mchog /rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos/ /dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o/ /phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku/ /e ma'o chos sku mya ngan 'das/ /e ma'o
chos rnams ye shes sku/ /e ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul/ /rgya che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che/ /thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ /
sngon dang da ltar 'brel don 'byung / /thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs/ /bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs/ /sa dang sa 'das don chen po/ /ta thA ga ta'i byin rlabs dbyings/ /
la la sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus/ /gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul
pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/ /dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis/ /rgyud gsum rnam dag tshim gyur nas/ /dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis
gsol ba btab/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che/ /gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che/ /dri med dang ba ya mtshan che/ /'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che/ /byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che/ /
sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che/ /tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che/ /'gog pa
rlung mdzad ya mtshan che/ /bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams/ /dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad/ /za 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god/ /de nas
bcom ldan bde chen pos/ /chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku/ /sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i/ /'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje rgyan gyi ting
'dzin gyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod/ /de tshe byang chub sems chen po/ /'od zer kun tu khyab pa des/ /dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis/ /gnas kyi mtshan
ma gsal bar mdzod/ /'du shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs/ /rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams/ /dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas/ /
rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste/ /'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan/ /las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang / /rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis/ /thugs rje chen po'i byang chub
sems| |sangs rgyas brtan pa 'di gnyer ro/ /byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis/ /'dus ba'i gnas lnga rig par bya/ /oM gu h+ya badzra sa ma s+t+waM/ a la la ho/ /rdo rje ro langs
bsdus pa yi/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams/ /rigs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bar/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas/ /skal bzang dam tshig chen po ste/ /de las 'das na
brlag par 'gyur/ /dka' yi bsgo ba'i don chen pos/ /'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas/ /dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid/ /
dbang thob las mdzad chen po des/ /bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag /rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod/ /mnyam 'gyur gsel ba
rab tu btab/ /'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che/ /mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod/ /bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid/ /smra bsam yul las rab 'das
kyang / /dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas/ /yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis/ /gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod/ /ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des/ /gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs
nas| |brjod bsam 'das pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs/ /de na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis/ /stobs mchog seng+ge chen po la/ /logs su btud de
phyag 'tshal nas/ /rmad byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas/ /gsol btab blo mchog seng+ge khyod/ /bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye/ /stobs mchog seng+ge gsang bdag gis/ /gsol ba btab
pa'i don dgongs nas/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig /bdag la zhus cig spobs par byos/ /slar nyid gsol ba btab pa'i don/ /kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa/ /mgon po
rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mtshog /byang chub sems dpa' rje btsun la/ /chos rnams ston pa'i gnas lags na/ /bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa des/ /gsang
sngags lam rnams mi ston cing / /dgongs mdzad 'brel bas mi mdzad pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa/ /'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol/ /gsal zhing
dbye bar mdzad par rigs/ /zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos/ /sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod/ /de
nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can/ /bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni/ /dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad/ /de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis/ /rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad
pas| |yang dag don gyi snying po nyid/ /rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig /byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni/ /smra bsam las 'das brjod med
pas| |tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin/ /gnyis mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag /tshig gi snang bas the tshom skyed/ /grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes/ /'das dang ma byon thams
cad dang / /da ltar byung bar dgongs pa'i don/ /ma gsung mi gsung gsung du med/ /de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni/ /spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems/ /kun rdzob bden pa'i
tshig dbang du/ /mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams/ /don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir/ /rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis/ /'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus
pa| |stobs mchog seng+ge de ltar na/ /bdag sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas/ /tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu/ /gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa/ /ji lta bu yis mtshon par
'gyur| |dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras/ /dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs/ /bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la/ /zhus shing stobs mchog seng+ge khyod/ /nges kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa
bzhin| |rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /phyag 'tshal rmad byung mchod rdzas nas/ /rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol/ /kye ma ston pa thugs chen po/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa/ /byang chub
sems kyi mtshan nyid de/ /tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na/ /ma 'ongs dgra la brten pa dag /don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir/ /mtshon bya mtshon par byas nas ni/ /snying po byang chub don 'di
la| |dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa/ /gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol/ /de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i/ /phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing / /rmad

byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad/ /thams cad pad+mor 'gyur ba yi/ /rmad byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrog /oM AHhUM swAhA/ bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya/ sa ma ya a sa/ a nu bo d+hi tsit+ta a nan+ta gar+b+ha/ mahA satA phra
ta a hUM| 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag /rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
yang dag bka'/ /bshad kyi rigs kyi bu rnams nyon/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par/ /yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa/ /de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de//
mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi gdengs/ /ji srid blo yi chos dag tu/ /gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la/ /bsam brjod kun rdzob ces bya ste/ /de las 'das pa don dam yin/ /sku gsum
gnyis su med pa yi/ /snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa/ /dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas/ /yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul/ /thams cad rang
bzhin stong pa nyid/ /zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni/ /de nyid bla med mchog dam pa/ /de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ /a la la yi sgra brjod do/ /stobs mchog seng+ge dri ba dris/ /de
ltar legs so bcom ldan 'das/ /sngags kyi lha la blo gnas gang / /spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis/ /phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur/ /blo yi rim pa 'jug bya 'am/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/ /mtshan nyid rnam dag dus lags pa/ /bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i//
dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no/ /legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing / /rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na/ /'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed na/ /lta spyod gnyis ldan bden
pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor sa la legs gnas shing / /bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas/ /yang dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shag /ma skyes thabs
kyi ye shes ldan/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings/ /bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis/ /yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung / /phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de//
med pa ma yin mtshan med de/ /rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro/ /slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas/ /bden 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas/ /
che chung mthu yis grub pa yin/ /sgra yi rjes 'brangs rnal 'byor pas/ /don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur/ /yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas/ /gnyis med don dam bden par gnas/ /
sna tshogs chos kyi g.yul ngo bzlog /rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par grags/ /zhes pas dgyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba
dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas rig pa'i skyes bu mchog /gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ /bcom ldan snying po byang
chub sems/ /dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu/ /las dang nyon mongs dag byed pa'i/ /ye shes sgron ma ci ltar legs/ /rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ /rdo rje lta bur mnyam
bzhag nas/ /mi rtog ye shes gsal mdzad do/ /sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems/ /bde ba che las gzhan med de/ /lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs
chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te/ /rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid/ /sku gsum gsal ba rnam par snang / /dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de/ /gcig las rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nyid/ /
phyag rgya gar thabs dbang bsgyur bas/ /'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol/ /dngos po thams cad bral ba yi/ /phung khams skye mched rnam par dben/ /gzung 'jin rtog pa'i
yul bral bas/ /dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung / /'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gsang
ba'i thugs/ /skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos/ /phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed/ /de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o/ /bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya/ /ngo mtshar ya mtshan
rmad kyi chos/ /me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod/ /'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i chos/ /sna tshogs snang byed gnas grol ba/ /rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba'o//
gnas dang gnas med byang chub sems/ /ya mtshan rmad kyi don byung pa'o/ /rgya cher so sor gsal ba'i ngang / /kun rtog byang chub sems chen po/ /dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i/
dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni/ /bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'o/ /ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid do/ /bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du/ /spros med spros pa sna tshogs snang / /spro bsdu 'dun
dang spros bral ba'i/ /mdzad pa'i byang sems brtan pa las/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du byung / /rang gi de nyid gsal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bshad pa'i
dgos don la/ /'khor rnams ya mtshan ngoms par 'gyur/ /mchod dang zhal dag sgra 'byin cing / /rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas/ /byang sems de nyid bstod par bya/ /e ma'o stong nyid
byang chub sems/ /e ma'o dag pa dri ma med/ /e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che/ /e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos/ /e ma'o so so rang gi sems/ /e ma'o bya byed lhun gyis grub/ /de bzhin
nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems nyid thugs kyi mchog /bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams/ /byang chub sems nyid smon pa dang //
'jug dang ldang dang gnyis med de/ /rang gi byang sems g.yo bar bgyis/ /reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi/ /nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na/ /thugs rje che dgongs byin gyis rlobs/ /
bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlobs/ /de skad tshig tu gsol btab pas/ /bcom ldan snying po 'di skad gsung / /sna tshogs rnam dag ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams
'phro ba'i tshogs rnams kun/ /rang bzhin brjod bral rtog pa med/ /rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don/ /srid gsum ye nas rnam dag chos/ /bdag rtog 'khrul pa'i nyes dmigs
kyis/ /dus ring 'khyams 'gyur 'gro ba rnams/ /rang rtog dngos po'i las la spyod/ /log pa'i sems kyis kun brtags kyang / /rang bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med/ /ye nas don gyis
sangs rgyas la/ /'khrul pa'i bde sdug 'khor los 'khyams/ /log rtog dngos med byang chub sems/ /'khrul rtog mi gnas rgyan gyi mchog /tha ba'i gnas nyid byang chub zhing / /
srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon rdzogs sku/ /'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal/ /brtan g.yo dngos po thams cad dang / /bde chen sku las gzhan med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /dkyil
'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba'i don/ /mtshan nyid 'phro zhing rtogs pa dag /rgyal bas bshad phyir bskul 'debs
mdzad/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don/ /rgya che mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas/ /rab rgyas mtshan bzhin cho ga'o/ /yan
lag dag la bstan du gsol/ /de nas mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /gnyis med ye shes la 'gro ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs gnas/ /rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad/ /
stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /ri bo rgyud 'dzin rigs mtshan can/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge'i tshul 'jug pa'i/ /rta bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba las//
mnyam nyid 'od kyi gong bu'i gzugs/ /snang ba'i 'od zer lnga yi tshul/ /phyag rgya mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rnam 'phros rang rig zhing khams sbyang / /de dag gong bu'i gzugs mtshungs
par| |gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku/ /stong nyid snying rje chen po yis/ /ma lus rgyud rnams gsal mdzad nas/ /nam mkha' dang pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /thugs rje chen po skyon skyong mdzad/ /
sa bon gsang ba'i las byung ba'i/ /mkha' snang gsal ba kun khyab las/ /sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid/ /'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkod/ /kun 'phrul sa bon las
bskyed pa'i/ /ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs/ /shar du do shal phreng pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshon rnga yab sogs/ /me long rol mo'i tshogs bsam yas/ /'khor
lo rin chen rdo rje pad/ /twa ra na bzhi rgyan mdzes pa/ /sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshogs/ /tsakra bar khyams phreng ba dang / /dam pa'i 'dod yon lha mo 'khrigs/ /
rin chen 'bar ba'i khri brtsegs gnas/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i rin chen rgyan/ /gnas rnams khyab par ji bzhin par/ /dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/

aM aH/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad byung ba'i/ /bder gshegs kun
gyi thugs gsal ba/ /byin rlabs ya mtshan sprul pa'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /phung po chos rnams
sangs rgyas te/ /'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'/ /khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang / /sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku/ /phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i/ /
dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che/ /gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad che/ /tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku/ /'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku/ /'du byed don yod grub pa yin/ /
rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku/ /sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te/ /chu khams lha mo mA ma kI/ /me khams na bza' dkar mo ste/ /
rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma 'o/ /nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku/ /'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o/ /dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun/ /thams cad bder gshegs
rigs kyi sku/ /mig la rnam par snang mdzad de/ /rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che/ /sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid/ /lce la don yod grub pa'i sku/ /lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /de ltar
snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba don shes bya/ /phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di/ /yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /gzugs
khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste/ /sgra tshogs lha mo mA makI/ /dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings/ /ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin/ /reg tshogs lha mo kun du bzang mo'i sku/ /dus gsum
mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod/ /thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rol pa'i rgyan//
nga nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog /sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang / /rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang / /yon tan 'phrin las mtha' phyin
pas| |tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che/ /rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed ba/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te//
dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul/ /'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas/ /rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing / /rdo rje mgon po'i sgo gsal brtan/ /
rtag tu gtor sbyin btang byas te/ /khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol/ /rtag tu lha la mchod byas te/ /rang gi 'dud rtsis mchod cing rol/ /rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba/ /rnam grol
thams cad brag ca'i sgra/ /pha rol phyin bcu dus gcig tu/ /pad+ma cho ga rtogs par 'gyur/ /zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang / /pad+ma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor/ /pad+ma'i dam tshig la
gnas pa/ /gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /pad+ma rang gi gnas su bsgom/ /'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi/ /mgon po rang rang gnas la gsal/ /dri med dag
pa'i thig le las/ /'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas/ /rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing / /de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs/ /kun du pad+ma chags med pas/ /gnas kun dkyil
'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang / /dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni/ /yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/ /kun du dregs pa'i sangs rgyas
mchog |rdo rje'i dam tshig la gnas pas/ /rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom/ /'od 'phros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag rgya'i/ /ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzad/ /thugs rjes rnam mang
yul bral zhing / /'joms par mdzad pa khro bo'i sku/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba/ /mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes sku/ /'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas/ /'khor lo rang
yi gnas su bsgom/ /rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che/ /'phro 'du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs/ /phung po khams rnams rnam dag cing / /'phrin las ye shes bla na med/ /byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs
gnas| |dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku/ /dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gnas/ /rnal 'byor dad brtson ting 'dzin ldan/ /'grub 'gyur ring
por thogs med spyod/ /ces gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang
ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis
dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo/ /kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso/ /sangs rgyas tshogs rnams skyed pa'i yab/ /khyed
kyis dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad nas/ /gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na/ /phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung / /gang dag dbang po ma smin pa'i/ /dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur//
de dag thugs rje chen po yis/ /bzung zhing las la gzhug par snang / /ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag /'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams/ /ji ltar dkyil
'khor brtan par 'dul/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod bdag
gis ni/ rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog /dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan/ /bdag chos ma lus
shas gyur nas/ /skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blang / /byang sems snying rje chen po dang / /dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi bzhag nas/ /sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer/ /slar
nyid byang chub lam la dgod/ /pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang / /bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas/ /theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing / /nyan thos la sogs blos pa
med pa'i blos/ /gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing / /dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan/ /gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing / /de nyid bcu la goms gyur pas//
rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing / /dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas/ /mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing / /theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med/ /rtag tu 'gro ba gzung ba'i blos//
dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon/ /'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag /btang snyoms spong len med pa//
nyid| |dmus long tshogs kyi dmig bu bas/ /bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya/ /'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs/ /zhi des gsong por smra ba dang / /'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid/
'ong pa| |rtse gcig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed/ /blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug /lha dang bla ma la sogs gus/ /theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas/ /ngan pa'i chogs spangs gzhan du
gnas| |de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan/ /theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod/ /sa mchog shin tu dben pa'i gnas/ /ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang / /me tog chu rgyun phun
sum tshogs/ /gnod byed skye bo tshogs bral ba/ /rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur pa'i/ /bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i mchog /bsnyen pa ji bzhin rdzogs pa yis/ /
dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya/ /phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas/ /bdag gnas sa gzhi'i grogs bcas dang / /mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa/ /bsrung zhing byin
gyis brlab par bya/ /rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang / /gur dang bla re bcas pa yis/ /khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom/ /sems can tham
cad bsgral ba'i blos/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang / /sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas mya
ngan mi 'da' zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /lus dbul byang sems bskyed pa dang / /lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ /rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing / /sems can don du smon
lam gdab/ /dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin/ /rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che/ /thams cad nam mkha'i
mtshan nyid ste/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba rnal 'byor pas/ /don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal/ /de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor
chen po sprul byas pas/ /rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing / /rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub/ /sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i/ /grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa 'am/ /ri phug
nags tshal gang rung bar/ /nyams dga' yan lag rtag par bya/ /gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas/ /dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /
de ni rab gus brtag par bya/ /nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang / /sa gzhi pad+ma dra ba dang / /bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi/ /bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /sa gzhi zhos rdib
med pa yi/ /dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /lho dang nub tu gzhol pas ni/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur//
nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /ting 'dzin phra mo'i las gzhan 'gyur/ /gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang / /dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya/ /sa de pus mo nub tsam du/ /brkos te slar yang dgang
par bya| |med 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog /gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin/ /dma' zhing ma legs gyur pa yin/ /sol dum rus sogs byung na yang / /yang na chu yis dgang byas te/ /slob dpon
rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing / /shar du mi drag gom pa brgyad/ /song ste slar log blta bar bya/ /'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur/ /snang dang mi snad sa yi
bdag |mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang / /blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir/ /bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya/ /bar chad med pa'i sa dbus na/ /rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas/ /
chos gos la sogs rgyan thogs shing / /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te/ /'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis/ /mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje bsrung
pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas/ /sa yi lha mo srung ma rnams/ /spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /khyad par sa yi bdag po dang / /'gro drug
bgegs rnams ma lus kun/ /dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang / /dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya/ /gang zhig dngos grub la sogs
'dod| |rab 'bring tha ma grub don du/ /lto 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /yan lag kun dbang rgya yang bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i/ /sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du/ /brkos
te sa yi skyon bsal zhing / /sa zhag mdog bzang 'jam phyen pas/ /gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'i/ /sngags btab gang zhig 'thas par bcag /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor
bstod| |rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad/ /tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod/ /mtha' skor khru gang pa yi tshad/ /dbang bskur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de/ /ji ltar gru bzhi rgyar bskyed cing / /
dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas/ /tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa/ /rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / /snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag /dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas/ /dkyil
'khor snying por gzhag par bya/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te/ /stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang / /dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor
byas shing / /sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te/ /lha tshogs mgron rnams tshim par bya/ /slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i/ /rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas/ /
sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan/ /tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab/ /dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa/ /kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i sngags/ /brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las/
dkyil 'khor ri brtsegs bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bsdams pa sar bzhag cing / /byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas/ /phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar
rgyan| |rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang / /gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas/ /gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus/ /bad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab/ /'od 'phros gnas kun g.yos pa la/ /lha
mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes/ /me tog phreng ba bum thogs pa'i/ /lus phyed sa las thon byas te/ /mthun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas/ /mchod bstod zhal bsil sogs 'bul
zhing | |dri zhing las rnams ma rdzogs par/ /de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas/ /bdud sogs bsgo ba'i dag bcas mdzad/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul
dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa las/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud
las kyang / /rgyal bar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pa'i/ /rdo rje dril 'gying bcas pa la/ /dam tshig nye bar bskul ba yi/ /glu dag phyogs bzhi'i
gnas nas gdon/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi me long gsal ba ston/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi gsang ba pa/ /rdo rje gsang gsum dam
tshig mchog /ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul/ /sgrib sogs ma lus bral byed pa'i/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /dkyil 'khor chen po drug cu'i bdag /theg chen chos
kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod/ /gsang gsum pad+mo dag pa'i dbyings/ /so sor gsal ba'i don bstan pa/ /rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor/ /zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs/ /chos kyi
'khor lo bshad pa'i dus/ /rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral/ /rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mnga' ba/ /nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rnams dgongs/ /bdag med mnyam pa'i ye
shes can/ /'phrin las dag pas zad par mdzod/ /gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag /rigs mchog shes rab brtson byed cing / /spyan bzang dag pas 'gro la gzigs/ /slar
nyid khro bo chen po'i sku/ /zhal lnga phyag cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur gnas te/ /mgur nas hUM bsgoms sgra sgrog cing / /rdo rje pad+ma lta ba yis/ /lha rnams bdag
la bsdu byed cing / /ma dang ta las byung ba yi/ /mig gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brjid/ /'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas/ /slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /shangs

kyi rlung sgo 'bar ba nas/ /'jig rten thams cad 'bar byed pa/ /rdo rje'i 'gros las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs sa gzhir brtan par byas/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ grih+na grih+na hUM/ grih+na pa ya grih+na pa ya

hUM hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga wA na bid+ya ra dza ya hUM hUM phaT/ phyag gi mtshan ma kun 'khrol zhing / /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar byed/ /hUM/ lha dbang rlung lha'i tshogs/ /gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang //
sha za gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs/ /mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma lus rnams/ /gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa/ /srung byed sa yi bdag por bas/ /thos pa tsam gyis myur bar dengs/ /nga yi bka'
las 'da' ma byed/ /gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che/ /pad+ma rdo rje kha T+wAM kha/ /thal ba'i tshogs bzhin rlag par byed/ /rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o/ /pad+ma'i 'bar ba'i gzugs
'di yis/ /gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag /'dod gsum skye gnas gsal byas te/ /'jigs par 'gyur zhing gzhan 'di med/ /sa las yongs su bskor byas te/ /bgegs byed bya phyir

phur par gdab/ /oM g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rod adz+nyA pa ya ti k+Sha ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod/ /ngo mtshar
khro bo'i zur mig bzhin/ /smin ma khro gnyer g.yon mdzad cing / /kha yi pad+ma 'dzum bcas pas/ /so so'i phyag rgya gnas su sgyur/ /'gying bag bcas pas zhal la bstod/ /rta mchog khro bo'i
gar thabs kyis/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i tshul/ /ba yi rnam lnga dri bsres chus/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyer byugs nas/ /lha rnams gnas su dri yi chus/ /thig le gru bzhi
zlum por bya/ /rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams/ /so so'i gnas su dgram par bya/ /dbu rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs/ /lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams nye
ba'i sa| |mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya/ /cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang / /bzod gsol bskang pa'i don ched du/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bskor

ba bya| |oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra s+t+wa twe no pa tiSh+Tha Di D+ho me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/
tsit+taM shrI yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wA na/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ma me muny+tsa/ badzri b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya s+t+wa aH/ gsang sngags rgyal po bla med pa'i/ /lan gcig brjod
pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing / /las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed/ /pus mo sa la btsugs byas te/ /lag pa g.yas pa spos 'dzin cing / /g.yon pa
dril bu dkrol byas te/ /tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /oM bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon/ /mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan//
rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ /brnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje shugs chen po/ /dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen la/ /tshul khrims la sogs phung po
mnyes gyur cig /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i/ /dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni/ /mnyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las rnam grol zhing / /bde gshegs yon
tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs sgrub dang / /'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes gzung byed cing / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /dkyil
'khor rnam dag rgya chen brtson lags na/ /mgon po'i bka' drin rjes su brtse dgongs te/ /khyed kyis rab tu gnas par mdzad 'os lags/ /me tog dri bzang phreng sogs 'di bzhes la/ /ji
srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma grub par/ /de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni/ /bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis rlobs/ /de nas slob ma la bos te/ kye rigs kyi
bu khyod theg pa'i snod/ /rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon/ /dad gus dga' ba'i shugs phyung shog /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /cho ga bzang po 'di bstan bya/ /mgon po
rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang / /ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te/ /gsang ba zab mo bla
na med/ /chog bzang po 'di spyod pas/ /skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du/ /kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par/ /pad+ma gar
dbang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad/ /de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi/ /blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas
chos dang dge 'dun la/ /kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi/ /'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /
kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid tshe/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar
gyis/ /de nas legs spyod slob ma yis/ /skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa gzung / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya/ /bdag gis
sdig pa byas pa dang / /bgyid pa rjes su yi rang ba/ /mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang / /rang
rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis/ /bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la/ /dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo / /sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor byed pa'i/ /tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la/ /bdag ni rab tu skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems
mchog dri med pas/ /'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings byang
chub sems/ /dus gsum dag tu gtang mi bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing / /dus kun du ni yon tan gzung / /rnal 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya/ /rdo rje spun la mig bzhin blta//
gsang sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag/ brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya/ /de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang dang mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags/ /byin brlabs ye shes bskyed par
bya| |slar yang bdug pa me tog dang / /mar me dri chab la sogs pa'i/ /rang gi gnas su 'dug cing dbul/ /bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /
rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med/ /chag gas med pa'i tshems shing ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzang byug/ rtse mo me tog phreng btags pa/ /sngags zlos dri chus bsang bar bya/ /rigs
kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra shi ta ni swAhA/ yi ge gsum bcas sngags brjod cing / /shar du kha bltas slob ma la/ /bden pa bdar zhing sbyin bya zhing / /
des kyang mi smra blang bar bya/ /gri rtse lta bus lce bzhar zhing / /phra mo'i phyogs kyis so brus te/ /sa gzhi dri yis byugs pa ru/ /phan tshun mi blta dor bar bya/ /shar la
sogs pa'i phyogs kun gyis/ /zhi sogs dngos grub mtshan ma brtag /gyen thur rab dang 'bring gis blta/ /mtshams kyis 'jig rten las rnams 'grub/ /las dag pa yi sngags bzlas

nas| |sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i/ /chu gtsang dris sbyang khyor ba gsum/ /nye reg 'thor ba'i tshul du sbyin/ /oM hri bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harma pA pa ni tsA sha bi sho d+ha ma sarba kalpa na
a pa ni ya hUM/ gtsang ma'i ras la legs bkal ba'i/ /srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i/ /yi ge gsum gyis sngags bzlas nas/ /de yi dpung pa g.yon par bcing / /ku sha
rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i/ /bam po gnyis su sbams pa yis/ /yab yum gnyis su byin brlabs pa'i/ /sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba du sti ku ru swAhA/ dga' ba'i gtam
