gyis gzengs bstod cing / /mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas/ /lha tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas/ /bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal/ /mi smra dge pa'i sems bcas
pas| |rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /slar nyid slob dpon nang song ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /lha rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste/ /dge ba'i sems
kyis nyal bar bya/ /de nas skya rengs shar dus su/ /slob dpon slob ma sngas 'ongs te/ /kye kye bzhin bzang rnams longs shig /rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba/ /bden pa brjod
pa'i dus yin no/ /des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya/ /rab 'bring mtshan ma'i ltas bstan cing / /ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang / /ba yi rnam lngas
byug par bya/ /dngos rnams mtshan ma las grol ba'i/ /stong pa chen po ye shes bsgom/ /rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi/ /bum pa mgul ring lto ba zlum/ /kha khyer zhabs bteg
'phel ka che/ /dri zhim tshon dkar legs byugs te/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs gnas te/ /so so'i mtshan ma'i yi ge brgyan/ /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs rnams/ /mchod
nas stan la bkram par bya/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru lnga dang / /snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang / /bkra shis rdzas lnga gzhug par bya/ /mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs/ /dam
tshig lha rnams gsal byas nas/ /ye shes sku dang gnyis med par/ /mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya/ /sngags bcas chu dang gnyis med gnas/ /dkyil 'khor grub
pa'i dus dag tu/ /rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel byas
pas| |dkyil 'khor sa la thig gdab bya/ /shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon ba'am/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa gnas
bya'o| |gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i ras/ /kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ /lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag /byin gyis brlabs cing bsgril bar bya/ /stong pa nyid kyis sbyangs byas
nas| |rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dag /mchod bstod sngags bcas bsgril bar bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya mu tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ oM AHhUM/ dza gdags pa yi sngags brjod cing / /rdo rje
slob dpon thugs ka nas/ /slob mas smin mtshams drang por 'then/ /de la gnas kyi nub dang shar/ /'od 'phros byang sems thugs rje che/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mngon bar blta//
rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan/ /stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje thig skud sgrar ldan pas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil
'khor legs grub cing / /'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzod/ /oM a nu na a nu ga to sarba d+harma pa ra pa ra a nu ga ta sarba a nan+ta/ a ba ta ra sarba d+harma hUM/ lha rnams
mdun du bzhugs gyur nas/ /mchod bstod dbang po'i tshul du dgongs/ /rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing / /shar nas nub tu brkyang ba yi/ /tshangs thig dang po gdab byas nas/ /
de bzhin sgo nas tshad kyis ni/ /zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal/ /rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang / /mtshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya/ /legs thig gru bzhi mnyam gyur nas/ /
brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo /bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs pa'i/ /gzhan dag cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo /thig gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing / /rdo rje khu
tshur sngags bcas kyis/ /rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya/ /oM badzra ga dzaH/ dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis/ /mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam/ /dkyil 'khor
gnas rnams kun bltas te/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yi/ /sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas/ /cha phran dag kyang blo yis brtag /rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /ri mo'i mkhar ni btegs
byas te| |'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag /rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis bya/ /oM be gA kra ma hUM/ pad+ma rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po/ /thugs rje ye
shes rnam 'phrul tshogs/ /khyab mdzad byin rlabs ston pa'i gtso/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad du byung / /ma lus sems can don gyi phyir/ /pho brang
dag par byin gyis brlab/ /phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas/ /byang chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur/ /nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i/ /thugs rje chen po dri med
shugs| |ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod/ /rin chen rnam lnga'i phye ma dang / /sa tshon la sogs gang
'byor pa/ /rin po che yi snod blugs te/ /dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhag /sbyangs shing byin gyis brlabs byas na/ /rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la/ /rigs kyi
dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang / /mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par bya/ /oM badzra tsit+ta ma ti sa ma ya hUM/ dkar mthing ser po ljang khu dang / /dmar po'i tshon rnams rim bzhin du/ /
dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsam byas te/ /pany+tsa rA ga drang bar bya/ /g.yas pas pad+ma rdo rje gzung / /g.yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o/ /de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing / /bden pa bdar
te dgab par bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag /sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /yang dag bden pa'i byin
rlabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzad/ /dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te/ /dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing / /phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri/ /mtho dman med snyoms
drang por bya/ /de nas mtshan ma rtags bstan te/ /chad cing smra bas mi 'grub ste/ /yon pas gdung ba'i las rnams skye/ /chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag /shi tha ma ngan par 'gyur ba yin/ /lhag
dang bcas pas g.yul 'khrugs shing / /phyogs 'khrul ba yis smyo bar 'gyur/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga las/ /bde gshegs gtso bo'i rigs su bcas/ /phyag
rgya'i yi ge mtshan ma bri/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab gnas pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshogs rnams la/ /byang sems khro bo bcas pa dag /shar nas rim bzhin bri bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi mtshams rnams
su| |mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams gzhag /bar khyams bskal bzang sems dpa' rnams/ /sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshogs gzhag go /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste/ /bde gshegs 'od
zer snang ba yi/ /pad+mo rdo rje dril bcas pas/ /rang gi kha dog tshon bcas gzhag /de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la/ /tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug /chags med 'od dang spyan dga'
pa'i| |pad brtsegs pad+ma'i phreng ma dang / /bdag nas glegs bam rin chen phreng / /rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa gzhag /shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bde bar gshegs pa mi
bskyod pa/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sngags bcas pas/ /rang gi 'od bcas gdan la gzhag /de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la/ /'brug sgra dri ma med pa'i rigs/ /mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phyug /
chags shing rin chen pad spungs pa/ /rin po che yi dra ba ste/ /rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bde gshegs rin po che sbyangs kyis/ /rin chen brtsegs
dang dril bu la/ /rang mdog sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o/ /de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la/ /nam mkha'i mdzod dang dra ba can/ /dkon mchog rgyal mtshan rin chen tog/
rin chen gling bu rin chen phreng / /rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum/ /rang gi 'od bcas sngags kyis brgyan/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bde gshegs kun du snang ba'i 'od/ /
'khor lo dril bu mtshan ma la/ /rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan ba bri/ /pad+mo rigs kyi 'khor lo'i tshad/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bde gshegs don yod grub pa yi/ /rdo rje sna
tshogs dril bu bsnams/ /rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal/ /de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la/ /brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po/ /gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang / /rgya gram

phreng dang pad+ma phreng / /rdo rje gdengs po zla gam can/ /'od 'phros sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i/ /mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi rnams la/ /'od 'phros pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / /pad+ma gnon dang pad skyong dang / /

me long rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi wang gar gyi phyag rgya la/ /rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i shar brtsams te/ /rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas/ /bde ba'i blo gros rgya
mtsho'i sgra/ /gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi/ /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams/ /rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan mar gnas/ /shes rab snang

pa rdo rje rgyal/ /'od zer 'phro ba drag shul gyi/ /rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs/ /pad+ma'i sdong po 'od phung bri/ /dri ma'i tshogs dang sgyu ma 'phrul/ /rin chen rgyal po dra ba can/ /rin chen ri bo

rgya gram bri/ /lag pa brang gser 'od 'phro ba dang / /rin chen snye ma chos mthong dang / /pad+ma'i rgya gram glegs bam dang / /pad+ma'i sdong po'i go cha bri/ /dri med mun pa sel ba dang / /dga' ba dbyangs dang

gzhon nu yi/ /chu shel nor bu'i phreng ba dang / /sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /de ni rigs lnga'i sems dpa' ste/ /rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i/ /de mthar khro bo bzhi rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan

ma bri byas te/ /sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / /rtse gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang / /dbyig pa rtse gcig ral gri'o/ /gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /bdug spos me tog mar me dri/ /phyi rol bar
khyams gnas dag la/ /phyogs re sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste/ /rdo rje rnam snang gar mkhan dang / /blo yi rgya mtsho thogs med bkod/ /rdo rje mtshan ma gsang sngags bcas/ /rang 'od gnas gdan
dag la bri/ /pad+mo dga' ba'i sa la dbang / /rin chen spungs pa sprin gyi phreng / /rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri/ /yid 'ong me tog sgron ma dang / /spos
brtsegs kha lo sgyur ba dang / /pad+ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri/ /dran dbang pad+ma'i blo gros dang / /las byed snying po'i blo gros dang / /rgya gram mtshan
ma sngags dang bcas/ /rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri/ /shar sogs pa yi sgo rnams su/ /khro bo'i 'jigs pa'i rgyal po yi/ /rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdengs/ /rin
chen dbyug pa pad+ma phreng / /rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /phyogs bzhi rgyan dang phreng ba dang / /'dod yon lha mo la sogs pa'i/ /rgyan rnams pad+ma rdo rje
dang | |rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram bri/ /'phro bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od bcas pa'o/ /phyi rol rta babs dra ba sogs/ /ban+d+ha dril bu nyi shu bzhi/ /gdugs dang bum pa
bya yi phreng / /dpag bsam rdzing bu dang ba dang / /nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ri dwags rnams/ /mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad+ma dang / /rdo rje me 'od mtshon gyis bskor/ /
dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga/ /pad phreng dmar po bar khyams dkar/ /sgo bzhi'i rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /gru chad gser gyi kha dog can/ /mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram zhing / /bla rgyan na bza'
phyogs rgyan bre/ /me tog tshom bu sngags bcas pa/ /so so'i gnas su dgram par bya/ /gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas nas/ /phyi rol phyogs dang mtshams su dgod/ /lha yi ting 'dzin
gsal byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor shis pa'i las 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams bstod byas te/ /rdo rjes pad+mo dam tshig gzhug /thugs ka'i sngags kyis dgug byas pa'i/ /mgron rnams
tshim par 'gyur ba dang / /dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas shing / /rang gi 'phrin las bcol bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba
dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gzugs brnyan brtsam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs mgu gyur nas/ /rgyal ba sar yang
bskul ba mdzad/ /kun don thugs rje chen po'i shugs/ /ma 'ongs gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor chen por gang 'jug pa/ /dbang bskur tshul bzhin ji lta bur/ /de bzhin
rab tu gnas pa gang / /bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag bsrung / /sbyin sreg rim pa ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo thugs rje cher ldan pas/ /ma lus gdul bya kun gyi phyir/ /dus 'di snang bar
mdzad nas kyang / /cho ga'i yan lag rgyas pa gsungs/ /de nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis/ /gus bar gzung ste spyad par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang / /phyag rgya shes rab rab
bskyod cing / /rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas pa/ /rigs rnams kun la gzigs mdzad de/ /mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i/ /don 'di rab tu gnas par mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa'
blo ldan pa'i/ /ma 'ongs gdul bya gang dag gis/ /gnyis med gsang ba'i thig pa 'dir/ /smin pa'i lam la 'jug 'dod pas/ /gang gis nyes pa'i las rnams kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon mgu
byas nas/ /yang dang yang du gsol btab ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i don du gnyer/ /ma lus sdug bsngal las bsgral phyir/ /byang chub sems mchog rgya
chen blos/ /phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag /thams cad byang chub don du bsngos/ /'dod chags rnam dag pad+mo'i dbyings/ /chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid/ /ye shes sprul pa'i dkyil
'khor mchog /de ring yid 'ong don chen gnyer/ /oM u ta ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pad+ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas/ /mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs
pa yi| |bde gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms/ /mi shes dri ma kun sel ba'i/ /thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar phyin/ /rdo rje thugs la phyag
'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos/ /rab snang pad+ma'i dbyings nas 'khrul/ /byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rin chen
char 'bebs shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba/ /dpal mchog bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /theg pa che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu gnas 'gyur khyab pa po/ /las
mdzad rdo rje dam tshig mchog /mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms mdzad/ /rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas
nyid du/ /dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba/ /dam tshig ye shes rab grub mdzod/ /shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul pa'i/ /rjes su 'jug pas snying rje'i tshogs/ /yang dag bden pa las
byung ba'i/ /byin rlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs/ /bde gshegs sprul pa'i tshig tshogs ni/ /dbang bskur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs/ /me tog phreng ba la sogs pas/ /slob ma brgyan
bar byas nas ni/ /phyir phyogs stegs bu la bzhag ste/ /gtor ma phyogs kun las phyin nas/ /kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing / /slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya/ /ras gtsang dmar
bo'i rgyu las byung / /gnas gzhan ma spyad ma nyams par/ /rang gi sngags kyis byin brlabs nas/ /legs par gdong ni g.yogs par bya/ /pad+mo'i thal sbyar rin chen phreng / /sngags brjod
gzungs 'dzin rtse gcig tu/ /brtan bor byang chub don gnyer bas/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed/ /de nas slob dpon blo ldan pas/ /theg chen lam la zhugs pa'i phyir/ /
slob ma dag la slar smras pa/ /gsang sngags lam mchog zab pa 'di/ /shin tu gzung bar dka' ba yin/ /khyod kyis gzung bar 'dod pa rnams/ /mi snyems pa yi blo bskyed nas/ /lta spyod

mchog la gnas dgongs so/ /kye ma rdo rje gsang ba'i don/ /theg chen snying po bla ma med/ /tshe 'dis byang chub 'grub byed kyang / /rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur/ /ngang tshul bzang po 'di rtogs
pas| |dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /byin rlabs ngo mtshar mchog brnyes te/ /sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan/ /khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral
zhing | |dad brtson the tshom med par zungs/ /de nas slob mas slar gsol ba/ /yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i/ /mgon mchog rnams kyis bdag la gnong / /'di dag bdag la
gtol med pas/ /khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal/ /slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid/ /tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog /slob dpon che la skyabs su mchi/ /sangs
rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs/ /thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs/ /bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed/ /gar gyi
dbang phyug bde chen mchog /mgon 'gyur rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir/ /bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis//
gsang ba'i mthe bo nas bzung ste/ /yol ba'i nang du gzhug par bya/ /oM pad+mo sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsit+ta ut+pa tA yA mi hUM swAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas/ /
mchod brnyes rgyun bshags la sogs kyis/ /snod du rung bar gyur pa dang / /dam tshig gsum sgrog chu blud cing / /rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing / /phyag rgyas sngags kyi gnas
gsum sbyang / /oM/ rgyal ba kun gyis khyod nyid ni/ /byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas/ /pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang / /dad med brtson 'grus nyams

pa dang / /blo dman shes rab chung ba dang / /blo dman rtog 'dzin la gnas la/ /srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya/ /bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku/ /khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na/ /gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan
brjod dus/ /snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du shes/ /bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku/ /khyod la thugs rjes gzung byed pas/ /nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag /'da' bar rung ba ma yin no/ /
bdag la brnyas shing 'khu byed na/ /rab gtum khro bo chen po'i sku/ /klad pa tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing / /lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed/ /gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
la| |rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas/ /dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du/ /dri zhim bdug spos dril bkrol zhing / /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya/ /des ni mtshan ma'i
rtags mthong 'gyur/ /sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g.yos/ /gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod/ /thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal/ /sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par
gnas| |bden pa'i ye shes byin rlabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin/ /bdag gis skal ba ji lta bar/ /dus 'dir dbab par mdzad pa rigs/ /nor bu phreng
ba gar bab pa/ /rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid/ /sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa/ /slar nyid de la sbyin par bya/ /gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs
pas| |ma rig ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad/ /ma rig bsgribs g.yogs bsal
mdzad nas/ /pad+mo spyan bzang dri ma med/ /oM pad+ma tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pra be sha phaT/ rdo rjes gdong g.yogs bsal byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya/ /legs
par ltos shig blo gros che/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams/ /gsang sngags snying po dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin/ /me tog gang la bab
pa yi| |lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin/ /shar gyi sgo srung nas brtsams te/ /gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan/ /zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas/ /bla ma blo ldan
mnyes par bya/ /yi dam lha sku phyag rgya sogs/ /gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan/ /de ring dus nas bzung byas te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par/ /rab rib tha
ma'i blo ldan pas/ /dus kun tu ni gzung bar bya/ /kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas/ /'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtson la/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma la btud de/ /pho brang grong mchog
nyams dga' 'dir/ /dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod/ /snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags/ /rigs bzhin thugs rje brtse dgongs pas/ /dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod/ /gnang
bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas/ /skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par mdzod/ /shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab/ /dbang bstan dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas/ /
dmar po'i tshon gyis legs byugs te/ /seng+ge'i khri bshams pad+mor bcas/ /'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis bzhag /spyi bor gdugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g.yas/ /dung dang zangs dung
sil snyan rnams/ /rol cha mchod cha phyogs mtshams dgod/ /rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs pa/ /dri chu sngags bcas yungs kar dang / /ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya/ /oM ma hA bin
ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de/ /bkra shis dag pa'i glu blangs shing / /rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te/ /bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya/ /de yi phyir ni sgrib tshogs
dang | |bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas/ /lha yi chu rgyun dag pa'i mthus/ /ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog /oM lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu/ /rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las
byung | |byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams dag /dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod/ /yon tan rin chen rnam dag mchog /rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi/ /dbu rgyan bzang po'i
cod pan bcas/ /kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog /traM/ yon tan ma bcas pa yi rgyan/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed/ /khams
gsum chos kyi rgyal po che/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob kun/ /ye nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od phreng sngags kyis brgyan byas pa'i/ /rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun
las rgyal/ /bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas/ /khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad/ /byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /rang rig ye shes gnas gsal
byed| |chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don/ /sgra brjod dngos po brag ca bzhin/ /stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bzhin/ /de las sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs/ /hoM/ chos kun
rgyun las rnam grol zhing / /de bzhin rkyen med 'bras bu'i tshogs/ /rang bzhin pad+ma dag pa'i dbyings/ /nges pa'i theg pa ston byed gsung / /kye ho rdo rje che ge mo/ /
rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur te/ /chos sku 'od gsal bde ba che/ /pad+ma'i sgra dbyangs ming dang bcas/ /oM/ phyag rgya chen po gsang ba'i gnas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i
ting 'dzin gyis/ /mi mthun la sogs bcom byas te/ /rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ /oM badzra pad+mo a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ oM rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM
a ti pa ti traM a b+hi Shiny+tsa haM/ oM na ma che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /slob dpon lha la rab gus pas/ /tshogs bcas yon tan gzung byed cing / /rdo rje dam tshig pa yi spun/ /mig gi
'bras bu bzhin du bskyang / /'di dag la gus smod byed pa/ /tshe srog rdo rje gtum pos 'phrog /sngags rnams dus su brjod bya zhing / /phyag rgya rgyun du bcing bar bya/ /gsang
ba'i tshig dang mtshan ma'i tshogs/ /dus kun dag tu sba byas te/ /bdud rtsi lnga po sha sogs rnams/ /mnyam par shes pas rgyun du spyad/ /bro drug glu drug stabs pa
yi| |brtul zhugs gnas skabs dag tu bya/ /nyon mongs chos lnga 'dod yon lnga/ /dam tshig nyams pas shes par spyad/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya che/ /gnas gsum
brtul zhugs la gnas shing / /lung bstan rjes gnang dbugs 'don pa'i/ /cho ga bzang po spyad par bya/ /des ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /yon tan bza' ba'i gnas
thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya sku/ /yang dag sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /ma 'ongs gzung ba'i blo gnas pas/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig rjes su zungs/ /oM sarba
ta thA ga ta swa ra pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /oM da du shrI pad+mo g+hAn d+ha a/ oM ma hA pad+mo swA hA sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta hUM phaT/ mchod pa bkra shis bzang la bklags/ brtul
zhugs mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i/ /dngos grub thun mong cho ga'i las/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang / /dbye
rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga dang / /gsang pa la sogs las rnams kun/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi tshul/ /khyod kyis gang 'dod grub par gyis/ /de nas rang bzhin
'od gsal ba'i/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rab sbyor bas/ /'khor ba'i chos rnams zil gnon cing / /phyogs bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing / /pha rol phyin drug
gnas 'phags te/ /sgro 'dogs the tshom gcod par byed/ /lung bstan bde gshegs sras bcas kyis/ /rigs mchog mdzad pa bla na med/ /rgyal ba kun gyis
lung bstan mdzad/ /khams gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum kun na gzhan med de/ /des na 'dod la
chags bral bar/ /khyed kyis nam yang ma byed cig /oM mahA sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gsang sngags rgyud rnams 'dzin bya dang / /lha dang slob dpon gzung bar bya/ /'di
ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsung gcig sgo nas gsungs pa yin/ /'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i blos/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs brtson par gyis/ /dad
brtson shes rab blo ldan pas/ /gang 'dod 'bras bu'i tshul la sbyor/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i grong khyer 'dir/ /gang gis 'dod don gang gnyer pa/ /des ni sgrib sogs
kun spangs shing / /mchog gnas ye shes gsal bar sbyor/ /bde chen gsang ba'i theg pa che/ /tshe 'di byang chub 'grub par byed/ /nyon mongs dgra sogs las grol
ba'i| |bde ba chen po'i gnas thob pa'o/ /de nas lha dang bzhugs gnas pa'i/ /rnam dag de nyid bstan bya ste/ /mchod sbyin gtor tshogs mgron gnyer cing / /bkra shis
'gro ba'i tshogs gsog bya/ /slar yang slob ma blo ldan pas/ /yon mchog bla ma la phul te/ /maN+Dal mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /mnyes byas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /
shes rab yan lag phun sum tshogs/ /bcu drug yang na nyi shu bzhi/ /rdo rje bla ma la phul te/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bya/ /khrus byas dri zhim rgyan gyis klubs/ /sna
tshogs sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang / /rigs kyi lha dang ldan byas pas/ /dam tshig bskul ba'i brdas mtshon te/ /gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug bya/ /byang chub
sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod byas pas/ /slob dpon tshogs la dbang yang bskur/ /ji ltar rgyal ba sras mchog gis/ /'jug pa po rnams
tshim mdzad pa'i/ /gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don/ /dbab pa'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i/ /a la la ho/ oM AHhUM/ a ho su ka rang gi gnas/ /
a ho re ti tshim par mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /shes rab mchog ldan byin brlabs pa/ /slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya/ /rang bzhin bde ba'i ye
shes nyid/ /zag pa med pa'i don gsal 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rang gi dngos nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /e ma ho 'gro ba'i gnas 'di dag /
de bzhin nyid las gzhan du 'khrul/ /de dag bde chen ye shes pas/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba ci yang med/ /ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra/ /rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra zhing //
rdul bral thar pa zhi ba'i chos/ /rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do/ /de ni sbyin sreg gsang ba'i don/ /khyed rnams kun la phyir bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs
bzhi 'am/ /gzhan yang gnas gzhan gang 'thad par/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / /las kun pa yi thab khung brtsam/ /zlum po khru gang zla gam dang / /gru
gsum sna tshogs dbyibs can no/ /de dag dkar ser dmar dang nag /sna bzhi kun gyis mtshon pa'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma'i rgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mtshon cha can/ /
khru gang bzhi dang gnyis med dang / /khru gsum de yi zhabs su phyed/ /bud shing yam shing so so yi/ /mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog ro/ /rtse mo cha las sor bzhi dang / /sor
brgyad bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad/ /sbams pa'i so so'i mar gyis byug /rim bzhin rtsa ba bud khang ni/ /zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam dang / /gru gsum tshul du brtsig par
bya| |lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid/ /me yi gnas su bzhag byas te/ /so so'i las dang mthun pa ste/ /ag+ne ra dza 'bod par bya/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas g.yob/ /g.yon
pa bgrang phreng gzung bar bya/ /oM e h+ye hi ag+ne ye mahA pa ba hi swAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal pos gsung bya ste/ /me lha'i gdan mchod pad+ma dbul/ /de rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang / /
bsreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas/ /lha rnams mchod pa'i phyag tshang du/ /bstod cing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis/ /khu bcud
'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul/ /oM mahA a na la mahA b+hu tA badzra la basmi ku ru hUM sarba duSh+TaN hUM phaT/ me lha mchod pa'o/ /oM mahA ku ru pany+tsa hUM/ dgang blugs dbul ba'i
sngags so/ /oM sarba ba d+ha ha na badzra swAhA/ til gyi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/ me tog gi'o/ /oM sarba ag+ne ye swA hA/ yam shing ngo / /oM badzra pU dza me g+ha ga lo ke shwa ra hUM/
'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o/ /oM d+hu pe ti pa pu sha gan+d+he sbyar ba'i mchod pa rnams so/ /oM a pra ti badzra ye swAhA/ ku sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra
A yu She swAhA/ dur ba'i 'o/ /gzhan yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa/ /rang ming yi ge gsum sngags dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing / /'dod pa'i don
la gsol ba gdab/ /sdig bshags bag chags kun byas pas/ /lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /tha ma me lha mchod byas nas/ /'phrin las so so'i sngags brjod
cing | |oM badzra na ma sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma ku ru hUM/ lha rnams gshegs su gsol zhing / dam tshig lha la bsdu bar bya/ /de nas rab gnas bzang po ni/ /'gro la
phan phyir bshad par bya/ /sa phyogs nyams dga' mdzes pa ru/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor legs byas te/ /mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes byas nas/ /slob
dpon chas su gzhug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrubs byas nas/ /rten tshogs sbyang ba'i cho ga bya/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan
gnas nas gshegs mdzad de/ /lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs nas/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol/ /dkon mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang / /
me tog la sogs mchod bzhes la/ /'di don gzung bar bya ba dang / /byang chub sems mchog spel bar mdzod/ /nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse
ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la/ /bka' drin cho ga mdzad par 'os/ /de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas/ /'gro drug gnas
kun sgrol byed pa/ /thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams kun/ /'jig rten mchod pa'i
don phyir ro/ /rab gnas bzang por 'os pa lags/ /de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /dbang
bskur cho ga rdzogs byas nas/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs gtang / /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog
rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lam khyad par du 'phags pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i
tshe bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te/ kye ma'o ho sangs rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing brlag par byed na/ thabs ji lta bus gdul bar bya/ 'on
kyang 'di nyid la ni/ bdag ci yang bya ba'i gnas med/ shin tu dman par gyur pa dag dang mtshungs par 'gran nam/ de bzhin du
'jig rten gsum pa 'di dag ni/ srid pa mi bsreg brlag par bya ba'i 'phrin las yin pas/ thams cad la bka' bsgo zhing / las ngan pa 'di dag la bzlog
par bya'o zhes bsam mo/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang / dbang dang gzi brjid thams cad 'dus nas kye khyed rnams bdag la nyon cig /
'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni/ rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na/ thams cad srid pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /des na phyogs thams cad 'khor dang bcas
pa 'dus la/ bdag gi bka' nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag byed chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa/
khyed ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can zhig yin/ nged rnams re re yang 'khor dpag tu med pa skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po yin pas/ yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed
cing / gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas/ khyod rang bzhin gnas na legs so zhes mthun par brjod pas/ bdud kyi rgyal po yang shin tu nyon mongs
pas rgyas te gzhan dag la smras pa/ lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /nga yi bka' las gnas pa yin/ /skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun/ /rgyal po'i bka' gsang nyan par
gyis| |khams gsum bdag po lha yi lha/ /sa rnams kun gyi sa ster pa/ /bdag ni mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshad/ /kun gyi 'gran par nus ma yin/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na/ /
srog srid brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te de dag gi dbus nas srin po chen po'i gzugs
'dzin pa'i khro bor gnas nas rang gi mthu las sprul pa'i khro bo dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs spro bar mdzad do/ /de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
tshogs kyi bdag po dang / b+h+ring gi ri ti dang / gzhon nu gdong drug pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te/ de dag gi dbus na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam mi khyab
par spros te dbang dang / rdzu 'phrul ston to/ /ri rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na 'gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad
do| |gser gyi ri la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin dang / dbang ldan dang / gshin rje dang / bden bral dang / chu lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / nyi ma dang / sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang
rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas par 'khod do/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / phur bu dang / pa bsangs
dang / spen pa dang / gza' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / mtshon char bcas pas 'khod do/ /mtha' yas
dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas dang / dung skyong dang / pad+ma dang / chu lha rnams kyis rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams dang / 'jigs pa'i
sprul pas 'khod do/ /de bzhin du khams gsum gyi dregs byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / 'gro ba drug gtso bo dbang che zhing mthu
yod pa rnams dang / ma mo rnams dang / gshin rje dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 'dab bzang dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs su bcas pa
rnams kyis kyang rang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mtshon cha dang nga ro dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bdud kyi rgyal po
yang nyon mongs pa skyes te rang gi 'khor rnams 'du bar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dus 'di dag gcig tu ston nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal
yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skur ston to/ /khro mo'i tshogs dang rol pa mdzad pa lags/ 'khor ba'i tshogs mtshon cha me 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur spros te nam
mkha' thams cad gang bar byas nas thog ser nad dang tshub ma thams cad skyes so/ /des 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyi
sa phyogs thams cad nas 'khor ba'i me 'od 'bar ba'i mtshon chas bsad cing gtubs pa las/ so so'i tshogs bred par gyur te rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /
de nas lha thams cad 'du bar byed pa'i bdud kyi sde de dag la gnas dor zhing dam tshig byin te/ so so'i snying po blangs te 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te/ lha chen
po brgyad ni/ rang gi rtse la 'khod do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi ni/ shar gyi gling la 'khod do/ /gnod sbyin dang phyogs skyong dag ni/ shar gyi gling phran gnyis su 'khod do/ /'gro
ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams ni/ lhor 'khod do/ /dri za dang ma mo rnams ni/ lho'i gling phran la dgod do/ /lha ma yin rnams ni/ nub tu 'khod do/ /gshin rje dang 'dab bzang
dang srin po rnams ni/ nub kyi gling gi gling phran gnyis la 'god do/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rnams ni/ byang du 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba bla na med
pa las/ bdud kyi sprul pa bstan pa'o// //de nas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' zhing 'khor thams cad la bka' bsgo/ /rgyal po gcig gi 'khor
du gnas pas ni/ yid dang mthun par spyod pas gnas pa yin pas/ khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ji ltar bsgo ba'i bka' bzhin nyon la/ thar pa'i lam 'di chod la ston pa gzhan
la gus par ma byed cig /kho bos 'jig rten stongs par 'ong ngo / /bsam pa rgya chen po med pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni/ gti mug can gyi rang bzhin te/ byol song lta bu yin pas/ bde legs
kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no/ /yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag /rang gi bde ba spong byed cing / /thar pa'i lam gzhan sgrub byed pa/ /de dag
'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag /nyes 'dod bde legs spong byed pa/ /rmongs pas 'gro rnams snying re rje/ /re zhig thugs rje skal ldan pas/ /bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin/ /gnas
gzhan gong ma thob 'dod pas/ /bdag la dad sems gus par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de dag gis kyang de ltar nyan te rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ji ltar bya
ba'i thabs med de/ de ltar 'khod cing gnas so/ /de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang gi gnas su song ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dga' ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod cing /
dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo la spyod do/ /ji ltar khams gsum kun gyi bdag po ni/ bdag yin pas 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni/ gzhan dag yod par bdag gis ma mthong ngo / /da sangs
rgyas kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bsdu na thabs ji ltar brtsam zhing / rang gi 'khor dag la yang 'dri bar byed do/ /de nas bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bsgo ste/
sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnams la mi dge ba'i ltas dang / mtshan ma ngan pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi sgrub pa thams cad du rab tu 'chad cing / ci 'dod pa rnams la grub par bya na/ bdag cag la mos
pa byed do/ /de'i rjes la de dag gi gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bar bya'o/ /gal te 'ongs par ma nus pa dag ni/ kho rang gi gnas de
nyid dang bcos pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do/ /de'i stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul nas dkar po'i ris la dga'
ba'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bcom zhing / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshams pa las/ bden pa'i mthu gang la gnod par ma gyur to/ /
de nas rab tu khros te bdag gi khams gsum 'di dus gcig tu gdul bar bya spyod pa la ngan pa'i tshul can g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/ de rang gi sde
tshan 'og ma la gnas pa kun bskul te thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di dag rigs kyis 'dul bar bya'o zhes brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad
pa dang / de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang / mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun tu spro zhing / rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang rjod par byed do/ /des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing
g.yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to/ /bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi sde dang bcas pa shugs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan bde chen mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/ /stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad phyir/ /rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs/ /de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos
kyang / /thugs rje che dang smon lam mthus/ /so so'i las rtog mthun bzhin du/ /sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston/ /'dod chags la zhen smon pa dag /chags pa chen pos 'dul bar mdzad/ /de
bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog 'dul don du/ /mthun byas snang ba sna tshogs dang / /mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad/ /pad+mo bde gshegs rdo rje don/ /rin chen rin
chen las sna tshogs/ /phyag rgya che sogs 'khor los bsgyur/ /ji lta ba bzhin dag par mdzad/ /thabs chen rnam dag pad+mo'i don/ /shes rab sprul pa'i mchog gyur pas/ /gar gyi dbang
phyug bde ba che/ /rdo rje lta nyid sprul par mdzad/ /gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po/ /sna tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de/ /dag pa'i 'gro ba mthun byas sku/ /gser 'od mtshan dang dpe byad
ldan| |go byed theg pa bla na med/ /zab mo gsang sngags ji bzhin par/ /rgyal ba bde gshegs phyag rgya'i sku/ /rab sprul dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i/ /la las byang sems rgya chen mchog
la lar lam lnga dag par sbyong / /la lar pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs/ /la lar 'bras bu'i don la sbyor/ /la lar dga' ldan lha yul 'phags/ /lhums su zhugs dang bltams pa
dang / /'jig rten spyod mthun rol rtsed sogs/ /gzhan gyi skur spang bya ba bsnams/ /bcas ka'i can gyi bsam 'phrul ba/ /mthun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba mchog /dka' thub
mdzad dang dga' ba spyod/ /rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas/ /bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing / /rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul nas bzhugs/ /cho 'phrul mdzad pa kun 'dul zhing //
chos kyi 'khor lo rim bzhin bskor/ /mya ngan 'da' tshul ring bsrel ston/ /zhi tshogs khro bor 'khyil ba dang / /rang byung dud 'gro'i gzugs sna tshogs/ /snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu sku/ /
tshangs pa khyab 'jug 'jig rten skyong / /bdud dang srin po gzugs sogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i las rtog dag mdzad cing / /rang gi ye shes don bkod bya/ /de tshe 'gro ba'i gnas mtshon
tshogs/ /las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams/ /de bzhin nyid mthus tshogs chen pos/ /yang dag lam las rab grol zhing / /nga rgyal chen
po'i dregs tshogs skyes/ /rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston/ /nyon mongs las kyi lam la zhen/ /rang gi rigs tshogs bsdu bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum 'jig a la la/ /khams
gsum gtso bo bdag cag rnams/ /su zhig sprul pa a la la/ /'jigs par mdzad pa'i 'os ma lags/ /rang gi dka' thub bde gnas pas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam
mchog ste/ /gzhan gyi bstan pa ci zhig bya/ /bde tshogs 'jigs pa'i yan lag go /su zhig rang gi bde spong zhing / /gzhan nas sdug bsngal don gnyer ba/ /gzugs
mang sprul pa bsam yas kyang / /rang gi sku mdzes bsgyur ba dka'/ /sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas/ /rang gi gsung nyan 'phro byed dam/ /sems rtogs bya ba'i 'od bcas
kyis| |ting 'dzin rtse gcig 'gyur ba med/ /drag po'i stobs mchog gzi ldan rnams/ /rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod/ /de nas bdud dpung dang po dang / /dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab
'jug che/ /rgya byed glu dang dregs byed rnams/ /rab tu khros te rang gi mthus/ /ston zhing drag po'i gsang sngags dang / /gtum tshig nga ro 'bod sgrog byed/ /de tshe rgyal po'i byin
rlabs mthus/ /mthun 'jug thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de/ /theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog /khyad par sgo gsung gsang byed cing / /yang dag don la bde bkod phyir/ /thugs rje chen
pos mthun mdzad de/ /'jug pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing / /dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang / /rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus/ /don 'jug mthun pa'i spyod sgo 'jig /gti
mug chen po mun gtibs nas/ /nga rgyal ri bo kun du bkod/ /zhe sdang me lce 'bar bsregs shing / /phrag dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas/ /'dod chags chu bos 'byin bar 'gyur/ /dregs
pa'i mthu yis rab khros te/ /tshogs rnams gcig la gcig bsgo zhing / /gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs phyung nas/ /rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni/ /'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug
par byed/ /mi nad mu ge 'khrug pa dang / /mtshon cha lo tog 'bras bu 'phrog /'byung po'i 'jigs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams/ /rgyun mi 'chad du 'khor bar 'byung / /sa gzhi me
'bar chu bdag byed/ /dug dang dbyig dug rlung bzhin g.yos/ /bde lam mtho ris thar lam gcod/ /mi dag sems kyis non 'gyur zhing / /'gro rnams sdug bsngal bskyed byas pas/ /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs khral bskyed/ /de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i/ /'khor rnams dus gcig bstan par bzhengs/ /gtso bo'i phyogs su 'dud byed cing / /lan
grangs bskor zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /mgon po bde ba mnyes byed cing / /mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /thugs rje che mnga' lha yi lha/ /byams sogs
dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus/ /gdos bcas thal bar brlag mdzad pas/ /thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs/ /cho 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ /mdzad pa'i byin rlabs bstan
du gsol/ /de dag nyon mongs rlabs 'khrug pas/ /rang bzhin thar lam bde bar 'joms/ /byang chub sems nyid rlan bral lam/ /srid gsum yal bar dor byed na/ /thugs rje
chen po gang la gdags/ /e ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das/ /e ma ho byang sems pad+ma'i rdzing / /e ma ho brjod bral ku mu ta/ /e ma ho me tog 'bras bcas shing / /'di dag
dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas/ /rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon tan gnas/ /dus 'dir dag par ga la mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po ga la gdags/ /'di dag skal ldan gsung
ba'i snod/ /rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin/ /da ltar rnam rtog ri bos non/ /thabs kyis 'dul bar ma gyur pas/ /shugs kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
bstan du gsol/ /zhes gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mdzad pa chen po'i le'u
ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid

sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings nas phyung ste sprul pa mdzad do/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa'i/ /rta babs rgyan tshogs kun gyis spras/ /rin chen nor bu'i phreng sogs dang / /ban+d+ha dril bu 'dod pa lnga yi

tshogs/ /mchod pa bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngas sbras/ /'khor lo re'u mig dgu pa las/ /seng+ge la sogs gdan khri spras/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha
Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ ye shes ma 'dres bde chen gsal/ /rnam 'phrul rigs mchog gzungs kyi dam tshig dang / /khro zhing 'dren pa'i mdangs
kyis gnas/ /rigs gnyis lung gis rgyud pa'i sku/ /dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /ser dkar dmar ba'i zhal gnyis dag /bzhin mdangs tshangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /
dbus ma khro 'dzum brjid bag dang / /pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /dril bu rin chen rtse gsum 'dzin/ /rin chen phreng ba'i chun 'phyang dang / /mu tig do shal dpung rgyan spras/ /stong g.yogs
smad dkris na bza' klubs/ /dbu rgyan snyan cha sor gdub tshogs/ /mtshan bzang dpe byad mdzes par brgyan/ /rigs kyi mchod pas dbu skra sil/ /rang 'od btsun mo'i sku bcas
pa| |phyung nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyis spros/ /hUM phaT pad+mo d+h+r-ika dza swAhA/ oM duM druM b+hin+d+ha dza pra mo haM/ mdzad pa'i 'phrin las rdzogs byas nas/ /slar
'dus bdag po'i sku la thim/ /shar du rnam snang phyag rgya che/ /gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rtse gsum be con pad+mo ral gri ban+d+ha 'dzin/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan nyid//
mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rin chen pad+ma gri gug dang / /shU la bum pa rtse gsum 'dzin/ /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas sku/ /dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /thod
dbyug rtse gsum pad+mo dang / /dgra sta 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin/ /byang du don yod grub pa nyid/ /ljang khu zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa mdung / /pad+mo rtse gsum
gshin rje'i rkang / /kun gyi g.yas dkar g.yon pa ni/ /dmar ljang ser dang le brgan mdog /rang gi btsun mo'i mgul nas 'khyud/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag po
lhar| |sku mdog gsang ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /phyag dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan/ /oM dzi na dzika laM/ dwe Sha ra ti/ swa rat+na d+h+r-ika /maM mo ha ra ti/ oM A ro la ki /paM rA
ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika /tAM badzra ra ti/ hUM phaT swAhA/ 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs bcas pas/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal cha
lugs dang / /dgyes pa'i skyil krung tshul gyis bzhugs/ /khyams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad/ /thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las/ /
rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon/ /sa snying dkar ser rin chen 'dzin/ /nam snying mthing ga ral gri 'dzin/ /spyan ras dmar skya pad+ma 'dzin/ /gsang bdag ljang skya rdo rje 'dzin/ /
g.yon pa pad+mo yu ba can/ /snyems pa'i tshul gyis phyogs su 'dud/ /sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar/ /dkar ser dmar ljang 'od 'phro mdog /me long rin chen phreng ba dang / /dbyangs

snyan gar thabs mdzes pa'i tshul/ /oM k+shir dza ya/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /trAM mA le sa ma ya ho/ /hrIHpad+ma ban+d+ha hri/ girti ra ho haM/ a nr-i ti ra ga yA mi hUM phaT/ byams pa dkar ser
klu shing 'dzin/ /sgrib sel 'khor lo mthing ga ste/ /'jam dpal dmar skya ut+pa la/ /kun bzang ljang ser rin chen snga/ /g.yon pa pad+mo lcug ma 'dzin/ /sems dpa'i stabs kyis
gdan la bzhugs/ /bdug spos me tog 'thor ba dang / /mar me dri chab lha mo rnams/ /ser dkar dmar ljang go rims bzhin/ /mtshan dang mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes/ /oM me ra
ni| dza d+hU be pra be sha /thi ling swa ra ma pa ya/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha hUM swa ra tsa ya/ baM dI paM bu gi ni/ muM she ra tsa ya/ ho gin+d+he tsi ta ya hUM phaT/ shar sgor gshin rje gshed po
che| |mthing nag po con rtse gsum phreng / /lho sgor stobs chen ser skya'i mdangs/ /rdo rje zhags pa rin chen phreng / /nub sgor rta mchog 'jigs byed rgyal//
thod sprul dril bu lu gu rgyud/ /byang sgor rdo rje 'khyil ba ste/ ljang skya rdo rje rtse gsum mthu/ /khro bo cha lugs rngam brjid dang / /dur khrod rim pa'i chas kyis brgyan/ /lcags kyu zhags
pa lcags sgrog dril/ /spyan dmar 'jigs byed 'od dpung dang / /rdo rje mche sogs khro gnyer can/ /yab yum 'khyil ba brkyang bskum sku/ /hUM phaT ru lu'i gsung 'don cing / /

las kyi 'khor lo gnon pa'i tshul/ /oM ru lu pad+ma n+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ dza badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hUM pradz+nyA n+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM rat+na kro d+hI shwa ri/ hUM pad+mA n+ta kr-iT phaT/ baM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hUM big+hAn+ta
kr-ita| ho karma kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT swAhA/ phyi nang med par dkyil 'khor chen po ste/ /thugs rje ye shes che las sprul/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab cing / /dbu la rigs kyi
bdag pos brgyan/ /'od dpung sprul pa'i lha 'khor gyis/ /'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing / /tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad rnams 'gugs/ /rdo rje brjid gnon sngags
kyi mthus/ /de dag dran pa med par 'gyur/ /mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis sgrol byas te/ /dug gsum phung po gsol bar mdzad/ /'phrin las khro bo brjid glu yis/ /lha chen
'khor rnams dbang du sdud/ /dkyil 'khor chen por bzhag byas nas/ /snga ma'i sha rus gnas nas ston/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /lha chen rnams kyis slar lus gsol/ /'khor
bcas pa yi dbang bskur zhing / /rdo rje 'chang gi gral la dgod/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i brdas bsgos shing / /'phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtad de/ /gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du gzhag /
kun kyang tshig dbyangs mthun pa bsgos/ /dam tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta
mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas pad+mo chags pa'i skus/ /gsung gi gzi mdangs rgyas
mdzad do/ /phyag rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas/ /gser mig 'dab bzang grong khyer dang / /lang+ka'i gnas tshogs srin po'i sde/ /klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul kun
stobs 'khor lo yis/ /lha chen la sogs gdul bar dgongs/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /pad+ma rta mchog sprul pa mdzad/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug
las| |sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab/ /rdo rje 'dzin thub dbang nyid dang / /rigs nyid sprul pa'i lung las grub/ /sku mdog dmar po rA ga'i mdog /zhal gsum rta mgo
ljang khu can/ /phyag na gri gug kha T+wAM ga /thod pa khrag me dpung sprul lnga/ /gnas brgyad klu bdag thod phreng dang / /glang chen stag gi pags pa gyon/ /sgra
skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrogs/ bgegs la sogs pa'i cha lugs can/ /drang srong khros pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /klu yi 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum
gyis| |yum chen dpal ldan ma dang sbyor/ /oM pad+mo gu ru he he ru lu hUM phaT/ 'khor lo 'bar ba phyogs mtshams su/ /ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad/ /hrI las grub pa'i
'jigs gzugs can/ /rta mgo ljang khu brjid pa yi/ /shar du pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni/ /dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma klu zhags dang / /rin chen dbyug ba
ral gri mdung / /seng+ge rgyal mo sku dang 'khril/ /sna tshogs mi mthun zhabs kyis gnon/ /nyi ma zla ba'i snyan chas brgyan/ /sprul gyi phreng bas gnas kun brgyan/ /lho ru gzi
chen drag po ni/ /mdog nag ral gri rtse gsum lnga/ /rdo rje rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu/ /drag po gnas kyi sku dang 'khril/ /me ri 'bar bas kun tu khyab/ /stag mo bcings pas
gzhan gnas 'jigs/ /sprul pa'i pho nya me 'brug gi /khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /nub tu rdo rje dra ba mchog /dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa gri/ /'khor lo sbrul zhags
me long chu/ /lha mo 'jigs chen zhabs kyis gnon/ /'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can/ /sprul pa'i pho nya lce spyang gdong / /'bum phrag gri dang thod khrag 'dzin/ /byang du 'od byed 'jigs chen sku/ /
ljang khu rtse gsum mda' bo che/ /nor bu dang khug lcug ma dung khrag 'chang / /ra ro mig dmar zil gyis gnon/ /rgyal bdag khro bo'i sku dang 'khril/ /cod pan klu mgo gdengs ka'i rgyan /dus
mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrogs/ kun kyang thod phreng g.yang gzhi dang / /dur khrod gnas 'byung gtsang sme byed/ /mtshams kyi khro bo chen po bzhi/ /rigs kyi phyed gzugs thig les mtshan/ /zhal
gsum phyag drug 'od mdangs can/ /rdo rje thod dbyug klu yi sgra/ /lce spyang bya khyung gnam lcags sprin/ /'od phreng thig le dbyug gu'i rgyan/ /rnam 'phrul klu thabs u ha ra/ /'dod yon lha mo'i
tshogs kyis bskor/ /kun tu spyan dmar rdo rje'i mtshan/ /gnas su 'jigs pa'i hUM sgra sgrogs/ /klu yi rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs/ /gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'joms par byed/ /oM mahA ha ya grI

ba pad+ma d+ha ru naM bid+ha har hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM na mo ud taM he ru lu ru kaM pa mu kha/ A ka R+Sha ya rak+Sha na gaM gu ru hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma rak+ma ku r+ya ra gaM ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/
nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru/ /lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhags pa dril bu rnams/ /dkar dmar ser ljang 'od mdangs 'bar/ /seng+ge lce spyang stag 'brug
dang / /mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas/ /rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang / /'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas/ /las mdzad klu yi
dkyil 'khor 'dul/ /klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas na/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya/ /rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs/ /spyan rnams spyan sngar 'dod par byed/ /oM na ga
drings me ga na na gar dza ya sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur nas/ 'od bzang gzi mdangs me dpung 'bar/ /rigs kyi dbu rgyan gsal byed phye/ /ye shes 'od tshogs
gnas bcas te/ /dkyil 'khor gsang bar goms zhugs kyis/ /tshul 'dzin dkon mchog mngon du dbye/ /tshogs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu/ /gar dbang sku la skyabs
gsol zhing / /'dod yon gsol 'debs dam bcas pa/ /bsod nams phung po'i gter la spyod/ /kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che/ /bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol
mdzad| |rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas/ /bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs/ /da ltar thugs rje drin gyis rnyed/ /rnal 'byor
gsang bar 'dzin byed kyi/ /ji ltar bsgos pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las/ /gal te nyams na 'das par shog /ces dam bcas so/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan pad+ma'i skus/ /yul la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis/ /bka' yi bsgo bas dgyes mdzad de/ /mi shigs ting 'dzin la gnas mdzad/ /phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen
po/ /rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas/ /gnas gzhan 'jigs par mdzad pa dang / /rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad/ /sku ni bai DUr 'tsher ba'i mdangs/ /zhal gsum phyag rgya
drug gis rol/ /rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lcug /'khor lo phreng ba ma ga ta/ /rgyan dang cha lugs rin chen tshogs/ /dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo/ /dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du
sbyor| |'od 'phro sems dpa'i gdug pa'i 'phro/ /rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan rin chen phreng / /phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan/ /
bar khyams 'khor gyi dbus nas 'gying / /pad+ma'i lte bar skyil krung bzhugs/ /shar du 'joms byed rdo rje'i sku/ /dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /lho ru rin chen blo gros sku/ /dpal be'u

gdugs mdzes 'od mang ser/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog /dkar dmar pad+ma glegs bam 'dzin/ /byang du 'jig rten kun sgrol ba/ /ljang skya rdo rje rgya gram ni/ /shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug ni/ /ser skye
rin chen b+h+r-ing ga ra/ /lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog /rtse gsum pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin/ /nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes tog /sngo skya seng+ge'i bum pa 'dzin/ /byang shar sgyu 'phrul dra ba
brtsegs/ /ljang ser g.yung drung rdo rje mtshan/ /'di dag 'khor los bsgyur rgyal byin/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan/ /skyes bu chen po'i longs spyod 'phel/ /cha mthun yum dang

'khril par bzhugs/ /oM bi ta dz+nyA na ta na saM bo ga ta hUM phaT/ oM d+harma mu ni na sa na sa hUM/ oM bi ha ra phra mo tha na hUM phaT/ oM dz+nyA na lo tra saM bo ga ya hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma ru d+he sa grubaM hUM phaT/ oM ma

hA shu ti mu sa mo ha hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha sar+ya na ku mA ra hUM phaT/ oM nam ga ga na si ta yo ga hUM phaT/ oM ni sa ha hi he hu mu ga ra ba ri hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas/ /
lha rnams phyi yi gnas su spro/ /drag po'i rgyu 'bras sbyong byas te/ /gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che/ /rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas/ /shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs/ /gnas mgo
skyabs dang dbang du mdzad/ /nyon mongs las kyis dregs pa'i tshogs/ /rang rgyu zhi nas byang sems bcas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod/ /snying po mdongs gsol dul bar 'gyur
oM trag sha ka sarba ra ma ma sa hUM hUM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bstan pa myur du spel cig /rgya chad pa'i sngags kyis thams cad byung
bar gyur ba bde legs su bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang / bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o/ /slar
yang bdag cag rnams mgon pos bzhengs la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di byin gyis brlabs so/ /oM u oM mr-i ta big na shu ta hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag dang po'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'od zer dang
bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen
po las| thugs ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug /pad+ma tshogs pa'i sku
chen pos/ /yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas gshin rje rnams/ /rgyal po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas//
'khor bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' chen mo'i tshogs 'phrul mdzad/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las/ /gzi ldan gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ /pad+ma rA
ga nam mkha'i mdog /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ste/ /pad+ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod/ /rdo rje khaT+wAM zhags pa thogs/ /rin chen phreng
ba'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /khyod bzhad 'jigs mdangs tshul 'dzin cing / /brkyang bskum zhing mchog nyi ma'i dkyil/ /g.yang gzhi nyi ma'i phreng bas brgyan/ /
oM pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ dpal gyi lha mo mchog nyid dang / /oM dang sprul te phyogs ngang mtshams/ /pad+ma'i gdan la zhing gis mtshan/ /brkyang bskum sku
mdog sngon mo'i tshogs/ /phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag /'bar ba'i cha lugs skra 'bar ma/ /phyi rol sprul pa'i tshogs bcas pas/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas
su rol| |rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang / /las dang sgyu 'phrul mkha' la bzhad/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin rgyas spyan/ /kha dog phyogs mtshams ji lta bu/ /gsal
zhing mun pa'i rdul gyis gos/ /zhing gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang / /gser gyi mda' dang rdo rje dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan zhags pa dang / /zhing chen rdo rje rtse dgu
gdengs/ /gri gug rgyu ma'i zhags pa sdom/ /rdo rje gdengs pa rtse gsum khrag /zhing chen khog phyes snying 'dren cing / /de bzhin rlung yab thod pa 'chang / /oM badzra ta kr-i ta
mahA la ti ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra ta tri med ra hUM phaT/ oM DA ki mad kum pa ya hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI ti bre sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki pi la sa hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki dri ku Ta ma le
hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab ma las/ /seng+ge rta dang lce spyang wa/ /bya rgod kang+ka bya rog 'ug /mgo brnyan mche gshog chen mo brgyad/ /
hUM las spul te mdog dmar po/ /phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag /rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum mdung / /'khor lo dgra sta be con mda'/ /gtun shing zhing khog g.yang gzhi
sbrul| |na le gzhong pa rin chen khyung / /zhal gdang so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin/ /kun kyang khro bcas khyams par gnas/ /zhing lpags g.yang gzhi thod phreng sbrul/ /
khrag zhag thal ba'i tshom bus brgyan/ /mkha' 'gro rigs bdun ma sring sprul pa'i tshogs/ /mche gshog 'bar ba phyogs bcur 'khrugs/ /oM ser ba ra na hUM phaT/
oM ni raM te sha pa mu kha hUM phaT/ oM kaM na ma du na hUM phaT/ oM mu ka ra na naM hUM phaT/ oM sU r+ya sa mo ka hUM phaT/ oM badzra snig sha bru hUM phaT/ oM ni sha ku r+ya ra na hUM
phaT| oM ri laM su bak+sha hUM phaT/ mkha' 'gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang / /'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can/ /'od kyis ru lu'i sgra 'byin cing / /spyan mur khro gnyer mche ba
can| |zhal gnyis phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs/ /dbyings dang shes rab rab rtogs la/ /so so'i 'phrin las mdzad pa'i phyag /zhal dang sku
ni so so'i mdog /oM ru khu saM ta gun+De ta sa mo ra ga hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra DA ki dza la shaM ba ra ku mA ra hUM phaT/ nye ba'o/ /oM DA ki hUM saM ba ra dzA li mu
kha ma me hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i mthus/ /de dag dran pa med par brgyal/ /slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus/ /dam tshig
dkyil 'khor chen por bkod/ /de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas/ /gdul bya rnams kyi gnas dor nas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa gzung byed cing / /rdo rje theg pa sbyor
bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi
pa'o|| || de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso/ /gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs/ /gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing / /phyogs bcu'i
dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /phyogs kyi bgegs 'dul byed pa'o/ /khams gsum gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i khang bzang ni/ /rin chen pad+ma seng+ge'i gdan/ /dri med nyi zla spras pa la/ /dbus kyi lha mchog chen po ni/ /zhabs brgyad
phyag ni bcu drug dang / /dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo gri /thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras/ /yum
chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang / /rgyan tshogs rin chen phreng ba can/ /dri med pad+mas bklubs pa'o/ /oM ba ga ba te ru kaM swaM bo ga ta ya hUM phaT/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni//
dkar ser rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas su rin chen sems dpa' ste/ /ser po rin chen 'khor lo thogs/ /rgyab tu pad+mo'i sems dpa' nyid/ /dmar ser rtse gsum bum
pa thogs/ /g.yon du las kyi sems dpa' ste/ /ljang ser dril bu tri shU la/ /oM badzra swat+ta hUM phaT/ oM rat+na swat+ta hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma swat+ta hUM phaT/ oM karma swat+ta hUM
phaT| 'khor lo pad+ma'i rtse mo la/ /yum dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis 'khod/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i rigs bdun la/ /bde gshegs yab yum nyis stong tshogs/ /bde gshegs
rdo rje rin chen dang / /pad+ma rgya gram sna tshogs mkha'/ /sku mdog pad+ma rA ga dang / /in+d+ra la sogs rim bdun la/ /ral pa rtse mdzod bum pa la/ /lcug ma dril bu glegs bam
dang | |chos kyi rgyal mtshan phreng ba 'dzin/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rin chen rgyan phreng 'od mdangs can/ /phyag mchan gri gug
thod pa dang / /pad+ma'i phreng ba rtse gsum bsnams/ /lhag pa'i phyag bzhi 'dzin par mdzad/ /dang po rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams/ /oM badzra du ki bi shi ka du kuM di kaM maM
hri saM ga ta spruM sra mo ta phaT swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra sa mo yo ga ta sa ra la su hUM phaT/ rin po che rnams kyi'o/ /oM pad+ma buM si nyi haM he
he maM baM hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o/ /oM kar+m+ma b+h+yo truM hUM rak+Sha mur+ya sa hUM phaT/ las kyi rigs kyi'o/ /oM badzra tsakra bruM si ti yo gi shwa ri hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i
rigs kyi'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro byas pa/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yis/ /phyogs kyi rgyal po'i gdon rnams 'gugs/ /
skrag shing byed nas dgra 'gugs shing / /so so'i rigs dbyer 'khrug pa dag /rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer/ /rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran/ /srog gi snying po
dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su 'khod/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i
gnas dor nas/ /rang gi lus su gnas byas te/ /gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du gzhug /de dag gi snying po ni/ oM sa mu da ra dzin na ga su tra b+ha ba si tri sni sha hUM bruM phaT
zhes pa'o/ /slar gso ba'i sngags ni/ oM su mu ge DaM saM nya ga he he ru tu pa la sa taM dza hUM phaT/ lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni/ /oM sarba sa ka ra bruM bag+sha saM me braM bu rak+Sha
hUM zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ khams gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste bco
lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan gar dbang sku/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus mdzad nas/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul byas te/ /gnod sbyin grul bum
'dul bar mdzad/ /gzhal yas gru gsum mthing nag la/ /dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan/ /dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka /dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brjid/ /zhal
gsum pa la phyag drug ste/ /sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs/ /rtse gsum gtun shing ral gri dang / /pad+ma zhags pa thod lnga 'dzin/ /glang chen ko ba thod rlon sprul/ /yum
dang zhal sbyor 'khril pa'i tshul/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/ /yi ge las sprul khro ba'i rgyan/ /shar du rnam rgyal mdog dkar sngo/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje
dung / /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang / /ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan pa/ /lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni/ /sngon gzhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /thod dbyug
rin chen ne'u le dang / /rtse gsum me dpung thod lnga 'dzin/ /nub tu rta mchog khro bo'i sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dmar skya'i mdog /'khor lo sdigs mdzub rtse gsum
dang | /ral gri thod pa DA ma ru/ /byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ /ljang sngo zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rgya gram gri gug pad+ma dang / /be con rtse gsum seng+ge 'dzin/ /shar lhor
dbyug pa sngon po ni/ /sdo skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dbyug pa tsakra pad+ma dang / /rnga yab ban+d+ha dril bu 'dzin/ /lho nub mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /zhal gsum ser skya phyag drug
pa| |rin chen ral gri gtun shing 'dzin/ /pad+ma thod khrag mdung rtse gsum/ /nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni/ /dmar skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje dbyug pa rin chen
bum| |thod pa bdud rtsi snying 'dzin pa'o/ /byang shar stobs chen dud ka'i mdog /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bam chen khog /sna
tshogs rdo rje bam chen khrag /'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro phreng dang / /gyad kyi dor thabs rol pa'i stabs/ /oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/

oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A r+ye a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Tak+ki rA dza hUM phaT/
oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la hUM phaT/ phyogs skyo nga rgyal po gnod sbyin dang / /grul bum tshogs rnams dbang bsdus te/ /gsang sngags drag pos bsgral byas na/ /slar
gsol ye shes lhums su gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing / /dam tshig la gzhan dkyil 'khor tshul/ /kun gyi srog snying phul ba ni/ /dam tshig
chen pos byin brlabs mdzad/ /slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags/ /'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad/ /oM badzra kra ka ra murda si na ba mu ka hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM badzra
su ka ta b+ha mo traM a la la hUM phaT/ lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung / /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po'i sku/ /khams gsum dus kyi dbang bskur
nas| |'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing / /byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog
rol pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo 'phrin las rol pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus/ /gzi brjid dgod pa'i brgyan bkod cing / /lha min
grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad/ /chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas bzang mchog /rgyal ba'i rang bzhin rin chen
spros| |gru bzhi khang pa sgo dang bcas/ /rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /gnyis med rol pa'i yum gyi sku/ /mdog dmar rgyan
du zangs chen gzugs/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs/ /'khor lo dung khrag pad+mo dang / /rin chen 'bar ba rtse dgu 'dzin/ /rin chen pad+ma'i phreng ba can/ /stong
bzang na bza' dkyil bzang bzhugs/ /oM pad+ma mu sha ra sa ma ka ta hUM phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /pad+ma dbyings phyug gsal ba mo/ /rin chen phreng
ba glu ma che/ /dkar dmar ser dang ljang khu'i mdog /rdo rje gsum pa pad+mo dra ba dang / /na ra si la'i snod rin tshogs/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor ma spros shing / /sna tshogs
pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /oM tsun+d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM Sh+Ni sha badzra saM bruM ga hUM phaT/ oM byi tsu sra te hUM phaT/ mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /de bzhin bde ba skyed byed yum
chen bzhi/ /dra ba mo dang glog 'gyur rgyan/ /gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o/ /dkar ser dmar skya sngo sangs dang / /ljang khu mdog legs la bzhugs nas/ /rdo rje rin
chen pad+mo dang / /ut+pal ljang khu legs mdzad pa'o/ /oM nu te no tsa kru hUM phaT/ oM saM bo ga ta su he bya hUM phaT/ oM ma ma kri bruM he he hUM phaT/ oM ta re ga ga na a ma la hUM phaT/ phyogs
rnams kun tu mkha' khyab pa/ /til gang bzhin du gnas gyur pa/ /ma mo gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kun/ /'khrug rngam rod rod por gyur nas/ /thugs rje can la skyabs su mchi/ /
srog gi snying po 'bul bar byed/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas te/ /rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing / /dam tshig dga' ba'i sdom pa rnyed/ /bder gshegs ye shes
gsal bar 'gyur/ /kun gyis mthun par khas blangs te/ /dam tshig srung zhing rnal 'byor skyong / /oM ma ma rak+ta sa pra ti i daM sa bu ta phaT/ oM trak+sha ra la si bad Ta ta phaT/ ma
ma mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o/ /oM yu me si d+ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o/ /oM AHhUM yo ga bri gu me/ ha sa ha sa/ ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ slar gso
zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ rin chen dbyings kyi dkyil
'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis/ /
sa 'og sa bla sa steng rnams/ /'joms byed gza' dang rgyu skar dang / /bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun/ /'du bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /snyoms
zhugs 'khor lo sprul pa mdzad/ /thabs dang shes rab bsgrubs byas pa'o/ /'od zer gsal bas stong gsum gang / /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /sgo bzhi
rta babs phreng bas brgyan/ /'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas/ /rdo rje pad+ma rin chen gyis/ /khor yug seng+ge glang chen mchog /nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad+mo yi/ /
dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje rin/ /pad+ma ral gri 'dzin par mdzad/ /dmar ser kun tu rgyu ba ni/ /ljang ser pad+ma dril bus
'khyud| |mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan phreng klubs/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas pa'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs rnams la/ /rigs
kyis mas dpa' nyi shu bzhi/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba'i mdangs/ /rdo rje dril bu pad+ma bsgom/ /'khor lo rin chen snyem bsnams/ /dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan
byas shing / /lhag ma gri gug thod pa thogs/ /khro zhing sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis/ /rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang po gsum/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /oM badzra swa

ha krod+ha he he ru lu hUM phaT/ rdo rje rigs rnams kyi'o/ /pad+ma te sh+tha swA da na ma ku ru ku ru hUM phaT/ pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /oM i ku ri tsag ban+d+ha si d+hi phaT phaT/ kro d+hI shwa ri
hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o/ /sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni/ /mthun pa'i blo gros dpa' chen mo/ /ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnams te/ /dkar ser dmar dang
rim pa bzhin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag /oM badzra aM gu sha dza/ pA sha hUM/ spo Ta baM/ gan+Da hoHphaT/ dgug gzhug bcing ba'i las
dag dang / /dbab pa'i cho ga mnyes par byed/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus/ /rigs gsum sems dpa' khro bor bstan/ /
'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stabs/ /rdo rje gcod byed 'jigs pa che/ /rdo rje 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed/ /rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog /rdo rje'i bstan pa g.yul las
rgyal/ /pad+ma'i sbrin chen 'brug sgru'i dbyangs/ /pad+ma'i blo gsal mya ngan 'joms/ /pad+ma'i sdong po nga ro myos/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer bdud rtsi 'od/ /'khor ba brtsegs pa myur du
zlog/ /'khor lo dga' ba sprang rtsi'i mchog /'khor lo sprol dang rtse gsum 'ching / /'khor lo rol ba dga' phyed stobs/ /'di dag sprul pa 'khor tshogs skus/ /gnas gsum
po dag 'dul bar mdzad/ /de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams/ /gdug pa'i nga ro chu ma shums/ /sgra chen sgrog cing sprul nas kyang / /mthu dang rdzu
'phrul med par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po skyabs gsol zhing / /bstan pa gzung bar dam bcas so/ /de dag so so'i srog snying dag /lus sems dad pas
phul byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur zhing / /rab gnas gdan la gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang
ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor byung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha/ /
pad+ma bde chen yum bcas la/ /'gro drug rgyu 'bras bya ba'i phyir/ /bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba'i/ /rin chen phreng sogs
'jigs byed brgyad/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin brgyan/ /dbus su 'khor lo gdan bcas la/ /rigs lnga'i he ru ka bzhugs mdzad/ /yum chen lnga dang 'khril
par sbyor/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dmar nag dkar ser ljang khu'i mdangs/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ral gri dang / /tri shul zhing dbyug tho ba bsnams/ /g.yas
par dung phor g.yon thod khrag /bar ma gri gug pad+ma ste/ /tha ma yum dang 'khril pa'i tshul/ /spyan dgu sdang mig dmar po bzlog /khro gnyer ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /thod sbrul

khrag dang thal bas brgyan/ /g.yang gzhi ri sha'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ /oM badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shrI ha ru

ka hUM phaT/ rat+na krod+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM karma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ karma krod+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ bde chen byang chub sems
kyi rgyan/ /rol pa kun tu khyab mdzad de/ /khams gsum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings/ /bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur/ /
bskyed de dbu la rang gi bdag pos brgyan/ /smon 'jug g.yo ldang bskyod pa yi/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med
pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
de'i dus na bdud kyi rgyal po ma tra ru tras rang gi rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan zhing / 'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcur rgyu gcing rig pa 'dzin pa dang / rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar
gcod byed cing bde 'gro'i bde ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa dang / rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rnam
par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad gcig gis
gsal bar mdzad do/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po stong gsum 'dir/ /khang bzang mdzes par byin brlabs te/ /rin chen ka ba gdan phreng dang / /gzugs mdzes la sogs
kun gyis spras/ /nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri/ /pad+ma seng+ge la sogs mnan/ /sgo bzang khyams su bcas pa yi/ /rnam dag gzhal yas khang bzang sprul/ /de nas bcom
ldan bde chen pos/ /dpal ldan gar gyi dbang phyug skus/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams/ /dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad/ /bde ba chen
po gnyis med mthus/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur/ /yongs rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos/ /dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad/ /dbus su pad+ma'i
rigs rgyal po/ /gtso bo pad+ma rdo rje'i mdangs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing / /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun du//
bde gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog /rnam snang rin chen don grub rnams/ /rin chen phyogs kyi tshon mdangs gsal/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /ral gri pad+ma sna
tshogs dang / /gtso bo pad+ma'i drug mtshan can/ /stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon/ /sangs rgyas spyan mdzes mA ma kI/ /dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dag /mdog bzang phyag
mtshan gtso bo bzhi/ /sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs/ /thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshogs/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la/ /rang gi mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /
dmar mdangs dkar dang gser gyi mdog /nI la ka ta'i mdog 'tsher zhing / /pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo rin/ /pad+ma tri shUl bcas pa 'dzin/ /g.yas na 'khor lo go rims bzhin/ /
rdo rje skyil krung legs brgyan brjid/ /gzhan yang khro bo'i tshogs 'bar ba/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyams dang / /sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis/ /rngam pa'i mdangs
bcas 'khod pa ni/ /khri tshogs yang sprul mtshon cha dang / /rigs kyi sprul pa'i don byed pa'i/ /khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang / /mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs
bcas rnams/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing / /rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha dang / /'od zer 'phro ba 'khrigs pa'i tshul/ /gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o/ /de
ltar dkyil 'khor zhi khro'i tshogs/ /skad gcig gsal bar rdzogs byas nas/ /phyi yi gnas su spro zhing bya/ /gsang sngags rgyun gyi skal bar
byed| |hUM a la la ho/ /mahA pad+ma hr-i da ya/ a A oM AHhUM/ mahA pad+ma ku ru/ ha la ha la b+hi shan hUM hUM phaT/ stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /rab 'khrug
bred rgyas rmongs pa dag /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing / /rang gi sangs rgyas zhing la bkod/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su bsdus byas nas/ /rang gi 'khor
lo mdzes byas te/ /dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs gyur nas/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /oM pad+ma kuN+Da li hr-i da ya na bi mu ku ru ha na da ha hUM phaT/ /gsang sngags
kun gyis brjod byas na/ /'jig rten gsum po sdud pa yi/ /pho nya rdo rje kI la ya/ /dregs byed gtso bo dag rengs bya/ /de nas bcom ldan bde chen skus/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
bskul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje se gol lan gsum brdab/ /dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams/ /ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje
las| |gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs/ /dregs byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur/ /log
ba'i lam la mngon zhen cing / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus snyems nas/ /'jig rten gsum dag pung byed na/ /zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur na/ /khro bo'i rol pa mdzad mod kyi/ /'dul
bar gzigs nas bka' gros mdzad/ /kye ma 'dul pa'i tshogs chen dag /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar/ /da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab
las| |log pa'i lam du 'khrul pa ste/ /khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa/ /de tshe sems can thams cad kun/ /shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur/ /de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan
nyid kyis/ /mnar med la sogs gnas ngan len/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal mtha' la brten/ /ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul/ /shin tu gti mug mdongs pa'i tshogs/ /
de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis/ /rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing / /bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur/ /las kyi mun pas 'gro bar 'khyams/ /dus
ngan rigs ngan phra men ma/ /gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang / /srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral/ /'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje
rnam 'phrul bstan/ /nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi/ /lta ba ri bo mthu brnyes tshogs/ /da lta'i tshe ni 'di byung gyur/ /rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing / /ji bzhin
las la 'khrul bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod/ /mngon spyod rol ba'i thabs chen gyis/ /'di dag bstan pa'i dus la
bab| |srid gsum gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul
can khros pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo
las| |phrag dog 'khrul pa'i rlung dag gis/ /'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams/ /ji bzhin gnas pa lam bral bas/ /khams gsum brlag pa'i lam la
zhugs/ /'jig rten 'di dag snying rje zhing / /mngon shes gdul dka'i rmongs tshogs rnams/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad/ /ces bsgrags so//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgral bya'i
le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug skus/ /ma tang ru tra la sogs pa'i/ /bdud kyi tshogs
bcas 'dul ba'i phyir/ /yum chen sku gcig rol mdzad de/ /byang chub sems sprin phyogs bcur spro/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dkyil 'khor gsal/ /dkyil 'khor 'dus
tshogs dkyil 'khor che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che/ /dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs/ /zhal gsum gangs ri mdangs ldan pa/ /pad+ma gtun shing
rtse gsum thogs/ /rin chen rgyun sogs dbu rgyan bcas/ /dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /snod gcig dus gcig sprul pa mdzad/ /mtha' dang dbus med 'jig
rten gnas rnams kun/ /drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo rtsibs drug par khyams nyis rim ldan/ /kun tu zla gam sgo khyud gru bzhir bcas//
rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyun dang bcas/ /tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la brten cing / /'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po klubs/ /nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam
lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ /smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcu na/ /gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba
na| |drag po lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir/ /lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas/ /sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung
nas ka ba byas/ /theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don/ /glang chen ka la ling gis ka gtan byas/ /gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos 'dod skong ba'i
phyir| |gza' skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med/ /'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/ /seng+ge ka la sha yis ka gzhu byas/ /'khor ba'i gcod rnying gtan nas
spyad pa'i phyir/ /seng+ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'dzag /thod rus bar khyams rdo rje'i gzar gyis brgyan/ /zhing chen rnga yab bla re 'phan gdugs dang / /thugs rje byang sems
kun tu khyab pa'i phyir/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan/ /sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye/ /khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang bcas//
rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla gdan/ /gser gyi seng+ge spyan gsum pa/ /drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu brgyad/ /khri rkang brgyad kyis bar khyams dag la gnas/ /thugs
rje nyi ma nyi shu brgyad/ /'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng+ge nyi shu brgyad/ /sprul sku thob pas dbang po nyi shu brgyad/ /kun tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas pa/ /rin chen khri rkang 'degs
pa'i stobs dang ldan/ /mgon gnas dben bar gzhan dag gis/ /mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung / /'phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas/ /rigs bzhi khrag
'thung he ru ka /bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku/ /de nyid kun tu 'od kyi lung / /pad+ma le brgan phyogs bcu'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i tshul/ /chags par
gyur par pad+ma ste/ /che ba'am yon tan lung du ston/ /mkha' dbyings rnam dag dri med pas/ /ma chags pad+ma can gyi lung / /stong zhing gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags/ /nyi zla'i
dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa yin/ /seng+ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pos/ /thabs dang shes rab ya bral bas/ /spros med rang gis bzlums pa ni/ /ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung //
'od zer gsal bas 'tsher bas na/ /yang gab sbas pa ye shes lung / /'phro 'du khyab bar gyur ba'i tshogs/ /shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum/ /thabs dang shes rab
