dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du/ /gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya/ /oM pad+ma
shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro ti shwa ri hUM/ mahA tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta na phaT/ dkyil 'khor bdag po rngam brjid cha lugs dang / /'bar ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs/ /dbu
lnga phyogs bzhir las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs/ /dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba dbyings su gzigs/ /ral ba'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar/ /smin ma khro gnyer sma ra
sogs myur ba/ /lus thung sku rgyan gyad kyi cha byad la/ /bco lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs/ /rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshog pas
gtams/ /bcu drug rol ba'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang / /sgeg po'i zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas/ /'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/ /khro
bo'i tshogs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas gnon/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la/ /bde gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston/ /rang gi zhing sbyong drag
po'i gnas 'dul zhing / /thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che la dgod/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis/ /yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba skyed par
mdzad/ /gnas su nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA

wA ka badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la/ /mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo khams rgya chen mo drug /zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs su
cha lugs can/ /rigs drug mtshan ma cha lugs ci lta bu/ /bud+d+ha badzra oM/ satwa badzra hUM/ rat+na badzra trAM/ pad+ma badzra hrI/ karma badzra ha/ g+hu na badzra phaT/ phyi rol dkyil
'khor khyab bar spros byas te/ /'gro rnams dud sogs khams rnams dag byas nas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad+mo dang / /ral gri kha T+wAM rtse gsum dril bu bcas/ /g.yon pa bdud
rtsi thod ba gang ba thogs/ /mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /rang gi phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis klubs/ /las kyi khams rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs/
dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /long ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /sku mdog mtshan ma sna tshogs la/ /phyag sprel zangs kyi thod pa thogs/ /oM shrI kha'i oM
shwA ri kha'i traM/ shrI kha'i a/ dmus long 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste/ /thod rus bar khyams gnas su dgod par bya/ /oM shri kha'i hUM/ shrI kha'i hUM/ lcags kyi sbyang mo
brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas/ /ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu rngam par 'khod/ /me ri sprin ltar gtibs pa ril zhing 'khrugs/ /bar khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun tu 'khod//
oM tib ta tsakra sho na mu mo ra khaM hUM phaT/ ku ku ra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dza hUM baM ho phyag rgya las/ /mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig
bo| |mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang / /mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang / /mgo gsum rkang gsum lag gsum mo/ /dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru/ /tshad med
sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol/ /de dag rol ba'i byin rlabs las/ /steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems/ /
me 'brug rlung 'brug phyag rgyas gsal/ /rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung / /oM dzi na la to tsa raM yak+Sha ku ru ban ts+tsha hUM phaT/ gzhan yang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /
bse yi byan lag dmar po dang / /dung bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams/ /'jig rten tsam pa'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /oM ha ha ru ru ma hA tsan+de sha ri bi sha na ya hUM hUM phaT/
kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma bi ta si to ha he tsa kra b+h+yo phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e a ma ra li hUM dza/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM b+h+yo e a
ra li dza zhes brjod pas khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par byon zhing / rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas he ru ka chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i
rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing / rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad do/ /de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo tshogs/ /ma lus ral bar byin
brlabs shing / /bdud dang grags byed rmongs byed cing / /rang gi gnas su 'du bar mdzad/ /oM hu lu hu lu raM dza la e a ra li dzaHhUM baM hoH/ a la la ho/ /oM
ma tra ru tra ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dug gsum dngos po spyang ba'i phyir/ /rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro/ /khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing / /he he ru ru'i gsang sngags
brjod/ /ha la rdo rje'i rgod rgyangs kyis/ /bdud dang srin mo la sogs brgyal bar mdzod/ /oM sarba pa pa ka ra he ta ba bye sha ma ta ru tra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pa pa he ta byi sha kha tang ru
tra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pa pa ka ra he ta ba byi sha kha tang ru tra hUM phaT/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor pho nya'i tshogs/ /dpal chen rdo rje tho thog ser chen 'bebs/ /hUM dang
phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig /hUM dang phaT kyis byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem/ /rdo rje mtshon cha gnam lcags thu
sum 'dril/ /gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms/ /rdo rje ser chen thog bcas 'bar zhing 'khrugs/ /nyams pa'i snying dang dbang po thal bar
rlogs/ /ye shes thugs rje a la la/ /oM mahA shrI he ru ka b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ gardza gardza/ ha la ha la hUM phaT/ de nas bdud dang ru tra bcas/ /rdo rje mtshon chas bsgral
bsgral nas/ /'khor gyi longs spyod rol mdzad cing / /sha khrag nang rol bdud rtsi dang / /rus rkang dbang po bcas pa la/ /tshogs kyi longs spyod ston mor mdzad//
kun gyi dgyes pa rdo rje'i glus/ /mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis bstod/ /thugs rje rnam dag pad+ma'i rang bzhin las/ /thugs kar laM las sprul
pa'i byang chub sems/ /phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni/ /grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga/ /dpal lus khyab bar 'phags pa zhal gyi
dbyings/ /dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can/ /thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi/ /ye shes byin brlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul/ /smin mdzad smon
lam yun ring grub pa yi/ /dmigs pa'i mtha' bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul/ /chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o/ /chags med thugs rje pad+ma'i tshul/ /sgra
skad thams cad mtha' las grol/ /zab dang rgyang ring chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las/ /shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas gcod/ /zhal gyi ho ma la
'brel bas rgyud lnga gcod/ /rno dbang mche ba skye shi rtsad nas gcod/ /le brgan ljags kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'chad/ /rol ba'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas//
gshog bzhi bskyod pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad/ /zhabs rol bas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul/ /sku che yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin/ /thugs mchog
ye shes stong nyid nyi ma brdal/ /ye shes lha mtshog byin rlabs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /ngo mtshar rol bas khro bo kun gyi rje/ /dpa' bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo//
de nas bde chen dbang gi skus/ /'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing / /rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs/ /gsang ba'i byin rlabs bskyed par mdzad/ /oM A hUM sarba
pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ma yo gi sid+d+hi hUM/ pa to ka ka ma la su ta sa hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya kro d+ha sa ma ya oM AHhUM/ mahA yo gi tsit+ta raM pa rak+ta ma la kha'i kha'i hUM/ /oM khaM kha
le la ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ i d+ha na sa ma ya a la la ho zhes rdo rjes glu blangs so/ /pad+mo gar mdzad do/ /bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de'i dus na
bdud la sogs pa rnams bsgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te dbang bskur ba'i thugs sogs kyis bdag po rig 'dzin
thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin par gyur to/ /de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam
tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs so/ /snying po brjod pa ni/ ma ma trag sha ru tra ma ma b+h+yo/ /slar bsgo ba'i sngags ni/ /oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo pad+ma
hr-id d+ha ru ru hUM b+h+yo hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ gsang chen
'dus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas/ /bdag dang gnyis med rol
pa'i mthus/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya che/ /dkyil 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku/ /bkod pa'i
dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o/ /chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang / /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi cod pan can/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro
ma lus sgrol/ /rdo rje bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che/ /dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan/ /shes rab thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med/ /dus gsum
gcig car sgrol bas tshar gsum brgyan/ /khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che/ /mi gnas mya ngan gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrog /ma bsgribs ma gsal go
'phang mdzes par mthong / /mi ldog g.yul sgrol stobs drug mdzes par mgyogs/ /gar yang thogs med byin rlabs shugs dang ldan/ /'tsher skad gdangs snyan ma
srid spro ba 'gyed/ /khaM dmar ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba/ /dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang / /rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni/ /don mchog khyad
par yon tan rmad du byung / /ljang khu'i me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni/ /'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal/ /byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs/ /rdog
ma le brgan 'bar de'i khyad par mchog /stug po bkod sogs zhing khams rab 'byams na/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun/ /zhing khams gsum dag ma lus
dbang du sdud/ /shes rab thabs su 'brel ba'i rta skad ni/ /grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rta dbyangs yin/ /dang po'i gdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs/ /gdangs
skad gnyis pa ri rab rtse nas 'tsher/ /gsang snyan gdangs gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni/ /bcu drug slad ma'i ngan rtogs thar lam ston/ /spyan mig glog ltar 'gyur ba cher
'phags shing / /sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms/ /'tsher can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni/ /mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad/ /rgyu dbyings grangs
dang gzigs thabs rtogs pa'i don/ /hUM las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /gnas ni sna yi dbugs ring dro ba lags/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par
'phrul pa 'byung / /shangs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes srog /gsang ba'i 'tshub mas sdug bsngal snying nas 'byin/ /rgya chen sprul pas
bag chags tshar gcod de/ /'khor ba'i rgya che lugs las ldog pa yi/ /rigs kyi rlung gis drug lnga dbyings su sgrol/ /zlum dkar bzang ra ma rno dpal tshems/ /zhal du
bdar ba'i byang chub sems/ /ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol/ /zhi rgyas dbang bdud drag po yi/ /cir yang 'gyur ba'i ho ma khung ste/ /las lnga 'brel ba'i zhal zhes bya//
'khor ba yongs su smin pa dang / /las mang nyon mongs dbang btsan dang / /skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan/ /des smin mdzad pa chen po yi/ /'jug ldog cir yang gyur pa dang //
rjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas/ /'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do/ /yig 'bru'i rgyu nyid bde gshegs thugs/ /rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin thugs/ /'od nyid nyon mongs
rnam dag 'joms/ /rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang / /yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang / /yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang / /rgyu dang las kyi rim
pa'o| |de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings/ /snying po phyag mtshan phra mo dag/ /bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings/ /chos sku chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /sna tshogs snang la rang
bzhin med/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun tu/ /gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol/ /shar du rol ba'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni/ /khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje
lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pas rol/ /de bzhin lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi/ /thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par rol/ /me yi zhags pa dag
dang khyung gi khra/ /sdigs mdzub rtse la ye shes 'bar/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu 'khrol/ /rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang / /rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg /ye
nas ma skyes dang ba'i cho 'phrul ston/ /ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni/ /rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan/ /klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyis/ /rtse
ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsung thugs/ /sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston/ /gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing / /byang chub sems bzhi
de nyid ston par byed/ /rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gyur ba/ /khyung gshog a mo theb gshog sder mo can/ /sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar/ /thabs kyis rnam par
'phrul pas g.yas nas brkyang / /srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i/ /shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas khyab/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i byin rlabs che/ /
sprul pas 'phros pas dug gsum rgyun mi 'chad/ /sna tshogs rol ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi/ /'phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i/ /dpa'
bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad/ /rgya bye'u lcags kyi shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de/ /rdo rje 'chol bas lho yi phyogs na brjid/ /bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkang ba
brkyang | |sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar mtshams su gyon/ /shu ken dar gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing / /mche ba dmar pos nub byang brgyangs pa'i gdan/ /sprul nag
'khril ba'i zhabs kyis 'og phyogs 'dul bar mdzad/ /khro brgyad gnon cing gzir bas zhabs brdebs shing / /dug chen bcom zhing sgal tshigs gnon/ /brang gnon
ldan pa 'joms shing 'jigs mdzad dang / /'khor gyi sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal/ /sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings kyis brgyan/ /thugs rje'i rol pas gzhal
yas khang du bstan/ /'phrin las rol bas hUM mdzad hUM gis brgyan/ /sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu dbang dang ldan/ /de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che/ /dam tshig gar gyi
byin rlabs kyis/ /rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni/ /mnyes mdzad gzi ldan dbang phyug ma//
ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang / /gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do/ /gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa la/ /rab tu smra bar gang byed pa/ /sgeg pa'i tshig gis brgyan nas su/ /sri zhu'i sems
kyis gdungs pa la/ /ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya bzhi
gdab/ /byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/ /thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal/ /dbyings phyug sprul tshogs bsam yas dag /nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i sku/ /
stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za/ /'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog /dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang rten/ /phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na/ /dam tshig
chen po de nyid mang / /phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa/ /thams cad pad+mo rnam dag pas/ /cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid/ /thugs rje chags pa'i 'phrin las kyis/ /dbang
drag 'phrin las gnod sbyin gnas/ /gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg /las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun/ /gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs/ /
lhun gyis dang bas kun tu 'joms/ /snying ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'/ /srid gsum sems can 'dul dka' ba/ /'phro 'du 'khyil ba'i 'od mdangs mdzad/ /'jig rten mkhyen dang
mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen/ /de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de/ /'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du/ /rnam par thar ba dbu
gsum bstan/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ga /ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni/ /g.yas pas rdo rje rnge'u chung dang / /mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol/ /dril bu
rgyu zhags thod rlon g.yon/ /bskal pa'i me ri sprul zhags dang / /thod rlon phreng brgyan du byas/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung / /dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje
rngam dang zhi ba'i sku/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can/ /'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal/ /skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su/ /mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas/ /chos kyi
dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal/ /longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis/ /mi 'jigs stobs mchog gdan steng na/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du/ /zab mo rgya chen chos ma bstan/ /
dngos dang dngos med gsal byed pas/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / /sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir/ /phal mang bkod pa'i sa rnams su/ /dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis/ /bya
ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs/ /thams cad mtshan ma nam mkha'i dngos/ /de nyid sgro btags chos dang bral/ /kun rgyan byams sems de kho na/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /he ru
ka yi bde chen dbyings/ /chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te/ /'od gsal ba yi gnas 'jug pas/ /rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dpal gyis skus/ /gar gyi dbang phyug
lhun grub mchog /thugs rje brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas/ /yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngom/ /cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i rngom/ /zil gyis
gnon pa'i gnas mchog rngom/ /tsham ngam chen po'i stangs stabs rngom/ /sku mdog brgyad kyis brjid pa'i mchog /phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i sku/ /haM lnga 'brel bar gyur ba'i zhal//
zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags/ /skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems/ /rnam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs/ /ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin/ /'phrin las rgya
mtsho'i rlabs tshogs ltar/ /byin rlabs cho 'phrul sprin phung tshogs/ /mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam/ /bdud dang srin mo 'joms byed rnams/ /khams gsum zil gyis
gnon pa'i gdan/ /stong gsum dus gcig bsgral ba'i zhing / /rtog pa 'joms pa'i brtul zhugs mchog /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan ni/ /rngom brjid sum cu rtsa
drug mnga'/ /rgya chen yan lag rags pas brjid/ /grangs ma rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid/ /bkur gshog gtso bo mthong bas brjid/ /khyad zhugs bla
ma yin pas brjid/ /gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid/ /don la nyi tsher ston pas brjid/ /gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid/ /thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin
brjid| |ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid/ /ma 'gag sa le mkhyen pas brjid/ /med la zad mi shes pas brjid/ /gcig la 'dod rgur bsgyur bas brjid/ /gnod sbyin
pham par mdzad pas brjid/ /thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid/ /rims bral nyam thag rol pas brjid/ /'khor ba yun ring mgon mdzad brjid/ /gcig car zil
gyis mnan pas brjid/ /bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /zil mnan nga rgyal bcag par bya/ /des su ro yi nang nas ni/ /glog
'gyur lce ni lan gsum 'byung / /so'am sen mo gcad par byed/ /de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin dbyung / /de thogs nam mkha' la song
nas| |rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod bya/ /oM b+hU ru na ra sa ma ta ya hUM phaDa/ gar gyi dbang phyug nga rgyal gyis/ /gang 'dod gnas su 'gro bya zhing / /dregs byed tshogs
rnams zil mnan te/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas glu blang zhing / /brtul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas/ /yud tsam gcig la gnas su dag par byed/ /bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka'i/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang snang / /mtshan nyid cig tu ma nges pas/ /sku gsung thugs sprul bsam yas che/ /rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi/ /byin rlabs
ya mtshan sgrib med gsal/ /khams gsum kun las rtsal 'phags shing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams gsal las/ /byin rlabs 'gro la rgya chen ston/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
pa dang | |sprul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o/ /tshig gi gsung rab rig pa'i gsung / /bzhi la sum bcu drug gis brjid/ /dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs/ /dug lnga bde ba chen
pos spyad/ /dbyings las ye shes rol ba'i mthus/ /skye 'gro ma lus rgyas btab nas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su sbyong / /rgyal ba gang gis thugs rjes kyang / /'di la skyabs su
yod ma yin/ /srid pa gsum du dag byas nas/ /srid pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya gsang bas 'debs/ /thig le chos sku rig pa'i mtshog /gar gyi dbang phyug ces su bsngags/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las/ khro bo rngom brjid ston pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// //de nas
'khor gyi gtso bo mchog /gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod ba rgya chen phul byas te/ /'gro ba rtse
ba'i sems can las/ /sgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos grub kun gyi bdag /gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur/ /de bzhin
mchog gi dngos grub dag /bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang / /las kyi cho ga ji lta bur/ /yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas/ /tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci/ /thabs
mang cho ga bshad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te/ /ma 'ongs 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor
ba las/ /ngo mtshar 'phrul pa 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che/ /rnam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas/ /las kyi dngos grub sgrub pa ni/ /gnas bzang dag tu
brtsam par bya/ /phyag rgya'i grogs la brten pa na/ /bzlas brjod yan lag ma nyams par/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /sum 'bum dag tu brjod byas nas/ /rol
pa mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /mchog chen mtshan ma ma nyams pa/ /rab brtags dur khrod gnas nas blangs/ /khro bo chen po'i tsham ngam gyis/ /yungs kar thal ba la
sogs pas/ /sum+b+ha ni yi sngags brjod cing / /yi dwags gshin rje bskrad par bya/ /de nas dri zhim sbyar bar yi/ /dag byed chu yis legs bkrus te/ /me tog phreng sogs rgyan
gyis brgyan/ /gsung gi phyag rgya byin rlabs shing / /dpa' bos rang gi khyim du blang / /glu drug dbyangs drug bcas pa yis/ /khro rgyal rol ba'i bro yis sbyangs/ /bsgrub pa'i dkyil
'khor nyams dga'i mchog /rgya khyon 'dom gang khru yis bstod/ /ci bzhin la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /rdzas dang sa gzhi dag bya zhing / /sa bon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas/ /bsrung
zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yab yum sgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste/ /mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru gzhag /srung ba'i
'khor lo legs ldan pas/ /stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te/ /dkyil 'khor mnyes sogs rdzogs byas nas/ /ro langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste/ /bar chad med par bzlas
brjod bya/ /oM bi ra na trag sha ta ta la ta'i lo ma ta ya man+ta tsan+t+ra hUM phaT/ ting 'dzin 'od zer gsal ba'i rgyun/ /zur ma chag par brjod byas te/ /'bum tsho gcig gis g.yo 'gyur
zhing / /gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang / /'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing / /langs te kun tu lta bar byed/ /de tshe rnal 'byor dbang po yis/ /skra nas bzung nas
bsgyel byas la/ /rta mchog sngags kyi dbang du bya/ /rdo rje khyung gshog phyag rgya yis/ /don gyi gsung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang brdung / /ting 'dzin
sngags dang yan lag rnams/ /ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs te/ /dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor byas nas/ /mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pas/ /lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya//
de nas brtul zhugs chen po yis/ /go la lang+g+ha mnan pa yi/ /bro la sogs pa rdzogs byas nas/ /ro de gser du gyur pa yin/ /de ni mchod dang sbyin pa dang / /rang la dgos pa'i
yo byad bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ ro langs sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi
pa'o|| //de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ /gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing / /'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid//
ma 'ongs 'gro la phan gdags phyir/ /rim pa bzhin du phan gdags mdzad/ /dbang thob dam tshig la gnas pas/ /yid mthun gnas mchog bzang po ru/ /mig sman
sbyor ba bsgrubs byas te/ /byin rlabs ldan pas 'gro don byas/ /rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /rang gi gsang sngags 'bum rdzogs nas/ /mtshan mo phra mo mthong ba
dang | |bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin ldan/ /rin chen sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni/ /'bum phrag gsum
du gsung bar bya/ /oM pad+ma ma tsa ga hru a la sa ma ra si ti yo na hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas/ /grong mtha'i gnas su 'gro byas te/ /dus kyang ma mthong mtshan
mo rung | /lha 'dre gtum po'i grong du bsdad/ /rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis/ /mi rgod btsan 'brang bsrung bar bya/ /der ni b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan du/ /gzi chen mar ni bltas
nas su| |mtshan gcig yal bar bsngags bzlas shing / /ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor bar bya/ /skya rengs dang po 'char dus su/ /dud pas bdugs te bcang bar bya/ /glu dang bro yi
brtul zhugs dang / /lha rnams kun gyi stangs stabs kyis/ /gnas de'i bdag po dbang du sdud/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas/ /slar nyid mig sman shas shig byug /de
nas 'khor gyi tshogs bsgo zhing / /skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya/ /pad+ma bsgrub pa'i an rdza lis/ /ci 'dod dngos po mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ri lu'i sgrub thabs ni/ /
bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi/ /rdzas dag sha lnga dang bsres te/ /thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gnas su/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gnas
su| /gar gyi dbang phyug sku bsgoms shing / /yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags kyis/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas te/ /mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba
dang | |bdud rtsi gong bu bsgril byas te/ /rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du/ /rin chen za ma tog tu gzhug /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhag pas/ /srung ba'i tsa kras bsrung
bya zhing | |rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /'bum phrag lnga ru brjod par bya/ /'od zer lcags kyu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /oM mahA pad+ma saM po ta hu lu hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas ri
lu de blangs te/ /kha 'am lag tu bzung byas nas/ /gang 'dod gnas su 'gro byed cing / /ci 'dod pa dag grub par byed/ /lha yi gnas mchog nyams dga' bas/ /snga
dro gcig gis 'khor bar nus/ /gzhan yang bcud len bzang po nyid/ /skyes bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas/ /bdud rtsi rgyal po a ru ra/ /gser gyi mdog tu 'dug
pas mchog /nyi shu rtsa gcig ra por sba/ /sul rangs rgyas par gyur pa dang / /ba gcin phur mo thal ba dang / /ser skya'i ba mar btso bar bya/ /de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
bas| |nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag zhi bar/ /zho re'i tshad du bskyed cing bza'/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba la brten nas/ /gar gyi dbang phyug skur bsgoms shing / /rig
'dzin pa yi sngags brjod cing / /mtshan rtags gsal bar ma mthong bar/ /yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed/ /oM pad+mo bi ha ra ha ra ta sa ni hUM phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags
sum 'bum ma rdzogs par/ /a ru ra yi 'bras bzang stong gi tshad/ /legs par sbyar te zos pa'i mthus/ /nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing / /tshe ring bde ba phun sum
tshogs| |rgas la sogs pa'i skyon sel cing / /rig 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang / /kha ra bu ram nye shing dang / /zur rdul mu zi la sogs
pas| |rang gi cho ga shes pa yis/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis grub/ /gar dbang dkyil 'khor la ni brten byas te/ /so sor ma nyams sbyangs pa'i sa/ /ba yi 'o ma dang
sbyar zhing / /ba yi mar gyis gzungs btab nas/ /mtshan ma ma byung bar du bzhag /de ni rig 'dzin dngos grub thob/ /oM pad+mo i dra dra a he de bi na hUM phaT/ /oM pad+mo ra rgya a
ga ra ta dar sha hUM phaT/ oM pad+mo sa mo na bi sha le hUM phaT/ oM g+hu li sa bo ta ma go ra na hUM phaT/ oM pad+mo me sha a na nad ta ya ka ra hUM phaT/ de dag las rnams 'grub pa dang //
rtag tu rang gis 'char byas shing / /gsang ba'i sngags lam la brten nas/ /tshe 'di grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med
pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// //de nas gar gyi dbang
phyug nyid/ /phyag rgya rol pa'i skur bcas kyis/ /snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag /mchog gi dngos grub skyed byed pa'i/ /rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad/ /dmar
po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bkram nas/ /tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya/ /de ni bza' btung longs spyod tshogs/ /
ma nyams phun sum tshogs par spyad/ /gar dbang lha la mos pa yis/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bstod byed cing / /sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs tshang nas/ /mtha' sngags
gzhan gyis brgyan byas te/ /rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsam/ /oM a su sha oM a yu sha so ta bruM/ /'od zer du ba lta bu dang / /phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byur
ba'i dus/ /bro drug glu dang gar bcas pas/ /brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi spyad/ /sku gsung thugs mchog phyag rgya che/ /gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog /oM
e ka te ba ga te ma taM ka te swAhA/ /ma nyams nyams pa'i phyag rgya gsal/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas pas/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul
la| |gzi ldan gsang ba e gru gsum/ /nyi ma pad+ma shes rab ldan/ /so so gsal ba'i brdas mtshon te/ /oM bruM pad+ma A yu she /byin rlabs rnam par 'phro ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas thugs bskul zhing / /byang chub sems mchog tshe yi rgyun/ /sgrub pa po la gsal bar mdzad/ /bad 'dab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas/ /dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje che/ /hUM gis gsor
zhing a yis bskyod/ /yang dang yang du bskul ba ni/ /sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems mchog rgyun/ /b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan nang du bcug/ /rnal 'byor gar dang
legs bcas pas/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu brang zhing / /bkra shis gar dang dbyangs su bcas/ /longs spyod ston mo kun gsol zhing / /dngos grub don phyir gsol ba gdab//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// //de nas gar
gyi lha mchog gis/ /thams cad bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun/ /rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang / /dngos
grub snying po kun bsdus bshad/ /chos rnams ma lus rnams brtags nas/ /rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas/ /de nas 'byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis/ /de nyid lta bur
sbyor ba bya/ /dang por bsod nams tshogs bsags shing / /rdo rje bla ma mnyes byas pas/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /lha nyid nye bar bsgoms
byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam par bya/ /rigs kyi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /dri dbyibs kha dog ro la sogs/ /sha lnga bdud
rtsir bcas pa dang / /b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan lnga ru ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor dang phyogs bzhir bkram/ /rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /so sor spang ba sbyang byas te/ /phyag rgya sngags
dang ting 'dzin mthus/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub/ /mchod cing mnyes par byas nas ni/ /las kun grub pa'i gsang sngags brjod/ /oM pad+mo badzra hri g+hu na sid+d+hi sar+b+ba
ban ts+tsha a mr-i ta/ /oM AHhUM swAhA/ de las 'od dang du ba dang / /dri dang lha mo rtags dag ni/ /bzlas brjod thun mongs khyad par dag /'bum tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas
grub pa'i rtags mthong nas/ /de dag btags tsam sbyang bya zhing / /mkha' 'gro rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /bsod nams sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa rgyan dang
bcas| |khro bo 'bar bar zhal bsgyur zhing / /yab yum gdung ba'i glu dbyangs dang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'phro 'du yis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par/ /bdud kyi
gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed/ /slar nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs kar zhugs/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas/ /dam tshig bdud rtsi gnyis med 'gyur//
sar 'byung pad+mo'i rgyal po'i sku/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs/ /mchod bstod dga' bas mnyes byas nas/ /bro gar glu yis thugs dam bskang / /khyad par gsang sngags rgyal po'i

mthus| |ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can/ /oM mahA sarba ta thA ga ta panats+tsha a mr-i ta ru lu ru lu hUM phaT swAhA/ ji srid mtshan mas yang dang / /sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya/ /de nas rta mgrin
phyag rgya yis/ /sgrub pa chen po gsang ba'i don/ /rdo rje rta mchog phyag rgya che/ /bdud rtsi rdzas kyis dbang bskur zhing / /rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs
pa'i glus/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang bla ma mchod/ /dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod kyis/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya/ /lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing / /dam med dbang
po sngags kyis bskrad/ /bdud rtsi gtor bas lus brlag 'gyur/ /rang gi ye shes las las skyes/ /de nas las mdzad srung ma dang / /mgron tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te/ /bsod
nams ye shes tshogs chen po/ /rab tshogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud rtsi sgrub
pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas rta mchog rol pa'i sku dbus su/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis/ /'gro rnams kun la
bskul mdzad cing / /'phrin las gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad/ /bsam gtan las kyis 'byung ba yi/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang / /mnan zlog rengs dang gsad la
sogs| |ting 'dzin gsal nam goms pa'i mthus/ /bdag dang gzhan don las la sbyar/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i yi ge ste/ /bsgrub bya zla dkyil la bzhag nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad
'od sngags kyis/ /dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing / /byang chub sems kyi bde bskyed de/ /zug rdu rtog pa rnam par sel/ /yun ring goms par bstan pa'i mthus/ /me 'bar
gnas kyang zhi bar nus/ /rgyas la rgyas pa'i gzugs bgyis te/ /rin chen 'byung ldan la 'byung ba'i/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis/ /ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba
brjid| |rang gi btsun pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /bde gshegs byin rlabs kun bsdus shing / /sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang / /'phrin las sgo nas brtsam par mdzad/ /
sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis/ /rin chen sna bdun gser la sogs/ /mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs/ /tshogs rnams rang gis longs spyod cing / /'gro
rnams gzhan la sbyin par byed/ /thabs dang dbang du bsdu phyir ro/ /'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas sku/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'a 'khor dbus bzhugs shing / /chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul
ba| |rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus/ /lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang sdud cing / /'khor bcas dang bar gyur pa yin/ /gang zhig sdang ba'i sems yod pa/ /'phrad pa bzhin
rgyas chags par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i las grub mdzod/ /de ni mthing nag las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las/ /khro bo sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /bsgrub bya dang phra zhing
dgug pa/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste/ /shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum la bsdo byed cing / /skye bo yongs la 'tshe ba dang / /slob dpon kun
la bsngo ba dang / /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad/ /las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis/ /mtshon cha me 'od 'bar 'phros nas/ /sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing / /bya
khyi lce spyang sha za dang / /khrag 'thung mang po 'dus pa yis/ /bstod pa'i tshul du rol zhing dgyes/ /til tsam med par zos pa dang / /sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas/ /de
dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang / /dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bsgrub/ /oM b+hu ta tsakra sa ma ba ga ti lo tsA na che ge mo shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM rat+na saM b+ha wa gu ru mA ma kI che ge
mo puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ oM yA mi te sa ra ba ra ho che ge mo wa shaM ku ru swAhA/ oM karma san+ti pa kro ta ni che ge mo hA yA swAhA/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas
bzang po/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mthus/ /cho ga mngon du 'grub par byed/ /gzhan yang rmongs dang rengs pa dang / /dbye
zhing dgug dang bskrad pa dang / /mnan la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang / /rang gi lta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsam gtan sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dgos pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// //
de nas sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang / /'phrin las kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o/ /rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid/ /'dong 'dod 'bras bu sgrub byed pa'o/ /gar gyi dbang phyug
phyag rgya'i sku/ /rnam spro lta yi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /so so'i 'dod don sgrub par byed/ /rdo rje tsakra rin chen dang / /pad+ma rgya gram la sogs te/ /las kun lha yi nga rgyal
gyis| |mtshan rtags ma byung bar du bsgrub/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gzhir bzhag nas/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor sgrub byed cing / /mtshan ma'i rdzas la brten byas

te| |brten par mchod cing mnyes pa dang / /las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod/ /oM ma ma sarba bi ta ha ra ku ru swAhA/ sarba sa mo ku ni lam pa shan+tiM ku ru da ni hUM/ puSh+TiM rat+na ma ku ru swAhA/
pa shaM ku ru pad+mo hr-i da ya aM/ staM pa na mo sha a karma pa ni hUM phaT/ cung zhig gzugs ni 'du ba 'am/ /'od 'phros bskyod par 'gyur ba dang / /nga rgyal ldan pas lag thogs te/ /gsang
sngags drag tu brjod par bya/ /gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang / /dbang la sogs ni bsgrub 'dod pas/ /de dag de dang mthun pa dang / /las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam/ /phyag
rgya'i mtshan ma bskul byas te/ /rang gi las la rnam par gnas/ /dgug la sogs pa'i las dag dang / /lcags kyu la sogs las kyis bsgrub/ /rten gyi mtshan ma dang bral
bar| |cir 'dod bya ba mthar phyin 'grub/ /thabs dang sgrub byed gsang sngags la/ /so so'i las kyis mtha' brgyan te/ /yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes thogs su/ /sum 'bum
grangs kyis bsgrub par bya/ /oM bi lo gi ma ma dush+Ta na ga ga na ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ /dang po rtsa ba'i sngags ni/ /sum 'bum dag du bzlas byas nas/ /slar yang de yi grangs
mthun pa/ /gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po
las| rten gyi sgo nas spyad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //'gro gnas thams cad srung byad cing / /phan gdags cho ga
bzang po nyid/ /rgyal ba'i byin rlabs gnas pa'i thabs/ /rnam pa yis ni brtsams byas te/ /grong khyer la sogs srung 'dod pas/ /chu dang bye ma la sogs la/ /gsang
sngags rgyal po brjod par bya/ /oM na mo ku ru sarba bi da ra ni mo sa de ni ra sha kra ra kra ta hUM phaT/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor/ /
gang srung ba dag shis 'gyur cing / /'byung po'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa'i/ /'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri/ /mu khyud dag
gis mtha' bskor nas/ /gsang sngags rgyal po dgod par bya/ /dbus su dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam/ /de yi mthar mar oM
mthar he he dang / /hu ru kaM pa bag sha ha hA ma mra bri hUM phaT swAhA/ de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed gang / /srung ba'i sngags dang bcas pa ni/ /gur gum bzang pos byugs
byas te/ /rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug /gang gi ming bcas 'bum bzlas shing / /btags pas srung pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bum pa bzang po ru/ /bdud
rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba dag /rang gi gsang sngags yungs kar bcas/ /gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing / /sngags thod srung bar 'gyur bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi| |gsang ba 'di nyid bshad par bya/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems bcas pas/ /de la thams cad dga' mdzad cing / /lha rnams kun la slar bsgo mdzad/ /de dag dad pa'i
shugs kyis ni/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung zhing / /de 'dzin gzhan la'ang byams par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen
po zhes bya ba las/ srung ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen
po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka kA ru Na krI Di ta tan+t+ra gu h+ya gaM b+hI ra ut+ta ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka snying rje rol pa'i rgyud
gsang ba zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dbang brnyen
pa| thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gsang ba chen po/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs dang ldan pa/ che mchog he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi
dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na
gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha'
la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang / /'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las
gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis khyab pa 'di lta ste/ snying po ye shes rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / me long ye shes rdo rje dang / so so'i kun
tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang / rlung ye shes rdo rje dang / me ye shes rdo rje

dang / chu ye shes rdo rje dang / sa ye shes rdo rje dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang / gzugs ye shes rdo rje dang / sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / dri ye shes rdo rje dang / ro ye shes rdo rje dang
reg ye shes rdo rje dang / sku ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung ye shes rdo rje dang / thugs ye shes rdo rje dang / bde pa chen po ye shes rdo rje dang / kun tu bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung gi
dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / shi ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / me tog

gi ye shes rdo rje dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / dbang gi ye shes rdo rje dang / nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje sgra yi shes rdo rje
dang / 'gro ba 'du ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / go cha ye
shes rdo rje dang / yang dag par zab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang / byang chub sems ye shes rdo rje dang / rin
chen dbang bskur ba ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+mo dmar bo ye shes rdo rje dang / dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo g.yog dang bcas
pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod ces
bya ba'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i
dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / las kyi dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jums par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par
byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dren par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'bigs par byed ma ye
shes rdo rje dang / gcod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / sdigs byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / tshig byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed
ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jig byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / khrag la dga' ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pham byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha'
la 'gro ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ngag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang / zas sha rlon za ba ye shes rdo rje dang / srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod

byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang / seng+ge ye shes rdo rje dang / stag ye shes rdo rje dang / ri dwags ye shes rdo rje dang / phag ye shes rdo rje dang / spre'u ye shes

rdo rje dang / khyi ye shes rdo rje dang / byi la ye shes rdo rje dang / ra ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rog ye shes rdo rje dang / wa ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rgod ye shes rdo rje dang / sre mo ye shes rdo
rje dang / mi'i keng rus dang / 'bu chen po'i ro dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / gzig dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / ma he dang / ba lang dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par
byed pa chen mo dang / rdo rje zas 'dren ma chen mo dang / de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro

ma'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro mo ye shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i
phra men ma ye shes rdo rje dang / yang sprul ma chen mo ye shes rdo rje dang / bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po rnams sgra ca co 'byin cing
nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod par byed cing / bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
dpal che mchog he ru ka kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshogs rdo rje gtong ba dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ sprul pa chen po'i gar dang / glu dang / sil snyan dang / gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang /
ro dang / reg pa'i bde ba chen po dang / 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa bde ba la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul
chen po 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spros pa dang / gar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa dang /
spras par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa dang / myang bar byed pa dang / 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'phrog par byed pa dang / rtsom par byed pa dang / kun tu 'bebs par byed pa dang /
bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa ro'i bye phrag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jog pas nye bar gnas shing
'tsho skyong ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ dgongs pa nye bar mi 'jog /thabs dang shes rab ston
par mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba phyin ci log pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/ nye bar 'jog par mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/
nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par
yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar ma gyur pa rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/
ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi gdug pa rnams gdug par yang mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang /
lha dang / lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i gdug pa chen po dang /
tsha ba'i don dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad/ de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste spyan gnyis mi 'dzum par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor zhing sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i
dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun/ /rnam dag sras bcas byang chub rnams/ /yun ring bsgoms nas shin tu gdungs/ /
dga' ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod/ /kyai/ 'dod chags dri med kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ste/ /'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/ /dga' ba drug spyad shin
tu gsungs pa yis/ /'dod pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jig par mdzod/ /rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems ni rab phyung nas/ /rgyal
ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni bskams pa la/ /dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pa/ /pad+ma'i
gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtod pas/ /sna tshogs sems dpa' sems brlan brlags gyur pas/ /sbyor ba gzhan min ma rtogs bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje sems khyod
dbang mchog bde ba byed pa'i mchog /rdo rje pad+mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab btud nas/ /thams cad bde ba'i sgrub
pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyis nges par
bskul ba thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing / zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan mdzes pas smin ring
bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+mo phyag gis g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskum pa dang / 'jog cing 'degs
pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad de sna tshogs dang / phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang / skyes
pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la bcom
ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag
gar dang bcas nas thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la spyi 'os btud nas gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru ka chen po rol pa'i thig le 'di/ gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi ma skyes pa//
skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba 'o/ /thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dag /nam mkha' dri med
'dra ba yi/ /rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste/ /rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba 'o/ /longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung / /pad+mo'i mchog ni dmar po mdog /'dod
chags de nyid gsang ba che/ /bde phyed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog /la la ar ni don dang ldan/ /yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros/ /sa phyogs ye shes bde ba che/ /
byang chub sems thig mchog nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos
gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par mdzad do/ /
oM AHhUM/ mi skye ye shes bde mchog ro la mnams/ /sems dpa'i mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang / /chags med kun tu mya ngan 'das mdzad bzhengs shing
mnams/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol/ /byang chub skye gnas dbyings las gar mdzod cig /sngon gyi nyon mongs rdo bskams gzir ba yi/ /bde
mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen
po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi gsang ba'i thig le shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas te steng dang 'og tu yang zhu
te ma lus lus pa med pa'i ril dang / sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro bde ma mnyes par byas nas de nyid du slar
log nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po gsang ba mchog gi thig le'i dbus na bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa snying po des bskul ba ni/ gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chan
po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bsgrubs te sku rang gi bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par
byung bar gyur to/ /de la la la ni/ spyan pad+ma lta bur bsgyur cing smin dkyus ring / sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du/ /rab
dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems la dgyes mdzad cing / /bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur/ /zhal bsgyur
smin ma bsgyur ba yis/ /spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin tu gnon/ /sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang / /rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / /sems dpa' che la mnyes par
mdzad| |rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /sku ni skad cig bskul ba yi/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur/ /zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu/ /dri med spyi bor
gar mdzad cing / /dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam bsgyur ba/ /byang chub sems ni med par mdzad/ /dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis/ /pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /
bde ba'i bdag po chen po la/ /rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad/ /rab tu dgyes gsal bde ba yi/ /pad+ma dmar la che mdzad de/ /'dod chags bral zhing rab tu bsgyur/ /
pad+ma'i dra bas 'brel ba yis/ /pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i/ /bde ba che la mnyes par mdzad/ /bcom ldan pad+mo gnas par
'gyur| |phyag gi sor mo rtse mo mtha'/ /rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing / /phyag sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis/ /glog bzhin phral nas spyi gtsug tu/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis
longs spyod pas/ /sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la/ /las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing / /bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun
tu bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi mchog tu gsang ba thig le byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor
nyid kyi tshul gyis su/ /cho ga sbyor ba spros byas te/ /de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor gdon/ /sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing / /ji ltar yang
dag brtags par bya/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang / /brtag par nus pa ma yin no/ /dkyil
'khor ye shes kyis brtags pas/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /lha yi sbyor ba rgyas btab pas/ /cho ga shes pas bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs
bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /thig gis yongs su 'khor bar btab/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan/ /kun tu yongs su mu khyud bcas/ /phyi rol rdo rje rwa bas bskor/ /
de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs bzhi he ru kas ni/ bskor/ gra bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas de'i phyir rim 'khor lo rtsibs ni/ bcu drug la ye shes
khro mo bcu drug /de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i khro bo pha bcu drug /de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i phra men ma bcu drug /de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang
sprul bcu drug /de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la zhe sprul bcu drug /de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la sman gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la bcom ldan 'das de kho
na nyid kyi sku bsil dpag bsam gyi shing bzhin/ de'i rtsa ba na snan bdud rtsi lhag ma re re/ gser gyi me tog gzhon nu re re/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bdud rtsi bum pa thogs
nas sku khrus mdzad pa re re/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang phyug ma las las grub pa/ mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgod
pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka /dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /zhabs
brgyad lha chen pho mo mnan/ /glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhi ya ba skor/ /sprul nag chun pos dbu la brgyan/ /thod pa rlon pas se ral kha/ /stag lpags
mgo chen sham thabs can/ /khrag dang zhag gi tshom bur bcas/ /bde gshegs rigs bzhi he ru ka /khyung mchog ma he gzig dang stag /mi 'jigs sems can bzhi yi
khri| |smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /cha lugs mgo bo yab dang mthun/ /
dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin du mdzad cing bzhugs so/ /rigs kyi yum kun gtso yab dang mthun/ /ye shes las
grub pa'i khro bo rdo rje thogs med dang / khro bo rdo rje mdung dang / khro bo rdo rje me dpal dang / khro bo rdo rje mda' bsnyegs dang / khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang / khro bo rdo rje tho

ba dang / khro bo rdo rje bya gri dang / khro bo rdo rje rnon po dang / khro bo rdo rje ral gri dang / khro bo rdo rje zhags pa dang / khro bo rdo rje gtun khung 'dzin pa dang / khro bo rdo rje gzhu 'dzin dang / khro

bo rdo rje ral pa gcig dang / khro bo rdo rje ye shes dang / khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / khro bo rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin dang / khro mo rdo rje pad+ma b+h+ri ku Ti dang / khro mo rdo rje ral gcig ma dang /
khro mo rdo rje rtse mo dang / khro mo 'jigs su rung ma dang / khro mo mi thub rdo rjes 'dul ba dang / khro mo bkra shis ma dang / khro mo dpal ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma
dang / khro mo nor bdag ma dang / khro mo grags ma dang / khro bo grags chen mo dang / khro mo rin 'od ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma dang / khro mo zas sbyin ma
dang / khro mo bdud rtsi 'khyil ma dang / khro mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang / sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te/ sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o/ /sprul pa'i khro bo 'di dag kyang sku
mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'o/ /khro bo hUM/ ka ra dang / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo nA la daN+Da dang / khro bo ya mAn+ta ka dang / khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang / khro bo ha ya

grI ba dang / khro bo Tak+ki rA dza dang / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang / khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo ma hA ba la dang / khro bo bsnyud kyi rgyal po dang / khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo

dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang / khro bo gom pa 'dor ba dang / khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang / khro bo las thams cad dang / khro mo sprul pa'i phra men ma dang / rdo rje go ri dang / rdo rje tsau ri

dang / rdo rje phra mo ha dang / rdo rje be tA li dang / rdo rje puk+ka si dang / rdo rje g+hasma ri dang / rdo rje sna sha ni dang / rdo rje tsaN+Da li dang / rdo rje sid+ha mu kha dang / rdo rje byA g+h+r-i mu kha dang / rdo rje sri la

mu kha dang / rdo rje phra na mu kha dang / rdo rje kri ta mu kha dang / rdo rje kaM ka mu kha dang / rdo rje khwa ka mu ka dang / rdo rje U lu ka mu kha dang / 'di rnams sku mdog gcig tu ma nges so/ /'di kun
zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so/ /bdud rtsi lha mo de rnams kyang phyag mtshan rdo rje bum pa 'dzin/ sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i
khri nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan la sku lus glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/ yang sprul chen mo seng+ge lcam dral dang / stag lcam dral dang / wa lcam dral dang / spyang mo lcam
dral dang / bya rgod lcam dral dang / kang+ka lcam dral dang / bya rog lcam dral dang / 'ug pa lcam dral dang / 'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul pa'o/ /pha wang lcam dral dang / zer mo
lcam dral dang / pho rog lcam dral dang / skra ka lcam dral dang / khwa ta lcam dral dang / byi la lcam dral dang / spre'u lcam dral dang / khyi lcam dral dang /
sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /las grub pa dbang phyug ma/ byo mi'i srin mo dmar ser shing chen tri shU g.yag mgo ma/ /tshangs pa'i dmar skya b+ha na
dmar rtse lnga sbrul mgo ma/ khro bo khyab 'jug 'byung sdig snying 'dren gzig gi mgo /khyab 'jug dkar dmar dung dmar byi zhags sre mo mgo/ /gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pha wang
mgo /dbang me dmar skya bam chen khro chen dred kyi mgo /dmar po dung dmar rgyu zhags dmar mo dom gyi mgo /bdud rtsi sngon mo rin chen chu srin mgo /zhi ba sngo skya
bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo /be con nag mo bam chen thod rlon khra yi mgo /srin mo nag mo bam chen rgyu zhags wa yi mgo /za byed nag mo bam chen snying 'byin
stag gi mgo /dga' byed nag mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya rgod mgo /khrag 'thung dmar po rdo rje dbyug dung dmar rta'i mgo /gcig pu dkar dmar nam mkha' lding gi
mgo /yid 'phrog dmar ser bzhin bsdus byi zla khyi yi mgo /grub ma dkar dmar sad ma byi za pu shud mgo /rlung mo dmar ser ro za rdo rje sha ba'i mgo /gsod byed skya ljang
bam chen rnge'u chung skye ka'i mgo /me mo dmar ser mo srag rgyu 'dren skyin gyi mgo /phag mo ljang nag rtse sbyin rlon dmar phag gi mgo /dmar mo ljang sngon bdud rtsi'i khrag 'thung
khra yi mgo /sna chen ljang nag bam chen longs spyod ba lang mgo /grub mo ljang ser bdud rtsi b+han dmar sbrul gyi mgo /phag mo lcags kyu pu tra rdo rje khu byug mgo /ra ni ser mo
rgyu zhags ra yi mgo /bum sna dmar mo lcags sgrog kun 'joms seng+ge'i mgo /gsus 'dzin ser mo bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mgo /sems can thams cad mchog
dag dang / dgyes pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /gang gis chud pas
rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can mchog gi ston byed na/ /de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan gcig 'dus nas/ /rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs nas/ /zhabs
dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis/ /sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzad/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyi/ /brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol/ /cung zad zur gyis gnon
pa yis| |mdzes pa'i spyi gtsug rnams bsgyur ba'i/ /spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i/ /'gro la phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /bskul ba'i dbyangs
kyis rab tu bskul/ /gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /mchog tu gyes pa'i dkyil
'khor du/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /rnam pa kun tu skye med rol cing chud mdzad pa/ /bdag cag gzugs dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur med pa'i/ /bde
mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ /che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog dang ldan/ /bde spyod de la rol pas tshul bzhin mdzad/ /rdo
rje glu ni blangs pa yis/ /shin tu srid pa'i mya ngan 'das/ /dge chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum
pa dang bcas pas spyan ut+pa la kha bye ba bzhin smin ma dang sku rnam par bsgyur ba/ /glog dang chu rlabs su gyur ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di
gsungs so/ /zhes| dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya/ /ye shes rdo rje thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid do/ /nyid kyi sbyor pa btags pa yin/ /rdo rje dgyes
pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje dpa' bo dkyil 'khor du/ /zla ba kham pa mdzes pa ma/ /mthing ga
'bar ba kun rgyas pa/ /me la rlung gis bus pa bzhin/ /dgyes pa'i mchog ni rab bsgrubs pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /
rab tu dga' ba nyi ma bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa/ /dam pa'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra/ /'dab ma brgyad po dgyes pa yi/ /ge sar ze bas mdzes byas pa'o//
las ni thams cad 'grub byed pa/ /rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste/ /'bar ba chen po me ngang 'dra/ /de la sogs pa mtha'
yas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis/ /ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
bzhengs nas rdo rje brjid pa'i gar mdzad cing glu dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / du na wa dang / pa na wa dang / pa la ki dang / zhi ba'i
thal mos sogs pa kun tu gdungs pa dang / sil snyan la sogs pha rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang /
stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / 'jib pa dang / 'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas pas 'dzum pa dang
bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/ /byams pas kun tu gzigs pas thugs rje'i spyan/ /grol bar mthun pa'i lan
ston dug lngas 'brel/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs/ /bde chen kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren/ /sku nyid stong bas tshogs pa'i
rgyal po bzhin/ /chos nyid bde ba reg pas sku nyid ston/ /byang chub bgrod phyir chos kyi sgo mo ston/ /gzungs bstan rigs lnga'i gtso bo rnams mdzad do/ /dgyes pa
drongs la mnabs shing rol mo mdzad/ /bde ba mnabs shing dbyings nas bslad pa'i phyir/ /skye 'gag med pa'i tshul du rnam par ldan/ /snying rjes rgyun bcas bde ba
chen po ston/ /chos nyid bde ba chen pos nam mkha' bzhin/ /bde ba mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo kye/ /rol pas gdul ba'i tshogs la stsal bar mdzod/ /bde
la bsnams shing bde la mnos hUM/ /bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par gsol/ /dbyings las bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol/ /ji ltar bzhugs pa'i
gnas su bzhugs su gsol/ /ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob/ /pha rol phyin drug gang la mi brten par/ /mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang rnam par
ldan| /bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yis/ /rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje che/ /byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /
yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs
kyis bstod pa/ pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun tu gzigs shing / 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyis tshogs 'jig rten gyi
khams mang po bskal par rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang /
las kyi rigs las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor dbang phyug
tshogs dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang / 'gugs par byed
pa dang / 'jig par byed pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / grags pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje
dang / /rin chen pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ba dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs
rnams la rnam par gyur pa dang bcas pa kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad ma dang / kun tu gnon pa dang / tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang / phyag na gar mdzad ma dang /
'gying pa dang / kun tu rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po
nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/ de nyid bdag ni mnyam bzhag dang / /de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid/ /dkyil
'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das/ /yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa/ /'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil
'khor mchog ces bya'o/ /chos min chos ni rnam dpyod pas/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/ /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa
yin| |'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam/ /chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra/ /rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /gzugs
med gzugs ni dri med pa'i/ /khams gsum las ni 'jug byed pa'i/ /sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
g.yog dang bcas/ pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
kye ma rab dgyes dpa' bo mchog /kye ma rab bgegs phyogs bsgyur ba/ /rnal 'byor chen po tshogs mchog ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas
sbyor ba rab tu zab/ /rdo rje spyod pa bla na med/ /'jig rten gsum po bde thob pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /pad+mo rin chen sna tshogs che/ /thabs kyis
sbyor ba gang mdzad pa/ /rnam grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du/ /bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag
sor mo 'dab ma kun tu 'brel/ /rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur/ /brjid bag dag tu rab tu bcas/ /grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan/ /chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du
gzigs pas bshad/ /dbyangs len pa dang gcig la gcig bskul dang / /snang zhing kun tu ma chags par/ /chags med bde ba mchog gis ni/ /bde ba'i rnal 'byor
gzungs kyis rnams/ /stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /stobs shing bzhengs te grub par
mdzod| |chags pas rab tu mi gos pa'i/ /bde ba reg cing dgongs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs
sad par gyur te shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes ba chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin
tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbyangs kyis mgur len cing / rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis bcom ldan 'das dgyis bzhad pas bzhad cing / nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo
rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas ma hA su kha hUM zhes brjod/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma 'di phyung ngo / /zla gam steng
du ldan pa yi/ /ye shes gnyis po ma lta bu/ /thig le mtshan du ldan byas nas/ /gsal ba ye shes rnal 'byor ma/ /A li kA li 'dren byas ma/ /ri mo dbus su brtags
byas te| |de yi mgo dang mjug nyid du/ /khro bo gnyis po mchog pos bya/ /'di ni btsun mo rab gsang ba'i/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i/ /dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag
kyang / /bsod nams kun gyi byin brlabs 'gyur/ /A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri/ /'dren pa yang dag ldan pa ste/ /steng du zla gam thig ler dga'/ /mgo mjug tu yang
gzhan yang dri/ /'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste/ /rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin/ /bstan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed/ /A
li gnyis dang ldan bya ste/ /tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad/ /'di ni rab 'gal kun tu chags/ /chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin/ /dang po bskal pa chen po yi/ /tsheg drag po dang
bcas par gzhag /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /bdag nyid la ma bzhag kyang rung / /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor sgrub byed na/ /dngos grub
myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog /ye shes phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i/ /'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba'i/ /bris pa yis kyang khyab par
'gyur| |e ma'o bde ba ye shes che/ /'di ni ye shes tshig gcig la/ /gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing / /'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/ /khams gsum mchog gi dkyil
'khor 'dir/ /'di las rgya chen gzhan med do/ /sgrub pa po dang sems can kun/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /che mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig
gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen mo rnal 'byor ma dbang
phyug chen mo rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te dgyes
pa'i yid ches pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu rgyas pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad cing / yang he ru ka'i sku mdog ni/ sna tshogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das che mchog he ru ka zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o/ /de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam
gyis mi khyab pa na shin tu mi srun pas gdungs pa nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa can thams cad la badzra dza l-i'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ru
ka dregs pa can thams cad tsha ra gcod pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka /nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir yak+Sha he ru ka /ye shes don dang ldan pa'i phyir
byi sha he ru ka /dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir sa ma ya he ru ka /de las 'phros pas he ru ka stong rtsa brgyad/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang sprul nas 'gro ba'i
don mdzad do/ /kro d+hA+e shwa ri sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o/ /dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs bzhi phyag cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /zhabs brgyad rdo rje 'bar nga me dpung gi nang na he ru ka bzhi
zhabs bzhis mnan pa/ badzra he ru ka /pad+ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i spyan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs pa/ shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo dbu'i steng na he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo
dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du bltas pa'i zhal ni/ nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par spyod zhing byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims/ byang chub kyi
sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyis su med par sbyar zhing byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/ badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yos par gyur te/
'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnam par rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol lo/ /mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gis/ /bskal ba bas kyang sreg
mdzad cing / /'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can/ /dbu mang sgrub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing / /phyag mang 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams/ /zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang / /
'jig rten rab tu spa bkong na/ /khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang / /rgod dang gshi zhing za byed pa/ /'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ /'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/ /khro
chen khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma slas 'di rnams phul nas skyabs su gsol lo/ /chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs
kyi sbyor bas dbang bsdus te dam tshig dang ming btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka
rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rol pa 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gru bzhi sgo
bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /thig gis yongs su 'khor bar btab/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i snying po la/ /bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka /shar du badzra he
ru ka /lho ru rat+na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du karma he ru ka /shar lhor rak+Sha he ru ka /lho nub yak+Sha he ru ka /nub byang byi sha he ru ka /byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka /bde
gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod/ /de'i phyir rim snam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i phra men ma bcu drug dgod/ /de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor/ /gshin rje
'joms dang stobs po che/ /rta mgrin dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no/ /sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te/ gcig tu ma nges pa'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma he ru ka dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa/ /gshog
pa rdo rjes gtams pa/ zhabs brgyad chas dang brgyan cing / phra men ma bcu drug gi 'khor dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs te sprul pa
las bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen por rak+ta dang / rus gong gsar snying gi nang na thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du zhing bsnol ma'i gdan khri la bzhugs so/ /
dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis klu chen po rnams brdzes pa/ rdo rje brag ris gtams pa/ rdo rje me phung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ dbu gtsug nas rta mgo ljang khu
lnga byung ba/ sbrul nag gi chun po stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhing bsnol ma'i khril bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags
pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /hUM nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing khams nas/ /de nyid rang snang mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor na/ /bde ba chen po dpal 'bar mchog gi
lha| |'du 'bral med pa'i thugs rje dbang gi lha/ /dbang mchog ngo mtshar rngam brjid dbang gi lha/ /dpal chen pad+ma'i thugs ni rin po che/ /khro bor ston kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs
can| |snying rje yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs cir 'gyur yang / /'gro ba'i don du dpal chen bzhengs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das rta mgrin de nyid/ /yul lam chags brag phug dgon pa/ /zas la ma chags rtswa'i rtsa ba/ gos la ma chags shing gi shun pa/ /skom la ma chags brag gi thigs
pa| |brag ri ra mi brten shing la brten/ /shing la mi brten chu la brten/ /chu'i snying po 'tsher ba gcig tu sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /ha ya gr-I ba rta mchog
dpal| |sku mdog dmar po stag gi sham thabs can/ /sprul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid chags pas/ /dbu skra kham nag ral pa muny+tsa cod pan can/ /dbu
yi gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa/ /smin mtshams sna phrag kun nas glog stong 'phro/ /dbu yi gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni/ /snyan nas sgra
byung 'brug skad ldir/ /spyan nas me byung khams gsum sreg /shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten 'thor/ /zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil/ /ma mo dam
can rnams kyang dam la 'du/ /rta skad theng gsum 'tsher bas srid pa dbang du sdud/ /rta bro theng gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon/ /pad+ma rgyal po rta
mchog dpal/ /dkar po'i mdog la dmar po'i zhal/ /sku mdog mthing ga'i khro gnyer can/ /snyan ni dung gi khong seng can/ /mu med khams ni ci mchis gsan/ /spyan
gnyis nyi zla'i phrugs su bcas/ /khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs/ /rtog pa mtshon gyi lcang lo can/ /rnga ma lcags kyi g.yab mo 'debs/ /shangs nas me phung
'bar ba'i tshub ma 'thor/ /zhal nas mi bzad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/ /g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar/ /g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng / /ke'u ri gshog
pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya yi/ /na ba rnams ni sos par byed/ /rta skad bzhad pa rta bro brdung / /rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /klu rgyal rigs drug dbang du sdud/ /rta skad chen po thang
gcig gis/ /ma tshogs dbang phyug dbang du sdud/ /rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du sdud/ /rta bro lan gsum brdungs pa yis/ /bdud
bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gnon/ /dpag tshad 'og na bdud gnas pa/ /klad du rgyob la thal bar rlogs/ /yab gcig re byams rta mchog dbang / /rta rkun tshul du gar byed kyis//
gar gyi brda la da tshur spyon/ /rta rkun tshul du spyugs 'dor gyis/ /spyugs pa'i rta la da tshur spyon/ /rta rkun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyis/ /g.yab mo brda la da tshur spyon/ /hUM gis
rgyu drug rtsad nas gcod/ /'phrin las zhi bar mdzod cig rta mchog dbang / /srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal pa'i mthu/ /che btsan kun
las 'phags pas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug che/ /gar mkhan sgyu 'phrul kun las thabs kyi rgyal por grags/ /byams ldan gar gyi dbang gis 'phrin las mdzod/ /
rtag tu grub mchog re zhing 'bod 'grogs na/ /byams ldan mgon po bdag la ci phyir thugs mi brtse/ /lha mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na/ /ye shes
lha mchog khyod kyi thugs rjes rung lags sam/ /dngos grub stsol bar mi dmigs kyang / /sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol/ /yum chen e ka tsa Ti
ma| |ral pa gcig mas de skad bskul/ /yang yab kyis sku la 'khyud par brten pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /bdud kyi yum la gshin rje lcam/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang
phyug ma/ /dpal ldan chen mo re ma ti/ /mchen e ka dza Ti ma/ /gu h+ya gsang chen ral gcig ma/ /re ta chen mo tsa mun Ta/ /srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs/ /dpal ldan
rdo rje dam shin ti/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam rgyal dpal/ /yi dam rgyal mo g.yu 'phro ma/ /las la 'gril cing chos la bstan/ /dbu rnams 'byin cing 'dud pa'i tshul/ /

gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /de nas snying po dran tsam gyis/ /pad+ma ta krita ha ya gr-I ba hu lu hu lu/ e a ra li hring hring hring / e ka dza Ti sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ sngags
kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /dbyings gsum rnam par dag pas bsgrubs/ /de nas skyo nas bsdu ba na/ /hUM hUM zhes ni rab brjod de/ /phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni/ /sang ha ra na hUM zhes rab
tu brjod/ /yab kyang yum la bsdu/ /yum yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / de kho na nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
phyung ngo / /rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /cha ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /pad+mo'i snying po
la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad+ma la badzra he ru ka /lhor rat+na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du karma he ru ka /mtshams bzhir yum
bzhi| de'i phyi ri ma du ke'u ri ma brgyad dang / sid+ha ma brgyad dang bcu drug /sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o/ /sgo bzhi rim bzhin dang mthun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu
bzang po de kho na nyid rab gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /za byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag /yon tan 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje
shugs can dang / rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo
dang / rdo rje gad rgyangs can dang / rdo rje grags can dang / rdo rje ha ha gad mo can dang / rdo rje he he grags can dang / rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje gshin
rje gshed po can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje bsgyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po che dang / rdo rje ko ba rlon pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa'
chen po dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi zad dang / /rdo rje bde ba dang / rdo rje so'i phreng ba can dang / rdo rje drung chen dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin

dang / rdo rje g.yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang / rdo rje hUM chen dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhu bdungs dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje rdo rje dang / rdo rje

g.yul zlog dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rjes dang / rdo rje chu dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje rlung dang / rdo rje nam mkha' dang / rdo rje yang dag dang / rdo rje sgra 'bar dang / rdo rje 'bebs
pa dang / rdo rje mig brgya ma dang / rdo rje ba spu ma dang / rdo rje sen mo skyes pa dang / rdo rje zangs kyi pags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang / rdo rje spu gri so can

dang / rdo rje pags pa mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgyan pa dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje kI la ya dang / rdo rje dpal ldan dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po
