dang / rdo rje za byed dang / rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje skyes mchog dang / rdo rje seng+ge dang / rdo rje kun tu

lta ba dang / rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od bzang dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje sku dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje thugs
dang / rdo rje 'od gsal dang / rdo rje sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang / rdo rje char bstan dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po dang / rdo rje rin chen kun bdag dang / rdo rje 'chang ba po dang / rdo

rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje snang ba dang / rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje dri ma med pa dang / rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang / rdo rje skyil krung dang / rdo rje 'od po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma skyes dang / rdo rje thams
cad kun mkhyen dang / rdo rje mdzod 'dzin dang / rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi
tshogs dang / rdo rje nub ma can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje longs
spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyed pa po dang / rdo rje don byed pa po dang /
rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje lha min bdag po dang / rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams
pa dang / rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang / rdo rje thog thog lcags kyi gsor chen 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje teg teg stong gsum 'gyed pa dang / rdo rje thib thib myos par byed pa
dang / rdo rje 'ur 'ur 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / rdo rje chem chem gnam lcags 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam glog 'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum
bsgul ba dang / rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje mi srung smyong bar byed pa dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM rgyal bar byed pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shing sdang bar byed pa dang /
rdo rje sprul gyi zhags pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin srog gcod pa dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung snying khrag 'thung ba dang / rdo rje dpal snying sreg pa dang / rdo rje mdung thung 'bugs
par byed pa dang / rdo rje khrag za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje tshil za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkang za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sha za bar byed pa dang / ye shes las sprul pa'i khro
po 'di rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/ zhal du 'dren par byed/ mkha' la rlom par byed/ zhal du rdub cing za bar byed/ dbang du sdud cing tshar gcod par byed/ thobs rdeg
par byed/ phur bus 'debs par byed/ ral gris gcod par byed/ be con gyis brdung bar byed/ 'khor los lus gtubs par byed/ dgra stas gsheg par byed/ rdo
rjes mgo mjug med par rdeg par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis phyed tshal du byed/ rdo rje mdas gting 'bugs par byed/ mtshon spu gri ma las gshegs cing dral bar byed cing lcags
kyus 'gugs par byed/ zhags pas 'ching bar byed/ lcags grog gis sdom par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram phyed kyis dbang du bsdus nas las thams cad grub par byed do/ /rdo

rje mtshon cha'i sngags so/ /oM bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT/ ha la ha la hUM/ badzra dza man+t+ra suM b+ha ni/ oM brUM hUM brUM truM bruM hi bruM ha bruM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT
phaT phaT/ grangs nges pa 'dir bstan to/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de skad ces rdo rje mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun
tu bzang po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshe sgrub pa 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ /chag ni dgu yi tshad du bya/ /thig gis yongs su 'khor
bar gdab/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/ /'khor lo dag gi lte ba la/ /bcom ldan kun tu bzang po bri/ /shar du rdo rje sems
dpa' bri/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan bri/ /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas bri/ /byang du don yod grub pa bri/ /phyi rim rdo rje ra bas bskor/ /grwa bzhir dgod par bya ba ni//
shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug bri/ /lhor rin chen dbyings phyug bri/ /nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug bri/ /byang du las kyi dbyings phyug bri/ /de yi phyi rim snam bu la/ /sgo bzhi sgo
khyud bcas par dgod/ /sgo bzhi ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mthun/ /de rnams kyang phyag mtshan tshe'i bum pa re re 'dzin cing bsnams pa/ gdan pad+ma la bzhugs pa
sha stag go /de nas tshe dbub par bya ba dang / tshe gshin rje nag po'i lag nas dbrog pa dang / che gang g.yab pa dang / che bcing zhing bsdam pa dang / tshe dbang du bsdu
ba dang / tshe yongs su spel ba dang / che rgyas par bya ba dang / tshe ring zhing bdud kyis bar mi chod par bya ba dang / tshe sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba dang /
tshe skye 'chi med pa'i 'bras bu chos lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa drangs med pa spros nas/ oM bruM badzra A
yu She hUM zhes bka' stsal ba dang / bdud gshin rje nag po'i snying dral te shog shog skya bo la rlung gis btab par zhin/ dun dun khyar khyar 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i co to nas bzung
nas 'drad kyis bsgyel te rdo rje snying gar bzhag nas lag pa nas hur gyis 'phrog nas tshe'i g.yab dar dang / phyag rgyas g.yas pa dang / ri rab rtse la sbas pa/ rgya mtsho'i
gting du sbas pa/ bar snang gi khams la sbas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu nas bkug cing tshe blangs te zhags pa'i tshogs kyis bcings/ lcags
sgrog gi tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te rgya cher yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /oM bruM badzra A yu She badzra hUM a zhes brjod pas bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag
rgyas bstan nas rgyas par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ karma d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ti/ ya ma ya ti kra sa ma ya d+ha rAt+ko \u0f85 haM zhes brjod pas bdud
gshin rje'i lag nas tshe 'phrog ste gshin rje yang brgyal zhing sdangs nas bsgral zhing rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos snying khrag 'thungs te tshe'i bar chod byas te/ oM puN+ye pu
N+ye| mahA pu N+ye/ a pa ri mi ta A yu pu N+ye/ dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te swAhA zhes bzlas pas sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe
srog gi snying po/ oM bruM badzra A yu She badzra hUM a zhes bzlas pas/ tshe skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung gi sku tshe thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje sems dpas tshe'i las 'di gsungs so/ /dbang phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum/ /yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te/ /dkyil
'khor rdzogs par phun sum ldan/ /rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa/ /gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol/ /aM e h+ye hi mahA kA ru Ni ka tri sha ho/ sa
ma ya s+t+waM/ dza: hUM baM hoHbrtan par bzhugs pa/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen
por bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra sa ma ya oM/ aM badzra sa ma ya aM/ hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ swA badzra sa ma ya swA/ haM badzra sa ma ya haM/ las la bzhugs pa/ /oM/
shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /rdo rje lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu dza/ /tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig /dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'phro
can| |tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /bruM badzra A yu badzra aM gu sha dza: dza: dzaH/ lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa
ni| |ser mo yid bzhin glog phreng 'dzin/ /phyag na rin chen sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams/ /che la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud//
nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma/ /dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma/ /phyag na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye
shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /nag mo mig gcig ral pa can/ /dung gi tshems la lcags kyi spu/ /phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams/ /
tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rnams bskul ba/ dbyings
phyug mkha' lding pad+ma'i dbyings/ /phyag rgya bde mchog dbyings kyi yum/ /ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma/ /dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /badzra aM
gu sha hUM dza/ stong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' brnyes pa/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang sdud ma/ /zhing la rngam zhing brkam stobs can/ /stong gsum dbyings
nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /dbyings ma dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshogs/ /bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma/ /gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying 'byin ma/ /
dpal chen rgyal po dgyes pa'i 'khor/ /dung phreng chen mo 'khor dang bcas/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /dbyings su mkha'
la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /log par lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma/ /'dod khams ma dang gnyis med rol pa'i sras/ /dbang phyug phra men 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /tshe
la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /gshin rje lag nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo lcags kyu ma/ /phyag na
shel gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun sgrol byed/ /lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo zhags pa ma/ /phyag na mthing shing bum
pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed/ /nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo lcags sgrog ma/ /phyag na zangs kyi bum pa bsnams/ /
tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sdom par byed/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo dril bu ma/ /phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing
'gal byed dbang du sdud/ /steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma/ /phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed
dbang du sdud/ /'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /che yi lha mo brtan ldan ma/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed ma lus dbang du sdud/ /oM
b+hUM badzra A yu yud te rat+na yu ti/ d+harma yu ti/ karma yu ti/ bruM badzra A yu She hUM a/ de nas dngos grub blang ba ni/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum
dang ldan/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa'i/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko nya haM/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung
'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/ /byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma
ko\u0f85haM/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas thugs 'dzin pa'i/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba
ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skong bar gyur cig /lta ba yon pa thams cad srong par 'gyur cig /cho ga nyams pa thams
cad rdzogs par gyur cig /tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye 'chi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems
dpa' sku gsung thugs sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs so/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ mahA rak+ta'i mgo la yan
gyis byugs la/ dbus su badzra he ru ka /yum kre d+hI shwa ri/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du badzra he ru ka /lhor rat+na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du karma he
ru ka |sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyud gzhan dang mthun/ de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la phra men ma bcu drug /de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi la dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la
dri chen gyis maN+Dal byugs la dbus su yak+Sha he ru ka dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs brgyad gshog pa rdo rjes gtams pa/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/
shar du badzra he ru ka /lhor yak+Sha he ru ka /nub tu byi sha he ru ka /byang du sa ma ya he ru ka /mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum bzhi bzhugs/ gdan zhing bsnol
ma'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de'i phyi ri ma snam bu la phra men dang khro bo pha bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so/ /sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do/ /khro bo
chen po nI la daN+Da dbus su bri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la sprul ba'i khro bo shugs can dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul
dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / gad rgyangs can dang 'di rnams go rims bzhin bri/ sgo bzhi gzhan dang mthun/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/
rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje grags chen/ lhor khro bo gad mo can/ nub tu khro bo he ha/ grags chen dang / byang du rdo rje bgegs gnon
pa'i rgyal po bri/ de'i phyi rim sgo rnams bri/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa/ dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri/ phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la phra men ma sid+ha la
sogs pa brgyad bri/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus su bri/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la khro bo 'gying pa
dang / khro bo glang po che dang / khro bo ko ba rlon pa dang / khro bo mig mi bzang ba bzhi rim bzhin du bri'o/ /phyi'i sgo rnams dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la
dbus su ha ya grI ba bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ ke'u rim brgyad bri/ phyi rim sgo snam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ Tak+ki rA dza dbus su dgod/
phyi rim maN+Dal brgyad la khro bo bde ba dang / so'i phreng ba dang / dung chen dang / khu tshur dang / g.yab mo dang / dga' ba dang / 'degs pa dang / hUM chen dang ni 'di
rnams bri/ sgo snam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje spu can
dang / zangs kyi gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi mche ba can dang / spu gri'i so can dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba
dbus su dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la stag gi mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can rnams so/ /sgo
bzhi rim bzhin du dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la khro bo hUM ka ra dbus su dgod do/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la spyang ki'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can
dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / dred kyi mgo can rnams dgod do/ /sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbus su dgod/ 'khor lo'i
rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje gdengs mo/ /lhor rdo rje sder mo/ /nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ /byang du rdo rje gtun khung rnams rim bzhin du dgod do/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/ /dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad te/ /
gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan/ /de yi 'khor gyi khro mo ni/ /phyag kyang srin po ltar mthun te/ /zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar bstan/ /shar
gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ste/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /dri za bsnol
ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu
gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /
ya mAn+ta ka gshin rje gshed/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /
'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /
zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /bden bral bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /ha ya grI ba rta mchog
dbang / /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /klu bdag bsnol ba'i khri la
bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo Tak+ki rA dza ste/ /sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug
gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /rlung lha bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /byang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro
bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ /sku mdog ljang khu 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la
bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /byang shar mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /sku mdog ljang skya 'od zer 'phro/
dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /bi nA ya ka'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /steng gi phyogs na bzhugs
pa ni| |khro bo hUM mdzad hUM ka ra/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug ga shog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /nyi zla gza' skar khri la
bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /mahA ba la stobs po che/ /sku mdog nag la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug
gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng na/ /sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ya mAn+ta ka'i
ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bskul lo/ /bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do/ /hUM/ gtum chen rab 'jigs 'jig rten 'joms mdzad la/ /nyi ma 'bum
pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod/ /phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar/ /rab 'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing / /gcan
gzan gdug pa'i bags rlon sku la brgyan/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs gshin rje gnon/ /zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan/ /mi bzang rgyal po
gdong drug hUM sgra can/ /phaT kyis khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po/ /sha za'i mgo bcad dbu yi rgyan du thogs/ /spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me
ltar 'phro/ /ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing / /ma mo rnams kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros/ /stong gsum mid par mdzad pa'i zhal gdangs
la| |tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi thigs 'dzag cing / /nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'bros/ /rkan sgra gtogs pa
lha chen khyab 'jug kyang / /'bum 'gyel bcas par khrag skyug nyid la 'dud/ /phyag na mi thod rlon pa bsnams pa ni/ /dngos grub phyag gis klad khrag zhal du stob/ /
tshangs pa'i mgo bcad dbu yi rgyan du byas/ /zhing chen mgo nas chem chem za bar byed/ /rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas par thogs nas ni/ /khyod mthong tsam gyis rab
'jigs nyid la 'dud/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sprul pa'i khye'u bzang dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis me tog gtor/ bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs pa de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /dgung la thog thog mi zad pa/ /khye'u chung sngon mo mkha' la lding / /ya man+ta ka khro bo ste/ /sku yang tshe la bam ldir bzang / /sku mdog
stang zil bcag pa 'dra/ /phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wAM ga /bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te/ /'khor ni phra men brgyad kyis
bskor| |nga nyid yin te skal pa bzang / /skal bzang nga yi dam tshig gis/ /dog la chem chem mi bzad pa/ /bsgrags pa ral pa gcig ma yin/ /dam tshig dus las ma
'da' zhig /ces bsgo'o/ /ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ma dang phra men ma'i
ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /las bcol bar mdzad do/ /kro d+hi shwa ri dpal 'bar ma/ /khams gsum srid par mnga' mdzad ma/ /las su
gsod la dga' ba mo/ /shan pa sbu gri rnon po so/ /ro la rngam pa'i kha T+wAM ga /'byung po tsit+ta mchog la rol/ /mthing ga mchog ston dpal gyi yum/ /rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug
ma| |ke'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/ /gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'gengs/ /rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma/ /ce'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/ /phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan
'dzin| |pad+ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug ma/ /pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol/ /nag mo ral pa thod pas 'gying / /dkar mo las kyi dbang byug ma/ /be tA li yi mchod pas rol/ /
gtum mo zhe sdang spu gri so/ /zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /g+ha sma ri yi mchod pas rol/ /pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs/ /'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug
ma| |puk+ka si yi mchod pas rol/ /rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin/ /gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /sma shA na yi mchod pas rol/ /las su
dgra sta 'bar ba 'dzin/ /nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /tsaN+Da li yi mchod pas rol/ /sid+ha gsod byed seng+ge mgo /ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma/ /byA g+h+r-i mgo
gcod stag gi mgo /thod rlon za ba'i phra men ma/ /sri ka dur rkun wa yi mgo /dur sri ma yi phra men ma/ /shwa na sha 'drad spyang mo mgo /sha chen za ba'i phra men ma/ /gr-i d+ha
khrag 'thung bya rgod mgo /khrag tshil za ba'i phra men ma/ /kang+ka mu ka dur bya'i mgo /dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra men ma/ /kha kha rgyu 'dren pho rog mgo /dgra bgegs
'dul ba'i phra men ma/ /hu lu tshe 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo /glo snying za ba'i phra men ma/ /stag g.yag sha ba seng+ge'i mgo /byi la spyang ki wa yi mgo /dom dred phag gi mgo
can rnams/ /thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas sku la 'khril cing las mthar phyin par mdzad do/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dza dza lcags kyu glo snying 'dren/ /a mo sngon mo thod sprul zhags/ /i li dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/ /
bas ni ljang khu dril 'khrol dgyes/ /bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las/ ye shes khro bo
dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
las phyung ngo / /rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs rnam pa bzhis ni brgyan/ /dar dang dril bu chun po dang / /nyi ma zla bas rnam par
brgyan| |rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras/ /do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam bris pa/ /sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi
dang ldan pa ste/ /ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag ldan/ /dbus su dga' byed stan la ni/ /dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yogs/ /thams cad
stan la de dag ces/ /dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /stan de la ni gzhag par bya/ /tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /yid bzhin nor bu
dbu rgyan ldan/ /rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes/ /tshad med dang ni sbyang ba yi/ /dbu la chun pos mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/ /chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas/
dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che/ /snying gar gsor la rab tu rtsom/ /bde la sogs pa yon tan ldan/ /thog ma
nyid du rnam par gzhag /slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung / /mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la/ /tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par
bya| |bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ /dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni/ /bdag ni rab dgyes rjes su smra/ /der ni slob ma byin brlabs te/ /
thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i/ /gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro/ /rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/ /yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya
ste| |snying ga mtshog ma mgrin spyi bor/ /lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te/ /mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba'i/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rang la 'khyud
pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mdun du lha mo myos byed ma/ /ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes/ /dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi/ /thams
cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog /shes rab can gyi mdun du gzhag /g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/ /mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson/ /do
shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ /gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ /chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo/ /sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing / /de yi tshul bzhin
gzhag par bya/ /rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma/ /pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa 'o/ /sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gcig /dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/ /
sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs/ /gar gyi bya ba rab rlag gzhag /g.yon du sna tshogs chen po ste/ /sna
tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa/ /sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/ /rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson/ /lha dang lha min mi yi rnams/ /'gro ba thams cad myos mdzad ma/ /sna
tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs dar ni na bza' gsol/ /gra rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams dang / /bdug pa me tog bsung ldang ba/ /
gzi brjid chen pe'i 'od dang ldan/ /ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /skal ldan 'ga' la rnam
mos pa| |sgo srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang / /rdza rnga rnga chen ku mu ta/ /mu ra tsa dang da ra dang / /gar dang
dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/ /rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/ /
dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/ /rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ma gzhag /yi dwags phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ /skal ldan rang gi lag
char ldan/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing / /sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / /rkang dang tshil du za spyod pa/ /dkyil 'khor byas te bdug pa ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil
'khor gzhag par bya/ /dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ /gsod par byed dang 'phrog par byed/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ /shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par
bya| |gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma/ /'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste/ /gtsug lag mthon pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /chags chen po
dang chags bral dang / /'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma/ /rab tu 'byor pas 'byor byas te/ /ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang / /gnod
sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog /sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs nas/ /sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag /shar gyi grwa ru bzhag pa ni/ /bya rog gdong ni mig 'bru
ste| |'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong / /ji ltar rjes su mthun byas te/ /yi dwags stan la yang dag 'dug /sna tshogs mchog gi gdong 'dzin te/ /lag par gri dang
khar gzhong thogs/ /mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ /nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa/ /bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma/ /khros pa'i khra dang phag gi gdong / /gsus pa
che la lto 'phyang rnams/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /rnga mo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma/ /khros par dang khyi yi gdong / /rgyu ma'i mgo nas sha bar byed/ /shar dang byang gi
mtshams dag tu/ /keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs/ /lto 'phyang po la bum pa 'dzin/ /phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi/ /ce spyang
gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ /'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'dzin/ /rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /sgo rnams kun ni phyogs rnams kun/ /sgo bzhi rnams ni gzhag
par bya| |byang phyogs su ni 'bod 'grogs te/ /bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du/ /nub tu rnam par 'jig pa 'o/ /lho ru gshin rje rgyal po gzhag /de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog
nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dgyes shing
spyan ni rgyas pa yis/ /bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi/ /brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thal mo sbyar bas gtsug nyid du/ /bzhag pa
yis ni 'dud par byed/ /bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis/ /de dag gtso la mnyes par byed/ /kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma bde
byed yang dag 'byung / /kye ma kun tu bzang po don/ /kye ma rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs/ /kye ma bde ba dga' ba che/ /kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste/ /kye ma sngags kyi yang dag
sbyor| |kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs/ /kye ma sgrub pa rmad byung ba'o/ /kye ma pha rol phyin pa yis/ /kye ma ji ltar mthur rigs pa/ /kye ma
dgos pa sna tshogs che/ /kye ma dag pa gsum sbyar ba/ /kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma pad+ma rnam phye ba/ /kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma mchog dang mnyam
sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma gar ni dga' ba che/ /kye ma glu rab dri ma med/ /kye ma sil snyan rnam par 'khrol/ /kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba/ /kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng / /kye
ma mar me mun pa sel/ /kye ma dri ni shin tu bsil/ /kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma sgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma rin chen
bde mchog skyed/ /kye ma sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad/ /kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang / /kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams/ /kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che/ /kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi
rnams| |shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying ba yis/ /dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/ /chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum
bcas pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur/ /yangs par spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /spyan dang
zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs/ /sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud/ /rked pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs/ /rnams kyi gos kyang che la mdzes/ /
chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon/ /tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla/ /mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / /rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod/ /bud med gzugs
ldan mdangs bzang ba/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
btsun mo mchog /spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis/ /pad+mo rdo rje
bsgom par bya/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/ /bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yis/ /bud med rnyed na cho
ga bzhin/ /bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin
du| |bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/ /sgrub pa
pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag /rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /pang par bzhag
nas rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog /'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni/ /byas na las
rnams brtsam par bya/ /bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la/ /rigs kyi sbyor ba rab bsgoms te/ /bdag gi khu bas mchod
par bya| |'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /na chung gzhon nu mig bzang btsal/ /gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yi/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i/ /
bzung nas byol song skye gnas brtag /bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /na chung mtshan ldan skal ba mchog /mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas/ /khu ba blangs nas bza'
bar bya| |dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/ /sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub/ /smin dkyus ring
zhing skra lo 'jam/ /lus ldem dbyibs sgu blo dag cing / /bstan pa chags shing bcos su btub/ /lus nyan ci la thogs pa med/ /rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/ /stod ni
drang la shin tu rgyas/ /tshems dkar mgul ring phyag sor ring / /dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog /gzungs ma mtshan ldan spyad par bya/ /mnyen lcug 'khril
ldem rab tu mdzes/ /yid 'ong 'dzum phran spyan zur gzigs/ /mkhur tshos dkar pos gdab par bya/ /dkar 'dzin phyir ni mnye bya ste/ /pad+ma'i ze ba chen pos gdab/ /
pad+ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste/ /mchan khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis/ /zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas par
gyur to| |de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do/ /zhi ba kha dog dkar la 'tsher/ /btang snyoms kun gyi sbro bsdu yis/ /gsum pa rdzogs bar ldan pa dang / /phyag rgya tshogs
mchog de dag la/ /rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/ /phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs 'dzin/ /che chung med par gsal bar
bsgom| |dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ge ldan/ /gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu/ /cod pan lnga yi rin chen las/ /rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi| |mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya 'o/ /mthing ga 'bar ba'i yi ge che/ /rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las/ /phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'i/ /rgyal mo dag
dang mnyam du skye/ /sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs/ /gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las/ /thams cad blo dbyangs yi ge gter/ /mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa/ /rin
chen rigs kyi phyag rgya gsal/ /las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog /rgyal po rnam par rol pa' / /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog /chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa/ /gsal
ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad/ /sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis/ /phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur/ /btsun mo dag dang mnyam
du skyes| |gnyis su med par 'khril ba yin/ /dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan/ /rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las/ /cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/ /ci bzhin pa yi
ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+mo'i tshul/ /mnyam par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin/ /mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus
mchog /pad+mo rigs kyi phyag rgyas gsal/ /rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar gsal/ /mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin/ /gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom/ /chu skyes
'jam pa 'og tu ldan/ /steng dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis/ /dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham/ /'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs/ /thams cad bsdu ba zhes
bya ba| |de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad/ /dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che/ /rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs/ /mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin te/ /yi
ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog /bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs/ /chu skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i steng / /gnyis su med par gsal bas na/ /rnam pa gnyis
kyi bye brag gis/ /'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa/ /'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing / /blo la yid gnyis med pas na/ /phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku/ /rgyal
mo dang ni mnyam du skyes/ /dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/ /sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu/ /bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med/
gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal/ /dus kun tu ni mnyam ldan pa/ /gsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs/ /zla rgyas lta bur gtso bo
bsgom| |chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi/ /yum dang lhan cig sgom pa ni/ /A li kA li byed pa'i don/ /phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis/ /bde ba chen por tshul
gnas pa/ /rgyal ba kun kyang de dang mthun/ /phyag rgya bsnol bar gnas pa yis/ /kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni/ /kun kyang yum
gyi rgyab tu bsnol/ /zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba/ /zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes/ /dung gi phur bus mkhur tshos la/ /'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du
bzhugs/ /bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog /gzhan yang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs sgom/ /rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don/ /
gsang ba spyod pa shin tu dgyes/ /gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren/ /thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel/ /yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni/ /sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing / /zas
dang mgo dbang med pa yi/ /nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis/ /pad+mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste/ /rgyal
ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin/ /phyag rgya chen mo tshogs mchog ste/ /dga' ba don du rigs mchog yin/ /myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na/ /gdon mi za bar grub pa ni/ /'dod
khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis/ /gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor
mchog /gsang ba nyid kyis mkha' dbyings so/ /yi ge oM ldan tsheg drag bcas/ /rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyi sras/ /gzugs khams lha tshogs byin brlabs te/ /
phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal ba dang / /bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs/ /gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gsal/ /nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du/ /gsal ba 'tsher
ba bcom ldan 'das/ /dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la/ /rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis/ /legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /
rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang / /ting 'dzin mthun par 'gro la gzigs/ /pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas pa'i/ /thig le gsang ba bzhin dang ldan/ /mdun du lha
mo chags pa mo/ /lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan/ /ma hA su khe gnas la dgyes/ /mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas/ /gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni/ /gtso la
rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /rgyab tu lha mo dgyes chen mo/ /sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis/ /thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa/ /sku tshe bcu
drug brtsan dmar sku/ /sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor/ /'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad/ /g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo/ /rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyes/ /
ma dad pa rnams dbang med par/ /drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel/ /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yi/ /stong pa med par bstan pa'i tshul/ /sngo
bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che/ /sku tshad bco lnga chags pa can/ /dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes/ /steg dang sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khru//
rab tu smras pa'i 'gog pa rnams/ /bslangs nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad/ /a rta ma li 'phrin las kyis/ /thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad/ /mig gnyis 'dzum dang sbom po
yis| |dbang mor ldan par byas pa na/ /gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin/ /sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin/ /ma ta bzhugs par brtson byas pa'o/ /so so rnams bsdams kha
phye ba| |dus la bab ces bya ba ste/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na/ /dus la bab ces bya ba yin/ /'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la/ /dam can bud med rnams mi 'dud/ /dngos
grub mi thob dam tshig nyams/ /tshe rabs kun tu brlag par 'gyur/ /'di ltar brtson par byed pa na/ /g.yon pa skyed pa rnam bzhi yis/ /skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
mtshams nyid du/ /dbyings phyug lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang / /dal bus dal bus rab bskul te/ /drag po'i tshig gi spro ba dang / /byang chub sems kyis pad+ma
dgang / /sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis/ /yum gyis blangs la gtso la mchod/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te/ /bsnyen pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil
'khor las/ /mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston/ /de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du/ /mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan/ /dus gsum
kun gyi gdung 'dzin la/ /g.yon phyogs bsten pa'i skal dang ldan/ /na tshod lo ni bcu drug pa/ /sdong po rul pa dag la dgyes/ /g.yas pa zung gyi spyan gyis gzigs/ /dril bu sgra snyan
'khrol la brtson/ /rdo rje rab tu sgrog byed ma/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa/ /brda dang bcas par gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma/ /byang
chub sems kyi sbyin chen gyis/ /mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes/ /sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa/ /dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /so so chags pa'i mdangs kyis
ni| |mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod/ /de nas gsang ba chen po dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te g.yon pa skyed pa mang po mnyes pa dang /
pad+ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so/ /chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba/ /'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen//
e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs pa/ mdangs bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring / /sku ni ldem la tsan+dan na dri/ /yan lag
lcug ma bzhin du mnyen/ /tshems dkar sum cu rnga rngo med/ /mgul pa zlum ring rab tu legs/ /gser la g.yu spras g.yas su 'khyil/ /gzungs ma 'di dag bsten par bya/ /
skad gdangs mi snyan ra ro po/ /yang na rmongs bag sub sub po/ /sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin/ /sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog /dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod/ /
phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can/ /de bsnyen na ni dngos grub nyams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la/ /rab tu 'phral te 'char ba yin/ /bden
gnyis so sor snang ba yis/ /yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas/ /kun tu bzang mo bsgoms pas grub/ /bud med la ni mchod bsten
na| |ye shes chen po grub par gsungs/ /dpal kun tu bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so/ /sngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na/ /rnal
'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin/ /de la mchod pa dam pa ni/ /sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste/ /kun tu khyab par kun tu sbyor/ /rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog /de byi dkar sham mdog dang ldan//
bcu drug bong tshod ring ba dang / /lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste/ /lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang / /dpral bar dbyes che kos ko phra/ /nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring / /yid tsam mig
dkyus ring ba dang / /so dkar thags bzang mtshams thung zhing / /skal bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste/ /'di la brtson par byed pa ni/ /
rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnas rab bden par rab brtags te/ /sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan/ /lus 'bring zlum pa cha
byad can/ /so dkar thags bzang mig dkyus ring / /skad phra mdog dgod spro ring ba/ /dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa/ /rma nag la sogs gnas pa ni/ /rtag
tu chos la 'dud pa yin/ /tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las/ /'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi/ /de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/ /
tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni/ /sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par
gsungs/ /bud med cha lugs legs pa ni/ /bod tshod mi ring lus phra zhing / /rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba/ /mig legs ngo zlum brtson dmar che/ /blun du chags pa mi
shes med/ /lus la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan/ /tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang / /so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan/ /chog shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang ba'i
mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od/ /rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na/ /'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /lus zlum
gtum pa nga rgyal can/ /khong na sems rnog sems la 'dzin/ /bya ba 'dra la mi gtong ldan/ /bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus che/ /mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir
gsal/ /sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dad/ /rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /pag chags yi ge tshar gcad cing / /ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na/ /sgrub pa'i dus la
bab pa ste/ /de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis/ /yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing / /bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na/ /rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni/ /tshe
'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis/ /'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs/ /rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na/ /snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan
pa'i| |rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po gsungs/ /shan pa'i rigs ngan smad 'tshong ma'i/ /na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams/ /'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /myur
du spyad na 'grub par gsungs/ /yi dwags gnod sbyin byol song dang / /khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs/ /mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun/ /so so 'tsham pa dga' spyad na/ /
las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs/ /rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog /rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel/ /zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston/ /grags pa can la
zhi ba che| |rtsen pa dag la rtsen par mdzad/ /thabs kyis mdzad pa kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams/ /'dul bar mdzad pa sna
tshogs kyis/ /mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med/ /shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad/ /shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis/ /grags pa can rnams
dbang du mdzad/ /shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis/ /chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad/ /e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos
rab tu brtson par mdzad pa/ yid kyi 'phro ba dang / zla gam med pa dang / gyad 'gyed pa dang / khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do/ /sha
mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur/ /stod smad phyed la smin dkyus ring / /pad+ma'i dri yang dung ltar 'phro/ /pad+ma legs pa gro bos 'dra/ /zlum la che chung snyoms pa 'o/ /sha mdog dkar
la sme ba can/ /stod smad phyed la sor mo ring / /nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste/ /dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru bro/ /mgul pa legs la ring thung ran/ /pad+ma dmar la mkhur tshogs
legs/ /spyan yang zlum la 'og nas lta/ /sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum/ /rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/ /rkang pa'i sor mo nang du skyor/ /lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms/ /
tshems kyang dmar la thags kyang dam/ /sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring / /dri yang tsan+dan dri ru bro/ /yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen/ /pad+ma ser la phra la ring / /spyan yang
phra la zur du gzigs/ /sha mdog nag la sme ba nag /sha yang nag la rtsub pa ste/ /skad mdangs mi snyan gnyis ra ro/ /rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo/ /nu mdog che la
nu ba sha la ring / /rkang pa sbom la sor mo thung / /gdong yang leb la sme ba 'thug /smin mthung la mig mi sdug /lus po sbom thung mjing pa thung / /pad+ma nag la yangs pa ste/ /
ba lang can gyi rigs zhes bya'o/ /gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal ba'i don ni/ rang dbang thob pa nga lo yang / /bcos su btub la lung nyan pa/ /skad gsal lta bas thag
chod pa| |spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms/ /yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gsal/ /sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag /dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba/ /tshig la rdzun gyi
gron theb med/ /dad pa skyo dang dub pa med/ /spyod pa blang zhing dor ba med/ /brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med/ /ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa/ /gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob/ /mig
'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing / /'og dang zur gyis rtogs par lta/ /dbu lo 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil/ /spyan bkra phra la dkyus ring ba/ /sna gzur zor la rgyud ma chad/ /ya yo
nyag dang chad pa med/ /so dkar sum cu thags bzang la/ /kos ko sogs bu yul gzungs 'dra/ /mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa/ /shed lan chag gang zlum pa dang / /
mgul ba zlum la phra la ring / /ngang mo bya yi tshul dang 'dra/ /sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang / /phyag gi sor mo phra la ring / /rna ba gro ba gcus pa 'dra/ /lce ni dar bltab khug pa bzhin/
dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra/ /gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med/ /kha snabs med la dri zhim pa/ /sna tshogs spos dri lus la bro/ /bskyod par mkhas shing las la dpa'/ /sbyor
drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig /pad+ma dam la spyod na dog /nu ma dag ni chung la sra/ /kha mchu srab la bzang ba'o/ /lha'i sbyor ba tsog bu/ mi'i gan rkyal/ ye
dwags zur gyis sbyor/ byol song kha sbub tu sbyor ro/ /gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi
bsre| dam bcas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan du sbyor ba byas na/ dam las 'das te/ mngal gyi srin bu kha dmar du skye'o/ /dam las ma
'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o/ /gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' mthun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the
tshom med do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /he ru ka rol pa las/ gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo /
ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni/ oM la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang sku la rdzogs so/ /de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes
lngar bstan to/ /a ltar snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ /zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes/ /rna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ /ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ /a las btags par
bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ yab yum rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar/ chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes pa'i ngang la skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan to/ /ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni/ phung
po lnga rigs lnga/ 'byung ba lnga yum lnga/ khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang sprul pa lcam dral/ phung po lnga he ru ka lnga/ 'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal
mo lnga| khams dang skye mched phra men ma bcu drug/ sgal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ ba spu nyag ma re re sprul pa'i phra men ma dang pho nya/ yan lag sgo ba bzhi/ sprul pa
thugs kyi rgyan te/ sngags ma hA yo ga'o/ /dkyil 'khor la yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar dgod do/ /sgo skyong yan chad rim bzhin du dgod/ ru lu lhar shes pa ni/ bcom
ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par shes par bya'o/ /ru lu mchod par shes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don
rtogs na/ ba dgra byang chub sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste/ 'grangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro/ /tshim pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /ru lu bsnyen par shes
pa ni| bsnyen pa ni/ dpal chen po'i sku'o/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni/ yum kro d+hi shwa ri'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ phra men ma bcu drug /sgrub pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar
bsgrubs pas 'bras bu drod rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro/ /'od kyi drod ni/ bdag sgrub par byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus la 'od byung ba ni/ drod dang po dang sbyar ro/ /'don
pa'i drod ni/ bdag sgrub par byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na/ drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro/ /drod kyi drod ni/ bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang
nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na/ tha ma dag sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dam par bsnyen pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang
po'o| |nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang mo'o/ /de la gnyis su med pa ni/ sgrub pa/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos la
'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshogs cir snang yang sgyu ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang / snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/ rgyu 'bras ro
gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/ thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par gnas pa ni/ lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems
zhes bya ste/ sgrub pa chen po'o/ /ru lu sgrar shes pa ni/ byi khung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o/ /ru lu dbyangs
su shes pa ni/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren stangs kyis/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho thugs dam bskul/ /rdo rje srin po ngur sgra yis/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/ /'khun
cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul/ /khong kun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis/ /ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul/ /mkhur ba dbugs kyi
rlung 'byin gyis/ /seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul/ /sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis/ /rdo rje tshig la skad gdangs med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi bzlas
pa 'di gsungs so/ /dam tshig ye shes dpal 'bar ma/ /oM ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngang / /ru ni gzi brjid 'phrul bo che/ /lu ni yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ /b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya
mtsho tshogs/ /ru lu gser phreng rgya mtsho ste/ /phar spros pas ni sku la thim/ /slar bsdus pas ni thugs la thim/ /oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga ba/ /paM las
pad+mar gyur pa'i dbus/ /ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /sha ta pa la sogs pa yi/ /bskul ba dag ni tshul bzhin du/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'o/ /sgrub pa dang ni
sgrub chen po/ /yum ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/ /dgyes mnyam
mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sku/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /gsung
gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung / /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /thugs kyi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs/
stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang badzra he ru kar byin gyis brlabs nas/ /badzra he ru ka'i dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /
stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang rat+na he rur byin gyis brlabs nas/ /rat+na he ru ka'i dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong
gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang pad+ma he rur byin brlabs nas/ /pad+ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong
gi 'jig rten na/ /byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang karma he rur byin brlabs nas/ /karma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig
rten na| |gnas rab gnas ni bsam mi khyab/ /dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog /bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog /yum gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen
nyid kyi gnas/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /zas rab zas ni bsam mi khyab/ /rdo rje dri chen zas kyi mchog /rdo rje ga bur zas kyi mchog /bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog /de
yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skom rab skom ni bsam mi khyab/ /rak+ta dri chu skom gyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skom/ /stong gsum
stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skyogs rab skyogs ni bsam mi khyab/ /ban+d+ha gsar snying skyogs kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skyogs/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /yab rab yab
ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun tu bzang po yab kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /yum rab yum ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mchog/
de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum/ /oM ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs/ /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung //
ru lu 'di ni gsung gi thugs/ /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs/ /skur gsal gsung gsal thugs kyi gsal/ /sku
don gsung don thugs kyi don/ /ru lur ma gyur gang yang med/ /stong khams thams cad ru lus bkang / /ru lu dngos grub dus 'dir gsol/ /
ru lu dngos su snang ba ni/ /de nyid ma skyes pa ni gsung / /snang ba dang ma byung ba gnyis su med pa ni/ thugs so/ /ru lu sku gsum gsung gsum thugs gsum dgu phrugs
kyi don to/ /oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ /oM ni/ dpal chen he ru ka yab yum mo/ /ru lu gong ma brgyad ni/ ke'u ri ma brgyad/ ru lu 'og ma brgyad ni/ sid+ha ma brgyad/ hUM ni/
sgo ba yab yum brgyad/ b+h+yo ni/ dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ hUM ni/ sdud pa byang chub sems/ lha re re la snying po grangs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /khro bo rnams ni/ kro d+ha
ni ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i ting 'dzin du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro gnyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM badzra b+h+ri ku Ti mahA kro d+ha ma/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM bruM/ bri bri/ bra ma ya
bra ma ya/ bi d+h+wa na sarba ba ra na sarba duSh+TAM/ ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hUM bri traM traM/ bri hUM traM traM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /pad+ma dza la mahA kro d+ha pad+ma pa mu ka kha kha/ sarba du Sh+TAM/ khA hi khA hi/

sarba dusta ba/ dusta na ma/ da ma da ma/ badzra sho da ka/ ta ma tha ma tha/ kro d+ha ko d+ha/ badzra kha ra tsa/ pa la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya mahA badzra pa da ba mu ka /pra ma pra ma hUM phaT/ ti ha
ha ti ha ti/ tsa tur mu ka /bi phran shan hUM hri/ hUM hUM hUM hri/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes kyi snying gnas

phyung ngo / /oM badzra be ga mahA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TA na/ sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra sa k+Sha hA na hA na hUM phata/ khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par
sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i
dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i keng rus khrag dang sha dang lud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pa rnams g.yogs te bsngams pa/ mi mgo'i phreng ba dbu
la 'dzin pa/ seng+ge dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byi ba dang /
gzig dang / stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga gnas phyung ste dkyil 'khor chen po'i
tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/ zhal rnam par bsnyen pa/ 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje mche ba cher gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo
chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro gnyer can mang po brgya stong
g.yog dang bcas par gnas so/ /nub phyogs su yang rta gdong khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/ /byang du yang 'ur 'ur chan po khro bo brgya
stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shin tu khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i
khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams thams cad snang bar
byas te| stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pa' Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho b+ho/ mahA ba re ba da ra ba/ mahA d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ gr-i ha gr-i ha/ ma ra ma ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ k+Shi kra na mahA
badzra tsaN+Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+TAM du ku /ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hUM phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po dbul bar byed pa rang gi sku nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi tshul du byed do/ /khro bo brgya stong mang po zhal rnam par bsnyer ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'khyil cing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs
bsnams pa/ zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku/ oM mahA badzra ang / ha sa ha sa/ ha ha ha hUM ha/ oM ti oM ma hA be ra ba be/ shing shing / tar tar tram traM/ ha ha i ti
de nas 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to/ /rdo rje he ru ka'i rol ba'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs
byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs
thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi brjid bskyed nas 'khor thams cad thul/ skyabs 'og tu yang btsud nas dam tshig la gnas
te yang dag par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad pas bzhad cing / oM badzra b+h+ra ku Ti/ ha na ha na/ grah+Na grah+Na/ ma ta
ma ta| ki na tsa ri ya/ si su ra ma hA sa/ sra ti re ke ba su ra dza la na la ra tshi pra ti dza li ta/ ma su ra ta/ A ka ta Ta/ A ka ta Ta/ a phya wa/ a phya wa/ kr-iSh+Na tsakra be ra brti

da ya na hUM bri/ de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags/ oM badzra sUr+ya b+h+ra ku Ti/ khro d+ha mahA kri te/ da ra pa da ra pa/ su ra du ra ti/ oM sa me dad ma ni tsa na/ oM bra bra bi baM ba/ de nas rta gdong
gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/ ba hri/ oM ma hA badzra ba da/ ba mu ka /kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tsa du ra mu khaM/ ba ba bi ba/ a ru ti ra ma/ ma kAr+ya hr-i da yan/ dra na/ da ma de'u/ badzra
ba daM pa mu ka /hi hi/ sha hi sha mahA she sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rta gad chen po mdzad cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta
bas gzigs te/ oM gu lu gu lu badzra mahA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ sha kra hr-i da yA na mahA badzra daMSh+TA ya/ hUM b+hak+Sha ya shriM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal
'byor pa rnams dang rol cing / rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad 'du bar mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do/ /oM mahA su rata/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ba saM har sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha /pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba

krod+ha uts+tshuSh+ma/ kro d+ha b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma dre le sta ma ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta praSh+Ta/ kro d+ha ma ba ya/ dzA la ya sha kra pA daM/ bai sha ra ma ye/ sha ra mahA/ b+ha ga b+han+d+ha/ su ra ti/ sarba ta

thA ga tA sA dA na/ sa ma ye na tsa hoH/ su ra ta/ sa ma i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM dza hUM baM hoH/ TAk+ki hUM dza hUM TAk+ki

hUM TAk+ki hUM/ oM ga ta she hUM dzaH/ A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ ba shaM ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha sa ma ya/ dza: hUM baM hoH/ TAk+ki hUMHdza dza: hUM/ TAk+ki hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po

'di phyung ngo / /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha mahA kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang mo phyung ngo / /oM badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ uts+tsha badzra a mr-i ta hUM AHde nas bcom ldan
'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun tu khros ta ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par sgrub pa'i rig

pa byung ngo / /oM a mr-i ta sa man tsi ba ni a mr-i ta su mu te/ pra ba sha ya sarbA na badzra/ pad+ma ma sa/ yo gi ni ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsi/ bi ta bi ti/ mur+t+ti ya/ rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo zhes bya
ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga tA mahA+e shwa ri sarba du Sh+TA/ su ta ni mahA prA la yAn/ sma shA na pi sha tsi/
mahA badzra kro d+ha daMSh+TA kA ra le bi kr-i ta/ de ba na/ sarba sha du bra maNi hUM hUM mahA kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di rnams phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum
pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / tho ba gcig khang pa dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / be con dang / mu su
dang | 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma dang / mda' dang / gzhu dang / shak+ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba mgul rgyan du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i
me'i 'od 'dra ba'o/ /de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o/ /oM badzra mahA d+ha ra/
mahA kro d+hi shwa ri/ mahA sma shA ni/ bi sha ni la dz+wa la ya/ mahA sa pra pra dz+wa la te/ mu ti da ra/ ka pA la mA la/ bu shid/ ma ku te/ ma ra ru d+hi/ ra dra ra pa/ tsi pu ri te/ ka pA la
ha ste| kha T+wAng+ga badzra/ tri shU la gan+d+ha/ mahA kro d+he/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ he he ru ta mu ta pra ye hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang ldan
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma nyid kyi khro bo nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hUM traM AH/ sUr+ya badzra kro d+hI shwa ri/
da ma da ma/ gra sa gra sa/ a sta ma hUM phaT/ aM hUM bra dra dra dra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen mo rab gtong zhing / /shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin
'bar| |dpung pa bcu drug rno ba che/ /dpung rgyan thod pa brtsegs pa byas/ /sbyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog /mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par brtson/ /gdug pa thams cad cha
byad cing / /yi dwags chen po stag la zhon/ /rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo'i khro mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hrIHbadzra pad+ma ba mu ke/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA mo ho da ri/ bi go
be hUM| he hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM trAM ha/ sha ti sha ma tha ba/ badzra pa da pa na la ma hoH/ te to hUM hUM hi hi hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /'di ni rgyab tu gzhag bar bya/ /rno ba chen po
zhal gsum pa/ /rta gdong gyen du ston pa che/ /khro bo chen po dpung bcu drug /rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gtong / /mi lto stan la yang dag zhon/ /khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa//
mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pa brtsams/ /'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / /g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhugs/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje khro bo gnyis su med pa'i 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros

pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba a mo g+ha mahA byi shwi shwa ri/ hUM hUM haM haM haM mahA kro d+hi gra ma khe/ mahA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ri Ni/
sarba duSh+Ta pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du/ /g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag bya ste/ /
sna tshogs pa dang khyad par ldan/ /kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /bskyed pa dang ni bcum pa'i gdong / /rab tu drag po'i ro byang zhing / /gdong gnyer thod pas rtse mo
byas| |dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ /khro mo chen mo gdong gsum la/ /za byed me bzhin lta ba yi/ /de yi ri po thams cad kyi/ /g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang / /rang
gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan/ /dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /de ni cho ga ji bzhin du/ /'byung po phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor
ma tshogs rnams/ /de dag kun du yongs su bskor/ /gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / /de ni de yi stan la gnas/ /bzhin mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo/ /gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur
bcas| |de la sogs pa ri ma par ldan/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

las byung ngo / /oM sarba badzra d+ha ra a nu rA gi nI mahA ti sha traM hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra A kaR+Sha Ni/ mahA kro d+hI shwa ri hUM dza: dza: dza: hUM hUM hUM/ oM badzra d+ha ra ku la ma nu rA gi nI mahA badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hUM

nya haM phaT hoH/ /oM sarba badzra d+ha ro gra mahA kro d+ha hUM sa sa hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hi ha tsa a pe sha ka hUM hUM hUM/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ti ka ro ke dra tha ta tha/ oM sarba badzra d+ha

ra mahA badzra he ru ka mahA kro d+hI shwa ri/ ma hA bi tsa yo tsa ra ba ye/ hUM hUM hUM druM druM draM draM tha/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha a ta ha si ni/ hUM hUM driM driM tro ta ya tro ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra

d+ha ra mahA badzra kro d+ha b+hak+Sha ni hUM hUM hUM/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hUM hrIH/ oM sarba badzra mahA badzra d+ha ra badzra ti k+Sha na kro d+hi shwa ri/ tshin+d+ha/ hUM badzra tik+Sh+Na haste/ ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ hUM hUM ma tha ma tha/

oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra kro d+ha ri ni/ hUM mahA gra du bI ni/ hUM hUM pa ta ya pa ta ya/ ma hA badzra tsa kreN tsa kraN tsU r+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA ke ra bA tsa ni hUM hUM hUM/ ma ta ma ta/
oM sarba badzra mahA d+ha ra mi ta pi sha mu kha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM sarba badzra mahA d+ha ra ma ya ba de/ hu du haM haM haM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA

badzra ya k+Shi ni hUM hUM/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a pi ba bI hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra pa ni di ni mahA kro d+hi bin+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya/ bi d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ha da ni/

mahA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra kro d+hi mA la ni/ hUM hUM/ gruM gruM gruM/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra kro d+ha gan+d+ha gra sa ni/ hUM hUM gruM gruM/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ri mahA kro d+hI
shwa ri mahA ma hoH/ kA la d+ha ri Ni ti pa ya/ ho da ho da/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+hI shwa ri mahA lA se hUM/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri mA le d+ha ra Ni hUM/ oM sarba

badzra d+ha ra d+ha ra mahA kro d+hI ga ti ni hUM hUM he he/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri ni ri te ke hUM/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha mahA ka ra shi na/ dza: dza: hUM hUM dzaH/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA

kro d+ha d+ha ra mahA badzra pA sha hUM hUM hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra kro d+he/ ban+d+he ban+d+he ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya hUM baM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he pa she hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho/ oM hUM traM hri hA/
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra d+ha ra/ oM badzra kro d+ha

g+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha TAk+ki ni/ mahA he ma pa ti pa hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni ku mA ri ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni dra sha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA badzre muSh+Ti ni/

bid+ya bid+ya/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba TAk+ki ni mahA badzra kro d+ha ra li hUM phaT/ oM sarba TAk+ki ni mahA badzra kro d+ha tsakra Ni/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra TIk+ki ni mahA mi thod pa ti ke

hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni se mya kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra TIk+ki ni mahA badzra d+ha na te hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA ma ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA a mr-i ta ka pA li haste hUM phaT/

oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA se mya kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ti mr-i tu daN+Da ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni badzra TIk+ki ni badzra sri ga li hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni pi pa pi pa ru d+hi ra ma ma hA badzra pa li hUM phaT/ oM

badzra TAk+ki ni mahA badzra pA sha pa pa shak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA badzra sha ni pi phe hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA badzra pi she hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni A na ya A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra

TAk+ki ni mahA badzra be ka ni gu gu ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni badzra dzra la ya/ b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA badzra mi ka te hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA badzra ha ste hUM phaT/ oM badzra

TAk+ki ni mahA badzra ke li pra be sha pra be sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA su maM sA sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA ka ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA ka ra sha ni mi ta ka la mu ki hUM dza:
dza: hUM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni ya bi sha ni hUM phaT/ khro bo spyi'i bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM ba hUM bi bi te ro/ dra san+ti ta/ yi ni she she/ sarba bi dA na

ya| sarba ta thA ga ta dza le dza le/ pra dza le pra dza le/ gur bi gur bi/ k+Sha ma sarba ma ba pra ni b+h+yo hUM hUM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ bsnyen pa'i grangs brgya dang / stong dang / 'bum mo/ /bcom
ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las/ gsang ba'i khro bo'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bzhi po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rol pa
rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lnga bcu rtsa gcig /phyag brgya rtsa gnyis

pa phyung ste/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA ban+te/ baM baM phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mahA do sha na sa ye hUM phaT/ a a/ oM badzra mahA rak+Sha sa ma su ru ti/ ra ma ti da pri ya/ mahA ku m+pa ka ru na/ hUM

hUM hUM hUM/ k+Sha oM badzra mahA rak+Sha /a gat+ta ya/ bra be sha ya/ bra be sha ya/ sarba badzra ga la/ ba sha ni ban+d+ha/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra rak+Sha ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ bi sha ya bi sha ya/ bi bi sha na
sarbA na/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA ra sha sa/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ sarba mahA bi kr-i ta nan/ dasha grI ba hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka'i sprul pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /smug nag sngo nag /hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM

hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT
phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT/ zhal re re nas hUM dang phaT kyi
sgra mang po phyung bas/ khro bo 'bum dus gcig tu phyung ste/ hUM dang phaT kyi sgra mang po 'byin cing 'jig rten gyi khams dus gcig tu gang bar gyur te/ dregs pa thams cad brgyal
bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma dang mkha' 'gro ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings nas
bzhengs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ma mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo dbyings nas bzhengs/ /khyod ni ye shes lha mo 'bum gyi gtso/ /zhing lpags rlon pas sa
gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma/ /zhing chen rlon pas g.yang gzhi ral pa can/ /gzig lpags rlon pa stong gis sku smad bklubs/ /sbrul nag 'bum gyis yan lag rgyan du bsgril/ /
thod rlon thod skam thod tshal mgur chu dpung rgyan se ral kha/ /khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yas pa las/ /ye shes lha mo tshogs ni brgya yang
'tsher| |khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yon pa la/ /las byed lha mo brgyad cu gnas/ /nyin zhing rgya mtsho gting nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /klu rgyal 'bum gyis dkris
shing mchod pa 'bul/ /mtshan zhing ri rab rtse la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /gnod sbyin bu mo khyod kyi pho nyar gtong / /bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag tu gnon/ /gshed
ma don du gnyer zhing dgra snying tshal par 'gas/ /gsur chen dud pas 'jig rten ma lus 'gengs/ /sha chen ro la rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du stob/ /rang yang za
zhing grogs la bdar bar byed/ /ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la/ /las la 'khril zhing chos kyi dbyings su bsten/ /mkha' 'gro za byed mgyogs
ma gshog pa can/ /mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can/ /mkha' 'gro rngam pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba can/ /mkha' 'gro 'byung ba 'dzin pa'i sder mo can/ /mkha'
'gro khams gsum rdub pa'i mchu ring ma/ /mkha' 'gro dug gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sku/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma/ /don gyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes
yum| |de nas mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las byed par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol ba ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis
su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting nge 'dzin du mdzad do/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum las skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar te bdud ru tra nag po sems can
dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
phyung ngo / /til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bskus pa'i rdo rje mche ba can dang / nag mo mi thod thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ba can dang / rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang / mgo bo
cod pan legs spras rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / lag na mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang / dgra bgegs dbang du sdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul zlog ma dang / sbrul gyi ska rags dur khrod
zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thogs ma dang / zhing lpags rked pa dkris shing khrag gis myos ma dang / mig rtsa dmar po gyur pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / mtshan mo dur khrod
du rgyu ba'i 'byung mo sgrol ma dang / ko rlon smad dkris thod pa se ral khar thogs ma dang / mi ro rgyu ma tshems kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang / khrag gi thig les brgyan
pa'i rdo rje bri tshor ma dang / zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / rdo rje zhag gi tshom bu can chen mo dang / rdo rje mi ro sha la chem che ma za
ba'i rdo rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang / dag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang / ma mo skrag par byed pa'i khams gsum dbang du sdud ma dang / zhing la skem par byed pa'i
rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang / nag mo lus mdog nag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'phro ba mo dang / zas su khrag tshil za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang / kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa
dang | zas su sha rlon za ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang / e ma ma tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang / dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang / kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skem ma
dang | lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi bya khrag
khyung gi g.yu mig can dang / thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje byugs ma dang / rdo rje ral gcig chen mo za byed ma dang / rdo rje shU la thogs pa'i zhag gi tshom bu can dang
tsham ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang / rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang / cir yang 'gyur
ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrad rnal 'byor sngo nag chen mo dang / mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa 'khyil ma dang / thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsa la dang / dbu gsum
phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang / stir chung du mang po brgyus nas brgyan te rdo rje brjid ma dang / tsham ngam brkyang bskum rdo rje'i 'jig rten skrag ma dang / bdud

bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje b+han+d+har ldan pa dang / stir chen glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rnge'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang / log
par lta ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang / ro la rngam pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang /gsod cing sbyod pa'i rnal 'byor sngo nag ma dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrad rdo rje mche gtsigs ma dang /
tsham ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shUl mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gengs ma dang / dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rdeb ma dang / 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag
'jigs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang / tsham ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stags tshul can ma dang / rnal
'byor mthing nag rdo rje stir chen za ba mo dang / bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa klad 'gems ma dang / gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang ma dang / khro gnyer
'jigs pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang / rdo rje tri shUl rnge'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdeb ma dang / 'ching zhing sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang /
gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba mo dang / zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje tsham ngam can dang / sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje mthing nag dang / spyan bgrad mche gtsigs rdo rje
chen mo dang / sti ra 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stob ma dang / spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje b+han+dar ldan ma dang / zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wAM ga 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za mo
dang / ro la bskam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen mo dang / rdo rje ser nag seng+ge mgo can dang / mche gtsigs spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje sdang mig can dang / mche tshogs mang pos bskor
ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang 'joms ma dang / mthing nag rdo rje seng+ge ral pa can dang / rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma dang / srog chags
mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rje klad 'gems ma dang / dmar mo chen mo sti ra mgo can dang / ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar
thogs ma dang / bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang / b+han+da rak+tas bkang nas gtso la stob cing dgra sdang klad 'gems ma dang / gsod byed sngo nag
dur bya'i mdo can dang / mche tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang / thal chen rak+tas rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang / spu gri mgo gcod b+han+d+ha
'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang / rdo rje zhags pa 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stob pa dang / mthing nag 'gying stabs rdo rje shwa na khyi mgo can dang / glo snying 'dren pa'i
rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang / phrag dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang / dmar nag 'gying ba'i bya rgod mgo can dang / zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms par byed ma
dang | gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang / ser nag 'gying ba'i pho rog mgo can dang / klu rnams 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang /
mthing nag 'gying ba bya rog mgo can dang / ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang / lcags kyu 'dren pa'i mi 'jigs sbyor
ba dang / rdo rje bka'i pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang / rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / snying rje phag gi mgo can dang /
rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gzigs gi mgo can dang / rdo rje byi ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje pha wang mgo can dang / rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje dom gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje
sbig pa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje wa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spyang ki'i mgo can dang / rdo rje
pu shud kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje skyin gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rnga mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang /
rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang / rdo rje ske ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje kha'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spre'u mgo can dang / rdo rje khu byug mgo can dang / rdo rje seng+ge'i mgo can dang / rdo rje
pha wang gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sha pa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje srin bya'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sre mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje zer mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje dmag pa thang gog gi mgo

can dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zhags pa can dang / rdo rje me lce glog phreng 'dzin dang / rdo rje srin mo mdung 'phen pa dang / rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje klu mo thog 'bebs mo dang / rdo rje
'jigs byed ba lang gi sna dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung ma dang / rdo rje lag na khrag thogs ma dang / rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang / rdo rje dam tshig srung ma dpal phreng
ma dang / rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang / rdo rje ri rab snyil ba'i rngam stangs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin tu mi srun ma dang / rdo rje cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul
