can chen mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje smug nag gtibs pa'i med dbal can dang / rdo rje keng rus 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma shin tu

gad rgyangs chen mo dang / rdo rje nang grol 'dren ma kang+ka'i mgo can ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje

sgrol ma dang / rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shan pa spu gri rnon pa'i so can dang / rdo rje go cha sra bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang / rdo rje 'ur

'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkan sgra rdeb pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang / rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang / rdo rje zhing chen

khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan pa dang / rdo rje drag po'i nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang / rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang / rdo rje seng+ge stabs su mchod pa'i nga rgyal can dang /

rdo rje sprul pa mang po 'gyed pa'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje stir gnas nyul bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs nyul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje phyi nang mtshams nyul ma

bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khra khri sgyigs can dang / rdo rje bya'i sbyor nyul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dur
khrod ro za 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma dang / rdo rje ser mo sbrul gyi ska rags can dang / rdo rje gnam lcags

'ur mo thog 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje rgyal byed sngags par byed ma dang / rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang / rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang / rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong
bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma dang / rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro chen mo dang / rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang / rdo rje skus rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma

dang / rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul mnga' ba chen mo dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang / rdo rje rin chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang /

rdo rje pad+mo dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing stan byed ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje tsher ma dang / rdo rje myong ma dang / rdo rje rig

byed kun la 'khyams dang / rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje sngo nag ral pa can chen mo dang / rdo rje ljang nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang / rdo rje ba lang gi mgo

can ma dang / rdo rje ser nag dbu bco lnga ma dang / rdo rje smug nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje ser ma dbu gcig ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dbu lnga ma dang /

rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje snye mas ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje ser mo bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo bya khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /

rdo rje mda' bsnyag ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje skul byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje rdzod byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje 'jigs

byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje 'phrog ma brlag byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje yid

'phrog ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje phrag 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje tshe 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje srin mo snying zan

ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje skul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje rkan 'jib ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can

dang | rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang / rdo rje sgrub pa tshe 'dzin ma bya khra khyi sgrigs can dang / rdo rje thod rlon dang sbrul nag 'khyil ba can dang / rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu

srin smad g.yogs can dang / rdo rje za byed kha 'bar ma dang / rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang / rdo rje khra dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje bya rgod chen mo dang / rdo rje byin lag dang / rdo rje kang+ka'i lus la chu srin gyi
mgo can dang / rdo rje gshog pa gtams pa dang / rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje mchu ste gcig ma'i gdong can dang / rdo rje so gri can dang / rdo rje kha gdangs
ma dang / rdo rje karma mud ka ra dang / rdo rje 'jigs par byed par byed pa'i gzugs can dang / rdo rje smigs bu'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba'i 'dun

pa mo dang / rdo rje myos pa mo dang / rdo rje dra ba mo dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje dang ba mo dang / rdo rje kha spu can dang / rdo rje ral gri spu can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi pags

pa can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi kha sbu can dang / rdo rje ka li pi ka'i dbyings can dang / rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang /

rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ched du 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu gtogs pa'i chos dang / rdo

rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro'i tshogs dang / rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang / rdo rje khro mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gos

gyon pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bza' btung gi tshogs dang / rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje klu mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dbye bar byed ma'i

tshogs dang / rdo rje pad+mo phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprin sdud ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje

nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje zhing 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nga rgyal
can kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje thim par byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'khor lo ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad+mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khro bo'i
tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bka' nyan sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje spyod pas ci la'ang thogs pa

med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sdug bsngal sel bar

byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sems ma ye shes snang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms las med

pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyid lug med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje the tshom med par sgrub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i
tshogs dang / rdo rje rnam par spros ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bstan pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs

dang / rdo rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdul ba mo'i dgongs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i
tshogs dang / rdo rje gab pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs

dang / rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje drang snang mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rang byung mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun
tu mang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun bzang longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rmongs par byed pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje srog za

bar byed pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje za mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshil za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bsod nams gter 'chang ba'i tshogs

dang / rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgra mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yon tan 'phrin las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje
sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyu las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gtum bag can dang / rdo rje gdug pa gtong pa sbrul gyi chun po can dang / rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad
pa dang / rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo gcig pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus sna tshogs dang / rdo rje yan lag
'bum yod pa dang / rdo rje gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo stong yod pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo brgya pa dang / rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig pa dang /

mgo brgyad pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang / mgo dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi yang sprul gyi pho nya ni/ lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang / long ba rgyab sgrel ba dang / nag po mgo dgu

pa'o| |shar gyi dkar mo sbyang dung gi khyi mo chen mo dang / lho'i sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang / nub kyi dmar mo zangs kyi mche ba can dang / byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang / 'di rnams kyi pho nya mo

ni| shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang / lho'i nag mo dung gdub ma dang / nub kyi dmar mo seng+ge'i mgo can dang / byang gi ser mo las kyi bdag mo dang / rdo rje rus chen phreng ba can dang / rdo rje zangs

kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje ral gri'i so can dang / rdo rje nam mkha'i gung gcod ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhon ma dang / rdo rje chu bo'i gzhung 'dral ma dang / rdo rje
rgya mtsho'i gting dkrug ma dang / 'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ sna tshogs pa'o/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /drag byed de bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so/ /oM hUM/ pho nya sum brgya drug cu rnams/ /yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing / /yud
tsam gyis ni phyogs bcur 'phro/ /hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / /bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po ldir/ /mgo gsum po la lcags sder can/ /mi sha za ba'i bdud dpung 'joms/ /bltas pas
bdud rnams tshig byed cing / /klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms/ /rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni/ /'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis
las 'phros/ /mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan/ /glog 'gyu ma dang 'dra bar grags/ /chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud/ /ye shes thugs rjes 'brel bas kun la khyab/ /'phrin
las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis grol/ /de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma/ /oM dz+wa la badzra hUM/ /ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod/ /skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye gsal byed//
'phrin las glog 'gyus 'gro ba yid kyis sgrol/ /dra bas sdud la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren/ /badzra a ma ka hUM/ /'od zer dud ka 'phro ba ni/ /hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / /bskal pa'i
'brug sgra chen po bzhin/ /kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs/ /mig gsum po la lcags sder can/ /mgo gsum po la rkang gsum pa/ /mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms/ /bltas pas

bdud rnams tshig byed cing / /klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms/ /'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste/ /ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing / /gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi/ /khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig/

na mo bya ci ri b+h+yo/ /ha ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ /mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po/ /lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad/ /lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /rta mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms/ /mgo drug po la

rkang drug bo/ /lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod/ /rkang pa gsum ni phur bu 'dril/ /g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin/ /gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag /'od zer dud kas reg pa ni/
tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig /lag pa g.yon pas bskyod pa ni/ /phra men 'khor bcas ral pa 'bar/ /lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing / /zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro/ /byang gi phyogs nas

'byung ba ni/ /lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po/ /lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig /spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra/ /bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs/ /skad ni 'brug pas shin tu che/ /rab tu mi srun 'di
dag ni| |phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog /mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po/ /lus kyang nag la 'od phung nag /yan lag nag la sbrul gyis brgyan/ /ral pa nag cing mche ba nag /mig kyang nag la lag
nag po| |mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med/ /'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas/ /las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ /long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang / /maM sa za
zhing ri lu sgrol/ /mig kyang med la cang mi smra/ /yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro/ /'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub par byed/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /dung gi
khyi mo chen mo la/ /dung gi ba lang sna khrid can/ /dung gi mi mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs/ /lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa//
lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la/ /lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs/ /nub kyi phyogs na 'gugs pa ni/ /zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo la/ /zangs kyi ma mo chen
mo zhon| |lag na lcags sgrog sgril ma thogs/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la/ /gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon/ /lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril/ /'di
yang dpal gyi pho nya ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor
'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ /dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa/ /sku mdog mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa zhig dgod/ /
shar du rdo rje til mar dgod/ /lho ru stag gi mgo can dgod/ /nub tu g.yag gi mgo can dgod/ /byang du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod/ /de'i phyi rim pad+ma la brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum
la pho nya sum brgya bcu dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi/ pho nya las byed bzhi dgod do/ /ci bgyi dang / bka' nyan dang / bka'i
pho nya dang / sprul pa dang / yang sprul pa dang / 'di rnams yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las
rdo rje pho nya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo / /bdag
med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa/ /thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol/ /yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las/ /'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro/ /gnyis
med dag las 'phrin las snying rje snyoms/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing / /brda can yan lag len pa'i don go
la| |lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel/ /bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum/ /lung
gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya/ /spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phub la/ /bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa bcad de/ /khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i
gnyer gyis bshad/ /'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung / /zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo sde zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal
rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ lung gsum gyis sna drangs te rnge'u bya'o/ /man ngag gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to/ /spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi
spyi gcad do/ /spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub bo/ /bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcom mo/ /rtsis mgo drug gis sa bcad do/ /khro bo rtog pa mtshan
ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni/ gol sa dang / sgrib pa spang ngo / /yon tan kun rngam pas brjid gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan to/ /rgyal po yin pa'i rtags
ni| rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal por gsol lo/ /lung gis spyi dril de bshad do/ /de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas/ /da ni phye byang ngo bstan te gses nas bshad pa de la lung gsum ni/ zhi
gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra/ /lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram/ /gdod bcas don dang bstun de 'tsham par bshad/ /ting 'dzin shes rab bka'
lung gsum du nges/ /de la man ngag gsum ni/ bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong / /yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs/ /yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/
nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag /de la spyi don gsum ni/ med rgyu btag chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snang / /spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dbal sos 'dul/ /rtog 'joms sman

rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu/ /'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad/ /de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni/ gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro/ /gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste/ /ngag khro shugs khro bar bcas
dang bcas so/ /rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang / /gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas/ /las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa 'o/ /las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras bu sku gsung
thugs| |ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni/ /dus gsum mi yong sha rus khrag la rol/ /gang gi ro ni hUM dang ha he phaT/ /gnas na lta 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs/ /bskyed thabs cho 'phrul
gsum po khro bo'i sku/ /'bras bu dpal chen phra men tshogs kyis bskor/ /phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad/ /de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni/ /tsham ngam drag pos lha chen 'dar 'gyel
brdzis| |brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig /dug gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za/ /rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs/ /rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu
ldan pa dang / /dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang / /ye shes dang ni nan tan dang / /drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro/ /de la dbang ni/ chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal
phrag dog ni/ /mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul/ /dran med thod pa kham por g.yang gzhi ni/ /kha dang rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen gnon/ /dal dpal drug ni/ byams las
khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs/ /smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs/ /gzhan don mdzad pas bdag
don lhun gyis grub/ /yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal/ /khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin/ /de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni/ bsam gyi
mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba/ /bka' khyab sprin bdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun/ /ting 'dzin bsam yas bo d+his thogs
pa de| |bsam yas bsam khyab mkhas la gza' skar gsal/ /klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa/ /mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang / /dug lngas gdos bcas 'du byed
brgyan byas pa/ /khrag sprul g.yang gzhi khra ta dregs pa 'joms/ /de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni/ mi thud bus pa'i gzugs 'dra la/ /a go la ni rkang lag gtams/ /drang srong
khros pa'i cha byad la/ /shin tu mkhrang zhing skem lpags bri/ /gnod sbyin snying bags mi mthun gzugs dang ni/ /'dul dbang yi dwags srin po drang srong 'dra/ /de la grags pa ni/ bud+d+hi
bo d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs/ /gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags/ /de la ye shes ni/ rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral/ /'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen
'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das/ /gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang / /mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin/ /de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas
'du| |nan tan 'phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don/ /bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson/ /nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya/ /da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad
do| |de yang mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung dang / che mchog yon tan gyi lung dang / yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do/ /de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i
rgyan zhes bya/ /bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung / /stag ni dpa' rtun za byed rgyan zhes pa/ /ye shes thugs rje'i 'phrin las ngang du bstan/ /sbrul ni gnyen lcug 'phrin
las rgyan zhes pa/ /'jigs tshul dug gnon 'khrul pa yum gyi rgyan/ /thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa/ /sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang 'chang sgrol/ /g.yang
gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa/ /byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya/ /rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa/ /mi rtog dbyings nas thugs
rje spyan| |gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa/ /bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od/ /thal ba 'dul byed 'phrin las rgyan zhes pa/ /yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog/
me ni 'bar 'phro 'du sreg klong dkyil zhes/ /ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul 'phrin las te/ /zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya/ /me sgra sgra chen tha dang sgra zhes bya//
chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa/ /ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni/ /de nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro/ /sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya/ /'dul dbang
mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpog /ces bya'o/ /de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni/ gong du bshad par zad do/ /de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang
ma nges bar 'byung ste/ gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub bo/ /zhes bshad do/ /de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang / /de la dngos byung phyag rgya rnams/ /nges pa med par dpa' bos
bshad| |mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub/ /ces 'byung ngo / /'o na yang 'di'i gnas skabs su he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de/ de yang yan lag
rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so/ /de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsung thugs lhun grub//
lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags/ /spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu/ /bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa/ /rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' yangs
dbu ma'i spyan/ /shangs gsum srog la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum/ /de bzhin nyid du kun tu snang zhes bya/ /sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan/ /zhal gsum rnam thar
sgo gsum lhun gyis grub/ /ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags/ /mche bzhi 'phrin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul/ /ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste/ /pha rol
phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob/ /de la mdzad pa rtags zhes bya ba ni/ /spyan dgu sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs/ /spyan gsum
srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen/ /shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs/ /snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan/ /dbug sum srid gsum
mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs/ /zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad bar rdub/ /ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs/ /khams gsum nyug byed
rdo rje srin mo lce/ /mche bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad/ /phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don/ /phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro
don mdzad/ /zhabs bzhir 'phrin las rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol/ /yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag bshad/ /rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni/ /rang bzhin mi 'gyur
las ni 'bigs shing 'joms/ /chos sku rdo rje tog dang bag chags bsregs/ /ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya/ /b+han+d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni/ /chos dbyings spros med ye
shes bzhi dang ldan/ /ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen khrag thugs rje skye/ /mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog /kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dug gsum dga'
byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms/ /stong gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags/ /kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud/ /zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni/ /
'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud/ /sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' 'gro tshim par byed/ /rdeg pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig /rtog pa chos nyid dran
med shes lnga gzung / /ji ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya/ /thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni/ /nyon mongs thab thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing / /ye shes chos
dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags/ /thabs kyis sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro/ /brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa/ /yul med ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la/ /'dzin pa bdag med
rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs/ /gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed/ /'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan/ /pad+ma
'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan/ /mi bzad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod//
rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad/ /dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams/ /rang gnyer las kyi brda tsam chos sku rtogs par bstan/ /de la
'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril te bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid la 'phrin las kyi rngom sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni/ de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam
mkha'i ri mo phyag rgyar rngom/ /cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom/ zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ tsham dam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi'o/ /de yang kun rdzob rang
bzhin med pa la nam mkha' la sprin dra ba'i tshul dang / lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang / smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis
gnon pa dri med pad+ma nyi zla 'od yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang / stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang / rnam pa ni/ 'og nas 'chad do/ /gsung gi
rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/ zla gam cir yang 'gyur pa'i ljags rngom/ skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i
dbyangs rngom pa'o/ /de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus
byas dang / rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs
pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do/ /thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin
phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ 'phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dpa' rlabs ltar rngom/ /yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom/ mdzad pa rol me rgyan gyi gar
thabs ltar rngom pa'o/ /de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni/ rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o/ /lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang /
zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas
kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i tshul lo/ /mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngom/ lha chen gnon
pa'i gdan rngom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom/ /rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/ de yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang /
gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu
bcom pa'i tshul lo/ /rngom tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad do/ /de la brjid chen po la/ sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che/ bkur
'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o/ /de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che/ thugs rje dang mnyam
par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags/ sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang / smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang mthun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham//
spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong / rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ 'phrin las kyi sgo nas yid
dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bzhi la/ gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid che/ khyad zhugs
yon tan mthong bas brjid che/ de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che/ sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang / sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas myur/ nye bar bsgyur
ba'i sgo nas the tshom gcod/ byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/ thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston/ shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/ tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo
nas 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/ thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin
pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o/ /de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ spang blang med pa'i sgo nas re dogs
med| lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mang gsal/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor
ba ji srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sel/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi brjid bzhi la/ med pa zad mi
shes pas brjid che/ gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che'o/ /de yang bdag
tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig/ sems kyi sgo nas 'dod rgur ston/ sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor/ grub pa rgyu'i sgo
nas phan par mdzad/ shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/ 'phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi mnyel nyams phag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor ba
yun ring mi mnyel bas brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o/ /de yang sgyu mar gyur ba'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ rang
bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol/ /spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ /mthu'i sgo nas mgon skyabs che/ dam bcas
pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun tu mdzad/ rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs/ /nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub/ brjid nyi shu dang / sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug cu pa'o/ /de
la rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur re/ /bcun mo rin po ches ni/ yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par
dbul lo/ /dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so/ /khyim bdag rin po ches tshad med pa bzhi'i rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to/ /glang po rin po che'i
stobs bcus pha rol tu bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do/ /rta rin po ches myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas sleb par byed do/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu
rin po che'i rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi re 'dod skong ngo / /lung rnam pa gsum ni/ mi 'da' brgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bar zad/ de nas
'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcu ni/ skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad ba/ /lha mi sdig sbrul mche ba bzhi ru ston/ /yo byad brid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni/ /rtog pa
gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol/ /ji ltar mos bzhin 'dod rgu gzugs ston pa/ /gar dbang 'thad dga'i tshul du rol pa mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas phra
men 'phro/ /lus ni ci rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston/ /gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sgrogs pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mche ba zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston/ /shes rab thabs
ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang / /dbyangs las ma g.yos cir yang sa le mkhyen/ /sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dang 'phro/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad/ /rdo rje
sder mo pags pa spu phreng rgyan/ /'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang / /lta ba rnam bzhi spyan zur gyis bskul bas/ /phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad/ /
smon lam dbang gis drag po'i skur ston pa/ /dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med/ /de la btsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni/ ma chags rdo rje gzugs kyi yum gyis
'khyud/ /zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor/ /thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis bskyod/ /lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'bebs/ /
'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste/ /bde ba chen po'i sku la mnyes par dbul/ /dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgu ni/ bsgregs pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul/ /nyam nga
med pa'i mdza' spyod dpa' bo'i tshul/ /gdug rtsub gdos bcas brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /log par lta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul/ /rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs
bzhad pa'i tshul/ /shin tu gdul dka' la khro snying rje'i tshul/ /smon lam dbang gis mi shom rngam pa'i tshul/ /nyon mongs grub pa'i gyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul/ /khro drag
dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul/ /de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang / /bsod nams snying rje
bdag nyid che/ /bsgral zhing bstabs pa dga' ba'i mchog /yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so/ /de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/ thugs rje chen po'i stobs ni
dregs chen bsnyengs phyir gnon/ /chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog /mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /ma spangs stobs ni gdos bcas
sku la brgyan/ /ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i rgyan/ /smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad/ /sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan phra men 'phro/ /phrag
dog log lta 'khor bar gcig mi gtong / /'dod chags yud tsam 'phral 'dod spyan mdog dmar/ /de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ /chos dbyings med
bzhin cir snang ba/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par bkram/ /ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa/ /mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong / /
tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du bdal/ /sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni/ /rol gcig car
'bab snod bye brag phye/ /de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skong / /mi zad bdag nyid gter chen nam mkha'i mdog/ srid gsum mun
nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron/ /dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin chen phreng / /lung gsum ni/ rtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no/ /da ni/ lha rgyud kyi rtog pa so sor bshad par bya ste/
'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa/ /shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston/ gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa/ /gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha
he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms/ /thabs 'dzin mchod pa'i dngos po bshig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa/ /zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru ka/ rin
chen dbyig ltar kun skong zhing / /bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru/ /nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa/ /nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam
du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing / /lhag mthong me chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg /'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa/ /'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka /
'phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod/ /phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa/ /phrag dog rdo rje karma he
ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag /phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchong pas mnyes mdzad cing //
chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i
mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /sra brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam
par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /lhag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /sbyin pas
mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /bdag med zhi gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/ /'phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs
mi dmigs shing / /bzod pas mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / /thogs med las la dbang bskur khro mo rgyal//
thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs/ /'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yang dbyug to can/ /dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs/ /srid gsum
'joms byed dbyug thogs gau ri ma/ /sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs/ /mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel/ /bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la
gzigs/ /dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tsau ri ma/ /gsung gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs pa'i tshogs/ /dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yong chu srin ni/ /mi gnas
rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta/ /stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo ha/ /thal bar byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs/ /kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin/ /sa
dgu rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs/ /'jig rten thal byed rnge'u thogs bai tA li/ /'byed med shes rab mi rtog lbos mo'i tshogs/ /'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching
zhing dbang 'dren las/ /khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol/ /bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka si/ /zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs//
myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i/ /thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs/ /snod bcud dkrugs nas skong mdzad g+hasma ri/ /chags pa'i tshul gyis
don mdzad sme sha can/ /ma ni rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags/ /mtha' gnyis spangs pas rnam par g.yeng tshul bzhugs/ /'bar ba stong gsum stobs byed tsaN+Da
li| |thams cad 'byung ba'i lhun 'gyur ma tshogs ma/ /kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po 'dzin/ /kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang
ldan/ /thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni/ /'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum/ /gnyen po stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /shes rab thabs
ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don/ /sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sing+ga ma/ /dpa' brtul za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las/ /brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang
'gro don du/ /thugs rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs/ /nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya khra ma/ /mdzes byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum/ /thabs mkhas
spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad/ /don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la gtad/ /'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma/ /mi ma byed spyong pas mchog rigs
kyi yum/ /g.yar ba'i 'phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srung / /chos nying sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs/ /phrag don las grub za byed shwa na ma/ /yid kyi ye shes
so so kun la rtog/ rnam shes kyis bsad gong 'brang tshul khrims srung / /'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin/ /mgyogs mas snyigs byed khrag 'thung gyi
gya ma/ /rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'grogs mtshan ma 'joms/ /bsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pas pha rol phyin/ /mtha' 'das chos sku gzugs 'dzin spangs tshul bzung
'gro ba'i sdug bsngal che 'phrog ka ka ma/ /bslad bas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing / /mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku thugs su
chud phyir zhal na thogs/ /yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kang+ka ma/ /dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs/ /gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin/ /
dbyings kyi thugs rjes 'phrin las 'dus ma byas/ /mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rnga ma tshul ka/ bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /dpal chen bcu drug
sa la lhun gyis grub/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/ /thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med/ /sbyin pas rigs pa'i klung du mtsho drangs ltar/ /'khor
bas 'jigs nas thugs rjes lcags kyus 'dren/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don mdzad pa/ /thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma/ /don dang mthun bas kun
kyang dga' bar mdzad/ /byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyun 'dzin cing / /rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong / /yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags
pa ma/ /gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don/ /shes rab sgron mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel/ /don gnyis mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog/ kun
gnyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan/ /snyan par smra bas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed/ /btang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du/ /phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i
gzugs kyang 'tsho/ /chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril 'khrol ma/ /da ni srin po'i lha rgyud bshad de/ bco brgyad spyan gyis bco brgyad khams la gzigs/ /bco brgyad
shangs nas bco brgyad sprul par 'byung / /bco brgyad khams la bco brgyad skur ston cing / /bco brgyad thugs kyis bco brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'/ /bco brgyad snyan
gyis bco brgyad khams gsan cing / /bco brgyad ljags kyis gsung rab bco brgyad 'chad/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab/ /sa dgur thugs rjes
don mdzad dbu dgur ldan/ /brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyang gnon/ /ji ltar rol yang spyan dgu dbyings mi g.yo/ /'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i
tshul ston cing / /rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs/ /rnam thar gsum las sku gsum 'phrin las 'byung / /spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs
ral gsigs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol/ /bco brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad rtsa bting ma/ /brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing / /phra me'i skyon spangs ngag gi
dbang phyug che/ /'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/ /chos la dbang mdzad ha ya gri ba dpal/ /'dzin tshul stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing / /log lta'i nyes
spangs yang dag lta dang ldan/ /tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas tshe/ /skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon/ /shugs 'chang stabs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod
cing / /'khyal pa'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/ /'dod pa kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul/ /sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal/ /'tshir ba'i stabs kyis
gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan/ /ngag rtsub skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug tsha/ /smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse/ /las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN+Da li/ /gnon
pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing / /gnod sems nyes spongs thugs kyi dbang phyug che/ /mnyen pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing / /rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad
'jigs byed stobs po che/ /rdeg pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing / /bden dang bral ba'i rdzun spangs skyon sel ba/ /mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad
pa| |ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can/ /'debs pa'i stabs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing / /brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang
phyag che/ /bzod pas gzhi lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba/ /smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da la/ /zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing / /'dod chags
skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/ /ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal/ /skye bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad hUM ka ra/ /rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod
cing / /ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che/ /rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar 'byin pa/ /yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal/ /'jigs byed stabs kyis
'chi bdag zil gnon cing / /srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/ /gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas/ /tshe la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed
gshin rje gshed/ /ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching / /thugs rjes zin pa'i srid las grol/ /gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar snyems/ /'dod
pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ki/ rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin/ /thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor ba mi gtong zhing / /shes rab thabs kyi lcags
kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin/ /gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ti ru/ /ye shes mtshan sdud thugs rje khrod 'byung zhing / /sprul pas 'gro bsgral sku dang ye shes 'phro/ /shes snying
ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye/ /sta na ba tis khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes/ /dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brdungs/ /thugs rjes sems can 'phrin las mtshan ma 'joms
dbu mar ye shes snying rje mi rtag dang / /mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu ha la/ /rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom/ /thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa thal bar brlab/ /
gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs/ /ha ya gri ba mnyes mdzad tsaN+Da li/ phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyings su 'phen/ /'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad
du thugs rjes rdeg/ ma khyogs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed sha ya ti/ /mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra/ /dbyings nyid rig
shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra/ /de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa/ /bdud rtsir 'khyil ba sha ya ya tis mnyes/ /bdag rtog log lta'i mtshan ma kun bcom zhing //
za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsad bcad de/ /sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa/ /pad+mo 'khyil ba mnyes byed ma ra na/ /thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas
bskul/ /thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren/ /gnyis med mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs/ /ma ha ha la mnyes mdzad
tsun+da ma/ /bskyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod/ /thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor/ /thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spong / /ba ya
ba tis khams gsum hUM mdzad mnyes/ /sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod 'phrin las dpa'/ /yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtan/ /gdong nas don mdzad
'khor ba mthar thug sgrol/ /de phyir dpa' rtul za byed bya khra ma/ /sdang mig mi 'gyur thugs rjes zhi la gnon/ /mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung zlog /tsham
dam ral gsigs gdangs par 'jig rten 'gengs/ /de phyir 'gyur med phra mon tsa sa ra/ /rtog pa'i dgra spangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas/ /'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin
rdzi mchor spong / /'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri na/ /chos dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing / /thugs rje spu ris
sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol/ /sel byed sprul pas don mdzad d+h+ya ma/ /yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan/ /
mi 'dul zing thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs/ /dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/ /de'i phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i rtsal ma/ /ye shes dbyings la 'jug
pa shes bya za/ /dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za/ /gnyis med ye shes 'phrin las 'khor ba za/ /de phyir za byed pu ka mu ka pa/ /rigs btsun gnyen por 'gyur
bar thams cad 'dul/ /'phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms/ /stong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshogs 'jig /de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sid+ha ma//
dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje rmi/ /lhing nag po drag po sku ston pa/ /thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen/ /de phyir rmi byed phra men ri k+Sha ma/ /ye shes
thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon/ /tsham ngam ral gsigs sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms/ /las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol/ /de phyir stobs
ldan phra men ha k+Sha ma/ /lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas rlan gyis rgyal/ /thugs rje 'khor bar smon lam stobs kyis myos/ /rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med par
rol| |de phyir phra men myos byed u ka ra/ /yid g.yo las can sems dpar gyur pa ni/ /ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo/ /don mdzad god 'brang ye shes
dbyings su mkhyen/ /de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kya ma/ /bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni/ /dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pas
za| |thugs rje'i 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags sbyong / /de phyir phra men za byed don ka ma/ /dbyings la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur/ /ye shes dbyings rtogs
drangs pa nyin mo nyal/ /'gro mdongs rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan/ /ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'i u lu ka /brtags pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin
'gyur| |mnyam nyid mtha' bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba/ /rtog ge spyod yul byas pas mi mthong ba/ /de phyir sbed byed phra men ba ya ta/ /las 'bras bden la yid
ches dang gyur te/ /mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes thugs kyis mgyogs/ /zhi gnas spyan rdzi lhag mthong bgrod tshags chung / /de phyir phra men mgyogs byed b+ha ga
shi ta/ /nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos par gyur/ /lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin/ /zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrog pa/ /de phyir
phra men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma/ /'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par gyur/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran/ /ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor
gsal/ /gnyis lam rmongs zin ma ti ti la/ /chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed par gyur pa ni/ /mnyam nyid ngang du log lta sel byed cing / /rig pa bskyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod/ /
de phyir phra men gsod byed na ku la/ /'jug pa rang dbang med pa'i gnyid gyur ba/ /bstan pa'i chos sgrogs log lta myos byed cing / /mnyam dang mi mthun log lta myos byed phyir/ /
thams cad myos byed phra men 'u shi ka/ gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg par gyur pa ni/ /'phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing / /phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyings su bros/ /de
phyir phra men 'bros byed ka si ka/ 'khor ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das/ /chos sku rdo rje brjod pas mtha' gnyis spangs/ /rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral/ /de phyir
rjod byed badzra pa sha ma/ /chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs/ /phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom/ /de
phyir 'joms byed badzra b+he ra we/ /'chi med bdud rtsi yul sems skye 'gag med/ /grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med sgrub//
rtsi mchog ye shes badzra a mr-i ta/ /ye shes 'phro byed yon tan rgya mtsho sgrub/ /thugs rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du bdud/ /ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ub//
de phyir brlag byed badzra ma ra na/ /de ni pad+ma dbang chen dang / dbang phyug ma'i lha rgyud brjod par bya'o/ /bco lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu/
ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dul mkhyen/ /snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan/ /shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas/ /rgyud lnga'i mgon
mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga/ /dug lnga zhal du shar te rdub mdzad cing / /ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chad/ /skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad gshog bzhis
bskyod/ /bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dran/ /phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom/ /rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis/ /phyogs
bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan/ /che ba che yang che bla na med/ /bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lta/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bcu drug sa la bzhugs/ /
phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs/ /tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /dbang chen yongs
su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal/ /thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa
skyon mi gos/ /mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo'i gzugs 'dzin cing / /thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas su za/ /srid pa'i sems can
chags pa'i snying khrag gsol/ /dbang drag las mdzad ma bu rak+Sha si/ /sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtog tshangs pa'i gzugs/ /tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan/ /
zhabs bzhir smra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod/ /gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ti/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma/ /ma rig dug gsum 'joms
mdzad dpal rtse bsnams/ /bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad dka' zlog ma/ /chags pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma/ /thams cad sgyu ma bzhin tu rtogs mkhyen ma/ /'brel
ba'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs/ /'phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzheng chen can/ /'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo po sna ba/ /'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar
mkhyen| |rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs/ /nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung thung 'phen/ /gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go 'u ri/ /rdo rje las
mdzad kun gyi bla na med/ /lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing / /mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi dmigs sku dkar mdog /gsod byed rdo rje 'bebs byed in+d+ra ma/ byams
dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar/ /ban+d+ha snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho la/ /rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma/ /sdug bsngal dbyings
su skyong mdzad ba ki laM/ /sems can gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen/ /mun sel sgrol bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad/ /'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs
kyang / /chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mr-i ta/ /zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen/ /zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku/ /gdung ba'i nad sel
'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing / /gtan mchog thams cad stob byed se'u mya la/ /dbyug pa 'tshog pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen/ /thabs kyis ma rmongs 'phrin las ljang
gu'i mdog /nan dbang drag shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams/ /dregs byed spyi nas 'joms mdzad dan ha ma/ /log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye
ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol/ /las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rked chings can/ /drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyur rak+Sha si/ /phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu
mdzad| |snying rje rgyun skad ba su zhags pa yis/ /chags med zhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma/ /rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol mdzad bak+Sha si/ /'tshog pa dbyug
pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen/ /gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad ma/ /yon tan mi zang nor gyi gter 'dzin ma/ /stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral
gri ma| |ra ro 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen/ /chos rnams gnyis med don rtogs rtag tu myos/ /nyon mongs tha ba zlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing / /dge ba'i lo tog
skyed mdzad ru ti ram/ /brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing / /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod/ /
gsod byed 'dra mdzad e ka ra tsa ma/ /bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed/ /thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las/ /'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum
yid 'phrog ma/ /thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma no ha ra ma/ /khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing / /gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can/ /mi zad
nor gyi gter ldan bum pa 'dzin/ /sdug bsngal re skong thag thug si ti ga/ reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel
ma| |bder gshegs ras rgyus sems can sgrol mdzad cing / /khams gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad pa ya be/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la/ /srid gsum
'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba/ /gsang ba nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad/ /sdug bsngal dbyings su gsol mdzad mar na/ /gzi brjid
can de me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsregs/ /za byed bskal pa dus mtha' tshul ston pa/ /lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag+na ye/ /
mche ba dag pas skye bzhi rtsad gcod bzhugs/ /nyan thos tha ba zlog mdzad phag gi dbu/ /'og gi phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor/ /skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed pa
ra ti/ /'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen/ /thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad/ /dam tshig srung ba'i 'chi bdag zlog mdzad cing / /lung
gi dur khrod dbang mdzad dza mun te/ /'jigs las lhag pa'i grags ni gzhan med mkhyen/ /stong phrag brgyad cu grags la mnga' mdzad cing / /sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi gi
wang mthong / /sdug bsngal nad gsos mdzad pa'i pu tam/ /chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen/ /nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing / /gdug
pa 'dul phyir dug gtong sprul zhags bsnams/ /zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud ba ru na/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog nag /srid gsum 'joms mdzad
tri shU la gdengs po bsnams/ /thugs rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams/ /'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la/ /chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad
ra mgo can/ /byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing / /gang la cis 'dul de la des ston pa/ /yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka lam/ /ston pa'i bka' dang rang
gi dam bcas gnyis/ /mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs/ /dam tshig sgrog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing / /ma rig nub mdzad kund ka rnam 'phrul/ /sku
gsum yon tan 'phrin las mtha' klas pa/ /stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs/ /so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ /ma chags byang mdzad lam po d+ha ra
ma| |dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las/ bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang
gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad

pad+ma'i lte ba la rak+ta'i maN+Dal byas te dbus su badzra he ru ka/ shar du bud+d+ha he ru ka/ lhor rat+na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du ka rma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma
bzhi| de'i phyi rim snam bu la go rim brgyad/ de'i phyi rim la sid+ha ma brgyad/ sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa/ zhing gi rgyan mtshan/ ras chen gyi 'phan gdugs/ /tsit+ta'i
thog /maM sa'i bla re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims te yum kun tu bzang mos rang gi mtha' la byang
chub kyi sems blangs te nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /byang chub
sems nyid bsgom pa'i dbang / /dbyings dang dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /sems nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab ste/ /de ru slob ma bskur bar bya/ /chos rnams thams cad
brtag par dka'/ /brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das/ /da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni/ /sems can nang na mi yin te/ /sangs rgyas mis ni sgrub thag nye/ /byang chub sems
de'i don rtogs nas/ 'bras bu yang dag mngon du 'char/ /de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa/ /de las sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /sems nyid dngos po de las med/ /
bstan cing yang ni rtogs par dka'/ /bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi'ang de las med/ /sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang / /tshig gis 'di yin bstan dka' zhes/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'di/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta hUM/ phyi yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na/ /sems la srid pa thams cad chub bar 'gyur/ /nang gi tshul du
rtogs 'gyur na/ /sems la sku gsung thugs kyang phrugs par gnas/ /gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams cad ni/ /yum chen kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya/ /sems ni snang ba shar ba'i
ye shes yin/ /gnyis su med par rtogs na chos kyi sku/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /badzra tsit+ta hUM/ /mngon ba'i sangs rgyas che ba yum chen kun tu bzang / /bdag
nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni/ /yab yum gnyis su med par gyur pa las/ /byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin/ /chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba
chen po ni/ /yum dang sems nyid gnyis su med pa yin/ /rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te/ /skye 'gag med pa'i sems nyid don yin te/ /sems dpa' yi ni bdud bzhi
med pa'i don/ /kun tu khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med/ /thams cad man ngag la ni thams cad rten/ gdod nas 'tshangs ni rgya ba'i che bar gsungs/ phyi ni snod kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur
na| |'byung ba lnga las sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /nang ni bcud kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na/ /sems las ma rtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang
bskur ro/ /bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med ces bya/ /rang byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' las 'das/ /sems la dngos po med cing gzung du med/ /
gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ya ti ste/ /rnam par mi rtog chos nyid stong par gsal/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rig pa rnyed pa dag la shin tu gsal/ /byang
chub sems kyi dngos gzhi ma gtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzhan na med ces 'byung ba yang / /mi rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad pa'i ye shes te/ /mi gtong ba'i spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i
sems nyid yin/ /mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs/ /mi g.yo ba yi chos nyid dbyings dag pas/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /mnyam
par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ /mtho ris srin mon rag dmyal ba kun/ /mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas/ /'di dang phyi ma'i don du bsgom par bya/ /byang chub
sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /mdzod gsum ston pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ /phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas/ /nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur
na| |sku gsum lus ngag yid gsum gnas gyur na/ /de yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya/ /kun gzhi yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum/ /gsang ba'i
mdzod gsum yin pas bskur par bya/ /de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba/ /tsit+ta'i dbyings nas 'od ni tshon gang 'phro/ /dkar ser snum la 'dril ba gcig tu gnas/ /las
'phro len las gzhan ni len pa'i tshe/ /sems ni rta dgug nyid rgyu ba yis 'dul/ /mi chags mi 'khor ba yi don de ni/ /'od dang bcas pa tshon gang gsal bar bsgom/ /
byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad/ /mi bskyod pa ni sems kyi mchog/ bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste/ /bdag gi gsung
ni 'gyur ba med/ /bdag gi sems ni mi bskyod pa/ /sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gsung / /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang
bskur ro/ /thig lo chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa/ /man ngag gnyer chen rnam shes tshogs dgu ste/ /yid kyi rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don/ /rnam par shes
pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /med pa'i phyal ba dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan
bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las/ /gzhan na sangs rgyas btsal gyur kyang / /btsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do/ /thams cad 'gyur
med byang chub sems dpa' las/ /ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs/ /byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab gdal te/ /bdag dang
gzhan du med par rtogs pa la/ /de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin/ /lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /
dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /dkar 'tsher snum la 'dril bas byang chub sems/ /mdzangs pa zin po sems shes de la bya/ /blun po byol song sems ni
na bun dud pas 'dres/ /sems gnas phung po tsit+ta'i dbyings dkyil na/ /'od kyi thig le dkar 'chang gnas pa ni/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems de ni/ /ti dang ra
dang nas btags zhabs 'khyud rnams/ /gu gu zla tshes dag tu gnas gyur te/ /mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs
kyi sa bon 'di/ /bdag gi ma yengs brjod bral med par 'di bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir
dbang bskur ro/ /nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la/ /mgon chun de las gzhan med do/ /rnal 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi skong gi/ bdag gi sems nyid kun
tu bzang po'i dang gyur na/ /bya tsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yang / /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyar med mnyam pa chen po dang / /de la sangs
rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas mnyes par ma gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /glang po dpal gyi thugs ka nas/ /lcags kyi zer chen bzhi
'phros te/ /glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i/ /lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /'od zer dgu 'phros gdug bam lus bcom/ /'gro ba mtha' dag
rnams kyi don byas te/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang / /kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka/ de ltar lags pas brtags nas byang chub sems/ /gang nas
btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /bdag med khams kyi snod gang du/ /rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste/ /re dogs med
par phung 'gro yang / /nyam nga med pa lam gyi mchog/ gza' gtad med pas don du bde/ /de bas rang sems bgrod pa'i sa/ /byang chub sems ni yangs shing rgya che ste/ /de
bas bdag gis lus rtogs na/ /snod bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams/ /shes gsal blo ldan rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal/ /bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la
yod ces gsungs te rdzogs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med/ /thugs
nas zhal du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs/ /rna rgyud ston pas thugs brtol te/ /lus dang sems las ma gtogs bsgom du med/ /bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas
btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungs so/ /dus gsum rgyal bas ye nas ma bces te/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku/ /chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med/ /man
ngag shes rab sbyin chen des gsungs pas/ /lus dang sems las ma gtogs na/ /bdag gi sku gsung thugs la tshang bar gnas/ /gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni//
don rdzogs sgom pa po yang yod par 'gyur/ /lus sems skye ba med bden bas/ /bsgom du med par 'jog pa gang / /don kun rdzogs shing byang chub par der gnas so/ /byang chub
sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /zla gsang dkar dmar rlung ka lci/ /zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te/ /thig le byang chub sems nyid dkar la 'tsher ba yi/ /dmar
ba yum gyi rak+ta byang chub sems/ /rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le sgom dus pa/ /de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ /man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs yin te/ /gsang
ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes nyid kyang zla ba yin/ /thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'dril/ /man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig le yin/ /sems las ma gtogs sangs
rgyas gzhan na med/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rang byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la/ /chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la/ /dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya
mtshor rab sprul te/ /yid ni 'phags pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni/ /phra zhing zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku/ /dran par byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum/ /kun gzhi pad+ma'i yig 'bru
gsal bar byed/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag/ 'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems de skye med ye
shes dbyings/ /skye med mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don/ /sems la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /'byung ba chen po bcom ldan
'das| |nam mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs rgyas so/ /chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos
brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so/ /'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro/ /dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te/ /nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin
no| |chos kyi dbyings las mnga' brnyes nas/ /gang ltar bsgrubs kyang dbyings kyi don/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang / /dbang chen dbang bsgyur 'chi ba
med| |sprul pa kun tu bzang po nyid/ /sgrib dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang chen ni/ /de yang sa gser zla ba med/ /gser
dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya/ /zla ba me dang 'dra ba yi/ /byang chub sems nyid kun tu bzang / /gsal zhing dro la nyon mongs sreg /byang chub sems
kyis dbang bskur ro/ /don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin/ /yab yum gnyis med rol pa yi/ /rak+ta byang chub sems dkyil na/ /ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/ sku dang gsung dang
thugs kyi rgyud/ /yon tan 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa/ /gsang ba'i don gyis dbang bskur ro/ /gsang ba yum chen kun tu bzang / /rak+ta byang chub sems dkyil na/ /mahA su kha'i
dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /sems kyi thig les thig btab ste/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po 'khyil ba la/ /chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku/ /don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod//
nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ro/ /nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste/ /lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros ba med pa yi/ /thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sras/ /kun tu
bzang po yum dang don gyi thabs chen las/ /man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don/ /bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ /dbal chen kun tu bzang po ye shes te
gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mahA su kha'i gnas/ /mahA su kha'i dbyings nyid na/ /byang chub sems nyid de kho na/ /ye shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas
mahA su kha gsang ba chen po 'di/ /don dang ldan te kun tu bzang po yin/ /ngang las ma g.yos kun tu bzang po ni/ /gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i byang chub sems
kyis dbang bskur ro/ /yum gyi nags tshal chen po 'dul med du/ /rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs/ /nga ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin/ /bdag nyid
'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub/ /gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /srid pa byang chub sems su ma bcos thig ler zlum/ /sngar 'das dang ldan bzhugs
dang phyis 'byung ba'i/ /sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /nyon mongs dri ma ya nas med pa'o/ /ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes lhun gyis grub/ /byang chub sems nyid gsang
ba'i dbang bskur ro/ /dpal chen kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro/ /lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du 'o/ /phyag rgya 'gyur
ba med pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /sku ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru 'dus/ /lam ni thams cad rol pas chub pa'o/ /yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag /zas
ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don/ /spyod pa bya ba med pa chen po'o/ /thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sa le ba'o/ /ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi don/ /byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir
dbang bskur ro/ /rnar brgyud ston pas thugs brtol te/ /nges pa'i lung dang don yang sangs rgyas yin/ /sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro ba zhes/ /byang chub sems ni kun tu rtag
pa'i don/ /rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid/ /dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /sku rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal/ /lnga bzhin nang du 'phor ba yang / /ye
shes sangs rgyas de las med/ /lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal ba bzang / /bder gshegs kun gyi thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don/ /don dam dbang mchog 'dis ni
dbang bskur ro/ /dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byams re yas/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim/ /'greng ldog spyi'u tshugs gar 'gyur
yang | |gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don/ /thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal/ /ye shes khrus kyi rdzing bu ru/ /dri la dag pas rdul
mi 'go/ /dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i phra men ma dang / khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya nams la bka' stsal to//

sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang / /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyag/ rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis longs/ /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /rnam grol dag pas gsung
skad sgrogs/ dril bu 'di ni sgra snyan gyis/ /phyogs bcu kun tu sgrogs par byed/ /dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya/ /rak+ta'i mgo ma yin gyis byugs
la| |de ru dpal chen dgod par bya/ /phra men 'khor dang pho nyas bskor/ /de ru slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi
dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/ /dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi dang / nang dang
gsang ba gsum gyis bka' stsal to/ /phyi'i dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang rdzas lnga bcu rtsa lngas dbang bskur ro/ /nang dbang dpal chen po yab yub dang / khro bo dang /
phra men rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro/ /gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo las/ /
dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /
chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo// de nas kun mkhyen
ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes go shag gis phye la kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom mo/ /de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge hUM mthing nag las sku smug nag 'jigs
pa'i sku/ gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags/ thugs ting nge 'dzin hUM mthing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo/ /de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
las 'di phyung ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khyil ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bla na med pa'i ting nge

'dzin dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dgyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin

dang | rtog pa 'joms pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbu ma chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bden pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / /sgra sgrogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin

dang | dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bar ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtum po rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / khrag 'thung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lbos

pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzhad gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dregs pa chen

po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

rngam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glo snying nang khrol 'dren cing zas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byin gyis rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol ba'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad
pa'o|| ||de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de la mchod pa dam pa ni/ /thog mar rtog
bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /'khril ba'i 'jig rten mnyam sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid mnyes
pas mchod par bya/ /mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /bzang dang btung dang bca' dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil

'khor la ni dbul bar bya/ /mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod/ /sha chen dang ni dri chen dang / /ga bur rak+ta'i dri chu dang / /ma he rta dang khyi sha dang / /na ge ge rgya ga shog pa can/ /'di
dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /pad+ma can dang dung can dang / /ba lang can dang ro mo can/ /'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul/ /zhing gi rgyal mtshan sha chen tog/ ras chen
dag gi bla re dang / /zhing gi dbyug pa tsit+ta'i tog/ til mar dag tu bcas pa rnams/ /'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na/ /thams cad ma lus
mngon sangs rgyas/ /phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang gi mchod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ mchod pa gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka

rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus phyung ngo / /bla med mi spang ba dang / bla ma bkur ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang / gsung

ba'i don du mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba lnga dang / sgrub pa dang / srung ba dang / gti mug dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dag mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri chen sha /dag pa'i
snod bcud mi 'dor ro/ /yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste/ /ye nas ma nyams rtogs pas spyad/ /bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni/ /rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur/ /mi spong mi 'dor gnyis po
ni| |yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas/ /'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /rtsa
nyams pa yi phyal ba dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson dang / /skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed/ /nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /sgrub pa thams cad nyams
bar 'gyur/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /'bras bu med cing ngan 'gro ltung / /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs
rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid yin/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ /gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su

med| |bsrung bar bya ba dang mi spang ba brgya nyi shu/ dang du blang ba brgya nyi shu/ spyad par bya ba brgya nyi shu/ spyir sum brgya drug cu'o/ /dam tshig 'di rnams mnyam na sangs rgyas so/ /nyams na dmyal
ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /blang bar bya ba'i snod ni gang / /spang bar bya ba ci lta bu/ /mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis/ /gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang / /drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /dum bu brgyad pa rab tu grags/ /bram ze rgyal rig
rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges/ /dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang / /sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste/ /thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug/ kha dog bdun du rab tu grags
nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab/ /'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes/ /dung sngo gcig dang dung gnyis dang / /chag pa dang ni mtshams gyes pa/ /'di dag thams cad rab brtags te/ /rab tu brtags te
spyad par bya/ /shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /snyi pa'i ma yang na dul ba'i sar/ /sngags kyis btab ste gnam du bsgyur/ /ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya/ /lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze med/ /
srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po snyol/ /nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te/ /rlung gi phyogs bltas gsang mi thub// byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur/ /dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags grub
ster| |shar du bltas na bdag nyid gsod/ /me yi phyogs bltas she'u shing med/ /'og tu bltas na rkun por spyod/ /steng du bltas na bud med gsod/ /glor bltas de ni rigs ngan te/ /snod kyi
mtshan nyid 'di rnams so/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /dge ba sprul pa'i snod dag ni/ /dum bu gcig pas la dbang / /gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur/ /gsum pa de yang nor la dbang
bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur/ /lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub/ /drug pa de ni slong ba yin/ /bdun pa de ni brtul zhugs so/ /brgyad pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs/ /
gnyis pa de ni rgyal po'i rigs/ /gsum pa rje'u rigs yin pa ste/ /bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so/ /bu gu med dang mang ba ni/ /mkhas pas shin tu spang bar bya/ /bong chung ba dang srab pa dang / /gang
dag ser bar gyur pa ni/ /bud med yin par shes par bya/ /bud med rab tu smad pas na/ /de dag rab tu spang bar bya/ /ser skya dang ni dkar ba dang / /kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya/ /dung med pa dang
dung gnyis dag/ lha mo sprul bas mi blang nge / /dung sngo ba dag sdug bsngal te/ /bya rog rjes ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur/ /nyi rim gyis ni gsod par 'gyur/ /glang po rgyab ni nad
du 'gyur| |'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /gsang ba sgrub thod mtshan nyid ni/ /yan lag che phra mang ba'i bdag/ dpag bsam shing ni yod gyur na/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur
te| |sngags pa de la the tshom med/ /dbus na gshod bu bzhi yod na/ /'di ni 'dod 'jo ba zhes bya/ /mdun na gshong bu gnyis yod na/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o/ /de yi mtshan nyid
ldan pa'i snod/ /su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni/ /longs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur te/ /de la lha mo the tshom med/ /de nas rigs ni rnam bshad de/ /snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang / /dung dang kun zla
'dra ba'i mdog/ snum la mnyam du sdug pa ni/ /sdugs rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin/ /dbang phyug chen por shes par bya/ /thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che/ /pad+ma'i dbyings su
'dab mar brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa gsol ba yod/ /'di dang tshangs par rig par bya/ /sbrang rtsi sar skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /zhi ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan/ /khyab 'jug pa yi
snod yin te/ /zug rdu dgra rnams 'joms par byed/ kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la/ /pad+mo dmar bas brgyan pa dang / /zlum pa shin tu rnam pa ste/ /snod 'di gzhon nu ma zhes bya/ /cung
zad ser zhing zlum la zab/ /gang dag rdo rje mchen yod pa/ /de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa/ /dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin/ /phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la/ /rab tu mkhregs shing mu
tig 'phro/ /sha yi dri dag mnam pa yi/ /snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya/ /thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che/ /thig le chen pos rnam par brgyan/ /khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam pa/ /'jigs byed
ma yi snod ces bya/ /snod kyi khyad par shes byas nas/ /sngags pas 'di dag rtag 'chang na/ /bdag bka' byed na bzhin bzang ma/ /de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang
bshad par bya/ /snod kyi dngos po khyad par ni/ /tshangs pa bram ze bcang bar bya/ /rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu/ /khyab 'jug dang ni 'byor kun la/ /rtag tu las
rnams 'grub par byed/ /rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma/ /pha rol yul ni rnam par 'joms/ /rje'u rigs kyi ni dam chen mo/ /blo dang ldan pas bslog phyir bshad/ /gsad dang bsgral dang bstabs
pa'i phyir/ /dmangs rigs kyis ni phag gdong bcang / /las dang rigs rnams thams cad dang / /'jigs byed mas ni dngos grub ster/ /re ba med pas bdag nyid mas/ /grub pa'i khyad par
'di shes pas/ /'du ba med pas bdag bsams te/ /rtag tu 'di dag spyad cing bcang / /bdag gi dngos grub skye ba yi/ /sngags pas de nas bshad par bya/ /oM na ba ba to/ /ba du ba ya smra sha na/ pa
