si ni i tang ka pa la/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ hUM phaT swAhA/ thal ba dang / me tog dang / chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la btab ste blang bar bya/ ri mo rdo rje 'khor lo
dang | |mchod rten dang ni rin po che/ /pad+ma dang ni ljon shing dang / /dbus na bu ga gnyis yod pa/ /mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis/ /gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa/ /dpal dang ldan
pa'i snod gnas so/ /srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis dang / /srubs gsum ba dang srubs bzhi pa/ /lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad/ /dgu dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dag/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug/ 'di dag rab tu spang bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol ba snod brtag pa'i
le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas dbang phyug chen po bsgral ba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di
phyung ngo / /mahA ru tra'i rgyud dur khrod mahA ru tra brgyud pa'i dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog/ phyi rol phyogs gar bde ba'i sar zhing chen stan gar 'os ba zhig tu maN+Dal byugs te/
gnas chen dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i cha lugs dri ltar nyal tshigs bcad las byang ba bzhin tshon gyis bris/ yang na thal ris dang / yid kyis bkod kyang rung / sta na'i dkyil
'khor bsham/ de'i dbus su hom khung gru gsum ba zhig bkod/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste mnyam pa nyid du sgom pa'i sngags la/ a sa mahA ca la d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA
ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM zhes cung zad bsgoms pa'i rjes la/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po dang / /chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa yi/ /gnyis med phyag rgya rol pa yis/ /dus la bab pos ma ya/ /zhes brjod
nas rnal 'byor gzhan gyis 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mkhas pa zhig gis las 'di bgyi/ dbang gi gtam rgyud bshad/ rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang / bden pa'i tshig gis
bsgrags nas/ 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson/ /'byung po mang po kun nyon cig /thugs rje dang dang shes rab dang / /thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'gro ba thams cad sbyong
bar mdzad/ /'gro ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa/ /bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun/ /bcom zhing gsod pa'i gnyen po ni/ /'jam dpal 'phrul gyi khro
bo des/ /srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa dang / /thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas/ /gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang / /ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du/ /bor nas sa gzhi dur khrod kyi/ /bdag
po gdol ba drag po yis/ /ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang ba byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o/ /lag pa g.yas
g.yon mkhrig ma la/ /khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod do/ /thal ba'i mdog la sku sgreng ba/ /de yi lus snying yan lag ni/ /ma mo chen mo rnams kyi gnas/ /dur khrod chen
po 'di dag go/ de yi snying ni ma he'i lto/ /dur khrod chen po bsil tshal na/ /ma mo chen mo gau ri ma/ /mkhas pa snying stongs che ba'i gnas/ /de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi/ /sing+ga la yi gling
phran na/ /ma mo chen mo tsau ri ma/ /mthong thos rngam ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'/ /lag pa g.yas ni shar lho mtshams/ /bal yul na ni buk+ka si/ /'khor dang longs spyod sna tshogs ldan/ /lhag par
zas kyi 'byor pa che/ /lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams/ /sa yi tshal na be tA li/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas/ /de nas mthu dang dbang yang che/ /rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams/ /li
yul na ni tsaN+Da li/ /shang+ga na zhes grags pa de/ /de yang 'khor dang longs spyod ldan/ /rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams/ /skad ni skad sna mthun pas na/ /ma mo chen mo pra mo ha/ /bde skyid
ldan pa'i sa la gnas/ /pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na/ /u rgyan yul na g+hasma ri/ /sbyor bas longs spyod 'jug pas na/ /dngos grub can yang de na mang / /de nas sta na'i dkyil 'khor
'dir| |bris te bsams nas dgongs pa ni/ /dur khrod bdag pos 'dus pa dang / /dbang du bsdus pa'i las brtsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs zhes brjod do/ /de
nas 'geng la rdo rje khu tshur sku g.yas su bzhag cing mig gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten 'di/ /skye shi gnas ni dur khrod kyi/ /rang bzhin yid ni rnam gzigs nas//
sa gzhi dur khrod gnas su bstan// bdag gis yid ches par bya zhing / /sta na'i dkyil 'khor bsams la gar bris pa'i sar bltas te/ de'i bdag po la sdigs pa'i phyir ldan pa g.yas

byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bgrad/ /mig gi 'bras bu dril la/ sarba pa pa ka ra he ru ka/ byi sta na ma haM ka ru dra hUM phaT/ rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa yang khro bo'i ngang du gyur te bdag dang 'dra
bar bsams la/ de nas 'gying rngam pa las ral pa bsigs la lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng / sor mo gyen du bgrad la ba ya ke tsi ta dza la hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas lag pa sta zur du gzhag

cing lag pa g.yon pa rngam pa bzhin du skra gyen du bteg la/ pra dz+nyA ke shi tsi ta dz+wa la hUM phaT ces brjod la rngam pa'i nga ro bgyi/ mche ba 'dar/ rkan sgra drag tu gtogs la rngam brjid chen po'i

tshul dang ldan par bsam/ oM pra dz+nyA su pa ya na hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa bskum/ oM badzra kro d+ha e sha ya hUM/ de nas slar go cha'i phyag rgya snying gar bcings la btang ste/ oM badzra ka be tsa

zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsams te gnas lngar bsrung zhing / oM na ma d+hu ba bi/ sbyi bor thal mo sbyar te sarba bud+d+ha mu tra saM ha ra na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsi hUM phaT ces brjod pas sku cir yang 'gyur
ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ rkang lag bzhi'i tshogs bskum/ mgo mgrin 'khril cing bsgril la hUM zhes tshig 'bru drag bos ga las g.yon du lta ba'i tshul drag po re
re bgyi/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM zhes drag tu brjod do/ /rdo rje dril bu bsil te brkyang bskum bsgreng la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la/ khams gsum nas 'byung sems can
rnams| |rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis/ /'od zer tshul du bsdus nas kyang / /de dag bdag gi lus la gzung / /sbro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya/ /thar ba'i bla med
dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /brod pa can rnams dar ba ltar/ /skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu/ /bde bar 'ongs pa legs pa 'ongs/ /rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta'i gnas
nyid du| |khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu 'o/ /chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las/ /dbyings su thim pas gnyis su med/ /kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid do/ /thams cad snying po byang chub
las| |ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag nyid med bas mnyam pa'i sku/ /thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad/ /sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos/ /bdag dang bdag gis
so sor phye/ /log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings/ /'khor ba rgyud lnga yi ba bri mas/ /mya ngan mi 'da' yun ring ste/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /sku yi sbrul ba phyogs
bcur bkye/ /gsung gis mtha' yas sems can sgrol/ /thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan/ /sku gsum 'gro ba'i tshul ston pas/ /dus la bab pa'i sems can dag/ las la bab pa'i rnal
'byor bas/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag grol/ /yang dag bsgral nas bde chen thob/ /mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/ /phyin
pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong / /rgyud drug gnas su mi skye phyir/ /dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /'khrug pa'i
bag chags bag la nyal/ /bde 'gro lam la sgrib pa rnams/ /ye shes 'bar pa'i mes bsregs te/ /mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis phaT/ /gsang
ba'i dbyings su hUM gis bsdu/ /skur bskyed ye shes skur bsdus pas/ /'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing gshegs/ /stong gsum ma lus gdon pa ni/ /
'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/ /skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bskal ba 'bar zhing snying rje'i mchog/ nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / /sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /
'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod/ /de nas 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la/ ma tang gi gnas dang lung gi tshul du smos pa bzhin gsal bar bsgoms te/ de'i
'khor 'byung bo mang po yang mngon du bkug par bsams te rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang shar mtshams su kha bltas te bdag nyid brkyang bskum
gyi tshul du 'greng la/ mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad/ /sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/ /gzung 'dzin rkang lag bsnol ba'i
sgo| |yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis phye/ /de nas hUM phaT pra be sha hUM phaT/ rkang pas shag gis phye bar bsam/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa'i phyag rgya bya/ g.yon pa'i mdzub

mo snying gar bsgreng ste/ oM shrI he ru ka mahA badzra sarba duSh+Ta na sa ma ya mu dra pra bany+tsa hUM phaT swAhA/ bzung thar byed kyis bzung / las thar byed gang gis mnan nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te/
brkyang bskum du bsgreng la a a zhes brjod la/ lcags kyus snying gar sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas nas rgyab tu bskor te lus kyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu rkang pa gshibs te dam
tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te/ hUM zhes sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas rgyab kyis bskor bas 'bod par bya/ e h+ye hi mahA ka ru sha/ draM karma badzra hUM phaT/ mahA de ba ma ta ru dwa dza zhes rdo rje gar
gyi gom pa 'dor zhing lte ba'i phyogs su song la/ shin tu dmar po bzhi lte ba'i phyogs bzhir dgod do/ /yi ge hUM mchog tu brjod cing g.yas g.yon du lan gcig tu gar gyis

bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /d+ho tse phya d+ho tse phya ma nu d+ha raM/ a ma d+ha raM/ shrI mahA ka pA la/ d+ho tsa phyaM/ pad+ma rak+ta d+ha raM badzra d+ha raM/ badzra mahA maM ba d+hA raM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas gar gyi
tshul du snying ga phyogs su song la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma sbyin par mkhyen pa ni/ shes rab mkha' dbyings dang / ma btang gi lus su dbyer med par
gzhal yas khang 'bar ba'i nang du khro bo he ru ka phyi'i phra men la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bkod do/ /sbyan drang ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyings nas yi ge dza las lcags
kyus gsal bar phyogs bcur 'phros te/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dgug cing sbyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa sbyan drang ngo / /mi gsang ba'i gsad pa chen po chos nyid
kyis bsgral ba dang / sku gsung thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bsgral ba dang / bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub pas bsgral lo/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don
bdud 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /'das pa'i dus na
sngon byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ste/ /de tshe sems can thams cad kun/ /shin tu khro zhing gdug par gyur/ /shin tu khro drag gtum pa
yang | |zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yis/ /khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis/ /thams cad 'jigs pa'i
mchog yin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshags/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /hUM bzhis he ru ka bsgom/ has he ru ka la sogs pa bsgom/ hes

sing+ha la sogs pa bsgom/ phaT kyis sgo ba la sogs pa bsgom/ hUM ha he phaT kyis ting nge 'dzin bzlas/ /sngags 'dis sbyan drang ngo / /sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mud tar pra b+han tsakra hUM phaT/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga

wan| |dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ru lu ru lu/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi tri sha to sa ma ya ho/ e h+ye hi a ra li d+hing d+hing / dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i
ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/ /tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal
dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las/ /sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs/ /oM shrI he ru ka mahA badzra/ sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu dra

pra be sha ya shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka mahA badzra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu dra pra b+ha na tsa kra hUM phaT/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i

phyir| |don kyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang / /'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol/ /oM shrI he ru ka mahA badzra sarba sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+TaM ka ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra hUM phaT/ sems can don phyir
nan tan mchog bskyed cing / /ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang / /mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog gi rnams/ /bdag cag stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /

oM shrI he ru ka mahA badzra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu tra a ma ba stam+b+ha ka hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya/ gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya ho/ oM badzra gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig sa la bzhengs pa
yi| |dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin mi gshegs sam/ /grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na/ /sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI

he ru ka mahA badzra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsa kra b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya bi to gas ya bi to gas ya/ he b+ha ga wAn/ bud+d+ha k+She traM pra ti stam+b+ha ka hUM phaT/ sku gsungs thugs su bdag sbyor
bas/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sbrul/ /nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas bsdus pa'o/ /oM shrI badzra ke ra mu ka sha ra yA ya na maH/ oM badzra ra ga sa ma yA ya na

maH/ oM shrI badzra kha twaM/ ga pra mA yA ya na maH/ oM shrI gan+d+he dza yA ya na ma: a ti bu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ ta thA ban+d+ha naM ka ro ya mi ma hA yo gi ni/ ti bu ho/ pra ti bu ho/ /bdag med phyogs
bral don dam thugs chud cing / /byams dang snying rje dgra zun mi mnga' yang / /gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la sa mi 'da' ba'i/ /'jigs byed
he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing / /'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che/ /ma sring byams pa'i tshul gyis
'grogs mdzad ma/ /phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka ya hA i dan bu ya ti ba li d+ta khA gu dza ho/ shrI ban kha kha khA hi kA
hi| dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka mahA badzra A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ hUM khA hi/ he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang / /dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nas/ /dpal chen
'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ /dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru/ /zhing chen gsar rnying sti rar bcas/ /dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgya mtshor bskyil/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar
ba'i tshogs bcas kyis/ /ma lus gshegs shing bsnams su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHshri he ru ka mahA badzra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu dra pra b+ha na tsa kra kha kha khA hi
khA hi nga yan bi pa hUM phaT/ nga ni za byed chen po ste/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya/ /gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sha rus la sogs bza'

par bya/ /dza: hUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka mahA badzra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya/ mahA maM sa/ mahA rak+ta/ mahA tsi ta/ mahA ba su ta/ mahA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha le le hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rang byung gdod
nas dag pa'o/ /rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman/ /rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/ /rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i/ /dug lnga
sel ba'i bdud rtsi stong / /phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis/ /thugs dam dbyings nyid bskul ba'i mchog /sku gsung
thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di/ /bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags na/ /bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la/ /'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA mahA
ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho/ dpal ldan shrI he ru ka dang / /yum chen kro d+hI shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzad la/ /'phrul gyi dngos grub
bdag la stsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA mahA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho/ dpal chen badzra he ru dang / /badzra kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig gi ni mchod pa 'bul/ /dpal chen rat+na he ru dang //
ran+ta kro d+hI shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /dpal chen pad+ma he ru dang / /pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /dpal chen karma he
ru dang / /karma kro d+hi shwa ri la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /oM sarba ta tha ga tA mahA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho/ /dpal chen mi pham
rdo rje dang / /ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen/ /gau ri la sogs brgyad rnams dang / /sid+ha la sogs brgyad rnams la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa
'bul| |ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang / /sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thams cad la/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /
bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzad la/ /'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA mahA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho/ /shrI ba na kha hi/ dpal chen sems dpa'
'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / /dpal chen po shrI he ru ka badzra DA ki nI 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / 'khor yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo mched
lcam dral 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol lo/ /deng gnas mchog dam pa 'dir 'phags pa thams cad mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir
lcam dral phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i thugs dam bskang ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir
rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa zhig yon du 'bul zhing mchis na/ thugs rjes bzung zhing bsgral du gsol/ rgyu mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma bsgral na/ 'di la spyod
pa zhig mchis te/ rnal 'byor theg par gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin du ma bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad ma khyad du bsad pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon dang /
mched dang lcam dral la ngan sems dang dpya sems bskyed pa dang / mched la 'khus pa dang / dam las 'das pa dang / sba lo dang sgyu gsog /rdzun dang kha g.yag /phyi tshul
dang rgyab nyan bgyis nas rdo rje slob dpon snying nas smod cing bla ma la dbang zos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun byung ste sbyor sgrol sgo bkag pa dang / dad pa can gyi
tshogs bcag ste gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag dog dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tsho ba'i bar chad kyis da ltar ngan song gi gnas na 'khyams shing
rtog pa'i dra bas ni/ bcings/ 'khor ba'i rnyis ni/ zin nas dmyal khams kyi gting brgyud par nges te/ zhing bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsgral
bas| 'di'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lnga phung gi yan lag ni/ kun tu bzang po
mchod pa'i sbrin phung du gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dgyes pa'i ngang du thim par smon to/ /smon lam brjod de
bsgral bar bya'o/ /sbyi gtsug tu oM/ lag pa g.yas par swA/ g.yon pa la hA/ snying gar hUM/ lus la oM/ oM mahA su ra ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra

kro d+ha shrI he ru ka a a hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la dan+d+ra da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka pa tsa pa tsa

hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la baM d+ha baM d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ri tsita tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-ita kuN+Da

li ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya b+hin+d+ha b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA pa la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ ma ma ma ma/ bo po bo po/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdza/ mi 'gyur nam
mkha'i rang bzhin las/ /gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsgribs/ /bag chags ma lus sbyong ba'i phyir/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya/ /nga ni za byed
chen po ste/ /sems can thams cad gsad par bya/ /ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya/ /rnam shes hUM gis bsdus nas kyang / /sha rus la sogs bza' bar
bya| |nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi/ /dmar chen dag gi rgya mtsho la/ /'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang rol/ /ma rungs gdug pas ma
chags shing / /dam tshig la sdang dgra chen rnams/ /thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis/ /ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya/ /pra be sha ya phaT/ tsi ta zum/ sum+b+ha
ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gri h+na pa ya gri h+na pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga wA na bid+yA rA dza ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ /badzra DA ki ni/ a ya/ s+pha ra Na phaT/ badzra yu ti dza/ drag po las kyis bsgral
ba'i rnams/ /'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo yang gcad/ /rnam shes hUM gis bsdus brdubs nas/ 'og min gnas mchog bla med 'dir/ /gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /
sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang / /khro bo dang ni khro bo yi/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang / /zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ 'jig rten khams ni rab
'byams kun/ /skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de/ /brlag par ma gyur gang yang med/ /'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams
kun| |yud tsam gyis ni dbang mdzad de/ /dbang du ma gyur gang yang med/ /nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /dpal ldan
gzi brjid chen po rnams/ /yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams
kun| |yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar gyur bas dbyings la rol/ /bdag cag mched lcam dral rnams kyis rdo rje slob dpon dbang zos pa dang / phrag dog
dbang gis mched lcam dral la ngan sems dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang / gnyid dbang gis le lor gyur pa dang / sems g.yengs pas sngags dang phyag rgya zur chag pa dang / dam
tshig dang du len rngo ma thogs pas smad pa'i dam tshig nyams so 'tshal thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/ /rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di 'phrin las rnam bzhis
bsgral pa'i yang gnas stob par sman to/ /bdag cag mched lcam dral 'di tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig /shrI he ru ka
bya shan/ /badzra be ra ba na sha na/ badzra ka ra dza li ta/ oM badzra kro d+ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ ur ta ke sha pra la ban/ sha ta sha pra da/ sha ma ba ra na shra ma la ha ha ha
hUM| ka ra baM/ badzra ka ra baM/ badzra ka ra na ta/ tri shU la a gu dza/ pa ra sha ra na su sho mA ma/ pra yo mahA tsaN+Da/ su re pa ru na/ ku be ra na/ nir ba dri ci ti mahA ku ru
nan| shrI he ru ka ta na ti/ la la gan du sa ta ma hang ya ku ra ka te/ ku sha la dzi mo ta/ sar mo/ gan ta gan ta/ ka ra ta ka/ ga po dza la ni/ ba pu ra ti ba ta/ ko sha bi sha
la| i san pad+ma tsan+d+ra na ka /mang gu na da ro/ /tsi ri ka ta/ tsi ta sti/ dza bi s+t+ra/ b+han+d+ha he ru ka /badzra ma rang sa na sa rang / ba mun ka na/ tig sha na/ taM stang ga ya/ dza ya ba
ke dong / bi ka ra be ra/ mar ma hA ri tsa yang sang sar/ mahA ru na/ dzA la pa ni/ ho ho ha/ ro na ro hUM hUM/ re na ro de na/ he he ra na ro/ bzhi la bstod/ /tha med tang bting /

ba ba ti ka bar many+dzu/ gri na dza la pa ra ho/ he he ro na ro/ oM phur bu sra sti sra ho/ /oM phur bu sha ta shaM ka/ phur bu ba ta ba ti ho/ /phur bu ba sA sa ra hUM/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM e sha hUM
be she hUM sa ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ kha raM pra ti dza ho/ /mchod pa 'bul/ bshags pa bya/ smon lam gdab/ phyogs bcu mthas klas mu med
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po shrI he ru ka badzra DA ki nI tshogs kyi dam tshig gi sa la gzhes
pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor dang / phyi'i grub pa la sogs te/ phra men gyi 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa rdo rje theg pa srung bar zhal 'ches pa'i 'phags pa thams
cad dang / rig 'dzin rtsal 'chang du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te/ sprul pa sna tshogs su sku bzhengs nas slob dpon gyi sa la bzhengs
shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa la bdag cag mched lcam dral 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas
'bul bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ye shes bla ma'i sa non/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur nas so so'i thugs dam skongs par smon
to| |rnal 'byor snga rabs sku tshe 'das pa rnams kyang sgrib pa rnam gnyis ni/ byang / tshogs gnyis ni/ rdzogs/ bdag cag gi stong grogs su gyur cig /bdag gis
snga slad dam rdzas bsgral ba dang / sems can gyi srog bkum mo 'tshal thams cad kyang ye shes ngang gis sgrol zhing rnal 'byor gyi skal ba can du gyur cig /bdag
cag rnams kyi tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon tu gyur pa dang / rgyud gcig cing yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dam la ma nyes par phog pa dang / bdag gi snying rje
chung ba'i rkyen gyis 'phags pa thugs dam bskul ba'i rtsal 'phang dmas pa dang / gnang ba'i dbang las pham par gyur pa dang / gti mug ma tshor ba'i rkyen
gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen mi bzod de lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas ma yin pa'i chos smra ba dang / spyod lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi lha dang / slob dpon
dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / rdo rje mche lcam dral thugs dam gyi lha yal bar bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad 'phang bar gyur pa dang / mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i
rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi gcig pa dang / mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyun mi gcig pa dang / bsod nams 'dres pas rtsal tshad mar gyur te le lo dang /
btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas thugs rje'i gnas su ma gyur te/ ye shes lha dang srung ma rnams 'phang bar gyur pa dang / rgyang phan gyi chos kyis gdungs nas bde ba'i yo
byad dang bral te nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas dang / mchod sbyin mi chud pa'i sgrib pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las the tshom gcod pa'i bsam pa ma
yin pa byung ba dang / shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams rjes su dran zhing gnong ba'i sems kyi mthol zhing bshags so/ /bshags bya 'di ni/ brjod pa
tsam gyis tshor ba dang / mtshor ba dang / bag chags byang bar smon to/ /gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas phyir mi ldog ba'i sa thob par gyur cig /lha dang slob dpon gyi
dbang dang sngon ji ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang / mi skyol zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par gyur cig /skyon brjod pa thams cad
dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams yon tan tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cig /de nas tshogs kyi gtor ma btang / oM shrI he ru ka mahA badzra DA ki nI nAM /
badzra gau ri ha/ badzra tsau ri ha/ badzra pra mo ha/ badzra pe tA li/ badzra puk+ka si/ badzra g+hasma ri/ badzra tsan+Da li/ badzra sma sha ni/ badzra he ru ka sa ma ya yo gi shwa ri/ sarba DA
ki nan/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dbyug pa'i brda yis mtshon nas kyang / /ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/ /
thal mo brda yis mtshon nas kyang / /ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/ /glu yi brda yis mtshon nas kyang / /
ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na/ /sku
ni dud kha chen bo la/ /zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste/ /nag dang mthing ga dmar ba'i dbu/ /g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ /rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du
gsol| |khyung gi khra chen 'bar ba'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na thogs ba ni/ /sti ri'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / /thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang / /ster phra mo gsus ba nas/ /
glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing za/ /glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon/ /zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can/ /thod rlon phreng bas rgyan du byas/ /ma lus pa dag gsan du
gsol| |rgyu las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs/ /ston ni ma nor don mdzad pa/ /mngag pa'i gnas su yud tsam gyis/ /thams cad kho nar dbang mdzad mdzod/ /srungs
shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs/ /rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin gshegs/ /mA ra na ta tha/ 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim/ /
'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim/ /'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste/ /thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod/ /dpal chen he ru ka/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs
chen po/ /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par sprul/ /mthing nag gcer bu ral pa can/ /mi lpags rlon pa gos su gyon/ /
thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs ba ste/ /khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan/ /phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas/ /lag na tI shUl thod ba thogs/ /dug gsum bshig par dam/
bcas pa'i/ /rdo rje me phung 'khrug pa'i tshul/ /re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'i/ /khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab/ /theg chen rnal
'byor spyod pa la/ /gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas phyung / /thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas kyang / /rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang / /sems nyid theg pa chen
po yi/ /rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ /nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ /ma
lus pa dag bsnams su gsol/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
gyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /de na te the hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par
'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs khro bo'i rgyud
kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /ru lu ru lu hUM
b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab
sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM e sha hUM be sha hUM/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da d+ha badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ e h+ye hi sa ma ya/ A na ya badzra shAn+tiM

badzra kro d+ha ni/ badzra tsakro badzra gan/ badzra musting / badzra ti ba ti/ badzra gan ti/ badzra gan da/ badzra a kriM/ badzra rak+Sha/ badzra daM Sh+TAM/ badzra shAn+tiM/ badzra e ka ra tsa ma/ badzra ma no

ha ra ma/ badzra dun+tiM/ badzra nI laM/ badzra na laM/ badzra gri ta/ badzra mu kriM/ badzra ki laM/ badzra uSh+ma/ badzra ma ka rad lpa/ badzra bid+ya tsa ra tsa ni ka /kha na kha/ tu ta kha/ sarba a sha
sa kha/ sarba ma A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ sarba DA ki ni nan/ e a ra li ma nu sma ra ya phaT/ mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang / /khro bo dang ni 'jug sred mo//
gzhon nu mo dang dbang po dang / /rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo/ /zhi ba ma dang be con mo/ /srin mo dang ni za ba mo/ /rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni/ /shin tu khrag 'thung mo/ /gcig pu
spyod dang yid 'phrog mo/ /grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang / /rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo/ /me mo phag mo rgan byad mo/ /sna chen mo dang chu lha mo/ /rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / /rdo rje ra
ste dmar ser mo/ /rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo/ /rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol ma/ /ma mo chen mo khyed rnams kyis/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam
bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /ye shes thob par bya ba dang / /sgrub pa rnams kyis las bya zhes/ /rdo rje byin nas ming btags te/ /dam bcas
bzhin du he ru ka/ /da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams/ /mngon par ston la grub pa 'phrul/ /ji snyed grub mchog ma phul zhing / /khyed rnams mngon du ma
gyur na/ /rab tu sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'dug pa las rnams kun gyis shig /oM pad+ma pa da mu mu ka /A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha
ya| to sha ya to sha ya/ badzra DA ki nI hr-i da yan/ oM oM hUM/ gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsgyur la kha b+han+d+ha dang ras chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang
gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod do/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ khro bo bskyed rdzogs las kyi bzlas ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan
'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i 'a phrin las rab bsdus pa/ tshad med snying rje
skyed pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dag la ni/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i lam mchog ste/ /sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya/ /khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni/ /ye shes gtso mo mchog
nyid de/ /gsum pa las ni 'das pa'i phyir/ /rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan/ /de ni gzugs dang byin rlabs dang / /bzlas brjod dang ni 'phrin las dang / /dus dang gnas
dang bdag nyid dag /phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste/ /btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes/ /dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs/ /'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir/ /
rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'/ /gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste/ /lcags dang lcags la seng ldeng la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad
dam bcu gnyis bar byas pa mgo 'jug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyogs su mgo byas la/ sor brgyad la sor gcig la rgya mdud/ rked par sor gcig la rgya mdud/
stod zur brgyad/ smad zur gsum du byas la/ ri rab ltar brjid pa 'dug pa ni/ gzugs so/ /byin rlabs ni/ thog ma nyid du sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par
bya ste/ /de'i 'og tu rgya mdud gzhal med khang du dmigs te phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar/ hUM sgril ma lnga bzhag ste/ dbus su he ru ka /shar du khams gsum
rnam par rgyal ba/ lhor gshin rje gshed/ nub tu rta mgrin/ byang du stobs po che/ 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul
te phyi nang gi mchod ba ci 'byor pa phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bkug nas gnyis su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis
brlab bo/ /de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo bskyed pa ni/ oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya ma na phaT ces brjod pa'i lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu skra kham pa zur gsum
pa'i thabs su bsgreng la/ brang gis 'gro chen po dang / thod rlon gyis bcings shing bshams la/ spyan gsum sdang mig tu bgrad de phyag g.yon pa'i phur bu la
gzigs/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ rab tu rngam pa/ dur khrod kyi me phung gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa
la phyag bzhi la g.yas kyi gong ma sta re kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste/ g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobs su 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang pos rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'khrol
zhing bdud kyi khams 'jigs pa/ 'og ma phur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabs su gzas shing / ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/ stobs dang mthu la sogs
pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pas kyang che ba gcig phyung ste/ rtag pa chen po bzhugs par bstan pa ni/ sprul pa'i skur byin gyis brlab bo/ /de la rigs lngar byin gyis
brlab par bya ste/ 'bru lngas gnas lnga byin gyis brlab bo/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi gtsug tu oM/ rked par hi/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo/ /
de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du phaT gsum/ ngos gsum du hUM gzhag go /da nas sku bltas pa dang rigs so
so'i khro bo thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo dkyil 'khor de dag nyid phyogs bcur 'phros pa slar 'dus nas hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing de'i sku la
bstims te dbang dang / byin rlabs thams cad brlan par bya'o/ /de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs thams cad dang / sngon gyi thugs dam du zhal gyis
bzhes pa lags pas des gros mdzad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang / bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid chen po yin pas phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing
byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir lag pa g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur ba'i steng du hUM/ g.yon pa'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i steng du
bsam mo/ /gung mo la oM/ /mthe bo la hUM/ mdzub mo la traM/ srin lag la hri/ mthe'u chung la ha/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du
gyur pa'i steng du gzhag ste su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod pas thal mo mnyam par sbyar la/ oM badzra a dza li hUM/ zhes brjod pas sor mo cung zad bsnol lo/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha
hUM zhes brjod pas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la bsdam mo/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas phur pa blangs te chang ba'i nang du bcug la/ lag pa chang pa phye la mthe bo
dang | srin lag dang / mthe'u chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang gzhug /mthe bos cung zad bsgul zhing drud do/ /oM badzra a be sha ya a a zhes brjod pas
phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku yungs 'bru tsam bar mtshams med par phur pa la
bsdu zhing bstim mo/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la gung mo
gshibs te bsgreng ba'i bar du phur ba bcug la/ oM badzra sa twa ra dza hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas bzlas so/ /de nas sor mo bug bug byas te lag pas phur pa bzung
la| oM hUM hrIHphur bu ba phaT/ ces brjod pas de nas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la the bong gnyis gshibs pa'i chang bar bcug nas/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ha na ha na ti ba ta tsakra
hUM phaT| ces brjod nas dril te bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i sku la bstims pas stong gsum
gang bar me stag 'phro zhing / dmigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i byin dang / dbang dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la e'i gdan la bzhugs par gsol
nas zungs kar gyi rgyal pos drang cing gu gul sbyar bas bdug la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o/ /de nas yid la brang pa'i 'phrin las bcol
te de'i byin brlabs so/ /bzlas brjod ni/ bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs la snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM mthing nag pa zhig bsams
la/ oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT/ ces brjod pas phur bu'i khro bo ci 'dra ba zhig de las byung ste phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas
nas phur bu la bstim mo/ /'di 'bum mam/ bdun 'bum mam/ sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste/ bsnyen pa gtong bar 'dod na phur bu nyid snying ga la bsdu ste/ 'di ni/
bzlas brjod do/ /'phrin las na/ thog ma nyid du brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa byas nas skad
cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang / mtshon cha'i char dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskrad nas phur pa bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs
te phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcad do/ /rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya ste/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas de
nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas byung ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / ske
tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / zhing chen gyi rak+ta dang / srub ma'i lo ma'i lo ma dang / khre dang / tsi tse dang / sum ma dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang / bong bu'i bdud rtsi
las sbrus te zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na/ til nag po las gzhi blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mo bris la mdog smug nag tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs
ba la zhing chen gyi rak+tas hUM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris te snying gar glan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du bzhag ste mgo bo lho phyogs su bstan te gdon
de nyid dgug pa ni/ mngag gzhug gam/ khro bo sum+b+ha ni/ sbyor ba yang rung ste/ gsang ba'i thugs ga'am snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zhig bzhag la dza:
hUM baM hoHbadzra aM gu sha che ge mo zhig hUM zhes brjod nas khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa brgyud ma sha stag byung bas bgegs kyi snying ga nas bzung ste/ der 'ongs pa
dang / dzaHhUM baM hoHche ge mo mA ra ya pra pe sha phaT/ ran tsam du brjod la/ gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya
bcings pa dang / bsdams pa dang / de'i sems ma 'khrugs par byas nas e'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam/ de nas phur pa blangs te las kyi lha'i snying po
dang bcas pas drag tu cung zad bskul lo/ /thal mo sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsor la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du
dril na| ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam ma reg par gzas la khro bo'i ske'am ma rked ba nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste rdo rje tho
ba'i sta re lag pas rdeg cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying gar btab/ dbral
bar gcig gdab/ dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab/ lte ba khung du yang gdab/ sder mo'i sngags/ na ma:
sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya/ sarba dush+Tan ma ra ya phaT/ kI li kI lA ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI li kI lA ya badzra d+ha rod/ A dz+nyA pa ya
ti kA ya wa ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT drag tu brjod/ phur pa de btab zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag rgya dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa gnyis sor mo
bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthe chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni/ drag por rgyab tu bskyed de/ de'i sngags/ oM badzra karma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te
g.yas phyogs su bskor te kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum bdug go /de nas phur pa slar mi 'byung ba dang / sus kyang mi phyin pa dang / lhag par yang zad cing
thal phyin par bsam mo/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la bcangs nas gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por bsgreng la
phur pa'i klad du gnon/ phur pa'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'di lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA
sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam/ sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te mthe bo dang mthe'u
chung ngo sbyar la bsgreng / khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bkyed de phur ba'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa
pa tsa| ban+d+ha ban+d+ha| ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ rba na rba na phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /stobs po che'i sngags bar phyag rgya ste/ gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyur nas ci
bsgo ba thams cad bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg /gur gum sbyar mas bdug la gzhag go /de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar
la mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis kha gram la g.yas g.yon du
bsgreng / yid tsam dgu bar bya/ lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi snying gar mnan te lan
bdun bzla/ oM badzra kro d+ha yaka kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud du sbrel la
mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag /mdzub mo gnyis ngo sbyar te bsgrengs nas sdang mig tu bsgrad la rdeg cing sngags 'di lan bdun gsum
nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ha ba tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya dza Ti lam+bo d+ha ra uts+tshusma kro d+ha hUM phaT ces brjod do/ /de nas
yungs kar gyi rgyal po rdeg cing las 'di shin tu brtan zhing grub par bcol lo/ /rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya'o/ /khro bo rnams kyi spyi
bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du hUM mthing nag la rdo rje lcags kyu'i rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge gsum gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra
ba zhig tu gnas pa las/ oM badzra badzra merta hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa zhig tu gyur la de'i steng na bcom ldan
'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang khu dbu gsum phyag drug la/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba 'phyar te bsnams/ g.yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar
bstan| 'khor dpag tu med pas pho brang gtams pa khro bo rnams kyis shin tu gzir zhing mi g.yo ba dang / las ma grub na bskal pa mthar thug kyang gnas par
bsam| |'phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te gzhag go /yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor
dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing dbul lo/ /drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig gnod byed de nyid bkug ste zar gzhug go /'phrin las 'di'i dus
su phra men ma dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo rnams kyang spyan drang / gtor ma dbul lo/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ bya da yak+Sha dza/ b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM zhes
lan gsum brjod de spyan drang / pra tits+tsha ho zhes brjod la gtong / oM sa ma ya ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha hUM swAhA/ zhes lan gsum brjod la a mr-i ta phul la las bcol lo/ /'di'i
'phrin las so/ /dus ni/ tshes bcu bdun nam mar gyi ngo la nyin mtshan gyi grang du gza' dang sbyar ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang ba dang / rtags byung ba la sogs te/ 'di ni/
dus so/ /gnas ni/ shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod par nges pa ste/ 'di ni/ gnas so/ /bdag nyid byang chub sems la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang / lha nye
bar gyur pa dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang / drag cing ltes pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan la re ba med pa dang / dam tshig
mnyams pa'o/ /'di ni/ bdag nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /
zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / mnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to/ /zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang / thab kyi khung zlum po chag gang /
thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi mtho gang / zlum po phar sor gcig /'jim pa'am bong ba la 'bur du brkos te gzhag /thab kyi kha khyer rdo rjer bas
bskor| de'i phyi rim zlum po la pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ bkra shis kyi lha mo dang / mchod pa'i lha mo dgod/ bsreg pa'i rdzas shu gu shug shags/ mar
dkar| kha ra/ sbrang rtsi/ 'bras chan/ 'bras thug /'bras yos/ til/ zho/ nas thug /so ba/ gro so ba/ til so ba/ sran ma sha /yungs kar/ 'bras
kyi lag pa na/ gtor ma dkar po 'bras las bgyi/ yo byad thams cad dkar po/ tshon dkar pos bri/ chas gos gsum dkar po/ /lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar
po grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi/ lha ni/ snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bsnan/ pho nya yang
'byung ngo / /yo byad thams cad kyang ser po/ /dgang gzar ser po/ /phrugs su bcas pa grangs bzhin du dbul lo/ /dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi
la| dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla gam phyed par bcad pa'i tshul du bya/ las kyi lha pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgod/ bsreg rdzas dmar po/ /gtor ma dmar po/ /chos
gos dmar po lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul/ drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum/ zabs su khru phyed/ gru gsum du mda' gzhu/ mtha'
thod pa gsar rnying gis bskor/ dpal chen mo dang khro bcu dgod/ yo byad thams cad nag po/ /bsreg rdzas nag po/ /dkyil 'khor yang nag po/ /gtor ma yang
nag po/ /las kyi khro bo bcu dang / phra men ma chas gos nag po/ /sbyin sreg lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul lo/ /oM shAn+tiM gan+tiM ti ka ra pra sha ma ni rA tsa ta/ a ba ba swa
ba ba| a mu ka si/ swasti shi baM ku ru swAhA/ zhi ba'o/ /ba shaM ku ru pra sha ma na ye ho puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
po he ru ka rol pa las/ khro bo mnan bzlog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po thugs gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la thig bzhi gdab pas re'u cha dgu /dbus su zla ba phyed par bcas pa'i
tshul du bya/ de'i phyi rim phra men ma bcu drug /sgo ba bzhi/ kham phor ri mor bris pa dgu /snang ba'i 'ong bcas pa dgram/ tshil chen dang ni tsit+ta'i tog /
ras chen 'phan gdugs la sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyun du bri bar bya/ /b+han+d+ha'i gnam yol/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod/
rak+ta dri chen gyi maN+Dal bya/ yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsags la 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o/ /dam ma 'dres shing mi gcig pa/ spyod
lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol du byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa de nyid ting nge 'dzin
gnyid dbang du mi btang / spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bsgrub pa dang / srid pa gsum gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal
gyis gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /de la dang por sgrub pa
la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams gcad do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / lta ba dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdzas 'di dag gis rab
tu gcad par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs/ /rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya/ /lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o/ /snying po ni/ oM ru
lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM zhes drang ngo / /de nas bsnyen sgrub lags pa dang / yo byad rnams phyi rol du mid byung / gnas su mi bgyer/ lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes
la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches kha bcad la sba bar bya'o/ /don de ltar byas na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o/ /de ltar ma
byas na/ dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i sgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil
'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gau ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can/ lho ru g.yag gi mgo can/ nub tu seng+ge'i mgo can/ byang du gzig gi
mgo can/ shar lhor pha bang gi mgo can/ lho nub tu pu shud kyi mgo can/ nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can/ byang shar du skya ga'i mgo can/ sgo pa bzhi dgod/
dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsau ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du smigs bu'i mgo can/ lhor bya
rgod kyi mgo can/ nub tu sha ba'i mgo can/ byang du khu byug gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can/ khra mgo can dang / byan lag gi mgo
can dang / pho rog gi mgo can rnams so/ /sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo'i rtsibs
bzhi la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / lhor spyang ki'i mgo can dang / nub tu sbrul gyi mgo can dang / byang du gzig gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir sre mong
mgo can/ dred mgo can dang / sdig pa'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can rnams so/ /sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su be tA
li| pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye shes kyi khro mo bcu drug dgod do/ /mtshams bzhir ye shes kyi khro mo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhir
la dbus su puk+ka si/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can/ lhor nam mkha' lding gi mgo can/ nub tu khyi'i mgo can/ byang du
spang ti'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir yang sprul bzhi dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su g+hasma ri/ de'i phyi
rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/ lhor rin chen dbyings phyug ma/ nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug ma/ byang du las kyi dbyings phyug ma/ nub tu khyi'i
mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/ byi la'i mgo can/ chu srin gyi mgo can/ ra'i mgo can rnams so/ /sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom
gang gru bzhi la dbus su sma sha ni/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad la shar du sti ra'i gnas nyul ma/ lhor rdo rje phung nyul ma/ nub tu mchod pa'i tshogs nyul ma/ byang
du de byi'i sbyor nyul ma/ shar lhor dam tshig rjes gcong ma/ lho nub tu phyi nang gi mtshams nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas phyug ma'i lhag nyul ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir
rdo rje sgrol nyul ma/ bsnyen pa'i mtshams nyul ma/ dgongs pa'i don nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas nyul ma dgod do/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su
tsaN+Da li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje sder mo/ /lhor rdo rje gtum mo/ /nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ /byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib
dang / rdo rje teg teg dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang / sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus
su sid+ha mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la chu srin gyi lus la seng+ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su
byA g+h+r-i mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang+ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su sri
la mu kha| pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la seng+ge'i lus la wa'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su shwa na mu
kha| pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la khyi'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kr-i d+ha mu kha/
pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang+ka'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang+ka mu kha/ pad+ma
'dab ma brgyad la spyang ki'i lus la kang+ka'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang+ka mu kha/ pad+ma
brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab
ma brgyad pa la pho rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo ba bzhi dgod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas
'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las/ phra men ma sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang
thugs las sprul pa'i he ru ka /chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs/ /phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub
bdag la stsol/ /ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro/ /phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad/ /las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril/ /ye
shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /phra men za byed mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /dbang phyug 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can/ /rdo rje mchu can sder chen
gshog pa can/ /phra men za byed chen po dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar/ /mtshon
thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad/ /rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung / /phra men yang sprul chen po dngos grub stsol/ /smon lam grub pa
'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /sems can rnams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /
ye shes chos dbyings skad tshogs zla nyi'i zhal/ /las mdzad ye shes nan tan don la zhugs/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /sgo ba yab
yum dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum/ /las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma/ /phyag brnyan sprul ba sna tshogs 'gro
don mdzad/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje gshogs pa thogs pa yid 'phrog ma/ /rdo rje sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro/ /rdo rje las byed
ma mo brgya yang 'gyed/ /dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal/ /
bla med byang chub sgrub par dam bcas pa/ /bdag cag las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/ sngon
che ye shes brnyes pa'i lha/ /de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /rtse gcig bsnyen kyang ye shes lha dang phra men khyod bsnyen bsnyen/ /bsnyen pa'i dus na
rgyang ma ring / /sgrub pa'i dus na mthu ma chung / /yang bsnyen ni yang yang bsnyen na/ /dpal chen phra men khyed ltar ma lags kyi/ /lang+ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang / /
pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung / /yang bsgrubs pa ni yang bsgrubs na/ /lang+ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang / /ma bas byams shing sring bas gdung / /gdungs
pas mchi ma'i tshul du dku/ /ye shes lha yi thugs kyis bzod lags sam/ /dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang / /sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis
dngos grub stsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to/ /'khor rnams kyis
kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po dngos grub stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub dbyig sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zab mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
thugs rdo rje las phyung nas sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo mjug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis/
kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis/ mdor bsdus na don dam la lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o/ /rgyud 'di mgo mjug gi don dpal kun tu
bzang por 'dus so/ /kun tu bzang po sku mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / gsung mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / sku
gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid gang byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dus so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang
por 'dus pa'i don ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do/ /sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang ba zab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po
la gtad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus ngag yid gsum rjes su yi rang skyes te bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ kun gzhi
rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ /zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rgyal ba'i sku bzhugs so/ /sprul pa mang pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad/ /dpal chen
kun bzang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes khro bo chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs/ /sprul pa'i khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad/ /phra men yang sprul ye
shes dbyings su 'khyil/ /khro bo 'khor mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan cho 'phrul can/ /sku gsung thugs la sprul pa mang po 'phro//
mkha' 'gro za byed phra men pho nya ma/ /mgyogs pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las rnams drag shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i man
ngag gsang chen rnams/ /klung nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum/ /sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams
rjes su yi rang ste legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin te bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan+t+ra 'di sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do/ /de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos
kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang
du gyur pas na/ /lus ngag sems kyis sdig bgyis mthol zhing bshags/ /theg pa dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /thabs chen
spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags/ /ma rig log pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags/ /snying rje chung zhing zhe
sdang dbang du gyur pas na/ /'gro ba'i don ma bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags/ /le lo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ /sgom dang sgrub la g.yel ba mthol
zhing bshags/ /ser sna 'jur bgegs dbang du gyur pas na/ /mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags/ /nga rgyal khengs sems dbang du bsdus
pas na| |slob dpon sku ma mnyes pa mthol zhing bshags/ /rtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /grogs mched thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing
bshags/ /za rogs ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ /phud dang lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/ /phud dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis//
phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags/ /phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis/ /mkha' 'gro bka' chad gnas su gyur pa mthol
zhing bshags/ /sgrol ba'i dus su snying rje chung ba yis/ /sems can gnas ma stob ba mthol zhing bshags/ /nyon mongs gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis/ /
yun gyi sgrib par gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/ /sbyor ba'i dus su ting 'dzin ma gsal bas/ /gzungs ma thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis/ /chags shing
'khor ba'i gnas su mthol zhing bshags/ /bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/ /de skad ces bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
kyang tshangs pa gnang ste bka' dam pa 'di yang nas yang du rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do/ /de nas rdo rje chos kyi bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka'
bzhin byas so/ /de nas 'khor de dag thal mo sbyar nas rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan
'das he ru ka rol pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma
yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rje rol
pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi lo tsA ba mkhas par lobs pa bal po shri kIrtis gtan la phab ste skad gsar pas
bsgyur nas sog po mchog gi snying po dang / an bkra shis dang / bal po bzang bkra shis rgya mtshos yon bdag bgyis nas mang yul byams sprin gyi gtsug
lag khang gi ya thog gi dbu rtser shin tu gsang ste skad gsal bar bsgyur ro/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ra sid+d+hi mahA du ka hr-i da yA na
pa ra bid twan aSh+Ta/ bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po mchog bam po chen po brgyad pa/ dpal kun tu
bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ /shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas//
skal ldan rnams dang thabs cig bzhugs/ /gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na/ /gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe/ /de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun
dang / /rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / /nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang / /dgra bcom ming yang med nang du/ /kun
bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dgongs te 'di skad bstan pa'i lung / /bshad cing 'grol ba'i dus gcig dang / /'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ /srid
gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga/ /ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas/ /dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs/ /ye nas
bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir/ /nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa/ /zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste bstan/ /de nas bde gshegs thams cad dang / /thabs cig bzhugs
te dgongs pa ni/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/ /ye shes mnyam nyid nyams rnyed nas/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de/ /kun gyi dam par 'di gsungs so/ /
bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung / /nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o/ /sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang / /'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang sngags gsang
ba'i man ngag 'di/ /bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung / /snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di/ /byang chub 'byung ba snying po mchog /lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang / /dam
tshig sgrub pa 'phrin las dang / /nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /zab mo bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang / /brgyad khri bzhi
stong rnam grangs kyang / /theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs/ /gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi/ /ldem por dgongs dang don dam
yang / /bkri ba'i don du sangs rgyas yin/ /rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te/ /thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir/ /nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so/ /
sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro/ /nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu/ /gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te/ /byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag /
rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid/ /ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya/ /ye nas bya med bya mi dgos/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i sgra/ /mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul
min no/ /de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin/ /nges 'byung chos sku chen po la/ /b+ha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na/ /byang chub
nyid de ltung gnas med/ /bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos/ /rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang / /dmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul/ /khyad par rtsal 'phang
thag ring yang / /gcig la gcig rten gcig gi dang / /dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas/ /gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med/ /dbyer med dang du
rtogs pa la/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/ /de las sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang / /lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal/ /lnga bzhi nang
du 'khor ba yang / /ye shes sangs rgyas de las med/ /dbyings su gyur pas mnyam gnas pas/ /ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod/ /
skye shi med pa'i dbyings su gyur/ /dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas/ /lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang / /ci spyad ci bsgoms ci
bsgrubs kyang / /bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog /bde gshegs nyid kyi thugs dam nyid/ /byin rlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung / /rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos/ /
sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung / /thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di/ /spros med thig ler gnas pa las/ /mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir/ /rang la mchod
cing rang gis bza'/ /sgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ /ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal
pa'o| |bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las/ byang chub sems de kho na nyid lta bar bstan pa'i man ngag chen po gsang ba'i don dang po ste/ thugs kyi rgya mtsho nang
nas gsang ba'i mdzod chen po las/ bam po chen po brgyad pa'i dang po'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ra sa ya na ta na dz+ha ya/
pra sha sta phra ma na shri kra na shasta ya na mo/ /bod skad du/ tshangs pa la sogs pa drang srong dang / lha dang / klu dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshangs pa'i gtso bo mchog /dung gi thor tshugs khong seng can/ /tshangs pa kun grol chen po dang / /drang srong chen po ljang sngon dang /
tsa ra ka dang nab so skyes/ /tha skar bu dang lha skabs dang / /rgyun shes pa dang g.yon phyogs lha/ /thang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug /dka' gnyis spyod dang
ka la yan/ /shing khyer dang ni ljang sngon pu/ /nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas/ /shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma/ /sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun/ /'di kun 'khor dang bcas
pa yis| |kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sman gyi dbang dang dam tshig mnos/ /drang srong rnams la rjes su gnang / /de nas kun bzang bde gshegs
kyis| |sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi mchog /nges pa'i lung 'di bka' stsal to/ /de nas thugs rje'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /sa rnams rab tu g.yos
nas ni| |stong gsum 'jig rten sa steng du/ /thams cad sman chen ra sa yan/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /de ltar smin par byed pa yang / /
thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po las/ /thugs rje sprin ni khyab pa yis/ /sprin chen glog gi phreng ba can/ /yud tsam sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /sa steng
khengs par char phab nas/ /de nyid thugs rje snyems pa'i mgon/ /chu yi phung po bdud rtsi yis/ /ma lus par ni ngoms par byas/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho
thigs chen gyis/ /sa dang sman rnams kun gyi gsos/ /ri rab rtse mo ri su la dang / /sman ljongs dang ni nags tshal dang / /lcang lo can gyi 'khor kun du//
sman chen bdud rtsi char gyis brlan/ /chu de thams cad ro gcig ste/ /chu yi bcud la skyes pa ni/ /dpag bsam shing dang gel ba'i shing / /ljon shing dang ni tsu
ta'i shing / /sa steng khebs par skyes pa ste/ /bdud rtsir gyur te thams cad rgyas/ /sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang / /rtsa ba sdong bu shun lpags dang / /snying po yal
ga lo ma dang / /'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /de bzhin 'bru yi rnam grangs kun/ /thams cad bangs shing smin par mdzad/ /'thungs na ngoms te rgyas
par gyur/ /so so'i yul dang gnas dag dang / /mdog dang ro dang dri dang mthu/ /gang gis sa bon de nyid las/ /de dag rang rang
'byin par byed/ /de bzhin srog chags thams cad kun/ /ra sa ya na'i rdzas la spyod/ /'gro ba drug gi gsos su 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi sgo ni rnam par phye/ /'jig
rten mgon pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rnon pos bsdus te bka' stsal pa/ lha dang / klu dang / drang
srong dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge bsnyen chen po dri ma med par grags pa li tsa bI la sogs pa la bdud rtsi ra sa ya na ta nan dz+ha ya 'di dag bstan no/ /
dang por bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas ni/ u hu si ti pa tsa zhes bya ste/ /ba tri sa zhes kyang bya ba ri'i rgyal po gser mdog can gyi rtse mo rta rna ri zhes bya ba der ras
ya na zhes bya ba drang srong rnams kyis bsgrubs so/ /de yang thang gcig yud kyis 'grub/ /la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'grub/ /la la nyin zhag bdun gyis
'grub/ /tha ma nyi shu gcig gis 'grub/ /de la the tshom med bas 'grub/ /de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa ba sdong bu yal ga dang / /lo ma 'dab ma me
tag dang / /shun lpags 'bras bu snying por bcas/ /ro dang mthu dang mdog dang las/ /rtsa ba gcig la yan lag brgyad/ /yan lag brgyad la yon tan stong / /'di dag
kun gyi yon tan yang / /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing / /bdud bzhi nges par 'joms par byed/ /sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi'i mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po 'di kun kyang / /mngon shes lnga dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /rig pa'i gnas mchog bco brgyad shes/ /de nas sman ni bsgrub par bya/ /
stegs bu khru gang pa gcig la/ /maN+Dal gtsang ma'i dris byugs la/ /de yi dbus su sman gyi mchog /bdud rtsi cong zi rnam gsum dang / /ser skya ba las byung ba
yi| |'o ma bre gang btsags nang du/ /a sho kanada'i phye ma dang / /bsres nas bskol ba'i nang du gdab/ /lcags las byas pa'i snod du blugs/ /stegs bu'i dbus
su bzhag nas ni/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags 'di dag /stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /oM badzra a mr-i ta/ pa la li ka /be la lig tsa na da lig swAhA/ dngos
grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /a mr-i ta sid+d+hi byi tsurna ya swAhA/ bu tsa lha ha ka na/ byin gyis brlab cing bza' ba yang / /nyi ma'i gung la bza' bar bya/ /don dam
thig le bden pa las/ /snying po med las snying po blang / /rnam smin 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'grub/ /nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar byed/ /de
nas drang srong nyi shu gcig /grub pa'i rig 'dzin mchog tu gyur/ /de yi 'og tu drang srong mchog /bco lnga yis ni bdud rtsi sman/ /ra sa ya na dam pa 'di/ /tshe yi
rig 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir/ /gzhon nu sred ces bya ba dang / /'dron skyob ces ni bya ba dang / /rtsibs kyi mu khyud la sogs pas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du bsgrubs//
lha rdzas dag pa a ru ra/ /rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni/ /brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe/ /thigs pa bdun ni kha nas lhung / /rlung gis khyer te sa las skyas//
bdud rtsi'i gtso bor rab tu grags/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang / /'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad/ /dus min 'chi las thar bar byed/ /rlung mkhris
bad kan 'di kun yang / /gcig la'ang lnga lnga yod par bshad/ /de kun rab tu bsal ba'i phyir/ /phung po'i bdud dang nyon mongs bdud/ /lha bu'i bdud dang
'chi bdag bcom/ /bdud rtsi 'di yis sel bar byed/ /shar lho nub byang gang yang rung / /brag phug stong pa yod pa las/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i khu ba ni//
rin chen sna lnga 'byung ba 'o/ /ming ni shi la mdza' du zhes/ /ra sa ya na bdud rtsi'i mchog /a ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /sul bu zlum
por gyur btsos te/ /de dag rab tu btsos pa dang / /lcags zangs 'khar ba'i snod nang du/ /bkang ste stegs bu gong ma yi/ /dbus su bdud rtsi sman de gzhag /byin
gyis brlab pa snga ma bzhin/ /'od dang dri bro ba'ang med/ /rtags 'di rnam gsum gang byung yang / /lag pa g.yon pa bkan te 'phyar/ /mthe bong srin lag mthil du
dgug /blangs te btung ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /oM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi byi tsurna ya/ /lha ha ka na zhes brjod do/ /de yi yon tan brjod mi lang / /rdo rje brag dang 'drar 'gyur
te| |nad med rtag tu dar la bab/ /grub pa'i rig 'dzin dam par 'gyur/ /srid pa chags nas srub shing gis/ /bsrubs pa'i 'bras bu rin po che/ /me shel
chu shel gnyis byung ba/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab ste/ /nyin mtshan gnyis la dbang byed pa'o/ /de nyid zung yang 'khor du bcas/ /de nas bdud rtsi zags
pa ni| |sa dman dag tu mi skye ste/ /a la pe tas sar kal ba/ /lha dang dri za gnod sbyin dang / /rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs gnas/ /legs ldan gangs
ra gnyan gyi shod/ /ri brag chu klung bgegs gnas su/ /lhung nas babs te skyes pa ni/ /oM lika dang bris rtsi ka /nyi ma gzi brjid ldan pa'i chu/ /
a la be ta sar sra kal ba br-ik+Sha 'bru/ /de bzhin zla ba gzi ldan chu/ /de yi sa bon lhung ba ni/ /gser mdog bdud rtsi 'dra bar gsal/ /dmar ba mer blugs pus pus
zer| |gzugs bzang mdzes pa phun sum tshogs/ /tsher ma rno ba dbal dang ldan/ /bdud rtsi shing dang 'bras bur ldan/ /dug rnams 'joms shing slar yang
zlog /sna tshogs nad rnams sel bar byed/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i mdog /ro yang rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /rak+ta'i gtso bor 'di sbyor cig /tshangs pa tshe dang
ldan par 'gyur/ /nyi ma zla ba'i dngos grub thob/ /ra sa ya na'i gtso bo yin/ /de nas drang srong gzhon nu srid/ /khyab 'jug spang gnyis bya ba yi/ /rwa yi gzhu
thogs mi srun pa/ /lag na mtshon cha sna lnga thogs/ /de yis srid pa chags pa'i bcud/ /bdud rtsi rnam lnga bskus pa las/ /kha nas thigs gnyis sa la lhung //
de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i mchog /ra sa ya na phyi ma'i rgyud/ /bu mo bzang mo gcig tu gyur/ /chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma la/ /yod de skye ba bstan pa ni/ /nye'u shing ngam
nye'u zhes bya'o/ /gan+ta ku le par pa ta/ /gnad pri ya ku mahA go na sig ham kha/ tsher ma yar lta mar lta ba'o/ /de la lha bran tshogs kun gyis/ /bskor zhing mchod pa byed
pa yin| |ston zla tha chung dpyid zla 'bring / /nya yi tshe na btsal bar bya'o/ /btsal ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar ro/ /byis pa lo drug lo bdun pa/ /khrus byas dar ldan gos
bskon nas/ /shar phyogs ngos su kha bltas te/ /lha phyag lan gsum byas nas ni/ /de dag rtsa nas dbyung ba'i sngags/ /tad+ya thA/ sho hod ga te da re swAhA/ phyag 'tshal
bdud rtsi mchog khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi las byung ba/ /stobs dang gzi brjid 'phel mdzad ma/ /rang byung ston pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur cig/
khu ba ra sa ya ni mchog /dngos grub mchog tu nye ba khyod/ /tshe dang stobs ni bdag stsol cig /ye shes thams cad gsal bar mdzod/ /shun lpags dang ni rgyud pa
gsal| |tho to bsnyil te slar la sba'o/ /snying po brdungs la khu ba yang / /ras ni gsar pa'i nang du btsir/ /bdag nyid lus kyang khrus byas te/ /dar ldan gos bzang
gyon nas ni/ /sman du sgrub pa'i 'dzab la 'jug /bsnyen dang 'dzab sgom byas nas ni/ /stong ngam 'bum mam ci nus bzla/ /bza' ba'am yang na 'thung ba'i tshe/ /
nyug chu ba yi 'o ma btung / /yang na phye ma mchog tu bgam/ /bza' zhing btung ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /na ma dza ra a ga dza tu swAhA/ zhag gam za ma re re yang //
srang re'i cha nas bskyed de bza'/ /zos pa'i yon tan 'di rnams so/ /lus ngag yid gsum dbang po gsal/ /bdud rtsi 'di dag su 'thung ba/ /ji ltar lha rnams 'chi med
ltar| |klu rnams la ni sman bzhin no/ /shing rnams la ni chu bzhin no/ /me tog la ni zla ba bzhin/ /lo ni lnga brgya lon bar du/ /bcu drug mdog ni
gzhon nu 'dra/ /nad med rtag tu dar la bab/ /stobs kyang glang po che dang 'dra/ /mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'o ma dag dang btung ba 'am/ /
mar khu'am sbrang rtsi dag dang btung / /zhag gcig zas na yon tan bcu/ /zhag bdun zos na yon tan brgya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig zos na ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad
'dis thob par 'gyur/ /bud med stong la khyab par sbyor/ /sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang / /bu phor 'phel zhing dpa' dang ldan/ /mi rnams kyis ni
mi sod do/ /zla gcig zos na yon tan ni/ /ngo yang zla ba nya ba bzhin/ /gnod sbyin srin pos mi sod do/ /lha rnams kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /zag pa zad nas nam
mkhar 'phur/ /rdo rje 'gros kyis nam mkhar 'gro/ /rig 'dzin go 'phang 'dir thob bo/ /'dres pa gang zag mi yi zas/ /zos na dngos grub mi thob nges/ /zhes lung du bka' stsal to//
de nas dang sreng trag sha na/ /rgyal po bshes gnyen can zhes bya/ /lha dang drang srong thams cad la/ /mchod sbyin rgya chen byas pa las/ /ma hA de ba lha chen po/ /kun gyi mjug
tu spyan drangs pas/ /lha chen drag po de khros te/ /lha chen de yi dpral ba las/ /mig gcig lhag par byung ba ste/ /lha dang drang srong thams cad la/ /rlung mkhris bad kan sna
tshogs dang / /de bzhin mi la rims nad dang / /rlung lha'i lag par bskur nas gtor/ /lha dang drang srong mang pos kyang / /ma shes mtshor myos par gyur/ /phye ma'i rgyal po 'dab
ma 'di| |sa steng khyab par skyes pa la/ /drang srong rnams kyang mchod pa byed/ /lug mig me tog chen po 'di/ /ra sa ya na'i rgyal mo ste/ /ba yi 'o ma dag ngang bskol/ /rngubs
gcig 'thungs pas ba spu langs/ /rdubs gnyis 'thung ba'i yon tan ni/ /rims nad thams cad byang bar byed/ /rngubs gsum 'thungs pa'i yon tan ni/ /mig rtsa dmar
zhing mdog kyang gzhon/ /phye ma grim mar bskams pa dang / /ma to la yi khu bar sbyar/ /blud na dgra rnams myos par 'gyur/ /lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /byin gyis
brlab pa'i sngags 'di'o/ /stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzla/ /oM so'u gri bA ha na ha na hUM/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ tse ta ya tse ta ya su gri pa phaT/ bdud rtsi ra sa ya na'i gtso/ /shu
dag dang ni ru rta dang / /phye mar byas te su blud pa/ /rgyal po bud med dbang du 'gyur/ /gri ha 'gro lo ki dang sbyar/ /dgra la blud na rna ba 'on/ /lug mig grib mar bskams pa dang / /su
ta'i 'o mar sbyar ba ni/ /dgra la blud na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lha chen drag pos bskyed pa ni/ /'jam dpal gzhon nus mkhyen pa las/ /lha dang drang srong gzhan mi shes/ /de skad ces bcom
ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nus mi mjed kyi bdag po lha tshangs pa dang / drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / bskal pa bzang po'i mi'i byang chub sems dpa' li tsa bI la sogs
pa rnams la bka' stsal to/ /de yang tshe phyi ma'am dus phyi mar mi sdod par bskal pa bzang po'i 'bras bu mngon du thob pa yang 'bras bu tshe 'di nyid la smon to/ /de nas rtsi yi lha mo mchog /

ming ni grub pa'i blo gros ma/ /bu mo mu la zhes bya ba/ /de yi sa bon lhung ba ni/ /'dzam gling shing gi nags la skyes/ /rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa/ /ra sa ya na'i gtso mo ste/ /rtsa ba rak+ta mu la
kha| |rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /mthun bar zad par dmar ba ste/ /'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam/ /gyen du zug pa de brko ba/ /ston zla ra ba'i nyal brko'o/ /srid pa'i na dang nags las skyes//

khrag gi nyungs ma zhes ni grags/ /rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang / /pad+ma'i rak+ta cha mnyam bsres/ /de dag sgrub pa'i sngags 'di'o/ /oM na mo ra ga rak+ta mu la phu ne swAhA/ 'gro ba dbang byed dam pa
yin| |rtsi yi lha mos bka' stsal to/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /rgyal bu don grub bya ba ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung ni/ /sha ri ram zhes grags pa yin/ /de yi sa bon 'phel ba ni/ /'dzam

gling sa steng khyab par skyes/ /ma hA ni le zhes bya ba/ /ming ni tha skar rdo rje yin/ /me tog tha skar bzhin du ste/ /snye ma zur gsum til gang 'dra/ /rdo rje brag kyang 'joms par nus/ /sha ri ram dang
rus pa yi/ /sbyar ba'i phrad kyi dam par rung / /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /de yi yon tan thams cad kyang / /rus pa sra mkhregs rdo rjer 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang mnyam/ /ra sa ya
na'i mchog tu gsungs/ /de nas lha yi dbang po mchog /brgya byin bu yi lag pa ru/ /gnod sbyin rgyal pos mda' brgyab pa/ /de yi dum bu lag sor yang / /sa steng khyad par skyes pa ni/ /si bi
rtse lag dbang po lag /sdong bu yal ga 'dzer ba med/ /me tog zur gsum mda' sgro 'dra/ /rtsa ba lag sor lnga pa ste/ /dbyar zla tha chung nya la brko/ /sgrub pos lag mthil g.yon du gzhag /
ra sa yan thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /de tshe med du mi rung ngo / /mang du 'phel 'gyur bsgrub rdzas yin/ /lus la 'byung ba'i dri chen dang / /bsgral ba'i dri chen yungs
kar gsum/ /cha mnyam 'thungs na dug rnams thub/ /'tsho byed dug ni sel ba'i phyir/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /'chi bdag bdud kyang
des bcom mo/ /purna zhes bya'i rna ba yang / /srin po purna'i rna ba ste/ /bsgral ba'i rna ba dag dang sbyar/ /rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /b+ha hu lug mig me
tog dang / /mkha' lding bya yi mig dang sbyar/ /A la bi ga shang shang de'u/ /rma bya ngang pa ko ki la/ /'di rnams bsgral ba'i mig dang sbyar/ /mig gis mngon shes des thob ste/ /stobs
ldan gyi ni mig yin no/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /tsi tra ka dang snying zho sha /thams cad gnod sbyin snying gi brla/ /bsgral ba'i tsit+ta dag dang sbyar/ /mngon shes lnga yi dngos
grub thob/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /bud med gong bshad 'dra ba yi/ /klad pa go ro tsa na 'byung / /de ni ban glang rigs can yin/ /bsgral ba'i klad pa thams cad dang / /thang
phal hwa yi rtsa bar sbyar/ /mdangs kyi dngos grub des thob 'gyur/ /ha lce ki ya kha 'bar ma'i/ /lce yin pas na lce dang sbyar/ /dbang ngo lcags kyi dngos grub dang / /spyan ras gzigs
kyi dngos grub thob/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /srid pa'i bdag po tshangs pa'i gtso/ /ming ni mgo btsun phya zhes bya'o/ /nal gyi bu ni dzi hwa zhes/ /skad ma phyung gi lce zhes bya'o/ /

skad phyung ba ni tshangs pa ste/ /skad ma phyung gi grub par gcad/ /de dang sbyar ba'i 'phrad du ni/ /me tog rma lo kril kril ste/ /ming ni ba ya sa ya 'o/ /rtsa ba mahA go na sig /me tog gser gyi mdun zhu

can| |shar phyogs su ni kha lta ba/ /'di'i kun ha ki ya ste/ /cha mnyam btags te phye mar bya/ /zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/ /yi dam lha la mchod bya zhing / /phye ma rgya chang nang du gdab/ /thang gcig yud

kyis 'grub pa ste/ /rta mgrin dbang gi dngos grub thob/ /bsgral ba'i lce ni thams cad dang / /sbyar ba 'phrad kyi dam par rung / /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /sna dang sna ma'i 'bras bur sbyar/ /tshangs

pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrogs nus 'gyur/ /bsgral ba'i sna ni thams cad sbyar/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /dung dang 'brug rus gdung dang ni/ /bsgral ba'i rus pa thams cad sbyar/ /lus kyi rdo rje mngon

shes thob/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /rgya mtsho dbu pa 'dus pa'i chu/ /sna tshogs chu dang gangs kyi chu/ /lan tshwa sna tshogs dri chu rnams/ /bsgral ba'i chu ni thams cad sbyar/ /rdo rje chu yi bdud rtsi ste/ /rtag tu 'gro
ba'i don byed nus/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /dgongs pa'i don sems can mtha' dag la snang ba dang / /nus mthu'i yon tan gyis sems can kun la phan 'dogs par nus so/ /'gro ba yongs kyi gsos
mdzad par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ye shes kyi thugs nas dgongs nas mgur gyi bum par bris te ljags kyi dbang po la bkram ste zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas mkhyen rab kyi
dbang po 'jam dpal rnon po dang / rdo rje chos la bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sras mchog nye ba dang / tshangs pa dang / drang srong dang / lha dang / klu dang / mi'i byang chub
sems dpa' ba ma la g+hi rti rnams la bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi sde las/ sman ras yan sgrub pa'i lung 'bum sde las btus pa bam po chen po gnyis pa'o// //rgya gar

skad du| pra dz+nyA b+ha ga wA na ma hA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis med kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas spyod pa bstan te/ lung a nu yog pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du bstan
te| lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang / /gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin dam tshig chen po'ang bstan/ /las 'di lung gis bsgrub bya na/ /mi spong ba ni dang du blang / /spyod pa dam tshig

bco lnga bsrung / /shes pa lnga dang srung ba gsum/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bsrungs pas ni/ /rtsa brgyad stong zhes de la bya'o/ /de yang ma hA sa ma ya/ /bzhi po rdzogs na kun tu bzang / /zhi rgyas dbang dang
mngon spyod dang / /mnan zlog drug ni gcig tu'o/ /dang la ga na'i lung bshad de/ /khru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa ni/ /yon tan bcu gcig dang yang ldan/ /bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus ring ba/ /stod smad
