phye la rked pa phra/ /tshigs pa zlum la sor mo ring / /yon tan 'od can bcu gcig lo/ /ye shes rigs can yin par bshad/ /bcu gsum rdo rje rigs su 'grub/ /bcu drug sngags pas 'grub
nges pa'o/ /rin chen rigs mchog yin par bstan/ /nyi shu gcig pa pad+ma'i rigs/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog 'grub/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pas ni/ /thogs med byang chub sems kyang 'dren/ /thams
cad las kyi rigs mchog 'grub/ /sum cu rtsa gcig phan chad kyis/ /sems phebs tshun chad kun tu dge'o/ /yid du 'ong ba dam pa yin/ /bder gshegs rigs su 'grub par bshad/ /bde chen

'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/ /de dag ma lus gang rnyed pa/ /lus kyang khrus byas gtsang mar bya'o/ /dri zhim tsan+dan go ban dang / /dzA ti pha la ku ru tshe/ /ka ko la dang ga bur dang / /a ka ru dang du ru ska/ /g+hi
baM glang bo'i spos rnams kyis/ /byugs nas rgyan dang phreng ba gdags/ /dar dang ras bal 'jam po dang / /gos rgyan chas klubs bskon nas ni/ /gser gyi rna cha gdub dkor dang / /do shal dpung rgyan se

mo do| |rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags/ /ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dag la/ /g.yon phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang / /sgrub dang sgrub chen bya ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi

pa| |'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/ /rdo rje dri chus maN+Dal byugs/ /sha chen gu gul pog gis bdug /dkyil 'khor de la bskor te bdug /g.yon du de byi bzhag nas ni/ /b+ha ga da nyid byin gyis brlab//
spyi bor oM dkar 'od ldan pa/ /lce la a dmar dam pa bsam/ /snying gar zla dkyil hUM mthing ga /lte bar swa sngon 'od ldan pa/ /rkang par ha ljang 'od ldan pa/ /ba las pad+ma'i dbyings su yang //
gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bsam/ /nyon mongs lnga rnams sbyang ba dang / /sdug bsngal lnga ni tshar bcang phyir/ /lag g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /g.yon pa
ro langs chen mo ste/ /de yi kha la khro gnyer ma/ /ral pa gcig ma pad+ma la'o/ /gsang yum lnga dang khro mo bzhi/ /byin gyis brlabs te sngags bzlas pa/ /oM AHhUM swAhA/
b+ha ga wA na ni nyid kyi bka'/ /phyag rgya bzhi ru bdag gyur pas/ /gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas/ /lha yi bdud dang phung po'i bdud/ /nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag
bcom| |phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan/ /mkha' la sems phebs 'phros pa'i tshe/ /byang chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis su med pa'i sar phyin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang / /mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun/ /bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /bde chen nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/ /
sangs rgyas nyid kyis ni mkhyen to/ /phyi nang ma lus snod bcud kyang / /byang chub sems su rnam dag pas/ /skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings/ /gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po ste/ /yab yum
bde ba'i ngang du gsal/ /'di ni snying po byang chub sems/ /bdar gshegs kun gyis bka' stsal to/ /lus kun yongs su 'khyud pa yis/ /rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas nas/ /rang byung rnams ni bde
mchog sems/ /phul bas myur du grub pa'o/ /oM ra ga pU dza ho/ /dngos grub blang zhing 'di brjod do/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur to/ /dngos grub sgrub pa la gzung ngo / /bdud rtsi chen po

mchog gi lung gi nang nas/ sgrub pa chen po'i lung dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sbyor ba'i man ngag dang / gla na sgrub pa'i lung dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang / /a mr-i ta sgrub pa'i
lung ste bam po chen po gsum pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sta na ma hA da ra pany+tsa/ bod skad du/ 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'o/ /dpal chen khro rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /mi phyed dang bas phyag 'tshal na/ /de nas sta na'i lung bshad de/ /ye nas rgyu nyid dag pa las/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yis/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu ru gyur/ /khams
gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing / /A sa ma tsa la d+harma d+ha tu swa b+ha ba At+ma ko nya haM/ raM yaM khaM ta tha phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i dang / /
dbang pha yug chen po'i bsgral thabs ni/ /'tsho ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog /thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang / /thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'gro ba thams cad
sbyong bar mdzad/ /bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun/ /gnyis med phyag rgyar rol pa yis/ /dus la bab po sa ma ya/ /oM sarba pA pa ka he ha sa si staM/ traM ka ru ni hUM dza dza/
ma tang gi ni rnam shes de/ /nges par gzugs la bab nas ni/ /Ta ki zhal ni nub tu bstan/ /dbang du bsdu ba'i las mdzad kyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
byin gyis rlob/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing / /sta na chen po bya ba'i phyir/ /bder gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing / /byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis/ /nyon
mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral te/ /gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad/ /sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/ /gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba yis/ /yul las 'das pa'i sgo phye zhig
ces brjod de sgo dbye'o/ /ka ta ri ka na pra be sha /g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis ru tra'i gzugs/ /gnas kyi sgo 'di bcad bzhin du/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su gsol/ /
shi ba'i sdug bsngal 'dir byung ngo / /zhes lha chen po brgyad kyis dus gcig tu tshig de smras so/ /Ta ki brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dregs pa ma rungs lha chen khyod/ /sems
kyi sgo kun de dbye yi/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i spu gri yis/ /gnas kyi sgo kun de phye nas/ /sems kyis bdag pos gzung bar bya/ /ston pas gsungs pa/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba
yin| |sdig pa'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi/ /bdag kyang dngos por lta bas 'jig /nga yi bstan pa 'di la gzung / /'on kyang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bral/ /gzugs 'dzin
rkang lag yul las bzlas/ /pho mo bsnol te mnan pa yang / /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bsnan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su brkyang / /Ta ki'i zhabs ni g.yas pa yis/ /ru tra
ling+ga'i steng du mnan/ /de ltar ling+ga mnan byas na/ /thar byed chen po'i 'gying stabs kyis/ /rngam brjid chen pos 'di skad do/ /sa ma ya ke sha tsi Ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ces mnan
no| |ma hA de ba ru tra dza zhes pa dang / khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams/ /rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis/ /'od zer tshul du bsdus nas ni/ /de dag bdag gis gzugs
la gzung / /spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyis/ /sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya'o/ /thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /brod pa can rnams 'ong ba ltar/ /skal dang ldan
pa rigs kyi bu/ /bde bar 'ongs pa legs te 'ongs/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis/ /rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta'i dbyings nyid du/ /khams
gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o/ /chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la/ /bde bar gshegs dang 'gro ba zhes/ /dbyings su gcig pas gnyis su med/ /kun kyang ngo bo mnyam nyid de/ /
thams cad snying po byang chub sems/ /ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig /bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku/ /thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad/ /ye gnas de ltar de bzhin du/ /
sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos/ /bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ /rtag chad mtha' gnyis ma spangs te/ /nor bas btags pa'i phung po lnga/ /
log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu bsags te/ /'khor ba'i rgyud lnga kha brims pas/ /mya ngan mi 'da' yun ring ste/ /phung po khams dang skye
mched la/ /'khrul pa'i phag chags bag la nyal/ /bde 'gro'i lam la bsgribs pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyun gcad phyir/ /ngan song rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /ma
ta ma ta sarba pre ta ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba ti ra ya he tuM phaT/ da ha da ha sarba na ra ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ de ltar ngan song rnams sbyangs te/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo
bcad phyir/ /raM ya khaM zhes brjod la/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te/ /mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur/ /dus la bab pa'i sems can de/ /las la bab pa'i
rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /skal dang ldan pa'i rnam shes des/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//
sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye/ /gsung gis sems can mtha' dag grol/ /thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan/ /nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /tshe dpag
med par dbang bskur nas/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag sgrol/ /yang dag bsgral na bde chen thob/ /mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/ /phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas/ /rgyal
ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong / /rgyu drug gnas su mi skye phyir/ /dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag /oM AHhUM swAhA/ 'og min dga' ldan lha yul du/ /ye shes rlung gis
brten nas ni/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT gyis 'phang / /a nri su tri pri du/ gang yang rung ba'i rnam shes de/ /gsang ba'i dbyings su hUM gis bsdu/ /skur bskyed ye shes
skur spros te/ /dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams dang / /bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor du/ /rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa
yis| |'phags pa'i lam du rlung zhugs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing gshegs/ /'jig rten lha yi gtso bo dang / /nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / /sa bcu'i
byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod/ /stug pos brgyan pa'i sa 'das nas/ /pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gzhag /'chi ba med pa'i chos sku thob/ /
stong gsum ma lus bton pa bas/ /'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/ /rang sems ma bcos ye nas chub/ /skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgral ba 'ba' zhig snying rje'i mchog
de nas ma trang ru tra de bsgral te/ /sngon byung ba yi gleng gzhi dang / /gtan tshigs su dgongs nas phyi rabs kyi sngags 'chang rnams yid ches par bya ba dang
dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams drang ba'i phyir dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang / ma mo chen po brgyad dang / rang byung gi mchod rten chen po brgyad/ 'di man chang gtan
tshigs dang bcas te bstan to/ /gong du bsgral ba'i bsam rgyud ni/ 'og nas zhib tu bstan no/ /'di yang bsnor te lung dkyus nas bstan no/ /bdud dang dbang phyug gshin rje
de| |thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas/ /ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te/ /dzam+bu gling lo'i gling khams su/ /bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni/ /dur khrod chen po brgyad du gyur//
mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon brkyang / /mgo dang lus snying yan lag kun/ /gnas kyi dur
khrod chen po brgyad/ /de ni dpal chen bzhugs gnas yin/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /ro yi srung mchen mo ni/ /ma mo chen mo brgyad gzhag go /de yi gnas
rten chen por yang / /mchod rten chen po gzi byin can/ /rang byung re re bzhag pa yin/ /de ltar sa gzhi 'di kun yang / /bkra shis ya mtshan thugs rje can/ /chos dang
dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/ /cho 'phrul 'byung bar bka' stsal to/ /de yi lus snying ma ga ta/ /dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal/ /ma mo chen mo ke'u ri gnas/ /mkhas shing snying
stobs che ba'i sa'o/ /mchod rten ming ni bde byed rten/ /de yi mgo bo lho phyogs kyi/ /dur khrod chen po bzhag pa ni/ /sing+ga yul gyi gling phran yin/ /ma mo chen mo tse'u ri gnas/ /
mthong thos rnam pa'i 'phrul bag can/ /mchod rten ri bo ta la la/ /lag pa g.yas pa shar lho'i mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po bal yul yin/ /ma mo chen mo puk+ka si/ /lhag par
zas kyi longs spyod che/ /mchod rten kha sho byA g+h+r-i kha'o/ /lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po sa la'i yul/ /ma mo chen mo be tA li/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang gi
gnas| |de ni mthu dang dbang yang che/ /gyad yul chen po'i sa las ni/ /mchod rten ma la sa gnad/ /rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po li yi yul/ /ma
mo chen mo tsaN+Da li/ /lha mo shang ki ni zhes grags/ /chu dang me grub rdzu 'phrul can/ /mchod rten ming ni ge'u to shan/ /rkang pa g.yon ba nub byang mtshams/ /dur khrod chen po
kha che'i yul/ /ma mo chen mo pra mo ha/ /bde skyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs/ /mchod rten ming ni ska ni ska/ /pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na/ /dur khrod chen po u rgyan yul/ /
ma mo chen mo g+ha sma ri/ /'byor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan/ /dngos grub can yang de na mang / /gzi yi mchod rten chen po ste/ /ming yang d+harma tsa kra 'o/ /de
yi nang khrol thams cad kun/ /dur khrod chen po za hor yul/ /rgya mtsho'i sgo gling ma ha do/ /lang+ga bu rangs srin po'i gnas/ /ma mo chen mo sma sha ni/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul
bsam mi khyab/ /srin po srin mo sha za rnams/ /de dag kun la dbang sgyur zhing / /rin chen nor bu dpag bsam shing / /'byor pa'i yo byad kun dang ldan/ /mchod rten bde
byed gzhon nu 'o/ /'jig rten kun tu bstan pa yi/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad do/ /de ltar sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzam gling du/ /skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas/ /phyi rabs sngags kyi sgrub pa pos/ /'jigs byed chen po khrag
'thung gi /dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du/ /bskyod nas byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ /sngags mchog bdud rtsir bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rgyu dang dam rdzas thams cad ni/ /sangs
rgyas grub pa'i rgyu dang bzhi/ /dam tshig dam par srung ba'i rdzas/ /byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'o/ /de nas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ nges don gcig tu
lam rgyud lnga ni/ 'bras bu chen po lnga yin te/ de dag thams cad 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis dus gcig tu bsgral ba'i phyir bdud yak+Sha ma hA ru tra zhes bya ba zhig dus der

bsgral zhing gnas spar ro/ /de la/ bdag nyid sku ni smug nag 'bar/ /phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /pra dz+nyA ke sha tsit+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma nu d+ha raM to sha phyung / u ma dar ma badzra

ma hA maM sa/ tra ma kha'i zhes bsgral te/ e h+ye hi ma hA ru tra/ sha tu ma ka ra/ badzra ni hUM phaT/ ma hA de ba ru tra hUM dza dzA zhes brjod de/ sta na dang g+ha na chen por byas te rnam par shes pa
byang chub sems su dbang bskur ro/ /de na sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /dur khrod bdag po btul nas ni/ /'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus/ /'jig rten gtso bo lha brgyad
dang | |srin mo brgyad dang bu mo brgyad/ /dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis/ /'di skad ces ni khas blangs te/ /mgrin gcig tu ni rab smras pa/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis/ /
bskal pa bas kyang sreg mdzad pa/ /'jigs tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can/ /dbu mang rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing / /phyag mang 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams/ /zhi ba'i phyag stong
spyan stong yang / /'jig rten khams kun spa gong na/ /khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong gis/ /dpa' bo sgeg dang 'jigs su rung / /rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje
rngam dang zhi bar ston/ /'bar ba'i tshogs chen sna tshogs can/ /khams gsum lha chen thams cad dang / /'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/ /e
ma ho cha mchog he ru ka/ khro rgyal khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /thugs rje nan tan bdag cag gzung / /gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus
snying | |dum bu brgyar ni gtubs 'gyur bgyid/ /de phyir 'bar bas bdag ma gtang / /zhes mthun par smras so/ /khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing / /rgyu drug
gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas/ /mi ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid/ /thig le chen pos dbang bskur te/ /zla gsang dbus na byang
chub sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la sam nyi med/ /sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/ bde gshegs lnga yi sa bon ste/ /rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad/ /phyi rol chen
po lnga dag la/ /nang gi rgyu 'bras ye nas dag /mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de/ /dmigs su med pas dag pa yin/ /maM sa rin chen 'byung ldan po/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam
dbyer med do/ /snag pa rak+ta mtha' yas thugs/ /skye 'gag med de ye nas dag /don yod dri chu las grub pa/ /dri med rgyu nas rnam par dag /kun kyang gtsang zhing dri med
pas| |thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga/ /lus pa med pas ye shes dang / /ma bcos ye nas de nyid do/ /de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog /bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/ /rtog
pa'i klong du su 'dris pa/ /mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med/ /'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i rgyu/ /sprul pas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yin/ /rang gi
lus la bsdu ba'i phyir/ /sku gsum rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur/ /de phyir bsgrub pa'i rdzas su gsungs/ /de skad ces sman spyod pa'i lung du bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi chen po
mchog gi lung 'bum sder bzhugs pa'i nang nas lung a nu yo ga'i spyod pa bla na med bstan pa ste bam po chen po bzhi pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ta thA ga ta
pany+tsa bud+d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma hA yo ga'i don du sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to/ /ri ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang
ba'i| |yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa/ /dri sna lnga yis maN+Dal bya'o/ /thig bzhi
btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /maN+Dal brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin bri/ /de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri/ /de yi dbus su bsam pa yang / /srid
gsum b+han+d+ha bzang kong yug /ye nas ma bcos rang byung snod/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la/ /de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman/ /ye nas rang byung
bdud rtsi lnga/ /sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag /dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi'i dngos/ /stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag /btag dang bcag dang gzhal ba yi/ /nyi zla gsal ba'i
dkyil 'khor du/ /'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las/ /stong khams khyab par don byas te/ /bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir/ /bka'
bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub blang / /mu tig dkar po dri med ltar/ /sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o/ /mgu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /gzhung bzhin brtan nas 'phro 'du bya/ /
de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis/ /dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya/ /dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya'o//
oM gyis ye shes 'od phyung zhing / /A yis mes bsregs thal bar 'gyur/ /hUM gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag /gsal la 'byung 'jug lhan ne bos/ /rtags dang mtshan ma
bdun gyis 'byung / /'od dang du ba dri dang sgra/ /lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/ /mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin/ /de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya/ /mtshan ma'i rtags
dag ma byung na/ /bskang gso'i cho ga rgya skyed cig /spogs thags bskyar la rtsal shugs dbyung / /dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir/ /bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag/ de
nas mchod cing dngos grub blang / /slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro/ /bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod/ /gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /dag
dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das/ /snga ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba/ /dus gsum gcig la sku bstan phyi bshol med/ /dngos grub sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can/ /su 'dod
sbyin gyi da lta 'di la longs/ /skal par sbrebs dang gti mug mun nag la/ /sprin mthongs nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin/ /bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin pas/ /rig 'dzin rgyal
po gtso bo'i go 'phang thob/ /tshe dang skong dang yid du 'ong / /bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te/ /nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i/ /yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis thob/ /ces bka'
stsal nas de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lung 'di las/ /dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa/ /'khor rnams
kun gyis thob par shog /ces bka' stsal to/ /yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas yang rigs lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso bo la
lung gi don zhus pa/ rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta/ don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes gsol pa las/ kun tu bzang po dang / rigs lnga bde bar
gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /klu dang bram ze gtsang ma za/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /byol song rtswa
mchog za ba yang / /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /yang dag don gyi lung 'di nyon/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni/ /chos sku gcig las tha
dad pa'i/ /rigs lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do/ /'di ltar rtog na grol zhes bshad/ /rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su rab rtogs na/ /gnyis med don
gyis zin pa yin/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /dngos dang dngos med rtog pa'i mchen/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan/ /mkhas pas dbus la gnas mi 'gyur/ /
ye shes sku lnga bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems ni dkar bas na/ /dri med dkar bas ye shes sku'o/ /rak+ta chags med dmar bas na/ /chags med rnam dag chos kyi sku/ /maM sa
yid bzhin rin chen sngo/ /sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam nyid sku'o/ /rin chen gser mdog snang mdzad de/ /mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o/ /dri chu dag byed ljang khu'i mdog /
kun tu don grub las rab sku'o/ /sku lnga lhun grub bdud rtsi 'di/ /so so'i lus la gnas pa yin/ /dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang / /maM sa sems chu 'di rnams kun/ /sems can rtog pa zlog pa'i
phyir| |gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o/ /gtsang sme med par kun gyis spyod/ /'di dag grol bar ngas bshad do/ /the tshom med pas dngos grub thob/ /spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas/ /tshe
'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /'di yan chad ma hA yo ga'i don gyi lung dang / sgrub thabs bdud rtsi chen po
'bum sde las btus pa'i bam po chen po lnga pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li na ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'khyal pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rtsi
rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te/ de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis/ /bdud
rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan te bka' stsal to/ /dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i yul/ /dga' zhing bar chad med pa'i gnas/ /btsal nas nyid kyi dbang du bya'o/ /de nas rang lus
bsrung ba'i phyir/ /lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /bar chad byed pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog /de nas bsgrub pa'i yo byad rnams/ /'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad dang / /sgrub pa pas rdzas
yo byad dang / /rkyen zlog sman gyi yo byad dang / /de ltar phun sum tshogs ldan nas/ /ji bzhin bde bar 'dug nas ni/ /sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs byas te/ /
tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam/ /snga dro'i dus nas dkyil 'khor bya/ /maN+Dal 'dom gang pa lnga bri/ /sgrub pa chen po bya ba'i phyir/ /dri chen dri chu'i skyang nul bya'o/ /dur khrod thod
pa lnga nang du/ /tshil chen me mar re re yang / /me mar sdong bu lnga brgya bya'o/ /me mar lnga brgya gtams nas ni/ /de nas sgrub pa brtsam bya zhing / /rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi
bya| |zhi ba'i tshe na byang du blta'o/ /gA na'i tshe na nub tu blta'o/ /stan chen po lho ru blta'o/ /rgyas pa'i tshe na shar du blta'o/ /yang na 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi/ /so so'i phyogs
phyogs dag nas blta'o/ /de ltar 'dug stangs bstan nas ni/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /sgrub rdzas thams cad gzhag par bya'o/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /
me mar lnga brgya smos pa gzhag /nub kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /sgrub pa yab yum gnas par bya/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rgyu mchog chen po gzhag par bya/ /dbus
kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rigs/ /bkra shis thod pa gzhag par bya'o/ /yang na ban+d+ha dpal ldan rdzogs/ /zlum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma 'dra/ /
dbus na bu ga gcig yod pa/ /de yi nang du hrI zhes bri'o/ /de yi nang du blugs pa ni/ /snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog /gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/ /dri zhim bcud ldan thams
cad kun/ /'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/ /mang po 'dus pa mthu byin che/ /yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar/ /go tsi hA dang leng leng hwa/ /gi wang tsi'u tang ra sa yan/ /ga pur mu tig
lan tshwa rnams/ /'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar/ /yang na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba/ /a 'bras rgun 'brum pa na se/ /ger rgya a ru ra dang lnga/ /'di ni nang gi 'bras bu lnga'o/ /sha lnga
dag dang sbyar ba yang / /dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar/ /de yi phrad du dgos pa yang / /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /gtso bo tsit+ta nyid dang lnga'o/ /shing tog rgun 'brum ka ko la/ /
a 'bras pa na bum sha lnga'o/ /drin chen po sna lnga dang / /cha yi grangs dang mnyam ste sbyar/ /nA ga ge sar shing tshwa dang / /sug smel gnad pa tra dang / /kun du ra dang dri sna lnga'o/ /
yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga/ /rgya spos dzA ti pha la dang / /ga pur tsan+dan li shi lnga'o/ /de bzhin spos lnga'i dam pa yang / /a ka ru dang du ru ska/ /pog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog dang / /gser
dngul zangs lcags g.yu dang lnga/ /brdar ram zhib tu btags te blugs/ /'di dag rab tu mnyam zhing gsog /'di dag sbyar zhing btags pa'i sngags/ /oM a mr-i ta mu sa la gra
he ha na ha na hUM phaT/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi mchog /dngos grub 'bras bu nges thob bo/ /'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir/ /byang gi phyogs kyi
dkyil 'khor du/ /me lce gla gli snying la sogs/ /gsang ba'i brda tshig dag gis ni/ /de dag rab tu sba zhing bsgrub/ /phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag /rgyu mchog chen po
khrus byas nas/ /mngon spyod mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi/ /'jigs byed 'jigs byed chen po yi/ /e yi dkyil 'khor sum brtsegs kyi/ /steng du bzhag nas dbang bskur ro/ /de
nas dpal chen he ru ka /dur khrod bdag po chen po ni/ /che mchog shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dbu mang phyag cha rtsub pa bsnams/ /smug nag sku ni 'bar ba can/ /zhal ni nyi shu rtsa
gcig ste/ /phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /oM badzra mahA shrI he ru ka raM dz+wa la hUM/ gsang ba'i yum yang yab dang mthun/ /mahA kro d+hI shwa ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dra a b+hi
Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes yum dbang bskur nas/ gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o/ /de yang tshul bzhin byin gyis rlob/ /e h+ye hi mahA ru
tra hUM phaT/ sarbed a a zhes brjod pas tsit+ta drang ngo / /yang nas yang du sbar byas te/ /dug gsum rtsa ba der bcad do/ /rgyu 'bras mthun zhing sbyar ba yang / /yangs shing
rgyud la goms pa dang / /chos sku zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod/ /yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nges pa'i don dbang thos par bya'o/ /'byung ba bzhi las skyed pa'i yum/ /tshul bzhi dag
dang ldan pa'am/ /yang na mtshan bzang sum cu ni/ /lus la rdzogs par yod pa la/ /zla gsang dkar dmar rlung dkar lci/ /de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma/ /btsal nas sgrub pa
chen po bya'o/ /'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru/ /dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya/ /'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yi/ /khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas/ /ra sa ya na'i gtso bor
bya'o| |bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod bstan pa/ /kun byed thams cad za ba yin/ /slob ma dpa' rtul gtsang sbra can/ /skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi/ /mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan/ /
dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing / /srog lus bu dang chung ma dang / /rin chen sna tshogs 'bul byed pa/ /sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang / /slob dpon bla ma de la 'bul/ /
de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog /yud yang pany+tsa yan chad kyis/ /rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o/ /thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di/ /rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i
phyir| |re ba med pas blang bar bya/ /ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad do/ /las kyi gtsor ni bskang pa dang / /sbyang dang mtshams dang gsal bar bya'o/ /nyi zla pad+ma yang dag
gnas/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo 'bru lnga yi/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya'o/ /dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum/ /ma thob bar du mi gtang zhing / /
btang na bar chad chen por 'gyur/ /gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon tan 'di/ /sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub dgos na/ /mkhas pas bden pa'i don shes nas/ /don la the tshom
ci ste za| |zhes the tshom bcad la dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o/ /a ho su ka d+harma ga ya ni/ a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrIHzhes dngos grub blang ngo / /gnas lnga dag tu bsam pa yang / /
spyi gtsug dbus su zla ba ste/ /der ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa/ /'od zer lnga ni 'phros pa las/ /slar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste/ /rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o/ /lce la hrIH
dmar 'od 'phros pas/ /slar 'dus mtha' yas chos kyi gsung / /mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa'o/ /snying gar yi ge hUM mthing ga /'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o/ /slar 'dus
mi 'khrugs sems pa ste/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /yang na bdud 'dul sa gnon no/ /lta bar yi ge swA ser po/ /'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba las/ /slar 'dus
rin chen dam pa'i gtso/ /phyag rgya yid bzhin sbyin pa'o/ /gsang bar yi ge ha ljang khu/ /'od zer sna lnga 'phros pa las/ /slar 'dus don yod grub pa ste/ /zhi ba'i phyag
rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o/ /rigs lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang / /rang byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /de ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'du las/ /khams gsum
'gro ba'i don byas nas/ /slar 'dus sman lnga nyid la bsdu/ /sman nyid phyag rgyar gsal 'bar nas/ /'od zer sna lnga slar 'dus nas/ /phyag mtshan so sor gsal 'gyur te/ /gser
gyi 'khor lo zur brgyad las/ /dri chen bdud rtsi zhu ba 'o/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'bar nas byang chub sems su zhu/ /swA las rin chen 'od 'bar te/ /mahA maM sa bdud rtsir zhu'o//
hrIHlas 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o/ /pad+ma rak+ta thig ler zhu'o/ /ha ljang 'od 'phro sna tshogs pas/ /dag pa'i dri chu bdud rtsir zhu'o/ /de ltar 'phro 'du bya ba yang / /goms pas yang
nas yang du bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la/ /bsam pa'i yi ge dam pa lnga/ /oM hUM swA hrIHA/ /rtsa ba'i yi ge lnga po yang / /'od zer 'phro ba snga ma bzhi/ /de nas 'dzab sgom
bzlas pa'i sngags/ /dgu pa 'di ni 'dzab tu drang / /oM badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM tha/ de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa brgyad/ /mthe bong srin lag mthil du
dgug /rdo rje mtshon gang bcas pa dang / /mdzub mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang / /sbyar te lag pa'i mthil gyis ni/ /bdud rtsi snod kyi steng du mnan/ /de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis
brlab/ /ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba las/ /bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra ba yis/ /glal dang lud pas bar mi gcad/ /de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab/ /badzra
a mr-i ta oM AHhUM hrI thA/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHmahA a mr-i ta A be sha ho zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal bas bka' stsal to/ /bdud rtsi dam pa mchog
gi lung las 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral bar lung nges pa dang / de bsgral nas de sman du sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa'i bdud rtsi chen po sa ma ya 'bum sde las/ bam po chen po drug
pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ka la sha sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung / dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phan byed
mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgrub pa'i yul dang gnas bstan te/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi'i ri/ /drang srong chen po'i sgrub lugs dang / /phra men ma yi sbyar lugs
dang | |rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams dang / /shing dang nags kyi lha mo'i gnas/ /ri bor sman ljongs tsan+dan gnas/ /bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsgrub par bya'o/ /dug
rnams bdud rtsir sbyar ba'i thabs/ /rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas/ /ra sa yan lag sogs rdzas/ /tshang bar bsags nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /ri bor nags 'dabs chu ngogs
sam| |brag phug stong pa thibs po'am/ /sgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'i phyir/ /sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya/ /mnyam zhing snum pa'i sa snga can/ /zug rdo srin brag med pa dang / /
tsha sgo sa dang ba tshwa med/ /ma grum ma gas mnyam po la/ /sgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'o/ /rang byung khro bo chen po bcus/ /phyogs mtsham s+phur pa btab nas ni/ /gnas dang sa gzhi

dag par sbyang / /oM badzra kI la ya mahA kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha

hUM phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ phyogs bcu dag tu mtshams bcad de/ /sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi
bya| |dri sna lnga dang rak+ta yis/ /byugs pa'i maN+Dal bzang du bya'o/ /ba su ta yi rgyu phreng gis/ /thig ni bcu drug char yang gdab/ /de la thig le bcu drug gam/ /yang na phyag mtshan
bcu drug dgod/ /de'i dbus su bzhag pa'i snod ni/ /thod pa ma gas ma chag pa/ /yang na rus sbal mgo yang rung / /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su gzhag /bdud rtsi sna grangs
brgya rtsa brgyad/ /btags te thod pa'i nang du dgang / /'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su gzhag /phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rnams su yang / /snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad bzhag la/ /
rigs dang kha dog mthun pa'i dar/ /ban+d+ha lnga yi kha nas dag ba/ /yang na bum pa'i mgul chings bya'o/ /ra sa yan la sogs rdzas/ /ji snyed 'byor pas
ma lus kun/ /dkyil 'khor de la bskor te gzhag /de bzhin dar dkar mthing yol gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor bar rab bskor nas/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir mda' bzhi
gzugs/ /me long bzhi dang rat+na bzhi/ /ral gri bzhi dang phur pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor bar bskor te gzhag /ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom/ /rgyu yi ting
'dzin 'bras bu las/ /de nyid byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /'byung lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor dag /byang chub sems las rim bzhin bskyed/ /raM yaM khaM su bruM/ nam mkha'i dbyings
dang mnyam pa yi/ /gzhal yas gsal bar 'gyur bar bsgom/ /dbus su byang chub sems chen po/ /shar du rdo rje dri chen tshe/ /lho ru maM sa sha sna tshogs/ /nub tu pad+ma rak+ta'i
tshogs/ /byang du dri chu sna tshogs ste/ /'di rnams rim bzhin bkod pa la/ /gtso bos sbyor ba tshul bzhin bgyis nas me long yu ba can gyi steng du byang chub kyi sems blangs te
dbus kyi snod blangs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te byang chub sems kyis g.yab cing / dbyangs 'di brjod do/ /byang chub sems 'di'i ye shes rang bzhin te/ /dri med rnam
dag char bzhin bab pa las/ /'gro ba kun skyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul/ /gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la/ /gnyis med sbyor bas rdo rje'i rigs chen 'grub/ /me long
ye shes de nyid yin par bshad/ /ces brjod do/ /dbus kyi ban+d+ha'i nang du shel phor bzhag la byang chub sems thams cad dang / gdung dang / go ro tsa na la sogs pa kun bsdus la
blugs so/ /dgu ya lag gi phyag rgya yis/ /de yi steng du bzhag nas ni/ /sgrub pa po kun kha shar phyogs su bltas te byang chub kyi sems kyis g.yab cing / sngags 'di brgya rtsa
brgyad bzla'o/ /oM AHhUM/ badzra satwa hU/ sarba e shud+d+he/ a mr-i ta su ka ma hA yo ga hUM/ tsit+ta hUM/ oM AHhUM/ ak+sho b+h+yaHde Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas dbus su blugs la
gzhag go /lho phyogs su kha bltas te mahA maM sa'i snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do/ /sems can rnams ni gnas la chags/ /nor bas bdag nyid gtsang mar 'dzin/ /don gyis
sun ni ma phyung na/ /bsod nams thams cad dang bral ba'i/ /yi dwags skam thag chad pa yang / /bdag lus gtong bar mi phod na/ /lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /lus
can rnams la smos ci dgos/ /de bas 'di kun sun dbyung zhing / /rang byung bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir/ /lhas kyang lha yi bdag nyid bza'/ /mi la sogs pa de bzhin du/ /
rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad cing bza'/ /'di ltar bdag gzhan mi 'byed pas/ /blang dor med par grol ba yis/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na/ /
thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku/ /bde gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grub/ /oM AHhUM ma hA maM sa sa ma ya ra ho haM/ rat+na ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de/ rin po
che'i rigs yab yum spyan drang zhing brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ mahA maM sa dang / sha sna tshogs bstabs shing lhor gzhag go /kha nub phyogs su bltas te rak+ta sna tshogs kyi
snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do/ /rA ga rak+ta pad+ma 'byung / /smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag /chags yul bde ba'i gnas yin te/ /pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig 'grub/ /so sor
rtogs pa'i ye shes yin/ /zhes brjod cing / nub phyogs kyi snod kyi nang du blugs la gzhag /oM AHhUM ma hA pad+ma rak+ta mu la/ a mr-i ta b+ha ra ga ra ti/ sa ma ya hUM su ka hri
zhes brjod de nub phyogs su gzhag go /kha byang phyogs su bltas te dri chu'i snod blangs nas 'di skad brjod do/ /kun 'byung zag pa gur gum chu/ /rdo rje dri yi chu yin te/ /chu
las ma byung gang yang med/ /las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / /nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub/ /oM AHhUM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ badzra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de byang
phyogs su gzhag go /shar gyi snod dang dri chen blangs te 'di skad brjod do/ /smad pa mi gtsang snyigs ma 'di/ /rtog pa de nyid snyigs ma yin/ /tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i bdud rtsi
ste| |gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam nyid/ /gnyis med sku ru sbyor bas na/ /chos dbyings ye shes dam tshig 'grub/ /oM bai ro tsa na mo
ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ma hA yo ga a ti spa ra Na ba li d+te/ a mr-i ta u tsi tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha oM zhes brjod do/ /de nas sgrub pa po kun gyis thal mo sbyar te dbus kyi snod yum gyis blangs te
'di skad brjod do/ /ye shes snying po can rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di/ /snying po chos kyi don las 'byung / /byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin/ /smad par bya
ba'i rdzas lnga bo/ /gcig la yon tan lnga lnga 'am/ /gcig la'ang yon tan gsum du dbye/ /dam tshig rtsa ba bco lnga yin/ /yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /snod bcud dbus su
bsdus nas ni/ /bcu drug por yang bstan par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las/ /sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs su blta'o/ /rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgyad/ /
rdzas ni sems dpa' bcu drug ste/ /snod dbyings sems ma bcu drug yin/ /'khor lo rtsi bas ni bcu drug kyang / /rang bzhin mi gnyis dbyings gcig pas/ /phyag rgya thig le
ldan par bsgom/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /rgyu yang gsang la 'bras
bu'ang gsang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mdzod ldan dpal gyi phyag rgya dang / /kha 'byed rdo rje phyag rgya ni/ /'khor lo rtsibs kyi dbus su gzhag /bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba
brgyad/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /mtshan dang rnam shes yul bar bcas/ /'dus la ma byas rdo rje ste/ /dgongs pa 'dus pas rdo rjer bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyar
nas| |rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /oM AHhUM sarba bany+tsa a mri ta badzra satwa hUM zhes brjod de/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlab cing bskul lo/ /de nam yang rtsa ba brgyan
dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang / skul ba'i tshig 'di brjod do/ /de nas yang snod stong par rgun chang dang / sbrang chang dang / rgya chang dang / bu ram chang dang / bzlas
chang dang / chang sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /'bru rnams la yang chang med de/ /chu la chang gi rang bzhin med/ /mkhas pas 'bru dang chur sbyar na/ /mnyams
nyid kyi chang du 'gyur/ /chang byin gyis brlab ba'i sngags/ oM a mr-i ta dza gad bra ba swA hA/ oM dzi ba swAhA/ sman chang du blugs la dkrug pa'i sngags/ mu sa la mu sa
la| |ro mchog go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /mi gtsang ba la'ang gtsang ba med/ /man ngag can gyi sgrub pa pos/ /mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi don thob
'gyur| |kro d+hi shwa ri sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/ yang 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /rta dang mi la sogs pa yi/ /ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa las/ /mkhas ldan chen pos
rab sbyar na/ /yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang / /de bzhin rdzas rnams bsgyur bas na/ /mnyam nyid yon tan mar ltar 'grub/ /ces brjod de byang chub sems kyi snod du sbreng ngo / /de nas
rin po che sna tshogs brdar zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /dper na gser dang rin chen ltar/ /gcig tu bsres dang so sor gnas/ /so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi /kha dog mtshan nyid
so sor gsal/ /rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang / /bsdus nas yon tan rmad du 'gyur/ /de bas gnyis spras mdzes par snang / /de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang / /rang gi yon tan
rin chen snang / /gnyis med mnyam par sbyar bas na/ /bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur/ /thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba 'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi ra sa yan sna tshogs bsdus te snod stong
par chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di brjod do/ /chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa/ /rgya mtshor phyin na lan tshwa'i ro/ /de dag thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal/ /rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la//
chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig go /'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las/ /sman dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po/ /'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa/ /thugs rjes
byin gyis brlabs pa 'o/ /dngos po med las dngos grub blang / /byang chub sems kyi sprin yin pas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de skad ces brjod de
sman lag tu blangs nas ngos ngos nas sman che ba'i yon tan brjod do/ /rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi/ /rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman/ /ras yan la sogs rdzas/ /
rtsa ba 'bum brag yangs pa'i bcud/ /gnyis med bde chen las byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sha chen mchod pa rin po che/ /zas mchog tshe yi dri chen po/ /pad+ma me tog
yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog /ga bur shel gyi spos phor bri/ /rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud/ /rigs lnga dam tshig
lnga yi dngos/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/ /rgyud lnga sems can kun bsgral ba'i/ /dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste/ /thams cad rnal 'byor bdud rtsi che/ /ma
lus 'dus pa'i thig le ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir/ /gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang / /gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
cad dang / /rgyal brgya mtsho rnams la mchod/ /ces brjod de/ de nas shes rab yum rnams kyis sman lag tu bzhag la/ yang bkra shis pa don la dam pa 'di brjod do/ /ngo mtshar rmad du
byung ba'i chos/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /rnam par mi rtog snang ba las/ /kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar/ /zhes brjod do/ /sman snod bcud chas par lag tu
blangs la yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te/ gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen por bsgyur zhing bsgom mo/ /de nas sgrub pa po'i gtso bos dpal chas su zhugs te/ ba yang nyo ba ti dang /
ba yang shang gi ra dang / na ra si ra dang / thal chen gyi thig les brgyan te/ sro tsa aM dza na dang / dgug cing g.yab pa'i dam rdzas mchog gi ha sta dang / brta sha ri la dang / shun chen
gyi 'breng ba 'dre brdab pa'i lcag dang / rkang gi gling bu 'bud cing ku sha'i glu blang / mchog gi tshar ma dang / shun chen gyi g.yang gzhi bting la gu gul gyi 'go ma yeng gis bskus la
rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas te mtshon re re'i steng du ta krid brgyad gzhag go /byA g+h+r-i tshar ma'i g.yang gzhi ta gis gyon la/ mdung la ba dan 'phyar nas thogs te/ dkyil 'khor yang 'khor
lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su zla gam dmar po gcig bris nas de'i steng du sman spungs la/ sgrub pa po yab yum yang sbyor ba tshul bzhin du bgyi/ lha mo bcu drug gi bsnyen pa brgya rtsa
brgyad yan chad gdon no/ /de nas byin dbab cing / dbab pa'i phyag rgya yang bya'o/ /g.yab mo'i brda la sogs te/ brda sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi rdo rje badzra sha ri
ram la sogs pa dang / yang na mchog gi lag pa g.yon gyis sman dgug cing g.yab cing / /mkhar gzhong gi nang du bsres te btsags la/ sman ban+d+ha'i nang du blugs la rdo rjes
dkrug cing glu dang / gar dang / rnga dang / dam pa'i tshig gis bstod do/ /spos kyis bdug cing gar gyi bro thags dang / rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor du bdud rtsi dbus su
bzhag la bskor ro/ /de nas ngos ngos nas kyang che ba'i yon tan brjod do/ /yang zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor yang / rigs so so'i yig 'bru kun sman la bstim zhing 'di brjod
do| |oM a mr-i ta sarba mahA yo ga hUM/ oM badzra sarba ma ya hUM/ oM mahA sarba a mr-i ta mahA su ka hri/ oM sarba e shud+d+he/ kro d+hI shwa ri/ sarba sho d+ha ya/ oM AHhUM/ badzra a mr-i ta hUM
hrI tha zhes rab tu yang bzla'o/ /de nas hom dang / sbyin sreg dang / me'i phud kyang nang du blugs so/ /de nas sems sbyang ba'i sman/ leng leng hwa dang / shel ga pur dang /
snying zho sha dang / mkhal ma zho sha dang / gla gor zho sha dang / shu dag ku ber dang / shu dag ba me dang / shu dag nab se dang / ra sa ya na dang / ra sa ya na ta na dza ya dang / khrus
mkhan u ba li'i thig les brgyan pa/ gdod sman bsre zhing sbyar nas dkrugs la ban+d+har stsal te ban+d+ha gnyis kha sbyar la dar gyis bcings la mtshams su rgyas btab la gzod dkyil 'khor
zlag ma gyi dbus su gzhag go /sngags dgu pa 'dzab tu drang ngo / /'di'i mgo mjug tu tshogs kyi mchod pa bar mi gcad/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du yang bya/ sman sgrub pa'i don dang /
sbyar thabs bstan pa'i lung dang / las kyi rim pa'i skul tshig dang / yo byad du byas pa'i rnam pa bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las/ bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung gi bam po bdud rtsi
'bum sde las 'byung ba'i don bam bo chen po bdun pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAn many+dzu shri tik+Sha na ma sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rnon po
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal nyid sku rdo rje lta bu byang chub kyi dgongs pa nyid la bzhugs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po ni/ dus
gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i yum gyi tshal chen po na dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings zhi ba chen po la bzhugs so/ /rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang /
'khor byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / sems ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na sras mchog dam pa nye ba'i 'khor rigs kyi rgyal po ma lus pa rnams dang /
tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / li tsa byI la sogs pa'i mi rnams kun la dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ nan tan
gyis ni brtson 'grus bskyed/ /the tshom med na nges par 'grub/ /bdud rtsi chen po rnam lnga 'di/ /spyad cing bcang ba'i yon tan dang / /rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo dang / /mthu dang byin
gyi rlabs kyis 'grub/ /mi brjed rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /nges par bsgrubs pa'i yon tan ni/ /nges pa'i man ngag gsum du bstan/ /zhes bka' stsal nas sdud pa po chos kyi
don 'jam dpal rnon po la gtad do/ /de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la 'di skad
brjod do/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun tu bzang / /gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs/ /ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron/ /dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /rang byung dri med
bdud rtsi 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i mchog /mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas/ /nges pa'i dbyings la 'god mdzad pa/ /gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /
snang mdzad rdo rje rgyal can dang / /mi bskyod nyi ma snang mtha' yas/ /don yod bdud rtsi 'khyil bal/ /dgyes shing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyings phyug yum gyi tshogs
rnams la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dud phyag 'tshal/ /lag na rdo rje rgyal po dang / /kun bzang blo gros chen po dang / /don rab sa snying la sogs la/ /rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal le/ /
nam mkha'i 'jig rten dbang po dang / /'gro ba 'dzin mchog dam pa la/ /gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag la rang bzhin dri med sku/ /tshul bzhin phreng ba dbyangs dang gar/ /
spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdug pa me tog mar me ho/ /gzugs mchog mnyes mdzad lha mo la/ /mos pas 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig byed tshogs kyi bdag po
mchog |rdo rje srin po 'dul mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal yab yum 'khor bcas la/ /gus pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams kyis legs so
legs so/ /a la la ho zhes brjod nas gnang ngo / /de nas dbang byin te 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la mkhyen rab
dang pos kun gyi mchod pa chen po mdzad do/ /de yang nyid kyis nyid la mchod de/ 'di man chad ye shes kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi chen por thim nas
mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la mi snang bar byas nas mahA su ka la sbas te bzhugs pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams
kyis 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen rab kyi dang po/ khyod la da nged kyi chos 'di bsdus te bshad do/ /'jam dpal rdo rje
chos| 'di lta ste/ /e ma ho gsang ba las byung ba'i/ /ma rig mun sel sgron me'i mchog /dba' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus byos/ /zhes pa dang / 'jam
dpal| bdud rtsi 'di'i chos kyi don ni/ dper na/ me dang 'dra ste/ chung ste rdul tsam nas che ste srid pa'i ri bo yang sreg go/ de bzhin du bdud rtsi 'di ni/ dper na/ nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ nyi
ma'i 'od zer chen po ni/ 'dzam bu gling du thog ma nyid du ri'i rgyal po chen po brgyad la snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu ri bo che rnams la
snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu ri nag po rnams la snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu gangs ri mthon po rnams la snang bar byed do/ /de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling 'dir sa phyogs dma' ba
rnams la snang bar byed do/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po de la blang dor med de/ mi rtog mi sems so/ /rnam par yang mi rtog mi sems so/ /rdo rje chos dang 'jam dpal/ nyi ma'i 'od rnams
ni/ dbri bskol med do/ /de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa la yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbri bskol med do/ /bye ba dang / bskyed pa dang / bskyungs pa yang med do/ /de bzhin du chos
bdud rtsi 'di yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings su bstan pa yin pa'i phyir bdud rtsi chen po 'di'i dbu las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes smos pa yin no/ /de bzhin du chos bdud
rtsi chen po'i lung 'di yang ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtog pas/ /mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa dang / mi gnas pa la rnam par khyab ste gnas so/ /de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po 'di
yang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar kun la khyab par gnas te/ skal ldan rigs lngas 'byung ba lnga la khyab cing / 'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum lnga'i tshal chen po ste/ yum lnga dang
yab lnga yang gdod nas dag ste/ nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du shar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
rgyal brgya mtsho rnams la khyab bo/ /de nas srid pa'i 'jig rten du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / klu rnams la khyab bo/ /de nas mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dang | rim pas nam mkha'i nyi ma bzhin khyab cing shar ba ste/ thugs rje'i bdud rtsi 'di yang srid pa gsum du nyi ma bzhin du shar bar bya ste/ 'jam dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing phra rab snyed la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus phul bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di lus la bcangs pa bsod nams che'o/ /'jam dpal/
dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba bas ni/ bdud rtsi 'di lus kyi mgul du btags pa 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/ /'jam dpal/ bskal
ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams la spyi bos bkur zhing phyag bya ba'i don ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di spyi bo la bkur ba'i yon tan ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad
bkur ba yin no/ /'jam dpal/ bskal pa stong gi bar du sems can gyi don bya ba bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'dis lan gcig gis 'gro ba'i don byas pas dmyal khams
brgyad kyi 'jig rten yang thar ba'i lam du 'dren pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal ba/ bdud rtsi chen po'i rang
bzhin ni/ kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma med/ /'gog pa med cing dbye ba'ang med/ /rtsa ba med cing rten ba'ang med/ /bdud rtsi che la brjod pa'ang med/ /nyon mongs dug dang
bdud bzhi bcom/ /dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems/ /nges don de la sdud bar byos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i lung 'di la 'phags pa 'jam
dpal gyis slar la lan gsum du bstod pa/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te/ /mtshan nyid med pas nam mkha' 'dra'o/ /bya ba med pas grol ba ste/ /bdud rtsi mchog la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu zla bzhin du dri bral bas/ /thams cad rtog ba yongs su spangs/ /bdag tu 'dzin med rnam par dag /bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
bdud dang ngan song gsum las thar/ /len pa med cing gtong ba'ang med/ /dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems/ /bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas skyed ba'i rgyu/ /
khams gsum sems can 'dren pa'i dpal/ /'gro ba drug gi sgrib sbyong ba/ /bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol nas phyi nang gi snod bcud ril sman ras ya na dang / bdud
rtsir gnas so/ /zhes lung dang man ngag tu bsdus te bka' stsal pa'o/ /bdud rtsi chen bo mchog gi lung / lung gi rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i mchog las/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i nang nas lung gi
bam po chen po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa chen po'i don bam po chen po brgyad pa rdzogs so// //spyir bdud rtsi 'bum sde las nyung shas tsam zhig bi ma la mi tras bshad cing / lo tsA ba dz+nyA na
ku ma ras bsgyur ba'o/ /rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi lags rdzogs so/ /rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod/ /mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang / /nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar/ /srog
gi sgo ru shar ba dang / /snying gi sgo ru bsgom bar bya/ /snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni/ /bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te/ /phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas/ /rnam par shes
pa rdo rjer bsgom/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+ha nan baM hUM hUM phaT/ rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin rnams/ /srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig /srid
ba rdo rje phur ba'i lha/ /ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las/ /'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa/ /sku yi dbyig tu bdag
gyur cig /thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du/ /byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas/ /dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsol cig /
oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kar hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po hUM ka ra dang / yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma/ sbrul ba'i phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang / smig bu'i mgo can no/ /oM
badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje rnam snyems ma/ sbrul pa'i phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can no/ /
oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po dbyug ba sngon po dang / yum rdo rje sder mo/ sprul ba'i phra men ma g.yag gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no//
oM badzra kro d+ha ya man+ta ka hUM/ ba tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed po dang / yum rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo/ /sprul pa'i phra men ma sha ba'i mgo can dang / 'ug
ba'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon po dang / yum rdo rje gtun khung ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang /
khra'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / yum rdo rje gtum mo/ /sprul pa'i phra men ma byi la'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo
can no| |oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra tsi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / yum rdo rje mda' snyems ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma spyang ki'i mgo

can dang / khra'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / yum rdo rje rlung 'byin ma/ sprul ba'i phra men ma seng+ge'i mgo
can dang / pha wang gi mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza la hUM/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje gsod byed ma/ sprul pa'i
phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / zer mo'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho ta s+pho ta hUM phaT/ khro bo stobs po che dang / yum rdo rje skyod byed ma/ sprul ba'i phra men ma
ded kyi mgo can dang / byi ba'i mgo can la sogs pa rnams kyis gtams ba'o/ /srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang / /dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir/ /ye shes khro bo gshegs
su gsol/ /khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang / /rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang / /kli la ya yi dngos grub gsol/ /dam tshig chen po'i dus la
bab| |sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ /phyag brnyan chen mo'i dus la bab/ /shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab/ /bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab/ /khyed kyi 'phrin las dus la
bab| |sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab/ /mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing / /dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob ba/ /rig
'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni/ /gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs/ /bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/ /khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /yud tsam gyis ni 'dir
bkug nas/ /mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang / /lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang / /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod/ /oM laM/ hUM laM/ staM pa nan/ mo
ha ga ya b+ha ga wA na/ shi kri bi kri/ shrI badzra hUM ka ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsarba big+h+nAn/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badzra
hUM ka ra hUM phaT hUM ka ra hUM a/ dngos grub bar chad byed ba'i bgegs/ /gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams/ /zungs shig rgyob cig rnam par chings/ /gtogs
shig grogs dang bral bar gyis/ /rings bar khug la smrar chug cig /phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis/ /nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang / /bsgo ba'i bka' rnams mnyan

bar gyis/ /hUM ba ra bid twa na hUM phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ grih+na grih+na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya/ ra na ha ta na hUM

phaT/ shri kri na a na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la ba ya hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bid+d+ha ya bid+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs/ /khyed kyi dam tshig dus

la bab/ /sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i/ /mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod/ /ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su
ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ke ta ya/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a pa ra tsi ta ya a pa ra tsita ya/ ma ra sa na pra marda na ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni/ /sdig can gang zhig
'da' byed pa/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po yis/ /klad pa tshal ba brgya ru khos/ /nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed/ /hUM ma ma ba shaM ku ru/
ma tha ma/ ny+yaka ra/ i na na da sti/ ma ma karma shri kang+ka ra ya/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi/ /lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung / /nga la bar chad byed pa rnams/ /mthu dang rdzu
'phrul med par byos/ /sarba a na ya hUM phaT/ tad tha ya tad tha ya hUM phaT/ rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/ /bka' las 'da' byed sdig can
rnams/ /rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas/ /lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du slogs/ /khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du/ /rdo rje thobs brdungs byas nas/ /lha yang rung ste
bsgral bar bya/ /kha tham/ kha tham/ kha tham/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha kro ta khA hi/ kha hi/ kha hi/ hi hi hi/ ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ chos nyid kyi
bden pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o/ /a bi tsar+ya'i dus la bab pa'i brnag pa de kho na la'o/ /kI li kI la ya nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
bco brgyad dkar nag gi mtshams su'o/ /hUM hUM/ phaT phaT tsam bzlas so/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ DA ki nI ag+ni dzi hwa dz+wa la tan+t+ra/ bod
skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/ srid gsum 'jigs byed drag po rdo rje'i sku/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal gyur snying rje can/ /bdud las rnam rgyal ye
shes lnga dang ldan/ /phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo/ gshin rje 'bar ba'i pho brang / gnod sbyin
ut+pa la'i gdong gnas pa'i dur khrod/ srin po ma tang ka ru tra ka'i 'chags/ bdud gtsug phud nag po'i khang pa/ rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po/ /lha dang lha ma yin g.yul
'gyed pa'i gnas/ 'byung po dge ba kha T+wAM ga'i shing nag po ti sha ka skye sa/ srin mo kang+ka la zangs kyi gshog pa me ltar 'bar ba'i zhing khams/ mi ro gsar rnying mang po yod
pa| nam mkha' las tri shU la dang / 'khor lo dang / lce 'bab ba/ sa gzhi las ral gri dang / spu gri dang / mdung rtse lnga pa skyes pa/ ri bo thams cad keng rus su snang ba/ chu
klung thams cad rnag khrag tu 'bab pa/ sa phyogs thams cad ni/ mi ro ut+pa la sngon po'i dri mnam pa/ nye 'khor na rngam pa dang / ngu ba'i nga ro rab tu 'jigs pa grag ste
shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu skyi g.ya' ba'i gnas de na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi bdag po/ /thabs dang
shes rab kyi dbang phyug /sku dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ drag po chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje snying rje chen po gtum zhing khro ba/ lus bskal ba'i me chen po ltar 'bar ba/
srid pa gsum dang / bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa brgyad khri dang / sgrib ba rnam pa gnyis las rab tu rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas stong rtsa brgyad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye
shes las grub pa/ lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis mchod cing phyag byas pa/ nyi ma stong gi gzi dang ldan pa/ dbu skra kham pa gyen la brdzes pa/
spyan sdang mig me ltar 'bar ba/ shangs kyi rlung sgrom nas bskal pa'i rlung 'byung ba/ zhal gyi mche ba rdo rje zla tshes su gtsigs ba/ rin po che margad tas dbu brgyan pa/
rigs lnga'i rgyal ba mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/ thod pa skam rlon gyi dbu rgyan dang mgur chu can/ mchog dang glang gi ko bas brgyan pa/ lag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin
pa| klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis thod du bcings pa/ klu tak+Sha kas rked chings byas pa/ klu kun nas gdug dang / sog ma med kyis gdan khri byas te khro bo chen po'i cha
byad du byas nas bzhugs so/ /de'i 'khor na tshangs pa dang / 'jug sred dang / brgya byin dang / ma hA kA li dang / drang srong me bzhi 'jug dang / thang la gnas dang /
gshin rje te la ba nag po dang / srin po rA ma Na dang / chu'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / gnod sbyin chen po ku be ra dang / 'byung po dbang ldan dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang /
skar ma dang / sa bdag lag chen dang / ma mo nag mo ral gcig ma dang / lto 'phye rab brtan dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po pho mo dang / gcan gzan gyi tshogs ni/ seng+ge dang / stag dang / khwa dang / spyang ki dang / dom dang / chu srin dang / gung dang / gzig
dang / ce spyang dang / sre mo dang / khyi li 'du dang / 'phar ba dang / sram dang / bya'i tshogs kyang bya rgod dang / chu glag dang / dur bya kang+ka dang / bzhad dang / khyung dang / bya rog
dang / so bya dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / skya ga dang / srin bya dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tso yang yod do/ /gzhan yang glang po dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrul gdug pa can
dang / rus sbal dang / rda mo dang / bse dang / phag rgod dang / ba men dang / khyi snya dang / sha ba dang / gla ba la sogs pas bskor te bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de
rnams kyi nang nas glang po che rab tu brtan pa gtsug na gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa/ mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum yod pa'i steng na nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus nas lha rnams
kyi dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba/ spyi bo gtsug na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba/ lus la gser dang baiDUr+yas brgyan pa des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du byas
nas glang po che'i stan las langs te dpal phyag na rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas brgya byin gyis 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang dbang po/ /yid bzhin nor bu rab 'dra zhing / /dngos grub tshogs la mnga' brnyes khyod/ /snying rje bdag
po yin pas na/ /ma 'ongs sems can skal ldan gyi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro go 'phang mchog /nag mo me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/ /bdag ni khyod la dri bar 'tshal/ /deng 'dir
ston pas skabs 'byed zhu/ /zhes gsol pa dang / dpal hUM mdzad chen po des me 'bar ba'i gdan las bzhengs te rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas brgya byin la seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas glang po che 'gying bag tu gom pa gsum bor te hUM hUM hUM gi sngags bzlas te ye shes kyi phyag gis rdo rje
lan gsum nam mkha' la dril te 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /snying rje'i yid
kyis brgya byin nyon/ /skal ldan dus mtha'i sems can rnams/ /mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce'i rgyud/ /bdag gzhan don la 'jigs med
pa| |ngas bshad khyod kyi yid kyis zungs/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor shin tu dga' ba dang / spro ba skyes nas la las ni/ /me tog man+dA
ra ba dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / tsam pa ka dang / bu ram dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang /
bsil yab dang / bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pas mchod do/ /'khor la las ni/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa nang
gi mchod pas mchod do/ /'khor la las lha mo dang / gnod sbyin mo'i cha byad du byas nas gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod do/ /de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la lha'i dbang po
brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khro chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /drag po hUM mdzad rdo rje 'dzin/ /da ltar 'dod pa'i khams 'di na/ /lha mo nag mo zhes bya ba/ /
gtum zhing khro la lus kyang 'jigs/ /srid gsum skrag pa'i nus mthu can/ /dngos grub dam pa'i gzhir gyur 'di/ /dang po gleng gzhi rgyu yi rgyud/ /slob dpon slob ma
gang gi rgyud/ /don dam kun rdzob lta ba'i rgyud/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum gyi rgyud/ /thang ga lha rten sku gzugs rgyud/ /dpon dang g.yog ni dam rdzas rgyud/ /bskyed
dang rdzogs ni ting 'dzin rgyud/ /rje dang khol gyi sngags kyi rgyud/ /bca' ba phyag rgya bcu gnyis rgyud/ /mchod pa gtor ma sbyin sreg rgyud/ /'da' bar dka' ba dam tshig
rgyud| |grub pa'i drod tshad mtshan ma'i rgyud/ /sbogs dang gnad la dbab pa'i rgyud/ /mi 'bral 'grogs pa gzungs kyi rgyud/ /pra dang mtshan ma dbab
pa'i rgyud/ /dbang bskur gnang ba sbyin pa'i rgyud/ /so so las kyi bye brag rgyud/ /mar me dang ni bdud rtsi rgyud/ /thig le ye shes man ngag rgyud/ /lha srin sde brgyad bstod
ba'i rgyud/ /'khor lo yongs su gtad pa'i rgyud/ /tha ma lung du bstan pa'i rgyud/ /dgos 'brel nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang / /ston pas bka' stsol bdag nyan 'tshal/ /
de skad ces gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud chen
po zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/ /khyed kyang rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /des rnam par phye ba bstan par bya'o/ /sngon 'dod pa'i khams 'di nyid na ri rab
kyi rtse byang shar gyi mtshams shing yongs 'du sa rtol zhes bya ba/ rtse mo na bya khyung ga ru Da gnas pa/ lo ma la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang 'byung ba/ 'bras bu la rin
po che sna bdun lo tog ltar smin pa/ /yal ga'i rtse g.yu'i ze ba'i bar bar na lha dang / lha mo dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan
pa| rtsa ba'i ngos la khrus kyi rdzing bu bdun la re re la shing rta re re/ shing rta re re la bu mo bdun bdun/ bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la rma bya bdun bdun yod
do| |shing rta de'i sa phyogs na sman gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lo tog gi rigs khri phrag bzhi rang skye ba tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gor shi Sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po rdzing bu lnga
brgyas bskor te/ de lta bu'i shing de thun mong gi bsod nams kyis skyes so/ /de'i dus na 'dod pa'i shing de ni/ lha rnams kyis dbang byed pa'i tshe ri rab kyi rtsa ba na 'od mi snang ba
zhes bya ba'i gnas na lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sum brtsegs dang / thags bzang ris dang / he ran na ke shu dang / rnam par snang byed dang / rab tshim dang / sgra gcan 'dzin la
sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam shin tu mi sdug pa'i cha byad nas rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mtshon cha thogs nas ri rab kyi kha chos bzang zhes bya bar
lhags so/ /de nas ri rab kyi kha la lha ba su de ba dang / lha ma hA de ba dang / brgya byin nyid la sogs pa lha bye ba dung phyur la lha ma yin rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /ri rab
rtse gnas sum cu rtsa gsum lha/ /shing 'di lha dang lha min thun mong las/ /da lta 'dod pas khyed cag lha dbang na/ /da ni nged cag lha min bdud la blangs/ /zhes smras pa dang /
lha rnams kyis slar smras pa/ dpag bsam shing la 'dod yon bsam yas kyang / /bsod nams dbang gis lha la yongs su grub/ /gzhan la
yod na bskams shing med par 'gyur/ /de bas khyed la ljon shing nged mi ster/ /zhes smras pa dang / slar lha la smras pa/ thun mong las grub bde ldan ljon pa'i shing //
lha yis dbang byas nged la mi ster na/ /'jig rten sreg pa'i mtshon gyis char phab la/ /lha dang lha min g.yul chen 'gyed ces zer/ /ces smras te slar yang song nas
lha ma yin gyis dmag drangs so/ /glang po ches srung gi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la gnod sbyin sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon te dbus kyi mgo la dbang po thags bzang ris zhon
te| glang po che'i sna la ka ma la nag po btags te lha ma yin gyi dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mtshon gyi char chen po me lce
'bar ba 'dra ba'i char 'babs te dmag drangs so/ /de nas chos bzang zhes bya ba'i gdan sar lha rnams 'tshogs te 'thab par brtsams pa dang / dang po lha rnams
kyis khrom shes nas rtsub 'gyur gyi khang pa na khro bo lang+ka nag po khros pa'i kha chu khro chu'i rdzing bu bdun 'khyil ba las 'thungs so/ /der lha rnams zhe sdang skyes te shin
tu khro bar gyur nas bzo'i lha bi sho ka rmas nub gcig la gser khrab bye ba phrag dgu 'bum rang brdungs so/ /lha mahA kro d+has nub gcig la mtshon ral gri dang / 'khor lo
dang / tho ba dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / mdung rtse gsum pa bye ba phrag dgu khri dgu 'bum rang brdungs so/ /dus de tsam na lha rnams go mtshon thogs te glang po che rab
tu brtan pa'i mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon/ /dbus kyi mgo bo la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon/ lha dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis mtha' brten te glang po
che'i sna la ral gri btags nas lha dang lha ma yin gnyis g.yul bkye'o/ /dus de tsam na lhas mtshon brgyab pa rnams ni/ khrag gar phog pa la bdud kyi dmag mi khri khri tsam
du 'phel/ lha ma yin gyis mtshon brgyab pa la ni/ khrag la dmag mi 'phel bar shi'o/ /der lha thams cad gting pham ste lha ma yin rab tu rgyal ba'i dus su phyag na rdo rje nyid
kyis lha rnams rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir dpal be'u'i dbus nas hUM mthing nag 'bar ba gcig sprul te lha bi nu rA dza'i dpal be'u'i dbyings su lcags kyi mdzer ba zhig tu gyur
to| |'dzer pa brtol ba'i nang nas bud med sngon mo dbu skra bai DU r+ya'i chun 'phyang can/ mig ut+pa la'i 'dab ma 'dra ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de la lha
rnams kyis ming btags pa/ lha mo u ma de ba bya bar btags/ lha'i bu mo de kun gyi chung mar 'dod pa la nam mkha' la phyag na rdo rjes sprul
pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bsgrags so/ /lha yi rgyal srid mtho zhing brtan pa dang / /ris drug sems can dge la dgod pa dang / /lha min bdud kyi g.yul chen bzlog pa'i
phyir| |dbang phyug lha la u ma chung mar byin/ /zhes bsgrags so/ /dus de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub byang mtshams yak+Sha ka ma la 'bar ba'i dur khrod na lha ma hA
de ba dge slong gi cha lugs su 'gog pa'i brtul zhugs drag po la zhugs pa'i drung du u ma de ba khrid nas zhag bdun phrag bdun drod la btsas pas 'dod pa'i 'khrig
pa spyad do/ /'khrig pa spyad pa'i dbang gis bar snang la gza' dang skar ma byung ngo / /der lha mo u ma de ba la bu tsha ming sring gnyis skyes so/ /ming po ni/ gshin rje ma hA
ka la zhes grags so/ /sring mo ni/ lha mo dmar mo tsa muN+Di zhes bya bar grags so/ /gshin rje ming sring de gnyis chos bzang lha'i mdun sar khrid nas phyin to/ /de nas
phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis gshin rje'i ming sring la ma hA yak+Sha bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur te/ sngar bzhin du lha dang lha ma yin gnyis g.yul chen po bkye'o/
de nas gshin rje ma hA ka las lag na gsal shing ri rab tsam zhig gis lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngor dril bas g.yul bzlog go /tsa muN+Di'i ral gri me lce phreng ba zhes bya bas/
lha ma yin he ran na ke shu'i mgo bcad do/ /de nas lha dmag mang pos kyang lha ma yin la mtshon cha'i char phab nas khrag rnams dmag mir sprul pa 'dra ste/ lha mo tsa muN+Dis
he ran na ke shu'i thod pas khrag bcus shing rol pas 'phel ma nus par byed kyin mtshon gyis char phab nas tsa muN+Di'i lte ba la lha bye ba dung phyur rnams kyi rdzong byas pas
'thabs so/ /lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas shing dpag bsam shing gi mnga' bdag tu gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang yang rang byung du yod de/ lha ma yin
pham par gyur to/ /brgya byin nyon cig /de nas lha'i bu mo tsa muN+Di des ri khrod chen po mdangs dga' zhes bya bar shing ri khrod ces bya ba'i lo ma gyon nas lo bdun du 'phags
pa mi pham pa'i gzungs bzlas pas/ lha mo par+Na sha ba ri ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas lha mo des klu dung gi 'dzer pa can zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems
dpa' de bya khyung ga ru Da zhes lha mo par+Na sha ba ri des bya khyung btul bas klu bskyangs te lha mo dkar mo dung skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lha mo dung skyong ma de ni/ ri rab rtse mo
rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang rtse/ byang shar gyi mtshams byang chub kyi shing drung na rin po che'i khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi gzhal yas kyi khang na
rin po che'i khri steng na gser dngul bai DUr+ya'i dbu rgyan dang mgur chus brgyan te lus 'gying bag tu bzhugs so/ /lha'i bu dang bu mo mang pos kyang longs spyod dang /
glu dang / dbyangs dang / rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa byed do/ /brgya byin nyon cig /de nas yul lang+ka pu rangs su srin po'i grong khyer bdun 'bum yod
pa la lha rnams kyis skyon phab ste/ srin po da sha gri ba dang / de'i sring mo rna la rtse gnyis lus so/ /de nas srin po da sha gri bas lha dang mi 'dul 'dod pa'i don ched
du sring mo lha ma hA de pa la btsun mor phul lo/ /de nas lha dbang phyug mahA de ba dang / sring mo rna la rtse gnyis tshogs pa las/ phas ni/ khye'ur smon lam btab/
mas ni/ bu mor smon lam btab/ ma'i smon lam mthu btsan pas ya mtshan can gyi bu mo zhig byung / pha khros pas thal khung du bor ro/ /mas slar blangs nas
lus kyi drod la btsas nas A yu bruM zhes tshe drangs gsos te/ phas ming btags pa sbas pa'i thal mdog mar ming btags/ mas ming mi pham khro gnyer ro langs
mar ming btags/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes dmod btsugs nas ming btags pa/ dus thams cad du nag mo rem ti zhes bya bar grags par gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi
bstan pa bsrung ba'i nus mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /ces ming du btags pa'i tshe bar snang gi lha ma srin sde brgyad po yongs kyis kyang de ltar gyur cig ces bzlas so/ /de
nas skye ba thams cad du nag mo re ma ti zhes bya bar grags so/ /lha mo dung skyong mas ming btags pa ni/ srin mo dmar 'dab phur ba'i lha gser can zhes bya bar ming btags
so| |dus der srin po da sha gri ba des da ni lceb bo lceb bo'i sgras 'jig rten du grags so/ /sring mo dang rna la rtse gnyis kyis ming po ma lceb par ci 'dod pa nga la smros shig /
ces gsol lo/ /da sha gri bas gsol pa/ nga ni/ lha mo dung skyong 'dod do/ /zhes gsol to/ /sring mos smras pa/ nga'i nu mo phur pa'i lha mo dung skyong gi khol mo byed du
gsol te/ de nas gdod bslu'o zhes smras so/ /de nas rna la rtses bu mo khrid nas dkar mo dung skyong gi g.yog tu phul lo/ /de nas re ma tis dkar mo dung skyong la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /kye che zhe chen mo rigs kyi yum/ /bdag nyid chen mo ga gar ma/ /dbu bzang rin chen thor tshugs la/ /bai DUr sngon mo 'od lam lam/ /zhal bzang pad+ma'i
dkyil 'khor du/ /nyi zla phrugs gcig rgyan bkod de/ /tshems bzang dung la ljags bzad me/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten khams na med/ /bdag ni
khyod kyi gtan 'bangs bgyi/ /khyod kyis bdag la thugs brtser dgongs/ /bdag kyang glo ba nye bar bgyi/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas lha mo'i g.yog mo byas nas glo
ba nye bar byas ta lha mo'i yid la ci 'dod pa dgos par byas so/ /de nas lha mo yang kho mo de la dgyes nas gces par byed de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yul lang+ka bu
rangs su spre'u 'bal le dang / mgrin bzang 'thabs pa la lha thams cad ltad mo la 'gro bas/ lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ring
khyod kyi gan du su 'ongs pas khyod bslu ste 'ong bas/ de la ma lta zhig ces bstan tsam na/ khol mos skabs der da sha gri ba la sbran no/ /der srin po da sha gri bas
srin gyi bong bu ga dmar la zhon nas lha mo'i pho brang sgor phyin te srin po kho bdag ni mi'i cha byad la shin tu gzugs bzang la mdzes pa gcig tu sprul/ bong bu ni/
ri dwags ga dor smug po zhig tu sbrul te lha mo dung skyong ma'i spyan sngar phyin nas rol mo sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs byas pas bslus so/ /lha mo rol mo
la dga' bas 'dzum zhig shor ro/ /de nas srin pos glags rnyed de lcags kyi lham sgrog sngon po bkrol nas bzung ste glu 'di skad blangs so/ /kye yongs 'du shing gi
gnas mchog na/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang nas/ /bde ldan 'phrul gyi lding khang na/ /'gying bag tshul du gar mdzad pa/ /dbang phyug sras mo ma lags sam/ /dga'
byed dung skyong ma lags sam/ /lha mo mang po'i tshogs dad rol/ /dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor ni/ /rin chen mdzes pas kun nas spras/ /spyan ni ut+pal 'dab ma 'dra/ /
shangs ni bil ba'i 'bras bu 'dra/ /zhal nas ut+pal ngad kyang bro/ /sku ni 'khril ldem gzhon tshul 'dra/ /gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan mchog /nu 'bur stod smad phyed
pas 'gying / /khyod 'dra'i sku ni gzhan na dkon/ /lha yi longs spyod mdzes pas mi brel yang / /zhabs kyi chas su lcags sgrog 'di 'bul zhes/ /ci mdzad ci sdug ci
yang gsung ba snyan/ /khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra shin tu dkon/ /sems can kun gyis blta bas mi ngoms khyod/ /bdag gis dbul 'di bzhes par gnang bar
mdzod| |ces phul ba la/ lha mos lcags sgrog blangs so/ /de nas rang gi rkang pa g.yas pa la dkris te rgyan byas so/ /de nas khol mo des jo mo dung skyong mal zhus
pa| kye jo mo bde mchog dung skyong ma/ bdag zhu ba zhig mchis na gnang ngam byas pa la/ jo mo na re/ khyod glo ba nye bas ci zhus pa gnang ngo zer
ro| |de nas lha ni/ ngag bden pa'i sdom pa yod pas/ ji skad smras pa ltar byed pa yin no/ /de nas khol mos gsol pa/ kye bdag gi yul gyi rjer gyur dung skyong
ma| |khyod 'dra 'jig rten gzhan na med/ /'grogs pas zla med skar ma gcig shar 'dra/ /deng 'dir mchis pa'i lcags sgrog 'bul mkhan de/ /gtan gyi grogs zlar
mdzad par zhu ba 'bul/ /bdag kyang rtag tu khyod kyi bran mo byed/ /ces zhus pa la/ lha mo des sngar khas blangs pa des mi bya ba'i dbang med nas lha mo na re/ khyor
bya'i| mi de gang na 'dug /su yin byas pa la/ khol mos smras pa/ de ni/ bdag gi zhang po srin po da sha gri ba yin/ yul lang+ka pu rangs na 'dug ces smras pa dang /
de nas dung skyong ma dbang med du srin po'i chung mar song ngo / /de nas lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la dmod pa bor ba/ nga yi bu mo rab tu gces par byas te/ /lha
yi longs spyod mdzes pas mi brel yang / /nga la gsang nas srin po'i chung mar song / /phyin chad bu mo khyod kyang srin dang 'grogs/ /mi sha za zhing mi lpags gyon par
gyur| |srog gcod byed cing mi yi thod khrag thogs/ /bong bu zhen la lha yi kha dog nyams/ /srin gyi kha dog nag la 'jigs par shog /de yi khol mo re ma ti khyod kyang / /nga
yi bu mo bslus te srin la byin/ /khyod kyang mi sdug 'jigs pa'i gdong du gyur/ /tshe rabs kun tu khyo dang ma phrad cig /ces dmod pa bcu gnyis pa bor ro/ /de nas bu mo la
ma'i dmod pas bsdigs nas lha'i kha dog dkar po nyams te mthing nag tu gyur/ mi sha za/ mi khrag 'thung / mi lpags gyon/ bong bu zhon/ gcer bur bud nas 'dug go /bu ni/
srin po phru gu seng+ge zla dang / me tog cod pan dang / gangs can dang / mche ba bdun pa la sogs pa lnga brgya skyes tsam na khyo srin po da sha gri ba shi'o/ /de nas bu mo dung skyong ma yang
yugs sa'i cha lugs byas te skra mdun skra lan bu gcig la blas so/ /bran mo phur ba'i lha yang dmod pas bsdigs pas srin gyi phag rdzi byed tsam na phag rdzi dun bu srin bya bas
mo la dbang med du chags pa spyad do/ /de nas phur pa lha yang nal bu sbrum mo/ /de nas dpon g.yog gnyis kyis srin po'i bong bu brkus pa zhon nas da sha gri ba'i ral gri sdig pa
can brkus pa g.yas na thogs/ srin po'i nor bu rin po che brkus nas ne'u le'i rkyal bur sbas nas lag pa g.yon du thogs nas bros so/ /phyi nas srin po'i dmag gis bsad
kyis dogs nas bong bu bskyon nas kha phyir bstan te phyi na srin po bya ra byed cing phyin no/ /tha mar dur khrod cig tu phyin na/ skyes pa g.yul du bsad
pa'i ro zhig dang phrad do/ /de nas khong gnyis sha de bsregs nas za 'dod pa la/ gtsub shing med nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na rdo sol gyi ri la char bab ste me 'bar ba mthong nas
rdo sol me blangs nas sha bsregs nas zos so/ /phyi na khyi dkar po zhig 'brang ba yang bsad nas zos so/ /pags pa la rgyal mtshan byas so/ /de nas khol mo re ma ti la
nal phrug skyes so/ /khong gnyis kyis nal phrug gi sha yang zos so/ /de nas jo mo bong bu la zhon/ khol mos kha khrid byas nas rgya mtsho'i khar phyin nas gshin rje rlung gi
'khor lo can zhag bdun bsgoms pas rlung nag 'tshub ma nag po zhig drung der grub bo/ /de nas lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis snang srid kyi lha 'dre mthu bo che pos nas/
smon lam btab pa/ da yang tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu gsang sngags kyi grub pa thob nas rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar shog cig /nga'i bran
mo phur pa'i lha 'di yang dus thams cad du nga'i 'bangs ka ma lar shog cig /nor du mi mgo la longs spyod par shog cig /zhon pa bong bu la byed la lag cha ral gri la
byed bar shog cig /ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho bskor zhing rlung 'tshub ma la bA ya be bA ya be zhes bos tsam na/ 'tshub ma byung bas dpon g.yog gnyis ka rgya mtsho'i nang du bskyur te
btang ngo / /de nas lha mo dud skyong ma de mi sha zos pa'i mthu dang / rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dur khrod chen po ro'i tshal zhes bya bar gshin rje'i lha mthu
can gyi bu mor skyes te/ gnod sbyin ma chen mo la kha dog mthing nag la rab tu 'jigs pa/ mig rtsa dmar ba/ mche ba zang yag la ral pa ting za bang du 'dug ba zhig tu gyur te
gshin rje ma ru rtse dang sbyor ba byas ba la bu bdud khram nag po bya ba byung / bong bu yang dmar gwa la g.yu'i rna ba can rlung gi gshog pa can mig mjug ma la yod pa zhig tu byung
nas nor skal byed do/ /de nas khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma 'di ni/ skye ba gang blangs she na/ rgya mtsho'i nang du bud med lus po phyed bskams la chu srin gyi mgo can zhig tu skyes te/
ming yang klu mo gzhogs bskams chu srin mgo klu mo re ma ti zhes bya bar btags nas zhag dgu bcu na tshe 'phos nas skye ba blangs pa ni/ yul dri za'i grong khyer gser sdings
skyed mos tshal zhes bya ba na dug shing nag po 'gyur med kyi rtsa ba na bdud ri ti 'gong nyag dang / dran pa dbang byed gnyis byi byas pa la zhag drug cu rtsa gcig na bu mo zhig skyes
te| phas ni/ srid pa gsum gyi blo 'phrog mar btags/ mas ming btags pa ni/ ya mtshan 'phrul gyi gshog pa can du btags/ bdud pha ma
gnyis kyis rang gi bu mo la skra nyag re la gser dang / bai DUr+ya'i chun 'phyang dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / nyi zla'i thod gdengs dang / thod pa'i mgur chu dang / sbrul gyi gdu
bus brgyan te byi byas pa'i nal phrug yin pas/ bdud kyis rin po che sna lnga'i khang pa'i dbus su thod pa'i gzhal yas khang byas/ thod pa'i nang du yang thod 'phrul gyi
lding khang grub/ /de'i nang du khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi bdun tshogs kyi nang du mi ro 'bum gyi khri steng du bu mo de sus ma mthong / sus kyang mtshor bar sbas te sgo smra bo lag
ring dang / nam gru khram thogs kyis bcad do/ /bdud kyi dmag gi rgyal mo dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal mo dang / sa bdag gi rgyal mo dang / de rnams kyis khang pa de rab
