byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang : gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang : yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang : lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang :
ru tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang : rmu rje btsan po rgyal po chen po dang : phyi rol lha'i bdag po ka la nag po dang : khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang : klu'i bdag
po gzhon nu gtum po dang : lha'i rgyal po li byin chen po dang : gnod sbyin chen po la ga rgyu ba dang : bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang : klu bdud chen po yam shud dmar po
dang : gzhan yang lha dang : klu dang : lha ma yin dang : za byed dang : yi dwags dang : 'byung po'i tshogs dang : pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
rab tu 'dus so: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par
mdzad de: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag: gzugs su brnyan pa rab tu 'jigasaH sgra ni mi snyan dag cing gtumaH dri ni mi zhim rul myag bsung \u0f7f ro ni kha skyur
tsha bar bro: reg bya tsha rtsub mi gdug spyod: zhe sdang chen po'i me 'bar zhing : nga rgyal keng rus drag tu gtams: gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs: 'dod chags khrag gi chu chen
'brub: phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs: stir chen po'i longs spyod la: stag gzig gcan gzan ce spyang dang : kang+ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogs: sha za khrag 'thung rus
pa 'joms: bam dang rul dang myags pa dang : bye dang bral dang gzhigs pa dang : zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor: brul dang zags dang brlag pa dang : rtsod dang rgod dang glal
ba dang : 'jigs shing gdug dang rngam pa dang : rol pa'i longs spyod rab tu sprul: kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing : gsod gcod shag gtub lus kyi las: tshig
rtsub brlang ba'i nga ror 'byin: khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis: ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i: mngon par gcod la rab tu bkod: 'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur
pa: kun rdzob tsam du snang ba las: sems can gcig gi ba spu la: cung zad gnod pa yong med de: rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod: nges pa'i de nyid kho na 'o: cho 'phrul
chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis: rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po yis: dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas
kyis: thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas: ma lus bstan pa srung mdzad pa'i: gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur phyir: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje
'chang : lnga brgya'i grogs dang bcas pa yis: so so gtso chen mdun nyid nas: rang gi stan las rab tu langs: mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad: thugs kyi gnas
pa'i sa bon las: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug kun: ljang nag rlung gis rab tu dkrogs: khrag gi rba klong 'khrug cing g.yoHsha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi las:
bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'bar: b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang : gdug cing 'jigs su rung ba ni: stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod: 'phrin las ma lus rdzogs
mdzad lus: phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyabaHbstan la rab sdang pha rol poHphung po zhabs kyis gdan du bting : 'od gdan gtsang ma gsum dang bcas: che ba
mchog gi skur mdzad de: rig can mthar gnas dbur mnan cing : stong pa bco brgyad dag cing snang : phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral: ban+d+ha tsit+ta g.yas g.yon
bsnams: thugs kyi dbang rtags dang pos gzung : thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdog: mi 'jigs rig pas mnan pa'i zhabs: bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas
pas gnon: ma lus dbang du bsdud pa'i phyir: ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar: 'bar ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigs: gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngub:
snyan gyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyabaHrno dbal tshems kyis gdug pa sgrol: ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag por bsdebs: khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud: dpa' ba'i chas kyis
rab tu brgyan: srung ba'i lha rnams sku la rdzogs: stobs ldan de nyid ma nyes mdzad pa'i: 'byung ba che la dbang sgyur ma: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ma: gri gug tri shUl
bdud rtsi g.yas: ban+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon: gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg: dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa las: 'dul byed sprul pa rab tu 'phro: phyogs bcu
'jig rten khams kun gyi: gtum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i: drag sngags bdag po ma lus kun: rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'i: rten dang gnas la re rer snang :
rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yoHoM badzra sarba duSh+Tan e ka ya ma ma b+he ra b+ha gr-ih+Na hUM phaTaHbdud dang gshin rje srin po dang : gnod sbyin lha dang log lta can: rmu rje che dang
phyi rol phyogs: gdug byed mkha' la rgyu ba dang : byol song ltos 'gro lus 'dzin dang : nga rgyal 'chang dang sprul pa can: mtha' 'khob gnas mtha' ma lus rgyuHlha
bdud mi ma yin gyi gnas: kha ba can du phyogs shing sreg: las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byin: ma lus pa rnams thams cad kun: shugs drag
rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin: rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnasaH thugs rje bdag pos dgongs mdzad kyang : gtum rngam 'jigs byed chen po'i skuHgsang tshig drag po
gsung gi sgras: ma lus tshim par bka' stsal pa: e ma 'jig rten khams kun gyi: drag sngags bdag po dregs pa can: sngon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dang : rang gi bka'
las ma 'da' bar: khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcas: so so'i lus dang btags pa'i ming : rigs dang rten dang byed pa'i las: sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnams:
'jigs byed gnas 'dir myur du ston: khyed rnams 'di las 'da' byed na: nga yi srog gi dam tshig gis: khyed kyi lus sems srog dang bcas: ma lus gtan
nas brlag par bya: zhes bka' stsal nas drag sngags kyi tshogs 'di dag kyang bka' stsal toHoM sarba duSh+T+na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaTaHya ma ra tsa mr-i ta ga s+ya ma ma:

k+She ta ma ra ya hring hring dza dza: du phrag ra tsa dug dun ma ting ma ra ya hring hring dza dza| rak+sha rak+mo ma ma ra ti ka mA ra ya hring hring dza dza: yak+Sha a pasma ra rak+Sha mi ru sham pa mA ra ya

hring hring dza: dza: mahA de ba shwa ra rA dza mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: ma trang+ka ru tra kA la mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: mun mun pa tsa tsit+ta mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: ti rti ka ma te ma hA de ba mA ra ya

hring hring dza: dza: biSh+Nu phi tra rok+ti dza mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: na ga rA dza ku ma tsan+d+ha mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: rA dza b+hu long e sa ya mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: ma hA khu lo sa b+ho mA ra ya hring

hring dza: dza: badzra sA d+hu so aM tsa mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: a b+hi shu traM li mA ra ya hring hring dza: dza: nri hur thum dza: sha truM mA ra ya rbad: ces brjod cing sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba ni: sA
yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan toHsangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma rungs pa'i sgra chen po dang : 'od
dang glog 'bar ba dang : rlung gi shugs drag pos gang bar gyur toHbdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas
te rab tu 'dus nas rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nas bka' rab tu sgrub par brtson par gyur toHdrag sngags 'du
pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las: byin rlabs chen pos dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi
rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya baHmdog nag poHkha nas me 'bar baHlag na khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa: zhing lpags
kyi gos gon pa: yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya baHlag na khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs shing gos su mi lpags gon pa: bdud rta nag po la khyo
shug gnyis char zhon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so: de bzhin du: 'chi bdag gshin rje
zhes bya baHmdog nag thod pa gri gug 'dzin: chung ma gshin rje za byed ma: gri gug thod pa phyag gis 'dzin: khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos: ma he chu glang zhon nas
ni: gshin rje pho mo'i tshogs dang bcas: 'gal byed gzor zhing myur du lhags: srin po gsod byed yab yum yang : mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos: ral gri gri
gu ga g.yas kyis bzung : g.yon gyis mi mgo thod khrag thogs: stag dang seng+ge zhon pa skyod: srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod: gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang :
chung ma sha za ral gcig dang : mthing nag mgyogs byed rta la zhon: zhing lpags gyon te phyag gnyis kyis: ral gri dar nag zhing lpags bzung : gnod sbyin tshogs
dang bcas te 'khod: drag sngags bdag po'i sde dpon teHshar lho nub byang phyogs dag gi: gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khod: dbang phyug chen po zhes bya baH'jig rten
lha yi sngags dag gis: dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs: dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhon: dregs pa lha yi bdud 'khor bcas: rings par bcas te shar phyogs 'khod:
thar pa nag po zhes bya baHmdog nag mchod gtor dug thun 'dzin: dom nag zhon te zhing lpags bgos: sde dang bcas te lho phyogs 'khod: rmu rje nag po zhes bya baHdar
nag dang ni zhags pa thogs: ber nag gyon te rmu rta zhon: rang gi sde dang nub phyogs 'khod: mu stegs nag po chen po yang : khaT+wAM dang ni tri shUl bzung : mi lpags bgos
shing ma he zhon: rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod: khyab 'jug ro ti zhes bya baHmthing nag khram shing dgra sta 'dzin: sbrin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon zhon: gza' bdud
'khor bcas stang phyogs 'khod: klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa: gos nag sbrul lpags na bza' can: bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzin: chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas: 'og gi phyogs
su 'khod cing 'dug: gzhan yang li byi lag dgu dang : the so gtso dang yam shud kyis: so so'i sngags kyi bdag po dag: dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing : shel gri
thogs shing lag dgu 'gyed: dar dmar mdung ring lag gis 'dzin: rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dang : rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgos: so so'i
sde dang g.yog bcas shing : phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas bcas 'khod: gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dang : ma mo gshin rje srin po 'dud: ru tra mu stegs 'gong the
dang : ging rmu gza' dang rgyan bran sman: snang srid lha srin dregs pa can: ded dpon chen po rnams kyi 'khor: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang : yang gsang dang ni drag
po dang : btags shing chags pa smras pa dang : las byed shan pa thor shod dang : che grags rtsal dang ma mo dang : mun thibs stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang : glen
zhing dbang che la sogs rnams: bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi: bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas: ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen du: 'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs
dang bcas: rang gi nus pa rab bstan teHbka' nyan gsung bstod rjes 'brangs gnas: de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs
dang ldan pa de dag gis rang rang gi 'khor dang : rigs kyi sde dang : mthu dang : longs spyod kyi khyad par dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas 'di skad ces
kyang gsol toHbcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen poHbdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa can sdang ba gnod ba
dang : shugs pa dang : 'tshe ba dang : rtsod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing : byams pa dang : snying rje dang : phan pa'i sems skye bar mi nus pa rnams kyis teHrang rang gi
khams dang : byed pa dang : rigs dang : las kyi bya ba dang : rten dang : nus pa dang : dbang gi khyad par dag dang mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag
bka' stsal par gsol zhes gsol toHdrag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas
rdo rje 'dzin pa yis: sku yi che ba rab ston cing : gsung gi snying pos gnad bskul teHthugs kyi dgongs pa gtsor mdzad nas: 'jig rten dregs pa can dang mthu stobs can:
'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa: hUM 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams: nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par bgyi: nga ni chos sku bde chen teHye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grubaH
snang ba'i sku la dngos po med: ye shes sku ste sku yi mchogaH nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen teHye nas tha snyad sgra dang bral: brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med: ma 'gags
gsung ste gsung gi dpal: nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste: ye nas mtshan med yang dag bral: gnyis med thugs las rtsol pa med: skye med
thugs te thugs kyi dpal: nga ni yon tan tshogs chen teHlhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyabaHsmon med dgongs pa ma lus 'byung : dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi:
nga ni 'phrin las mdzad pa ste: yongs rdzogs brtson pa'i bdag nyid can: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod: sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs: 'jig rten sngags
bdag dregs pa can: gtso chan dbang sgyur khyed rnams kyang : nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyiHthugs dang ye shes gnyis su med: gsung dang dbye ba yod ma yin:
sku la so sor mi blta ste: yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs: 'phrin las gcig ste thun mong bsgrub: thog ma med nas da lta'i bar: nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyis:
gnas ngan len gyi phung po smin: nga rgyal dregs pa'i lus ngag sems: stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs: che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang : yang dag nges pa'i don
ma rtogs: don dam bden pa khong ma chud: spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs: rang rig rgyal ba'i stobs ma rnyed: skye med dbyings kyi rtsal ma shar: bde chen gnas kyi gdeng
ma thob: mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myong : chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong : ye shes klong gi sgo ma phyed: de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis: rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs:
lus la bdag tu yongs ma 'dzin: ngag la brjod par ma smra zhig: sems la dngos por gang ma rtog: gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung : rten rdzas longs spyod dbang
skal rnams: nga dang nga yir gzung bya yin: thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig: de dag ma lus stong pa ste: stong pa nyid kyang de dag go: de las gud na gzhan med de: gzhan las
gud na'ang de med cing : ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med: ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing : ma bcos ma sgyur ma byung la: ma skyed ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i: don chen de ni
rang nyid las: phyi nang snga phyi steng dang 'og: phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems: kun nas rnyed pa ma yin teH'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no: sha khrag pags dang
rus pa dang : snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang : dbang po yan lag bcas pa la: bde chen dam pa de mi gnas: de las gzhan na'ang gnas min teHgnas ma grub la gnas
zhes brjod: gnas yod mnyam na der rtogs shing : ji 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu: gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song : gang na 'dug cing ci zhig byed: dbyibs dang kha dog ming
dang mtshan: rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogs: de la de yis der bltas pas: mthong ba med pa blta ba yi: gang la gang gis gar bsgoms
pas: bsgom dang bral la sgom zhes bya: ci la su zhig spyir spyod pas: spyod dgu mi gnas spyod pa che: su las lus thob ci bsgrubs pas: ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu
ste: ma lus med cing rnam pa yi: yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go: zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod: dbang du bsdu ba 'phrin las yin: rang la rdzogs shing rang gis
grub: thag chod pa dang bstan pa dang : tshad ldan mthar phyin la bzla dang : 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang : bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang : gnas dus yon tan skyon
rnams ni: rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub: ces bka' stsal toHdrag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las: don dam pa'i gnas nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis: dgongs pa chen po 'di gsungs teHye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i: chos nyid don gyi snying po ni: gzung 'dzin mtha' bral don rtogs teHnga
bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis: dregs shing gzir ba'i ru tra de: ma bsgral ba ni nyes pa ste: thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum: mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis
bsgral: dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par: dngos por spyad pas 'khor bar ltung : mkhas rtogs ldan pas spyad pa yis: 'phags pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol:
tshogs gnyis rdzogs te sku gsum thob: rnam rig mthong bas la thag gcad: brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsam: dbang du bsdu dang gdul ba'i phyir: 'jig rten
las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud: nga dang ston pa rnams kyis bshad: chos dbyings rang gnas dur khrod du: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du sdud:
snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dus: sdod cing btsugs las ltos pa'i chos: skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung : stan pa 'jig byed las ngan can: drag sngags stobs kyis
bsgral byas na: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur: dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin no: lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin: rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur: ling+ga
nya 'o dmigs pa'i rten: ming rus byang bus rnam shes dang : bla tshe 'khor ba'i rten yin te: 'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag 'gugs: pho nyas las kun sgrub par byed: sngags
dang rdzas kyis dpal skyed cing : thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang : rengs lkugs mtshon 'bebs rdul du rlogs: gnad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren: lha dang 'byed cing
rtsa ba gcod: byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni: don po khrag gi lan bu'i mgo: kun gzhi til 'bru tsam zhig gnas: rtsa ba rlung gnas 'dra bas te:
phur pa me sbal lta bu yis: bsdus shing bsregs te bcad pa yis: dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas: bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la 'dus: phrin las rnam bzhis
gzir ba la: dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyam: lta spyod ldan pas zhing bcus te: pha rol bla med gnas su bsgral: bar ma do yi rnam shes ni: hUM dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du
yis: sbyang dang sbar ba'i las rnams bya: phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed: phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni: rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang : chos sku'i gzugs
brnyan brtan par bya: 'dis ni pha rol bla na med: sprul pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang : rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi: spyod pa rlabs chen spyad pa 'o: zhes
bka' stsal to: drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las: sgrol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis:
las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te: thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas: dur khrod chu gling ri yi sul: khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru: rab tu mnag cing gdeng
ldan pas: dam tshig ldan pa'i sgrub po ste: yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob ma yis: sngon du bla ma mnyes byas shing : lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan: rdo rje
'dzin pa he ru ka: nye dang ldan pa gnyis su med: tshad dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste: yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas: rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni: smin
'byor gdug cing shis pa'i sa: las la mngags pa de dag la: dregs pa gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i rten: 'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan: lte ba las
ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs: bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad du 'god: bar khyams phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir bcas: rim pa gsum gyi thod phreng ldan: rang gi rigs la
sngags pa yi: dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags: thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya: dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten: bris sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dang : rang
gi gnas su mdzes par 'god: gsung gi snying po'ang de bzhin no: thugs rten rang rang phyag cha 'am: sngon nas bsags pa'i rdzas yin no: rang sngags bsags
pa'i 'khor lo dang : mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams: nang du mtshon pa'i rten du g+zug+saHde dag tsit+ta so so ru: dmigs pa'i snying po dril te gzhug:
gsang zhing sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur: de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su: nga yi sngar bshad rgyud nyid la: e dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad
bcu gnyis: khru gang mdzub gang thur du brko: gdug cing drag po'i rdzas kyis byug: bdug cing bsreg pa'ang de yis so: de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni: rgyud med
gzugs ngan ka pA la: seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyes: dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang : shel nag gnam ru nag po dang : gi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang :
zla mi gcig dang srid shing dang : tsa ra ka dang mgrin snyan dang : sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyi lus: phyi nang bar dang gsang bas brgyan: bsreg chen spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas:
rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgras: bsung chen dri dang sha khrag ro: tsha rtsub reg dang 'bru bcud bshos: sha chen dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i tshogs: rab tu bstar zhing 'bad
pas sbyar: dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu yis: nga yi sngon gyi 'phrin las bzhin: khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de: thams gnas pa'i 'byung tshan lnga: drag po sngags
kyi 'byung bar bsgom: keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang : ban+d+ha gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsigs: sti ra gsar rnying tshogs
kyis gtams: rak+ta dmar po grub cing 'bab: tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'byung : dbang po don snying 'phyo zhing 'brul: bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan: yan lag nying lag
rkang zhing snyil: shun dang pags pa brgyangs shing 'phyar: phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og: gcus dang 'phyang dang bskum dang brgyangs: rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshags:
ba dan bla bres lhab lhub dang : phur pa dang ni stab ma dang : yol ko ka ma la gtams ni: rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan: gzhal yas 'bar ba de 'dra ba: rab tu bsngags
pa 'di las bshad: dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas: sbyor zhing dgongs pa de nyid kyis: bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed: 'phro dang chas kyi khyad par dang : bsdu
dang rang gi gnas su brtag: skur gyur gang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo dang : byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis: yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs: de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du:
rgyal mdzad rang gi phyag rten du: dmigs pa myur lhags de yi 'khor: bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang : gnod sbyin drag po'i lha dang klu: rang rang chung mar bcas pa dag:
ngas bshad bzhin du 'jigs par bsam: sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste: lha dang ma mo rgyal po ging : btsan 'gong rmu dang mu stegs dang : rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas:
ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs: 'di las rab brjod gang yin pa: de nyid du ni gas pa bar bya: nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs: ye shes rigs
kyi dbang bskur zhing : byin gyis brlabs nas rgyas btab ste: de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstim: yongs rdzogs sku yis bstan pa bsgrub: phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul zhing
bstod: rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis: bsdu dang sbyor dbang sgrol ba dang : gnas dang ring dang rim pa dang : bskyed dang dbab pa mnyes pa yi:
gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pas: drag sngags rol pa ma 'gags spyod: rang gi las la sbyar ba ni: bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje'i ltoHsrin po'i dmar dang
gnod sbyin byad: lha yi chang dang ma mo'i rims: gza' yi ki kang klu yi dug: tshe chad pa dang khri mon bcug: gcan gzan 'dzum dang lcags sgrog tshud: nad dang
mtshon nyid khong zhugs dang : dug 'thungs thog babs bzhin du drag: thar zhes bya ba gdags su med: bdud ni ma brtags srog la rgol: gshin rje 'khor
ba'i 'khor lo gcod: srin po ral gri'i so yis 'gems: gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'joms: lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis sor: ma mo dpag med mda'
bzhin 'bigs: gza' bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg: klu ni sa 'og ral gri sogs: thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags/ /mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad:
du 'bod lta bu gshin rje ste: ro len dur pa srin pos 'dren: lce mdung drag po gnod sbyin na: bka' chad drag rtsal lha yis smod: ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste: 'brug sgra glog
'byin bza' bdud do: klu yis sbrul nag dug gis 'joms: 'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis: phal pa rnams la dmod par byed: de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o: zhes bka'
stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dmod pa nye bar sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis: so so'i drag sngags dmod pa
bstan: phung bshig bdud kyi drag sngags ni: rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru: shel nag snying du nya 'o rtsal: dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab: tshon sna lnga'am nag pos
bcings: gri lcags sbug ma srog rtsar gzhug: yungs kar yungs nag til nag dang : ske tshe shing tshe zi ra dang : zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang : dug khrag ngar dang
bcas pa rnams: mu su ri yi thod par bsdu: bdud kyi srog til sngags kyis mngag: bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la cho: ka la mu tri mA ra ya: dgra bo snying ling
tsit+ta rbud: nri zlum khyigs: bram bram ro la 'dus: zer spugs ro spugs bdud rjes chod: bdud mos rol: bdud bus gtor: bam khyigs: pra ma ni:
sha truM ma ra ya rbad: mun pa gling 'khrugs zhes bya ba: ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de: rtag tu brjod cing sbug mar brab: gang la dmigs pa de myur du: snang srid bdud kyis
srog nas 'dren: mi nag go tshon bcas pa dang : sngags nag bud med mon dang rdoHkhyi nag rta nag bya nag dang : rgod nag dred nag shel nag dang : ri nag mtsho nag
shel nag tshogs: dmag dang 'khrugs dang 'thab pa dang : khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dag: las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur: de nas nya ro bstabs shing bsgral:
gri mtshon phur pa rnams kyis gtub: lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar: ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyin: rol par mi byed bskyar la bsgrub: ru tras myos shing 'thibs nas 'chi: 'chi bdag
gshin rje'i drag sngags ni: rgyud med pho mo ka pA la: za ma tog tu kha sbyar la: nang du de nyid tsit+ta gzhug: pho thod stang nas spyi bor phug: bcing dang dgab pa drang ba dag: sngar
bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg: ya ma me ta k+She: ra tsa sa to meHru tsa na yo ni: ro ma tsa ni: sa ma ra dza: mu ka snying khrag rtsa la rbad: ya ma dbugs la rngubs: ro tsa ya ma rA
dza: rA dza baM ril rbad: ya ma rA dza hri snying gong chod: ya ma snying : ya ma khrag: ya ma du baM ril rbad: gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags: rab tu mngags te tsit+tar brab: sha khrag
chen pos mnyes par bya: gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis: don snying rlon par ster ba dang : snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung : de nas las la sbyar byas na: gang la
dmigs pa myur du sgrol: gtum khro srin po'i dmod pa ni: myur shi'i thod par de snying nang : dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan de: ming sngags ldan pa btsal byas te: le
brgan kha dog dar gyis dril: sngon dmar skud pa'i dra bar gzhug: stir gsar pa kha phye la: dbang po don snying nang khrol gyis: srin po bskang zhing dmod pa bzlas: rak+sha srin po

sa mun dza: rak+sha ru tra hu ra hu ra b+h+yo: ru gnyen nag po dgra la b+h+yo: dgra bo mu le shin sod sod: hab le hab le kha thun b+h+yo: rak+sha dza: tri ta dza: du ra du ra shan dza: rak+sha rbad: nri mA
ra ya sod: dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg: mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis: khrid dang gsod dang don snying ster: las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis: dgra bo'i don
po myur du sgrol: drag sngags gnod sbyin drag sngags ni: rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni: nya'o gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags: rag chen la phug mu sa la: snying sna khrag sna sbyar bas
mchod: gnod sbyin srog tig dmod la brjod: yak+Sha ba hu da ri dza: ma ga la bag sha dza: ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dza: yak+Sha snying la shad shad du dza:
yak+Sha srog la breng thuM dza: ming shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra: rlung dmar dag dang bu yug 'ong : gsang ba'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg: lhag ma bsreg cing rlung gis gtor: de
nyid khrag tu skyugs te sgrol: drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni: lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du: brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bris: sngon dmar skud pas ske nas
gdags: rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug: dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la: tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya: bya rgod dar ma'i sgro rtsa ni: srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du
brtol: dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la: dbus su gru gsum thur du bru: lha rdo gsum gyi sgyed bu la: gong gi thod pa gzhag par bya: mthun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon
cha dang : ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying : bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang : ba dan dkar po rten du gzugs: yungs kar sngags kyi mda' chog ni: thun gyi rdzas su
gzhag par bya: drag sngags snying gi nang du brab: stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas: lha rnams 'dus pa'i sngags rnams basbreng : mahA de ba ti dza ti dza: sa ma phra ma
na rag sha kaM ka la ya hUM: de ba rA dza mahA na dza: dgra bo mA ra ya thun rbad thun rbad: shag sen dza dza: shag sen dza dza hUM hUM: tsa tu ra mu kha rag sha ma na: kang+ka ma ya hUM: mahA de ba
a mu ka mA ra ya sod: 'jig rten grags pa mthu rtsal can: lha yi bod rbad gsad gsum dril: drag tu bzlas shing snying nas brab: rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang : skyes pa
stag chas dar ma dang : zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni: gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang : dngos su snying phyung 'phang ba 'ong : rtags byung snying nas ling+ga dbyung : mtshon
gyis gtubs la me la bsreg: thal ba nya'o byas nas ni: thod par bcug la lha rten nam: 'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan: lha yi dal yams dgra la phobs: nad
bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni: nr-i dri'i mo yi thod pa ru: de yi snying nang ling+ga gzhug: mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la: thod pa tshon skud lnga yis bcing : dkyil 'khor mthing
nag gru gsum dbus: thod pa bcug la bsgrub par bya: smug nag gsum gyi snying khrag gis: ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod: yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe
sogs: drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshad la: ma mo rnams kyi rmod pa'i sngags: ma mo snying kha rag: ma mo snying kha rag: ma ma rak+shaHma ma rak+sha: trag rak+Sha snying khrag la
hubs dza: snying rtsal dun dun: trag rak+sha ma ma dza dza: dam dam dgra snying rbad nan: ma ma nr-i snying tsit+ta la thun thun: trag rak+sha trag sha mo thun thun: mugs
mugs myogs myogs: rbad rbad: dza dza ma ma thun: snying khrag thun: ti ta ma ma rag mo: sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo: ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa yis: gsad pa las kyi ngan sngags
'di: gri lcags las byas sbu gu 'am: bya rgod sgro rtsa'i nang nas sngags: ma sring mon mo bal mo dang : byi mo la sogs bud med tshogs: bya nag rgod nag tshogs
chen lhags: dngos su sha dang mgo sug ster: tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang : gsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang : snying la phur pas gdab cing gsad: dug shing
me la sbyin sreg bya: thun khrag dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phang : thal ba bsdus la nya 'o bya: dur khrod dbus su gnas par bya: rims nad dag gis dmigs pa sgrol:
drag po gza' yi drag sngags ni: mon pa nag po'i ra rog po'i: thod par snying nang ling+ga gzhug: srog rtsar gri lcags sbu gu gzhug: yungs kar yungs nag zangs
lcags phye: thun du sngags te thod par brab: ma ra ba sha mi ki du ru du ru: ma ti dz+wa la ti dza: tsa ba ma ni: ru ru ra hu la: a tra ta tra pad+ma sha ra sha ra shasta: u mu ka mu ra ru
phaTaHtri ling+ga shang+ka du dri: dza dza yag sha thun: bum dril shi niM ba b+ha ba hiHkha yag kha dun ti: ru ti shu ti trig shul pra ti: mA ra ya dza: dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di: drag po'i
rdzas la sngags te brdeg: sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen: dkar gsum mngar gsum rdzas kyis mchod: nyi zla klad la 'khor ba dang : mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang :
sbrul chen gshog can 'khrug pa dang : bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang : dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong : rgod dang ri dwags gsod pa dang : don snying nang khrol
ster zhing rol: de lta'i gsod rtags rdzogs pa dang : snying dang ling ga hoM mer bsreg: thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor: thod pa klu yi rten sar sba: chu 'khyags ser
ba drag tu dbab: hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi: kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur: gdug pa klu yi drag sngags ni: lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas
su: stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus: dgra yi pha mes mgo bo 'am: yang na mdze can thod pa ru: dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug: gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum
dang : mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs dang : rtag tu mchod cing bsngags par bya: oM nag po ti pa tsa ya: nA ga rA dza: dag bo he khu la phe shan: na ga phos phos:
shigs shigs: hu ya hu ya: ti ya ti ya: ti pa tsa ti pa tsa: a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya: nA ga rA dza dgra bo ma ra ya rbad: shak+ti rbad: srog ti
rbad: snying ti rbad: snying la ril sham sham rbad: oM shan nag po phe rag udA nA ga rA dza nan/ thi li nan: pho li nan: drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yis: me chen 'bar
dang chu chen brub: ba lang spal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs: shing gcod sa snyil brag ral sogs: lus la shu ba skrang lo byung : stobs ldan gnyen pos drag tu
bcun: de nas byang bltas chu mig tu: b+ha ling gtang zhing bden pa bdar: thod pa ling+gar bcas pa mnan: klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtad: phung po lhag
med gtang bar bsam: gnas su byin la bsrung bar bya: dgra ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi: sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyis: 'jig rten las kyis mnar ba yi:
bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa can: ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur: zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa'i sde so so'i las
la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis: 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyiHso so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs
dang : sde dang las kyi byed pa bstan: sngon gyi 'jig rten khams 'di nyid: phung po nyon mongs la brten nas: nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos: rang gzhan kun
la 'tshe zhing rtsod: gnas ngan len gyis kha khrid byas: legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod: ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis: gti mug mun thibs bdud dang klu: nga
rgyal stobs kyi dregs pa bdag: lha dang rgyal po gol sar 'gyur: phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigs: 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs: zhe sdang btsan dang
srin por gol: srog lus 'brel bas bdud ces bya: yi dwags gshin rje rdog rnams rje: phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs: de yi don gyis srin por byung : gang gis
gnod pa sbyin byed pa: de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do: gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste: skyod byed nus pa lha yin no: gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor ba: gza' zhes
bya bar brjod pa yin: blun zhing myos pas klu zhes bya: 'gro ba rigs drug so so la: bdud dang lha dang lha min te: gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar bcas: rgyal chen
rigs bzhi'i lha yi sde: ma mo srin po mi yi sde: gshin rje yi dwags sde yin te: klu ni byol song sde yin te: bdud rigs pho dang mo yi rigs: ye nas gnas dang glo
bur byung : 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed: sred dang chags par byed pa ste: gshin rje las dang zhib ste: gzugs can gzugs med
dbang can dang : dbang med gyi dang nang khyad par: las kyis rab tu bsgrims pa yi: srin po sha za rgan mo can: sprul pa dang ni gzu lum sa can: rab tu rgyu dang gcig
pu gnas/ /gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyis brtags: grol ba dang ni rang rgyud de: tha dad rigs ni bco brgyad de: gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can: lha ni 'dod
pa'i gzugs can dang : gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs: rab tu gdug rtsub tshe bas ni: lha min mi ma yin du grags: gang las byung dang gang las srid/ /
gang gis bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa: ma mo zhes su grags pa ste: las dang ye shes bsdus shing phye: phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis: che chung gtso dang 'khor
du snang : mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul can: las kyi phung po kho na 'o: rgyal po bla rje bram ze dang : dmangs dang gdol pa can rnams kyis: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan
lag 'gyur: tha dad rigs ni sde yin no: 'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngos: dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyis: ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung :
bdag lta bag la nyal du gnas: g.yo 'gul phra mos kun nas ldang : 'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar: bsod nams las dang de ma yin: las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang
sar ltung : nag cing mi dge zag par bcas: kha nas ma tho lung ma log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyis: gnas ngan len pa'i rgyun chags mthung : dus gsum
phyogs dang bcas pa yi: rjes su 'gro dang bzlog pa yis: 'khor ba'i rten gzhi dam po btsugs: so sor ma rig srog la gcod: longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam
par 'tshe: gzi mdangs 'byor pa sde dang bcas: gang yin 'joms shing rlag nus la: rgyud la sdug bsngal skyed byed pa: ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las: srog
len tshe 'phrog gcong dang sha: myos 'thibs byi nad rims dang yams: gcog 'gyel gdug pa'i nad 'bebs shing : rme dang 'khrug pa rtsod pa dang : thor shod las dang
dmod pa yis: rang gi sde las re re yang : kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de: drug cu rtsa drug yan lag bcas: las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab: dregs pa'i bdag po so
so yi: rang bzhin dgongs pa'i bye brag gis: dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag: tshul bzhin srung ba'i dam tshig can: drag sngags las kyi dmod pa la: brgya
dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gis: nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogs: rang gi rigs la gang sngags pa: de dang de la rab sbyar bas: las kyi mtha'
la gang dmigs pa: rdo rje can gyis yongs grub ste: nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang : mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs: lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa: gang yin
de la mngon par 'byung : de yis thun mong yongs 'grub cing : mthar phyin pa yang len par byed: 'di las ma 'ongs rnyog pa can: the tshom bskyed par ma byed cig:
nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis: 'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o: zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /dregs pa can gyi sde rigs dbye ba
bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis: las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs: dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang : chu 'dus ngam grog
'jigs su rung : phung shul nags khrod ma rungs pa: dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no: mi rung mi gsang phung shul sa: rdur zad phe ta rul chad sa: sa smin dri chen
ma rungs khrag: las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzas: rta nag dre nag ma he dang : chu glang dang ni stag seng dang : rta dkar ne le rgod dkar dang : dom nag rmu rta ban
glang dang : 'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dang : bya khyi ku ku shel dang mi: rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag: bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems: rang gzugs snying po 'khor
lor bcas: rgyan ldan shos cha mthun pa'i rdzas: dam tshig mchod cing brten pa 'o: so sor bsngags pa'i las khung du: thod ngan 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos: rgyu gsum
phu sa mtshon cha rnams: gsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no: rme khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsum: srog chags gsum dang rme rdzas gsum: thabs rdzas gsum dang bsreg
rdzas gsum: rten sa gsum dang dril sa gsum: bzhugs sa gsum dang dbab sa gsum: kun rdzogs rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis: chu drag dbab pa nges par 'grub:
rigs sul snod dang mchod rdzas dang : gnas sbyong byang chub srid 'dor blos: legs bslangs yid kyis mthun spyad pas: gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas: chos
sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la: steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum: rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur: bar snang khams dang nam mkha'i dbyings: srung dang
zlog dang gsod pa'i las: dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal skyed dang : rab tu khros dang sbyor ba zhig: las kyis pha rol dmod pas bzlog: ngan pa'i thod pa sna gsum
dang : shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du: rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas: dmigs pa'i nus stobs gnon par byed: khyad par las kyi bye brag
gis: rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dang : chung ma slob dpon mkhan po dang : rab byung khyim bsngags spyod dang : phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs: che btsan
dregs pas snyems pa dang : nga rgyal ldan zhing skal ba bzang : kun gyis bkur zhing brjod pa dang : sems rgyud bsrel dang yun gyis drin: nye bar bstan cing bslab
sbyong gnas: lhag pa'i lha yis rab bskyangs te: thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing : yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas: tshar gcad dka' ba'i yul yin
te: ma lus gang la bsngags pa yi: ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogs: rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bsgral: gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang : dbang
dang mngon par spyod rnams dang : rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhan: mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin: thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis spyad: de dag gsang
ba'i dmod pa yang : dregs pa sde brgyad so so yi: gal gnad snying po 'di dag go: ya ma du ha na ha na tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta ru tra ma ma sod sod: kha tri tsam tri dza dza shog tri dza

yag+sha dza da tri dza sha tri pa tri dza: tsi ta pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dza dza b+h+yo: tri tsa pa la a shug+me: a b+hi sha: a b+hi shu: tsa ga tri rag+sha sa ma ya dun thum ril li li: myags myags
myogs: srog la thun rbad: rag sha srog la phrig phrig: a pa ti li ki ni ya ma shri hri sti b+h+ri kri ta na kro ma ri pa tra srog la dun b+h+yo: mahA yak+sha thum ril rbad: ma ru tse ng+ga sha
g+di pa pra ma ling : gsod sgra gcod byed 'phrog byed kyis: ma lus las la bsngags par 'gyur: nr-i hur thum dza: sha truM ma ra ya rbad: a mu ka ma ra ya nu ma ka ma ru
sod sod: gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o: byi sha mi ki du ru mi tri ka ta dz+wa la a ta dz+wa swAhA: tsa pa ti ra hu la mahA kro d+ha ka pa shar shar ta shar ti hUM phaT: bi shu la du ma gi sha

dz+wa la a na: ma hA tsan+d+ha rak+sha hri d+ha nr-i ma ya ru tra sa tri byi nag ra tsa be ga a nan+ta rak+Sha ti san+d+ha rak+Shi na tsa ta b+ha mi ku ru: mu hri tsan+d+ha dum bu dum bu: kha la rag shu thum ri li li/ ma
ma sa ma ya trag rak+sha trag rag sha ma tri ga na: ma sa kha ya ku ru ti tsi b+ha li mu ta da ra da ra: tri ka ra mi triHdul dul: snying khrag la ril ril: rtsa la thun thun: trag rak+mo hril
hril: shag shag shar shar rbad: ma ma tsag sha trag tu phrom: a se la mi byi ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rak+sha hril hril shar b+h+yo: ma ra ya raM hril shar b+h+yo: shel tra hUM drag du rtsar
shu ti phroM kar phroM: phyir ma ti pa sha: mi ki ri ra hul shag hril phob: khrag la tsa ra mu sha b+h+yo: trag raM thun shag ril raM shar b+h+yo: bdud phroM na ga
hril sen shags du ma hril b+h+yo: bra ta pa sha ya ya ma snying ya ma khrag: ra hu la hril hril shag shag: ser ser/ tug tug ya ya phob phob: mu ka yeHka pa yeHa
pa yeHhri sti byi krin te/ dza pa ti ra hUM la ma hA kro d+ha ka bab ta shar shal ta te hUM phaT: thig nig: shu ti phroMHbdud phroMHmthongs phye: lcags sgrog khrol: mi ring
song : rkyang rje rkyang mo: tsu ru tsu ru: ho hoHphroM phroM: mu ra mu ra sha: du ru phroM: thog hUM hUM sod sod: rlung dang sprin dang rab rgyu dang : phyogs dang rtags kyi tshad ldan
pas: dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya: steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i las: gzhug dang gtor dang bsreg pa dang : bskol dang dgug dang sbreng ba dang : 'bod
dang dmod dang gdung ba dang : gzir dang bskor dang gzhig pa dang : gcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis: smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed: nag po ti pa tsa
ya na rag shar ra tsa d+he gu la phe sha rag sha nan: phos phos: shigs shigs: hu ya hu ya: tir ya tir ya: ka la nA ga ban+d+haHdgra bo mA ra ya dza: nag po ti pa
tsa ya phe sha rag sha dza: nA ga ka ka la phe shar ga sha dza dza: a sha nan ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo mA ra ya dza: nA ga rA dza shag ti srog ti la rbad: snying la rol: sham sham rbad: i sha na
nan: phe sha rag sha u nan: nA ga nan thi li nan: phi li nan: tsi ri nan: a par sod rmag: dul dul ka la rdubs myogs thibs: ma ra ya 'dus 'dus: d+ha ra d+ha ra: d+hu ru
d+hu ru: ru ru ra ra: ti ti: tri mo ti ti: ga ru ga ra ga tor dza mar te gang : man dza phe shan rag sha u ta nan: b+ha sha ni: sha ra le: shu ru mu le: d+ha ta ma re na: hU ya hU ya: ra ti ra ti:
thi r-i shag tsag gi: nr-i mA ra tri ya ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa baM ril: nag po ti pa rag sha nan: khug ro la baMHdgra bo mA ra ya dza: nag po ti pa tsa: snying la dza:
shag shan nan: khug thum ril rbad: tsan dri rag sha ro la khug thun ka la snying la thum ril rbad: ka la sho re snying la trag sha ha ra ka: a mu ka mA ra ya thum ril rbad nan:
khugs dang 'gro dang las byed pa'i: rang gi rtags dang ldan pa na: dmigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya: zlog dang ma grub 'khyil ba dang : 'byams dang sdug dang zad
mthar gtugs: gnyen po 'dab ma sna sel dang : bsdu dang spo dang mi zad gter: longs spyod thug pa med pa yis: dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya: sde brgyad so so'i
ming gi sngags: rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la: d+he ba a byi sarba b+h+yo bzlog: bra la dun rtse phob: badzra 'grig sho sa ma ya hri b+h+yo: san+ti ma ru ru:
ya ma trig b+hu ta k+Shi pa lo hUM: bzlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyis: las kyi mthar sgyur ma lus par: nga 'am nga dang 'dra ba yi: rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis:
phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis: gang la bsngags pa de dag sbyar: gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya ste: nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis: de la rig par snang ba
yin: zhes bka' stsal to: drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las: 'phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis: yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so: hUM| dur khrod chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas: gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na: gdug
byed ru tra sti ra'i khri steng na: mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na: dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso: bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni:
sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar: sa dgu rdzogs pas dbu dgu ston: stong pa bco brgyad ldan pa'i phyag: zhabs kyis brjid pa'i bdud bzhi gnon: dbus
mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar bas: khro zhing bzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhal: ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar: khams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzis: shangs kyis
srid gsum ma lus rngub: snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengs: tshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol: ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab: khro gnyer
'od kyis dbang du sdud: 'phrin las rigs kyis dbu la brgyan: bco brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis: dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin: g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad
na: dregs pa'i lha brgyad ban+d+ha g.yas: tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams: 'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan: srung ba'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs: g.yas g.yon zhabs
kyis dregs pa gzir: ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed: log lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpal: byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
bzhi sbyor: gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas: ban+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon: mthing nag 'od kyis kun tu khyab: ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa 'di: dbu gsum
phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad: sku mdog mthing nag khros shing rngam: phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po yis: rdo rjes dung khrag dkrug cing gsol: g.yas g.yon gnyis
kyi phyag bzhi yis: lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol: yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma: sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor: g.yas kyi
nam mkha' stong khams 'degs: g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon: zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma: dpal chen yab yum byin rlabs las: sprul pa'i dregs pa
pho mo gtso: bdud mo nag mo kha rlangs can: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing : khram shing tri shUl g.yas na bsnams: g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen: na
bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol: zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying gar gzir: bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma: khrag bam thod rlon phyag na bsnams: sku la zhing
lpags gsar pa bgos: bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs: zhabs kyis dgra bges bshugs kyis sgrol: 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni: zhal gcig phyag
gnyis sku mdog nag: phyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yon: btsun mo yum chen za byed ma: gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams: yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa
gsol: ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs: zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir: srin po gsod byed sku mdog nag: phyag na ral gri thod khrag bsnams: yum chen
gsod par byed ma yang : gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams: na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol: stag seng rol pa chibs su bcibs: gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang :
zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngoHdar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags brdeg: yum chen sha za ral gcig ma: yul gyi tshul 'dzin sprul pa mo: zhing lpags
gyon te gyi ling bcibs: drag sngags bdag po chen po ni: dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtso: mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar: na bza' dar dkar ber chen
gsol: chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibs: thar pa nag po ru tra'i gtso: mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams: zhing lpags gyon te dom nag bcibs: rmu
bdud rje dpon nag po ni: dar nag 'phyar zhing sti ra 'drad: ber nag gsal zhing rmu rta bcibs: mu stegs ka la yag sha ni: mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shUl 'dzin:
zhing lpags bgos te ma he bcibs: khyab 'jug ro ga ti nag po yang : khram shing dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin: sprin nag ba gos te 'brug sngon bcibs: klu rgyal ba ru
na yi rje: ser nag sprul gyi na bza' gsol: bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzin: chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs: rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba: mdog dkar
shel gri dar dkar 'dzin: sras mchog 'bar ba dmar po ste: mdung ring g.yos la shan gri g.yon: rdo rje mdzes pa mdog dmar po: ru
mtshon dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin: khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yang : mdog ser sprul pa'i lag dgu 'gyed: zhing lpags bgos shing sti ra gnon: drag sngags
bdag po gtso 'khor yang : rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 'dul ba: so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab: gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde: 'chi bar byed pa gshin rje'i sde:
gsod byed shan pa sin po'i sde: gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde: drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde: nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde: nam mkhar dbang sgyur
gza' yi sde: glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sde: sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngags can: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab: 'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang :
'phrin las longs spyod mi zad gter: yon tan nus pa dpag tu med: zhe sdang can la khros par ston: nga rgyal can la lhag par ston: 'dod chags can la
mi sdug ston: gti mug can la myos par ston: ser sna can la 'phrog par byed: phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston: khyod kyis mi 'dul gcig med kyi:
mchod cing bskang ba'i mthun rdzas bzhes: bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig: bstod cing sgrub pas las mdzod dgyes par mdzod: de nas rang gi snying po dang : 'jig
rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams: so so'i sngags kyi las la sbyar: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis: byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis: ltos dang re ba kun spangs te: sangs rgyas
bstan pa rab dmigs nas: drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs na: nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing : sems can rnams kyi ston par
'gyur: thun mong pa dang nye ba dang : mchog 'gyur ring ba'i dngos grub kun: dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung : yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing : 'jig rten chos
las rab bsngags pa'i: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang : sa chen po la rtogs pa yi: rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod: mthu stobs nus pa snyems
pa yis: gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing : rang gi dbang du khugs pa dang : bsgo ba rtsod pa med par 'gyur: zhes bka' stsal to: drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
rgyud las/ bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i
lugs su sku sprul te thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba
dpag tu med pa phyung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nas ma rungs shing gdug pa dang
gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad kyang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te: phan pa dang : bde ba dang : gnod pa med pa dang :
brtse ba dang : yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces
gsol to: kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang : khyod kyi bstan pa gsang chen 'di: ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu: rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhig na: bdag cag 'jig rten
dregs pa can: zhi ba sems su gnas byas pas: rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa: de la rgyas pa phan par bstan: 'phrin las dang ni lta spyod kyis: khyab pa de las
yongs rdzogs shing : grogs dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du: gang gis bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi: dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan dang : rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan
pa la: bka' las 'da' ba mi spyod cing : gsung bzhin sgrub par rab tu spro: bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis: ji ltar mngags pa'i las rnams ni: bdag cag nus pas
myur du bsgrub: byin gyis brlabs pa gtsor mdzod cig: ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing phyin par gyur to: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa
rnams rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing : sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do: drag sngags 'dus pa'i
rtsa ba'i rgyud las: 'phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang : bod kyi lo tsA ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa: rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyi bla'i
phyag dpe la zhal bshus pa las brgyud/ rgya gar skad duH lo ka sto tra pU dza tan+t+ra nA ma no bi ka san+ta kaH bod skad du: 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa
rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
dang thugs kyi 'phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par sgrub par mdzad pa: mthu dang : stobs dang : mi 'jigs pa dang : dbang phyug dang : gzugs kyis 'jigs par
byed pa: gtum po dang : drag shul can dang : dregs pa can dang : stobs can dang : bzod par dka' ba dag myur du 'dul bar byed pa: bde bar gshegs pa thams
cad kyi thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid las phyung ba: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bo sa chen po mthar phyin pa la rab tu bzhugs pa: 'dod pa'i khams
dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi bdag po chen po: lcang lo can gyi gnas dang : ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi ded dpon
chen po de: 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzang na bzhugs te: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul
pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas tshig 'di skad du bskul te: kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin: khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis: bstan pa dam pa srung ba yi: mthu stobs
bdag por dbang bskur te: dam tshig chen po de gzigs la: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las: 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa yi: sku mchog drag po'i gsung dang
bcas: gtum po'i thugs kyis shugs phyung la: gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir: sprul pa lnga 'phrul 'phrin las kyis: sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod:
ces bskul ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin las ma g.yos
kyang gdul bar bya ba'i yul drag shul can rnams la gzigs nas phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sku'i rnam
par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste: sku mdog mthing nag zhal dgu pa la: g.yas kyi zhal ni kham nag gtsigs pa: g.yon gyi zhal
ni smug nag bsdus pa: dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rngam pa: phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi thod khrag dkrug cing gsol ba: g.yas 'og ma brgyad na
lha chen po bsgral ba'i mgo bcad de bsnams pa: g.yon 'og ma brgyad na klu chen po brgyad kyi mgo bsnams pa: de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa: g.yas kyi
spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa: g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phred la gzigs pa: dbus kyi spyan dgu thur la sdang mig mdzad pa: khro gnyer drag po
dpral bar bsdus pa: shangs nas srid pa'i rlung drag po 'tshub pa: zhal nas bskal ba'i me 'bar ba: mche ba dmar po bar snang khams su gtsigs pa: sma ra
ag tshom sprin bzhin du gtibs pa: dbu skra ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'khyil ba: snyan nas gdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa: sbrul gyi chun
pos yan lag dkris pa: bdud dang ru tra bsgral ba dang glang po che'i pags pa na bzar gsol ba: stag gi pags pas sku smad dkris pa: khrag dang zhag gi
thig le dang ri mos brgyan pa: thal chen gyis lus la byugs pa: thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang sha khrag ra ri can gyis phreng bar byas nas brgyan pa: zhabs brgyad
kyis tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang brgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa: yum chen po rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma rang gi sku
dang mtshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba: grangs med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang oM badzra tsan+d+ha sarba duSh+Tan ta
ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT: ces bya ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa: de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pa: 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang : bdud dang : gshin rje dang : srin po dang : gnod sbyin dang : gza' bdud dang : klu dang : rgyal po dang : ging
dang : ma mo chen mo rnams dang : mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang : ru tra dang : mu stegs dang : srog gi bdag po dang : nor gyi bdag po dang : tshe'i bdag po dang : sngags
kyi bdag po dang : srid pa'i bdag po dang : gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang : dur khrod chen po dang : yul chen po dang : 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha'
'khob kyi sa dang : ri'i rgyal po dang : ri phra mo dang : rgya mtsho dang : chu bran dang : yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang : nags tshal chen po dang : gnas phra mo bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang : gtso bo dang : 'khor dang : khyad par rgyu ba dang : bran dang : g.yog gi
tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi gnas nas myur bar dngang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang yang ba'i sems dang : dul ba'i sems kyis thon te bcom ldan 'das
de'i spyan sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang dbang med par lhags par gyur te: phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang : khyad par du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi dang : rgya mtsho chen po dang : rol pa'i chu klu'i gnas dang
bcas pa ri rab chen po dang : ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang : lha'i gnas 'dod pa'i khams dang : gzugs kyi khams dang : gzugs med pa'i khams
dang bcas pa dang : dmyal ba dang : yi dwags dang : byol song gi gnas na gnas pa dang : dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i chan gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas
rang rang gi mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa: gzhan dag gis nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste: de dag thams cad tha dad du rang
rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do: sde dpon chen po rnams ni: 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang gi 'khor dang
bcas te skyabs su 'gro bar byed de: thams cad kyi rang rang gi gzugs dang : longs spyod dang : 'khor dang : rgyan dang : bzhon pa dang : gnas dang nye bar bde bar
spyod pa 'phrin las khyad par ma lus par ston cing : ming gi snying po rnams mngon du phyung ste smras so/ /mahA de ba e dza: u ma de ba e dza: d+hu dra ma du phrag dza: dun ti ma
du dza: zhes 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud pho mo dang bcas pa rnams kyi rang rang gi ming phul ba'o: de nas gshin rje'i ded dpon rang gi tshogs dang
bcas pas rang rang gi ming dang srog dang bcas pa yul ba: hrIHSh+T-i kr-iSh+Na ya ma pre ta dza: ma ma ya mun+t+ri b+hi tr-i dza: zhes phul lo: de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor
dang bcas pa'i ming gi snying po rak+Sha ra sha ra ma ti rak+Sha ma shu ti dzaHzhes phul lo: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming dang srog gi snying po
yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha ta me yak+Shi ma sha dza zhes phul lo: de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon kha ba can gyi dbang pos rang gi ming phul ba: gaM b+ha b+had tra d+he ba ta ru ti
dza zhes phul lo: de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal phran gyi ded dpon lha'i the bcu gsum gyi bdag pos ming phul ba/ gaM ta pa sha li ba ra tri saM ka ra sha dza zhes phul lo: de nas
spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po smras pa: duspra shaM dza a ka ru gaM tsa dza zhes phul lo: de nas ye shes dang las la grub pa'i dam tshig gi tshogs
kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang sdud ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kun gyis rang rang gi snying po phul ba: ma ma trag mu tra ra tsa
e ka dza Ti ru ru ro tiSh+Ta b+hat+to re tu ma ti kha mun+t+ra pa tsa la me sha dza zhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi lha btsan po dang : ru tra'i rigs kyi ded dpon chen po rnams kyi rang rang
gi ming gi snying po de ba a b+hi shu tri ru tra ni dzi haM shaM tri dza zhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang : mu stegs byed pa dang : bdud dmu ba'i tshogs
kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po bi nA ya ka tir+thi ta ka du mun mun ba: dzaHzhes phul lo: de nas 'jig rten gyi srog gi bdag po dang : gnod sbyin klu'i bdag po rdo rje
can dang : bla'i rgyal po chen po dang : lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po ging+ka ra tri pa le rA dza
badzra bu ru lu dza badzra la ru tri dza mahA ka la yak+Shi dza zhes phul lo: de nas 'jig rten gyi klu dang gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi srog gi
snying po phyung ba/ nA ga tsi ta hu ya nA ga me k+She tra hu la g+hu he pa sha mi ke hUM dza zhes phul lo: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug ma rungs pa'i
'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog dang bcas pa: e a nri dza sa ma ya srog breng breng dza dza zhes phul lo: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can
'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas mi 'jigs pa byin te 'di skad du: kye ma 'jig rten grags pa'i tshogs: khyed rnams nga la ma 'jigs shig: nga ni sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi: sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las bdag: chos nyid zhi ba chen po yi: thugs rje dang ni ye shes kyis: dus gsum 'dus byas 'dus ma byas: skad
cig nyid la mngon du gsal: ma 'ongs sems can don gyi phyir: sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba ston: dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyang : thog ma med nas
da lta'i bar: nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te: gnas ngan len gyi bag chags kyis: lus ngag yid kyis mi dger spyod: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi
'chad: na rag chen por lhung nas ni: thar pa'i dus med 'byung srid kyi: de bas da lta'i dus mchog 'dir: nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi: sku gsung thugs dang
yon tan dang : mdzad pa'i 'phrin las rab son la: bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis: las dang srid ba don yod la: mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyis:
bslab pa'i gzhi bzung sems bskyed la: mthu stobs nus pa drag shul dag: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyod: rig 'dzin rnams kyi
bka' bzhin skyongs: khyed cag rgyal po rje dpon dang : bran g.yog tshul du lus brten pa: dngos grub gsol zhing 'phrin las sgrubs: gal te de ltar mi byed
cing : gsang ba'i tshig las 'gal byed na: khyed kyi lus sems srog gi rgyud: da lta nyid du ma rungs 'gyur: zhes bka' stsal nas dam pa'i tha tshig la
bkod nas bzhag go: 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dul ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i
dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
gsung thugs gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to: kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag: 'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul can: 'dod chags
zhe sdang sred len gyis: gang gi mchod cing brten byas nas: bdag cag rnams ni dga' mgu rangs: khyod kyi bka' lung rjes bzhin du: brtul zhugs 'dzin
pa de dag la: 'phrin las spyod pa'i grogs bya'i phyir: bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dus: rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yog dpung : mthun pa'i las dang longs spyod
dang : cha lugs rigs dang bsam pa dang : khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang : dam tshig sbyor ba'i khyad par dag: bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i: rig pa'i
tshul 'dzin don phyi ru: ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol: zhes gsol pas: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag gis gtso bo dbang
phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams: so so'i las dang gcig tu sbas pa dang : tha dad du sbyar ba dang : nges pa dang : ma nges pa dang : rim pa dang : 'chol ba dang : khyi
dang : nang dang : gsang ba dang : sbas pa dang : tshogs pa dang : 'thor ba dang : mthun pa'i rdzas dang : snying po dang : ma ga pa dang : gnyer gtad pa dang : skul ba dang :
rbad pa dang : bzlog pa dang : tshar gcad pa dang : gzir ba dang : spogs pa dang : las sna tshogs pa dag gi sgo nas rol pa chen po'i gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo
rje dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to: nyon cig 'jig rten dreg pa'i tshogs: phyi ma'i tshe na snyigs ma'i dus: dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'di: so so skye bo
rnams la snang : nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshul: rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi skuHrgyud dag sa lam rdzogs la gsal: spros med chos sku 'du
'bral med: ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs pas 'grub: bsam pa chos lnga smon pa yis: rigs drug so so'i bdag por snang : las kyi dregs pas khyed rnams ni:
'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa yis: gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas: gdul zhing drag par nus pa las: zhi bas gdul bar mi 'gyur te: rig pa 'dzin pa'i
skyes bu ni: stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul ba: khams gsum spyi la dbang sgyur byed: nga dang gnyis mer sbyor ba yis: las kyi bya ba rab rdzogs pas: dur khrod
chen po rab 'jigs pas: byin gyis brlabs pa'i dben sa ru: sgrib byang bsod nams bsags pa dang : bar chod bdud bzlog las la 'bad: mthun rdzas sa la
pho brang bzhengs: dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis bran: thod mkhar bang mdzod ldan pa 'am: e traM grangs dang sbyar bar bya: dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas brten:
ngas bshad tshul dang mthun par dgod: phyi rol sgo sogs rgyan 'jigs ldan: dur khrod chen po sngon du phyung : tsa ra ma he chu glang dang : seng+ge glang chen rta nag dang :
bya khyi lug nag rnga mo dang : stag dang bya rgod khyi phag nag: dur bya chu srin nya rus spal: rgod dkar rgod nag rta dkar dmar: so bya dre'u ba glang rnams: rgyal mtshan
sha khrag snying dang bcas: so so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bsham: 'bru bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzas: bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar ba: rin chen bcud kyis sbreng ba
ni: grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir gzhag: gdugs dang ba dan bla res dang : lda lngi dra ba za ra tshags: 'di la shis shing mthun pas te: stag gzig dom dred
'phar sbyang dang : kang+ka dur bya bya rgod khra: mi rta ban glang ke le yi: sha rgyus pags pa mgo yis bya: mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wAM ga: ral gri chu gri spu gri dang : tri shUl
phur pa so mang dang : mtshon cha drag pos bskor zhing gtams: mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyan: dri nga ba dang gdang ba dang : kha mngar tsha skyur rtsub pa dang : tsha
grang 'jam rtsub dro dang bsil: gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyis: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gtad: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des: phyi nang gsang ba'i srung ba yis:
gnod cing 'tshe ba tshar bcad de: bsod nams tshogs kyis rang rgyud sbyang : gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub: chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin du bsgom:
ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyed: ngo bo skyed rgyu hUM du bsgom: de las snod kyi gzhi mo lnga: ye shas 'byung ba lnga ru bsam: steng du rin chen ri rab
kyi: dbus su dur khrod gzhal med khang : thod mkhar e traM sum cu pa: gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin bskyed: dbus su nyi zla pad+ma dang : ro bzhi bsnol
ba'i steng nyid du: rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugs: nga nyid kun la snang bzhin bsam: yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma: gtso dang gnyis med sbyor ba
las: thabs dang shes rab 'od zer las: e dgu'i rnam pa sa bon tshul: 'phro 'dus gri gug kha T+wAM gsal: de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud sbyangs pas: 'dod
khams dbang phyug gtso bo che: lha mo yum dang bcas par 'gyur: seng+ge glang chen zhabs kyis gnon: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngam: na bza'
ljang nag klubs ber gsol: gtso chen gri gug tsit+ta bsnams: yum gyis kha T+wAM thod khrag bzung : yab yum gnyis med thugs ka nas: ya ma: dun+tiHrak+Sha:
yak+Sha las: phyogs bzhir bdud dang gshin rje dang : srin po gnod sbyin sde dpon dang : yab yum bcas pa gsal bar spro: gra heHnA ga: steng 'og tu ni bdud
klu'i gza'i: sde dpon yab yum spro zhing bskyed: de ba: tri dza: du triHgang bzang lha dang rnam rgyal dang : spyi bdud sde dpon shar du bskyed: ma maMHdza ti: d+ha ki las:
ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo dang : ral gcig ma dang mgyogs byed ma: mo tshogs sde dpon lho phyogs su'o: ru traHa b+hiHhaM shaM las: lha sbyin btsan dmar
ril btsan gyi: sde dpon nub kyi phyogs su bskyed: bi traHti thiHrmu du las: bgegs dang mu stegs rmu bdud kyi: sde dpon byang gi phyogs su bskyed: tri yaM: ra tri
sa trin tri las: srid pa'i srog gi bdag po dang : gnod sbyin klu tsha bdud rgyal po: sku lha gsang ba rdo rje legs: nag po chen po chos srung rje: shar lho nub byang sgo
bzhir bskyed: phyi rol khyams su dregs pa can: so so'i g.yog 'khor mang po dag: bka' nyan gsung sdod tshul du bskyed: rang rang sngags kyis bstan par
bya: dbang po'i tshul du gsal ba dang : 'jig rten rang rgyud so so yi: gnas nas 'od kyis bkye pa dang : gsang ba'i snying pos myur du 'bod: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul
'dra ba: rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la bstim: rang rgyud pa dang gzugs brnyan 'dres: oM AHhUM oM badzra tsan+d+ha sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT: sku gsung thugs
ldan byin brlab cing : rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur bya: dur khrod gnas kyi sgo bzhi nas: bka' nyan las byed sde brgyad kyis:
lus ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing : phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshogs: 'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can: gzugs can gzugs med bcas
pa yis: dregs pa'i tshogs la mnyes par dbul: sku yi cha lugs so so yi: don rtags mthun pa'i tshig gis bstod: sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan
dang : 'phrin las smos te thugs dam bskul: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs: gsal bstan tshad dang ldan pa yis: nam mkha'i khams kun mthas
khyab kun: rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigs: dregs pa'i sde dpon re re'i drung : rdul snyed 'dul byed gnyen po gnas: phal pa re re'i gnas
drung du: sde dpon chen po de bzhin bsam: bka' nyan gsung sdod g.yo ma nus: cung tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cing : rang gi 'dod pa mi spobs la: skad
cig tsam la don sgrub dmigs: de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyi: bsnyen cing sgrub pa tshad rtags ldan: yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni: dregs pa'i ded
dpon tshogs rnams kyis: so so'i gzugs brnyan gsal btab ste: rang gi ming gi snying po dang : gcod 'phrog yi ge spos te bzlas: dus tshad grangs dang
mtshan ma yis: tshad bzung ma nor grub pa yis: rtags la phab ste las la sbyar: nga nyid rjes su sgrub byed pas: dregs pa myur du dbang du sdud: ces bka'
stsal to: 'jig rten pa'i ded dpon gyi tshogs nye bar sgrub pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas rab tu bshad
bya ba: 'di dag kun la ngas bshad pa'i: sde dpon chen po rang gnas nas: 'bod dang gzhug pa mnyes pa dang : bstod dang thugs dam bskul ba dag:
tshig brjod 'di yis brtan par bya: thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas: chos sku stong nyid dbyings las ma g.yos kyang : 'jig rten dregs pa'i
tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir: khro chen dpa' gtum 'jigs byed skur bstan pa: thugs dam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcas: ma rtogs shugs
kyis 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol: dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lha yi gtso: 'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas ma: 'khor tshogs drag shul
mthu stobs dpung gi bdag: khro gtum gdug pa'i rtsal 'chang dpal dang ldan: rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub: dam tshig rjes
dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol: badzra sarba duSh+TaM a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo: a gats+tsha sa ma ya hring hring : dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir: lha
chen nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du: bcom ldan khro rgyal rngam brjid 'bar ba'i skuHyab yum da gyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsol: snang srid dregs pa
ma lus ded dpon gtso/ /'dod khams bdag po dgyes mdzad yum dang bcas: lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcas: 'phrin las mthun pa'i
gdan la bzhugs su gsol: badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo: sa ma ya sti ta badzra hUM dza: dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchogaH chos kyi
sku las gzugs sku 'gro don sprul: che btsan 'gran zla med pa khro bo'i rje: dbang sdud yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma
lus sras dang bcas: dam bcas bstan pa'i tshul srung 'jig rten mgon: zhing bcu sgrol mdzad 'phrin las drag shul can: sde dpon sum cu'i tshogs
la phyag 'tshal lo: badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo: na ma a ra li hoHdpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la: sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'bul ba
ni: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re dang : phreng ba phye ma lnga ldi za ra tshags: bdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dang : gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bro
dang : reg 'jam 'dod yon ma lus ji snyed pa'i: 'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs bzhes su gsol: khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni: dus gsum
gnas su sbyangs pa'i sha rus khrag: dug lnga sman du sgrub pa'i dam tshig rdzas: stobs mchog nus pa ba liM mchod pa dngos: thugs rjes mthun pa'i ngang gis
bzhes su gsol/ /dpal chen yab yum bka' bzhin rjes sgrub pa'i: dbang phyug chen po yab yum mnga' bdag rje: 'jig rten 'das kyang 'khor ba'i cha
lugs 'dzin: bka' yi bstan srung sde dpon sum cu la: 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa ni: dkar dmar ser ljang la sogs mdog: zlum po gru bzhi la
sogs dbyibs: che chung sbom phra ring thung tshad: mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi sdug: 'byung ba rten 'brel rol mo'i sgra: glu tshig bstod dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig:
spos sman bdud rtsi me tog driHsreg bsung baM bsung dri dang ngad: kha mngar tsha skyur ska ba dang : lan tshwa spod dang byi skyu dang : 'jam rtsub
bsil yang tsha dang bro: so so'i yon tan tshogs dang bcas: 'dod rgur 'bul gyi bzhes su gsol: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang : don snying lnga dang 'byung
ba lnga: dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang : phung po lnga dang nang khrol lnga: 'tshe zhing gsod dang bar du gcod: gdug par sems shing log par lta: mi mthun
phyogs lngar bcas pa rnams: so sor 'bul bas bzhes su gsol: badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e tsa dza b+h+yo: mahA ba liM ta: a mr-i ta: su ka ta: maM sa
rak+ta: pi pa ta: b+ha su ta: la ma ta: i daM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma du: kha kha: khA hi khA hiHbcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dang : yum chen khams gsum
spyi 'dul 'khor bcas kyis: sku mdog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhin: gsal zhing rtog med snang ba ma 'gags pa: sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i
dngos grub stsol: gsung mchog 'gag med brag ca sbra snyan bzhin: snyan dang mi snyan grags stong tshangs pa'i gsung : gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mthas khyab
dngos grub stsol: thugs mchog spros bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyings: mi rtog bde chen thabs dang shes rab dang : rtsol med mi g.yo mchog gi dngos grub stsol:
yon tan brjod kyis mi lang sna tshogs yod: 'das dang ma 'das mchog dang thun mong gi: grub pa brgyad dang mthar thug dngos grub stsol: 'jigs pa brgyad sogs
zhi dang 'byor pa rgyas: log lta mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang du sdud: mngon spyod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dngos grub stsol: badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza kA ya
sid+d+hi: wAk+ka sid+d+hi: tsit+ta sid+d+hi: gu Na sid+d+hi: karma sid+d+hi: hUM hUM hUM: bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni: dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad de: sku mdog mthing
nag khro zhing rngam: g.yas kyi zhal gsum smug nag bgrad: g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag gtsigs: dbu skra ral pa me dpung 'bar: spyan dgu sdang mig
bzlog cing bgrad: shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'thor: snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra ldir: sma ra ag tshom me ltar 'bar: mche gtsigs srid gsum rtsa ba
gcod: phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yis: rdo rjes thod khrag dkrug cing gsol: g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og ma na: dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral ba yi: g.yang
gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnams: g.yon gyi phyag brgyad 'og ma na: klu chen brgyad kyi ban+d+ha ru: dregs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsol:
dpa' bo'i chas brgyad sku la rdzogs: zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum dor stabs kyis: khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi mnan: yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul
ma: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag skuHrdo rje 'phyar zhing thod khrag stob: gnyis med thugs kyi 'phrin las kyis: 'jig rten dregs pa bran du 'khol: lha srin
sde brgyad las la 'gyed: dgra bgegs gdug pa rtsad nas gcod: khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod: dpal gyi bka' bzhin las mdzad pa'i: lha chen dbang
phyug chen po ni: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing : phyag g.yas gri gug tsit+ta g.yon: lha mo u ma de ba ni: sku mdog mthing nag gtso la 'dud: phyag
g.yas rtse gsum thod khrag g.yon: seng+ge glang chen gdan la bzhugs: sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtso: yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod: bdud kyi rgyal
po'i sde dpon ni: khram shing g.yas la dgra sta g.yon: bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugs: sbyor yum bdud mo re ma ti: khrag bam g.yas la nad rkyal
g.yon: bong bu gwa dmar gdan la bzhugs: gshin rje'i sde dpon chen po ni: be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon: sbyor ba gshin rje za byed mo: phyag gnyis srid
pa'i 'khor lo bskor: yab yum ma he chu glang gnon: srin po'i sde dpon glog phreng can: phyag gnyis thog ser 'dril zhing 'phen: srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma:
phyag g.yas phur pa khrag phor g.yon: yab yum 'brug dang rnga mo gnon: gnod sbyin sde dpon me sbal ni: phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon ral gri: sbyor yum gnod
sbyin nag mo ni: phyag g.yas spu gri g.yon sbyang mo: stag seng phag mo zhabs kyis mnan: bza' bdud ded dpon chen po ni: phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sbrul
zhags: sku smad sbrul 'khril 'brug chen gnon: sbyor yum thog gi bu yug can: g.yas g.yon phyag gis thog ser 'bebs: klu rgyal ded dpon chen po ni: phyag
g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon nad rkyal: sbyor yum klu mo nag mo ni: sbrul mgo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshul: yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnon: phyogs bzhi steng
'og gnas bzhugs pa'i: dregs pa'i ded dpon 'di dag ni: kun kyang sku mdog mthing nag la: khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul can: dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i chas
kyis brgyan: rang gi tshogs 'dus 'phrin las mdzad: yab yum bcas la phyag 'chal bstod: gnod sbyin sta yi rgyal po ni: shel gri ba dan
dkar po 'dzin: rgod dkar ru bzang zhabs kyis mnan: gnam rgyal chen po ded dpon ni: phyag g.yas ldan dkar g.yon shel gri: rta dkar rdog dmar zhabs
kyis mnan: spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtseHphyag g.yas ba dan g.yon shel gri: zhabs gnyis rdo rta gro bo gnon: dkar po'i ded dpon chen po gsum: shar
phyogs gnas la phyag 'chal bstod: srid pa'i ma me ded dpon mo: 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon: zhabs gnyis 'brug mo mgo dgu gnon: sngags
kyi srung ma chen mo ni: tsit+ta g.yas la spyad mo g.yon: dred rta nag mo zhabs kyis gnon: mkha' 'gro nag mo mgyogs byed ma: rgyu zhags g.yas la mtshon gru
g.yon: so bya nag po zhabs kyis gnon: nag mo'i ded dpon ma mo gsum: lho phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod: rdo rje bdud 'dul nag po ni: g.yas
g.yon phyag gis thun khrag 'phen: drag btsan srog zan dmar po ni: mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dar dmar 'phyar: che btsan 'gong rgyal chen po ni: shag lang
dang ni zhags pa 'dzin: dmar po'i ded dpon rgyal po gsum: kun kyang rta dmar zhabs kyis gnon: nub phyogs skyong la phyag 'tshal bstod: bi na ya ga bgegs
kyi rgyal: phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod khrag: phyi rol skyong ba'i mu stegs gtso: tri shUl g.yas la thong khrag g.yon: rmu bdud chen po khrag med ni: mda' gzhu
dang ni shang lang 'dzin: nag po'i tshogs kyi ded dpon gsum: bdud rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon: byang phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod: tshangs pa'i rgyal
po srog gi bdag: spu gri g.yas la nyi zhags g.yon: seng+ge dkar po zhabs kyis gnon: bdud kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag: bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon:
ban glang sna ring zhabs kyis gnon: sku lha'i rgyal po yul gyi bdag: phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa dan: ra dkar gnam ru zhabs kyis gnon: nag po chen po
tshogs kyi bdag: phyag g.yas be con g.yon thod khrag: rta nag mgyogs pa zhabs kyis gnon: phyogs kyi sde dpon chen po bzhi: sku mdog dkar ser dmar
nag mdzes: sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod: ded dpon dregs pa 'di dag ni: khro zhing gtum pa'i tshul 'chang zhing : na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs
pa'i chas: sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan: rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis bskor: sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab: mchod
bstod chen pos khyed bsgrubs na: so so'i tshogs 'dul 'phrin las mdzod: zhes brjod ting 'dzin ldan pa yis: dregs pa'i ded dpon mchod cing
bstod: 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis: 'jig rten gtso bdag gzhung bzhin bsgrub: rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med: ces bka' stsal to: 'jig rten
gyi ded dpon nye bar sgrub pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rab tu bshad bya ba: 'jig rten dregs pa dbang
sdud cing : tshar gcad las la bskul ba'i phyir: byin rlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad: gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas dag tu: sngar bshad las kyi pho
brang bsham: yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par 'phags: ma lus par ni gzung bar bya: rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'brang bcas: mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar: dus
kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtags: bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad: gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnams: khyad par gnas pa'i sta gon bya:
bris dang brkos pa la sogs pa'i: ded dpon rnams kyi gzugs brnyan dang : phur pa grangs dang mnyam par dgram: gzhan yang bum pa mchod gtor dang : dug
gtor thun gtor thun rdzas dang : sha khrag bshos chang bza' btung sogs: rgyal mtshan ba dan mda' dang gzhu: dpa' ba'i chas dang rol mo'i sgra: rab tu brdar zhing
mdzes par bsham: rdo rje 'dzin pas ting 'dzin gsal: las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod bya: rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang : bshags dral gcugs
spyang dbab pa bya: mos shing spros bdag dang ba yis: bdud 'dul gtso la skyabs su 'gro bstan pa srung par sems bskyed de: bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin: he
ru ka dang gnyis med la: gdug byed log lta 'dul nus pa'i: mthu dbang chen po'i gzhung 'tshal gyi: brtse ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas ni: dkyil 'khor dam
par gzhug tu gsol: nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu: dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs: gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir: spro bas 'jug pa
khyod lags kyi: mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis: dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug shog: mgon po he ru ka dpal rje: 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa
yi: drag shul spyod pa'i pho brang du: mdzes pa'i me tog bdag 'bul gyi: rdo rje dam tshig 'di bzhes la: dregs pa 'dul nus dngos
grub stsol: pra ti g+h+r-i h+Na puSh+pa hUM: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi: rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod ni: thog ma med nas da lta'i bar: bstan pa srung ba'i skal ldan
te: sde dpon dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'dir: bstan la rab dga' sems kyis ltos: badzra ya sa ma ya ma d+ha la tsag shu pra be sha ya phaT: rdo rje bdud rtsi dam
tshig chuH'di las dus gsum 'da' mi bya: grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis yin te: tshul bzhin mi 'da' bros dor cig: mahA sa ma ya i da te na rag kAn ShA
pa mi li: rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin che: thugs rjes rtag tu byin brlabs phyir: 'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bar: mthu stobs dngos grub stsal du gsol:
badzra sa ma ya tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM: thog ma'i sangs rgyas sras bcas kyi: rjes su sgrub pa bdag yin gyi: 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i: lha dang dregs
pa mthu stobs can: gtso dang 'khor du bcas rnams kyis: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongs: rdo rje slob ma rig 'dzin la: dbang bskur dngos grub
stsol mdzad pa: nus chen rtags mtshan bstan du gsol: rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis: khri stan chen po'i steng 'dug la: snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag
ste: dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yis: sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur bya: gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yul: dregs chen yab yum 'khor bcas
kyi: mdzes pa'i sku gzugs sku yi dbang : so so'i tshig bstod snying po dang : smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o: rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyis: chos skur
dbang bskur thugs kyi 'o: rigs sbyangs stobs la ngang gis gsal: phur pa drag shul rdzas kyi dbang : mchod gtor bshos cha sku gsung thugs: ma lus mnyes
