par byas pas te: yo byad tshogs kyi longs spyod spel: rgyal mtshan ba dan sgra dang bcas: dus rnams kun tu mnga' thang rgyas: sha khrag dug gtor thun rdzas
rnams: dregs pa'i ded dpon dbang sdud cing : pho nya 'phrin las bskul mdzad de: mngon spyod gdug pa tshar gcod dbang : 'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan
sgra: don ngo shes pas dbang bskur te: chos sku spyi dang dregs pa yi: sde dpon so so'i dam tshig rtsal: thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis: rang bzhin don gyis
sgrol byed pa'i: dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus te: tha dad mi gnas gcig yin no: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis: phyi nang
'khor bcas so sor snang : ma lus dbang bsdu zil mnan phyir: so so'i snying po tshad kyis bstim: nga rgyal brtan po bdun du skyes: don snying sha rus khrag sogs
bza': dus gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyung : gzugs brnyan bstims la rab tu gsal: dbang bsdu las bcol gdul ba'i phyir: zhabs 'og
mnan te bran bzhin bsgo: dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso: dam tshig dbab cing bstod bskul bcol: 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang : nga
dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis: zhal mthong lung bstan mchog stsal pa: srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis: da rung 'jig rten las la spyod: rang rgyu da rtsub mos
phan gnod sbyor: nga ni bka' yi dam tshig gzung : ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub bya dang : sgrub par byed pa de dag dang : mnyam par kun la dbang bsgyur te: chos
nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs: theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang ston: ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir: rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag gnas pa: kun tu bzang po
nyid thob 'gyur: ces bka' stsal to: 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar sgrub pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
de nas rab tu bshad bya ba: dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes bya'i phyir: mthun rdzas gzugs kyis bkang ba ni: ri bo'i rtse mo'i chu bo'i mdo: 'jig rten dbang phyug
'du gnas su: skal med yul la mchod sbyin gnas: thod mkhar re mig dgu sogs sam: yang na gling bzhi ri rab brtsigs: 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs
pa: rin chen spos sman me tog stsal: dregs pa bdag po so so yi: gzugs brnyan rang gi 'khor dang bcas: sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shing :
rang gi gdan khri bzhon par bcibs: ri rab thod mkhar yang steng du: lha chen yab yum 'khor bcas bzhugs: bang rim re mig dang po gsum: bdud dang gshin
rje srin po dang : gnod sbyin gza' dang klu rnams kyi: sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgod: gnyis po la ni dkar po dang : nag mo dmar po nag po'o: sde dpon bcu
gnyis gnas su bya: gsum pa'i phyogs bzhir sgo srung bzhi: 'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgod: tha ma gsum mam bzhi pa la: phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa la: gsang
ba'i gter dang drag po sngags: las byed btags chags lha ma srin: sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgod: gtso chen sum cu'i
mthun rdzas ni: rang gi gdan nam bzhon pa yi: srog chags gzugs ni lnga 'am b+cuHbrgya'am stong ngam grub tshad bya: skyes pa bud med glang chen rtaH
ban glang ra lug bya ra khyiHlongs spyod bskong rdzas sngar bzhin no: sde brgyad phal pa kun la ni: shes ldan mi dang byol song ste: 'dab chags gcan gzan
ri dwags dang : sa chur gnas dang dud 'gro'i tshogs: mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugs: ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis bskor: 'di dag bskang ba'i yo byad ni:
'gro ba'i glud du 'bul ba ni: rin chen ngar mi rgyan ldan dang : nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brnyan dang : sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang : shing glud yul
mkhar mtshon pa dang : skyes pa bud med phyag cha dang : rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams: dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang : mthun pa grangs mnyam gnas
su dgod: mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang : gling tshad chung du de bzhin no: bzlog gsad drag po zor gyi rdzas: sbyin pa'i sa la zor phor du: gru gsum mnyam
byas dug khrag dang : thun rdzas sna tshogs stsal ba dang : gdug pa'i shing gi rtsang phur dang : ban+d+ha dug thun gtor mar bcas: bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis: ci rigs
sbyar te mdzes par dgod: steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi 'am: dar nag mtshon skud gdugs kyis dbub: tha mar ras bzang yol bas bres: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis:
gtso chen bskyed cing rdzogs pa dang : dregs pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nas: gzugs brnyan mthun rdzas bsngo ba ni: rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal gsal: bdud rtsi
mchod skyems rak+ta sbreng : sha chen spos kyi dri bsung 'phul: rnga chen gling bu rol mo sgra chen bsgrags: mda' chen ba dan nag pos g.yab: hUM nga ni dpal chen he ru ka:
gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byed: 'jig rten dregs pa zas su zaHkhams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbang : snang srid 'khro 'das nga yi bran: nga yi bka'
bzhin 'dir 'dus shig: nyon mongs dbang gis dregs pa yi: lha bdud gshin rje srin po dang : gnod sbyin gza' klu rgyal po dang : ging dang ma mo lha btsan dang : rang
gi sde dang g.yog tu bcas: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : ri rab chen po'i yang steng nas: lha chen dbang
phyug chen po bzhengs: btsun mo u ma de ba bzhengs: na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol: chibs su seng+ge glang chen chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston
pa ni: g.yas na pho rgyud pho nyar 'gyed: g.yon na mo rgyud las la 'khol: 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas bskor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs:
mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : rtsal gyi rgyal po seng+ge dang : stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dang : shes ldan mi dang cang shes rtaHtheg chen glang dang 'dod
'jo'i ba: rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan dang : thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya: khyed kyis bzhes pa'i dkor du 'bul: rin chen rgyan ldan dar mi dang :
sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang : sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang : shing ris yul mkhar mtshon pa dang : pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang : rgyal
mtshan pa dan ru mtshon rnams: nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa'i: rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul: dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang : mthun rdzas
ldan pa'i bshos cha dang : snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang : rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang : mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra: zhim pa'i dri dang bda'
ba'i ro: khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul: lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas: sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te: mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i dkor:
sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la: sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs: dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstod: rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrol: sgrub
pa po la bar gcod pa'i: stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs rnams: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang : glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig: ye 'brog sum
brgya drug cu'i tshogs: dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang : gshis ngan 'gum pa bco lnga dang : gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs: rmi lam mtshan
ltas ngan pa rnams: zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang : gdul dang tshar gcad las mdzod cig: ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas: srid pa'i rgyal po skos rje
ni: bdud rnams kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol: ral pa nag po mun ltar btibs: spyan mig nyi zla 'khyil ba 'dra: rno dpal
mche ba zla tshes gtsigs: sma ra kham nag srid rtser 'bar: chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: khram thog bdud sde g.yas nas
rol: sho thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'gyed: snang srid pho bdud khyod kyi 'khor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: mthun pa'i
rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : shugs ldan rta nag la sogs pa: khyod kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul: rin chen ngar mi la sogs pa: rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud
du 'bul: dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs pa: khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul: srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas kyis: sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs
la: ji ltar bcol ba'i las mdzod cig: bdud mo chen mo re ma ti: ma bdud kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs: dpal ldan nag mo 'jigs gzugs can: nag mo
sha zlog bdud kyi ma: sku la mthing nag ber chen gsol: chibs su bong bu gwa dmar chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed:
nag mo stong sde las la 'dzud: snang srid bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: cang shes bong bu la sogs pa: mthun pa'i
rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : srid pa'i bdud mo 'khor bcas kyis: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: ri rab chen po'i lho phyogs nas: gshin rje ya
ma rA dza ste: gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs: sku mdog nag po ral pa can: gdug pa'i thod sbrul g.yang gzhis brgyan: gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags pas
dkris: sha za'i mgo gcad thod du bcings: zhal bgrad mche ba rab tu gtsigs: ma he nag po chibs su chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: gshin rje pho mo pho
nyar 'gyed: 'chi bdag gshin rje btsun mo ste: gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cing : gshin rje mo yi sde dpon bzhengs: za byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan: g.yang
gzhi nag mo sku la gsol: chu glang nag po chibs su bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: yi dwags pho mo las la 'dzud: snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor: dam
tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: ma he chu glang la sogs pa: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i
'phrin las mdzod: ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas: srin po nag po glog phreng can: srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs: sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la: glog
dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyan: 'brug chen 'ur pa chibs su bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: srin po 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed: srin mo gsod byed las la
'dzud: gcan gzan gdug pa phyi nas rol: 'khor du snang srid srin pos bskor: srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma: srin mo rnams kyi sde
dpon bzhengs: sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs su rung : lus la khrag gis lwa nag gsol: rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs can: chibs su rnga mo gdong drug chibs:
khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni: srin mo kha 'bar pho nyar 'gyed: gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzud: snang srid srin mo 'khor dang bcas: srog gcod srin po yab
yum 'khor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: 'brug sngon rnga mo la sogs pa: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : srin po pho mo'i 'khor gyis
bskor: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs nas: gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dbal can: gnod sbyin kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs: sku
mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba la: me dpung tshub ma na bzar gsol: stag seng rngam pa chibs su bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: g.yas na me dbal 'bar
ba la: g.yon na du 'thul phyu ru ru: gnod sbyin stong sde pho nyar 'gyed: zhub chas 'bum sde las la 'dzud: 'jig rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor: gnod
sbyin chen mo blo mon ma: gnod sbyin bu mo gdug pa can: nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu ma: snyan cha rin chen ne'u les brgyan: sku la ba ti nag po gsol: chibs su lcags
kyi phag mo bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: nor 'dzin mo ni pho nyar 'gyed: glo mon nag mo las la 'dzud: gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes bskor: shan pa gnod
sbyin yab yum 'khor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: stag seng phag mo la sogs pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : gnod sbyin pho
mo 'khor dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs su: gza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa: rog ti khyab 'jug rA hu la: gza'
bdud sde dpon chen po bzhengs: mgo dgu smad sbrul mgo mang lus: chibs su 'brug chen glog 'gyu bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: 'brug sgra stong gsum
ldi ri riHnam mkha' glog 'od khyugs se khyugs: gza' bran rgyu skar pho nyar 'gyed: thog ser ki kang drag tu 'bebs: gza' bdud stong gi 'khor gyis bskor: gnam
sman thog gi bu yug ma: gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs: sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa la: na bza' gu zu mdzes pa gsol: 'brug sgra glog gi 'od la zhon:
khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: gza' chen nyi zla klad la bskor: rgyu skar tshogs ni zhal la 'char: lha sman 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed: gdong
zor ma mo las la 'dzud: zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis bskor: gza' gdong gnam sman yab yum 'khor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs:
'brug chen 'ur pa la sogs pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : gza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: ri
rab chen po'i 'og phyogs nas: klu bdud nag mo mgo dgu pa: klu rnams kun gyi sde dpon yin: sku stod dud kha nag mo la: tsha ba'i 'bu sring nyi li li: sku
smad dug sbrul nag po la: grang ba'i sbal lcong pha la la: chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: klu rgyal stong ni pho nyar 'gyed:
klu bran 'bum ni las la 'dzud: klu bdud gdug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor: klu mo yak+Sha nag mo ni: klu bdud nag mo'i sde dpon bzhengs: sku mdog dud kha 'jigs
bag can: sbrul nag gshibs pa'i ral pa las: mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phro: sbrul gyi thul ba na bzar gsol: sbal sbrul nye'u tha ra ra: rus sbal nag po
chibs su bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: klu rigs lnga yi sprul pa 'gyed: sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtong : snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcas:
gdug pa klu bdud yab yum 'khor: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: chu srin rus sbal la sogs pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs
dam bskang : klu bdud pho mo yab yum 'khor: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi: bang rim gnyis pa'i shar phyogs
la: gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba bzang : srid pa lha yi bcas: sde dpon bzhengs: mdog dkar ral ka 'bar ba gsol: gnam ru dkar po chibs su bcibs:
khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: gnod sbyin stong ni pho nyar 'gyed: lha dmag 'bum sde las la 'dzud: ba dan can ni g.yas nas rol: go mtshon can ni
g.yon nas rol: gnod sbyin lha yi 'khor dang bcas: skyes bu gnam rgyal chen po ni: rgyal phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' dar zab ber
chen gsol: rta dkar rngog dmar chibs su bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: rgyal bran stong ste pho nyar 'gyed: grong rgyu phra mo las la 'dzud: the
rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang bcas: spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtseHmi ma lha yi sde dpon bzhengs: sku stod rgya che'i slog pa gsol:
'bum bye smad kyi sham thabs can: dbu la shel rmog dkar po gsol: chibs su rdo rta gro bo bcibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: srid pa'i khyung
chen klad na lding : stag seng tshang ma phyi nas rol: sde dpon mched lnga pho nyar 'gyed: ma sangs spun dgu las la 'dzud: lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcas:
skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang : dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: gnam ru rta dkar gro bo chibs: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam
bskang : dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: bang rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs nas: ma chen srid pa'i rgyal
mo ni: snang srid ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' dar nag gu zu gsol: chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni:
tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyed: sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'khor: snang srid ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor: e ka dza Ti ral gcig ma: bka' yi srung ma'i
sde dpon ni: sku la na bza' mthing nag gsol: chibs su dre rta nag mo chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: srin mo nag mo pho nyar 'gyed: bal mo nag
mo las la 'khol: mon mo nag mo sna tshogs sprul: smug nag 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas: dpal ldan nag mo mgyogs byed ma: mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi
sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' mthing nag gu zu gsol: chibs su so bya rog po zhon: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed:
sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud: snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis bskor: dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum yang : dam tshig dbang gis gnas
'dir bzhugs: 'brug dang dre rta so bya sogs: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : nag mo sde gsum 'khor dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las
mdzod: bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas: skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni: gnod sbyin ru tra'i sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol:
ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibs: chibs su rta dre'u nag po chibs: zhing lpags gyon pa pho nyar 'gyed: ral 'chas bgos pa las la 'dzud: snang srid ru
tra'i 'khor gyis bskor: btsan rgyal srog zan dmar po ni: srid pa'i btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengs: sku la dar dkar ras dmar gsol:
chibs su rta dmar glog 'gyu chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: dbu la bse rmog dmar po gsol: btsan po kha bzhi pho nyar 'gyed: mgyogs pa sde
brgyad las la 'dzud: snang srid dregs pa'i btsan gyis bskor: skyes bu yam shud dmar po ni: btsan 'gong rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs: sku la zab dmar
ber chen gsol: chibs su rta dmar yid mgyogs chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: g.yas su bro brdung chi li li: g.yon na spyugs glu kyu ru ru: rta
zhon stong ni phyi na 'breng : srid pa'i btsan 'god 'khor dang bcas: skyes mchog dmar po sde gsum ni: dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: dre
nag rta dmar la sogs pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod:
bang rim bzhi pa'i byang phyogs nas: bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal: log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' mthing nag beng chen gsol: chibs
su rta nag mgyogs pa chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed: phyogs skyong tshogs ni las la 'dzud: snang srid bgegs kyi tshogs
kyis bskor: dbang phyug gu lang nag po ni: mu stegs tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol: chibs su stag seng ma he chibs:
khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: sa gzhi kun ni dmag gis 'gengs: bar snang mtshon dang dar gyis b+kang : nam mkha' glog dang 'od kyis 'gengs: gcan
gzan 'dab chags rgyug cing lding : mu stegs nag po'i 'khor gyis bskor: dmu bdud nag mo bkrag med ni: dmu bdud tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs: na bza'
mthing nag ber chen gsol: chibs su dmu rta nag po chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: dmu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed: dmu bran stong sde las la
'dzud: snang srid dmu yi 'khor gyis bskor: skyes mchog nag po sde gsum yang : dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs: stag seng ma he rta la sogs:
mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : phyi rol nag po'i tshogs dang bcas: ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod: ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi: bang rim
gsum pa'i shar phyogs la: tshangs pa dkar po srog gi b+dag: lha chen ging gi sde dpon bzhengs: srid pa gsum gyi myur mgyogs par:
sku la bya rgod thul ba gsol: chibs su seng+ge dkar po chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: ging chen bco brgyad pho nyar 'gyed: ging bdud pho mo las la 'gyed:
mi rta ra lug bya dang khyi: stag dang bya rgod la sogs pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : bang rim gsum pa'i lho phyogs la: gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi bdag: sku
la dom gyi slog pa gsol: chib+sa su ba glang sna ring chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: skyes pa brgya dang bud med rgya: nyan thos stong dang sngags pa stong : 'bag seng kon
bu bsam mi khyab: stag seng ba lang spra dang spre: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : bang rim gsum pa'i nub phyogs la: rdo rje mdzes pa zhes bya ba: 'jig rten
lha yi sde dpon yin: mthar shel gyi na bza' gsol: kun kyang shel gyi na bza' gsol: ra dkar gnam ru chibs su chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni: 'dzin
ging bzhi bcu pho nyar 'gyed: rang gi 'khor sde las la 'dzud: tsa ra bya khyi la sogs pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : bang rim gsum pa'i byang
phyogs la: lha chen nag po chen po ste: bstan pa srung ba'i sde dpon bzhengs: na bza' ljang nag ber nag gsol: chibs su bdud rta bra nag chibs: khyod kyi cho 'phrul
ston pa ni: lha dmag phyogs kyi dbugs 'byin cing : lha min g.yul ngo rab tu bzlog: phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzud: mi rta ra lug bya dang khyi:
nag po'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang : dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo srung bzhi: rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas: dam tshig dbang gis gnas
'dir bzhugs: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang : dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas: ji ltar bcol pa'i 'phrin las mdzod: bang
rim tha ma'i phyogs bzhi na: phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad dang : nang gi lha srin sde brgyad dang : sbas pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dang : gsang ba'i lha srin sde
brgyad dang : yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dang : drag po sngags kyi lha srin dang : las byed myur mgyogs lha srin dang : brtags shing chags pa'i
lha srin dang : sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la: khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni: shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta: theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba: rin
chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra: thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya: khyed kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul: rin chen rgyan ldan ngar mi dngaHsem+sa
kyi gzugs ldan ngar mi dang : sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang : shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang : pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang : rgyal mtshan ba
dan rol mo rnams: nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa: rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul: dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang : mthun rdzas ldan pa'i
bshos cha dang : snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang : rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang : mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra: zhim pa'i dri dang bda'
ba'i ro: khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul: 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas: sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te: mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed
pa'i dkor: sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la: sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs: dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis bstod: rnal 'byor sku
dgra khyed kyis sgrol: sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i: stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs dang : bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang : glo bur gnod pa
brgyad cu gcig: ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs: dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang : gshis ngan 'gum pa brgyad cu gcig: gzugs can dgra
dang gzugs med bgegs: rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams: zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang : gdul dang tshar gcad las mdzod cig: ces brjod rang
gi mthun rdzas bstab: bskang bzlog gsad dang gso la sogs: ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'phrin las bcol: gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub: ces bka' stsal to:
'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas rab tu bshad bya ba:
dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun: ngo bo rang rig byang chub sems: ma skyes dbyings las g.yos pa med: 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'dug cing :
mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas: 'jig rten mchod bstod ces su brjod: phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag ste: snang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor kun: gsang ba'i
bdag po de nyid dang : gnas skabs mchod bstod phyi yin no: dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung : rang gi snang ba 'dus pa'i tshogs: dbang po'i yul gyi longs spyod dang : gtsang spra'i rtog pa sbyang
pa'i rdzas: 'dod chags bzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi: gnyis med pha rol snang byed pa: rang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing : so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag: nges par
bstan pa nang gi'o: sems dang sems la bstar ba'i tshogs: thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che: ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub: lung nas ma lus 'dus pa las: chos
gzhan med de yul nyid dang : yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag /gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chud: mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba yi: lus las sprul zhing bsgrubs pas sku: 'bru bcu sgra
yi 'khor lo gsung : rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs: lha klu gnod sbyin btsan dang bdud: srin po gza' dang mo rigs rnams: dregs shing gdug pa khro zhing gtumaH myur mgyogs
rmugs shing thibs pa dang : dregs dang dbyings pa so so'i sde: ri rab bshos gtsang rgyan dang bcas: 'bru lug snying rtse tsa ru'i dbyibs: dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis mchod:
pha dang rgyal po grogs dang lha: ma dang rje khol bran lta bu: brten pa rang gi tshul yin no: che btsan dbang gis dngos grub dang : longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par blang : rgyud 'jam
skyabs che bka' nyan zhing : drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldog: shin tu nye ba yon tan te: rang la rtsub cing 'tshe ba dang : longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dang : glo bur nad kyis gzir
byed cing : slar ldog bkra shis nyams pa dang : bsgo ba mi nyan don med cing : rang rgyud rtsub cing khengs pa dang : rigs rgyud ma smin kun gyis brnyas: bsam don mi 'grub mnga' thang
nyams: rgyud don sbas pa ma shes skyon: khrims kyi bdag po lta bu'i lha: gnad kyis bcing zhing bsgrub par bya: dbang chen pha dang mtshungs pa'i bdud: mtshungs med grogs dang 'dra ba'i
btsan: gnod sbyin khrims kyi gtso lta bu: srin po srog dang rgol ba'i gshed: gza' rgod lag yan gzhon lta bu: sdong bu dug sbrul lta bu klu: mo rgyud dbang chen rje dbon ma: mtshungs ldan de yi
gnyen pos bsgrub: khugs su ma bcug bsgo mi nyan: se long gnad med bdud du 'gyur: bcud phur ma thebs slar la ldog: rang gi rab rol ma gzhar g.yel: lto ba ma dkrugs las
mi myur: log non ma ldan bdag nyid stob: dbang du ma 'dus bsgo mi nyan: gnad kyis mnan ngag brgyad kyis ni: mchod bstod bsgrubs te 'phrin las bcol: zhes bka' stsal to:
'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya: 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams:
drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni: dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu: rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nas: so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas bsar te: drag po'i las kyi khang pa ni: e dbyibs sum cu
ldan par bsham: phyi nang gsang ba sku gsung thugs: gnas byin brlab dang bskang dang mchod: spyi dang so sor bsngags pa dag: rab tu bde bar 'dod pas dmigs:
gzugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yis: lus dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang : srog dang srog gi gnyen po yis: sems dang sems kyi ngo bo las: phyi nang kun tu bsngags pa ste:
'phro 'du 'od kyis drang zhing dgug: rang gzhan dmigs pa de la bstim: sha lus khrag sogs ma lus bzas: dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs: ma lus mnyes pa 'di
yis bya: gang la dmigs pa tshad kyis sgrol: ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyis: bul dang myur ba'i blo yi stobs: 'di la the tshom mi bya ste: rdo rje 'chang chen gsang ba'i
bka': gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing : myur du 'pho bar bya ba ni: rno sbal tsha rtsub dri nga ba'i: yam shing gdug pas dbyibs ldan brtsig: gdol pa rigs ngan shan pa
dang : g.yung mo grogs bral khyim gyi mes: sbar zhing dug khrag mngar ba la: gzugs brnyan rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i: slar yang dmigs te lhag ma dbul: gtso
dang 'khor gyis rab phye ba'i: drag po'i tshig gis rab tu bgrang : dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi: che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yis: stob cing sbyin pa rim bzhin bya:
drang srong 'phrin las rdzogs par bskul: thal chen dang ni drag po'i rdzas: rme khrag gsum dang gsod byed gsum: mtshon bral rin chen gsum gyi dbyig: rang byung bkra shis bzlog pa'i
rdzas: nang du 'du 'phror sbyar ba ni: sgra tshig ting nge 'dzin ldan pas: stobs chen 'khor los dbab cing 'phang : dregs pa 'khor bcas las su d+mig+sa: gzhan yang mchod rdzas
gzugs brnyan byas: rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas bstim: 'gyu gnas sa dang chu phug dang : sa gsher 'thab dang phung shul dang : rgya mtsho'i dbus dang lam po che: mtshon gyis
brdegs dang rlung gis bskyal: bag med ltung zhing me chus 'joms: lugs nas byung ba'i rten 'brel te: brnag pa'i yid kyis 'dzin phur gdab: gdug byed 'khor dang zas su
gtad: ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par: thar bar mi 'gyur las kyi ging : byams dang snying rje'i sems ma rtogs: 'di ltar mngon par spyad pa yis: bstan la rab sdang phyir
gyur pa'i: rjes 'brang log par lta ba rnams: tshar gcod sgrol zhing 'dul ba yi: zhes bka' stsal to: 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i 'phrin las drag po'i las la
sbyar ba'i le'u ste: bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang gshad pa ni: 'jig rten dregs pa rang gi gnas: gsang ba'i snying po drag shul gzungs: kun bsdus dril
dang phye mas mnan: badzra sarba duSh+TaMn: e ka pa ra asta na ya: ma hA shwa ra de ba de bi: du phrag dun+ting ma ya: pre ta bi kr-i sta na rak+Sha rak+Sho yak+Sha k+Shi ta: biSh+Ti

pa tra a se la dza na ga gu ling sha dza: tsa du tri tsa ra tsa la ma du tri: ma ma ru lu man+t+ra rA dza du ma ti: ma kA la ru tra tIk+Sh+Na tir+thi ka tha: a b+hi shu tri pa sha li haM shaM tri dza: rA dza king+ka

ra: sa du tri nA tha kA la A gats+tsha hring hring dza 'bod pa'i sngags so: badzra sarba duSh+TAn e ka pa ra sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a gats+tsha/ ba li d+ta gr-ih+Na i maM ta gr-i h+Nan+tu ma hA ga na
pU dza kha kha khA hi khA hi: 'di dag sbyar bas mchod par 'gyur: sarba A yu mi tra sid+d+hi pu tra brta ni: sid+d+hi pu tra ba hu b+ha dra bA su d+ha ra rat+na rat+na puSh+TiM sid+d+hi: ma hA
dz+nyA na sarba d+ha rma gar+b+ha kA ya wa k+tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ pha la sid+d+hi mahA sid+d+hi a be sha ya a: ha ha hi ho: rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub blang : sarba sha truM yak+Sha rbad
rbad b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'di yis rab tu rbad par bya: r+n+ri hur thums dza:dza: sha truM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad: rU pa ya kan+da rbud rbud phaT phaT mA ra ya thums thums: ha na ha na:
da ha da ha: pa tsa pa tsa: tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ thun rbad thun rbad: 'di yis dmigs pa rab tu gsad: ma mA ra ya phri pre ta ka hring hring : tri sha phA li rU pa ya/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha:
hu lu hu lu: rbad nAn laM nAn: oM nan hUM nan: stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya nan: zhes pa yis ni mnan bar bya: sarba mA ra ha ka raM raM: dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM: s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya: ho ha
ya ho ha ya: raM tsa ya raM ku ya: zhes pas ma lus bsreg par bya: mA ra sha truM thun b+h+yo thum ri li b+h+yo na te thun: A be sha ya b+h+yo: dmigs pa 'di yis 'phang bar bya'o: badzra
uts+tsha Ta ya phaT a gri sarba b+h+yo bzlog: sa ma ya rbad sa myags bzlog: pha rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog: ma hA b+ha ri sha ya: a be sha ye pra tsa yaHbe tsa ya: be tsa ya: zhi bas lugs
dbyung chu dbab pa'o: nA ga gra he bi tsa ya phroM phroM hril hril: shar shar: raM na tsag ne phroM hril shar shar phob phob: drag pos bzlog cing bstab pa'o/ /ma hA shAn+tiM puSh+TiM wa shaM ku ru
mA ra ya dza ya karma ma li a mu ki sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ka ra swa sti swAhA/ 'phrin las thams cad rab sgrub pa'i: mthun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis: las kyi khyad par so
sor dbye: gnas sgyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha': snying rje byams pas rang bskul zhing : kun tu khyab pa'i mchod sbyin bya: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya:
drag pos bsgral zhing tshar gcod pa'i: las kun rang gzhan don du spyad: 'jig rten gnas shing srog dang snying : yi ge gsal bar rang 'byung gnas: mngon du
du rgyu ba thugs ka ste: ring thung pho mo khrag dang dus: chags sdang snying srog snying rje gtser: rdo rje pad+ma rlung dang gnas: thabs dang shes rab chos can dang : chos
nyid las dang 'bras bu yis: mi 'chang gnad 'tshang bod dang drang : grogs dang ldan pas las la sbyar: zhes bka' stsal to: 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las
sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba: 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams: tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrubs pa yis:
grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni: nyams dang rbad rtags rmi lam rtags: 'di la so sor 'byung 'gyur te: dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang : bde dang rtogs pa spro
bskyed cing : mngon rgyu yid kyis gdeng thob kyis: nyams nga bag tsha dogs med cing : nus lan 'phrin las mthar phyin rtogs: 'di dag la sogs rim par 'byung : lus
'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cing : yang zhing brtan la khyad par dga': nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus: 'byung ba'i nus pas mi bskyod cing : kha dog dang ldan sdug cing
mdzes: 'di la sogs pa lus 'byung gda': ji ltar bsgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin: rang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs: mthun pa'i tshul gyis mi 'dor la: snyan dang mi snyan
ci brjod rnams: tshangs pa yi dbyangs bzhin du 'ong : grags thos tsam gyis dbang du byed: tshul mdzes 'jug pa dag gi brda: gang la brtsam pa de 'grub cing : ma zhum mi spor
mi 'dor bas: dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo la: gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob: yid kyi yul du brda 'byung ba'i: snga phyi de ma thag pa 'o: bag chags ma yin rmi lam
ni: rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dang : che btsan rigs ldan rgyan bcas ldan: gcan gzan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang : skyes ba bud med bus pa sogs: rang
gi gnas su lhags pa ni: nye bar 'grub pa'i rtags yin no: bran 'bangs mngag pa'i tshul 'chang zhing : bka' bsgo las byed nyan pa rtags: ring ba'i
gnas nas glu len cing : rgyang mig lta ba g.yel ba'i rtags: rang la chad pa'i las rtsom zhing : nyes lan 'ded pa bzlog pa'i rtags: zas skom 'dod cing
'khrig lan bsnyag: rang nyid gnod 'gyod ma skongs rtags: 'jom zhing dud mos 'debs byed pa: ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtags: rang gi bsgo ba mi nyan
zhing : slar zhing tshur la 'khol 'dod pa: gnyen pos dbang du ma gyur rtags: mtshon cha brdung zhing tshad ma ldan: nus med bya ba mi 'grub pas: sngags kyi nus pa ma
grub rtags: gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang : rang gi yod pa 'dod med rnams: mchod bskang mthun rdzas ma chang rtags: sha rus khrag sogs longs spyod
cing : ngo mthon rab tu che ba na: las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin no: pha rol dmag tshogs ma byung zhing : sgo med khang par bdag zhugs la: ngan sngags gzhan gyis
bzlog ba'i rtags: bye brag sde brgyad so so ni: mi dang dud 'gro 'dab chags sogs: pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags: mo tshogs rgyan bzang ma mo ste: che btsan
'bag seng gtsug lag khang : bus pa spra spre rgyal po'i rtags: mi rta khra spyang ri dwags ni: brag btsan ri btsan rtags yin no: chu gnas dud 'gro klu yi rtags:
ma he ra lug mig mang dang : mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtags: skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa can: ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags: nya pa shan ba bya pa
dang : dmag gi go mtshon srin po'i rtags: 'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyar: bye brag sgrub pa'i rtags su 'gyur: zhes bka' stsal to: 'jig rten gyi sde
dpon chen po sgrub pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste: dgu pa'oH \u0f7f de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa: dregs pa can gyi khyad par rdzas: mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan
sku yi rten: ming nas 'bod pa gsung gi rten: phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten: lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nya: glang rta sngon po rin po che: g.yul bshams myur
bsgral bya gcan dang : nal bu shel nag bya nag dang : rta lug khyi dang rgod nag dang : ra phag bya khyi dkar po dang : kla klor rog dom khyi nag: sbrul nag bya rgod ra skyes
dang : rta ra bya khyi dmar po yi: snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni: lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang : ma mo bdud dang rgyal po ging : gshin rje gza' dang btsan rnams
kyi: rim bzhin so so brten pa'i rdzas: rab tu gsang ba nyid yin no: e ldan gdug bcas rgyud med kyi: thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dag: dug khrag rin chen drag
po'i 'bru: kun tshogs rab tu gsang ba'i rdzas: klu gzung snod ni sha khrag bcas: ru bzang rigs med myur song chu: myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzas: chu drag dpa'
rabs dud pa'i rdzas yin no: mchod rten ri rab rgya gram bcas: dme rdzas rigs ngan mgo bo gsum: dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas pad+ma ni: slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin
no: nad gdug baM ril mgo rkang rnam: rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin no: dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan ma ngan: dmigs pa'i rten la 'phang ba'i rdzas: ngan
pa'i sa yi rten khang dang : gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing : 'bru nag dug khrag bsres pa'i rdzas: gzhan yang dbang can
dregs pa'i 'khor: so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i: mthun dang mi mthun gtsang dang sme: bsngags pa'i kun rdzas shes par 'gyur: ma 'ongs dus na rdo rje
'chang : rang gi rig 'dzin byang chub sems: brtul zhugs can gyis 'grub pa yis: dbus dang mtha' 'kho ba yul rnams dang : sangs rgyas zhing gi
'jig rten khams: kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas pa'i: yid dang dngos po'i lus can rnams: khams dang rigs pa bsam pa dang : skyed pa rten gnas
yo byad dang : ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogs: shes ldan mig can rnams la ston: de tshe dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams: da lta nga yis gdams pa yin:
yang dag don la ma 'da' zhig: khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig: las kyi gnas ngan len spangs te: byang chub sa la myur 'gro yi: de bas bka' yi dam
mnos la: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin bsgrubs shing : gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshul: phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yis: nyams shing smras par
mi 'gyur bas: rgyas shing bstan par khyod kyis byos: zhes bka' stsal to: 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i rten rdzas dang : las kyi gnyer bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu
pa'oH \u0f7fde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de
dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus pa mdzad de dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to: kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams: bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i:
'jig rten dbang chen gtso chen rnams: mthar thug mya ngan 'das nas kyang : dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi: bstan pa'i tha tshig sgrub pa dang : rnal 'byor
lam gyi grogs mdzad phyir: drag po'i sku gsung thugs nyid dang : yon tan 'phrin las sna tshogs ston: phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin: skyes bu brtson ldan rnams
kyis ni: gnyis su 'dzin par yongs mi bya: yul snang phyi nang ma lus kun: rang rigs sems kyi rgyal por bsgrub: de ni ma bcos yul mi bral: ma chad ma lhung bdag
po med: gnyis med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub: nges 'gyur sbar blang rtsol sems bral: ma lus rtsa ba snying gi srog: de nyid shes bya rab tu blang : dbang gi rgyal po
'char bar 'gyur: gal te nga dang dregs pa can: so so rang rgyud ldan pa yis: gnyis 'dzin yid kyis rtog spyod cing : mtshan mar
rab tu sgom byed par: rkang med khams gsum bgrod 'dod cing : mig med stong gsum blta dang mtshungs: bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byed: de bas rigs mchog
ma rnams kyis: gsang bdag nga nyid shes par gyis: zhes bka' stsal nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros dang
bral ba'i dbyings su thim par mdzad do: 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor dang bcas pa chos sku mthar thug tu sgrub par gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o: :dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so: shrub+haM:
@/ skye ba 'di nas tshe rabs thams cad du/ /gsang gsum rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i snying po'i don/ /rtogs nas gzhan la sdom par byed pa la/ /rgyal ba sras bcas rnams dang cig gyur cig /
